68a7(rgyud): rgyud du// de ni 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// byang chub lam tu gnas pa gang // gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po can// de yis ma rig mngon skyon gyis// dbang phyug la sogs su lta'o// de phyir rang gis rig rang bzhin// 
68a8(rgyud): rnam dag 'di ni bshad pa yin// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor lus// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// / zhes bya ba ni
68b1(rgyud): dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin du rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga/ 
68b2(rgyud): pa'o// // de nas phyag rgya lhan cig skyes// byed rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya// mi phyed ma sogs rtsa rnams la// bzhi yis lhag pa bshad pa yin// mi phyed ma dang phra gzugs ma// bzang mo g.yon ma g.yon
68b3(rgyud): phyogs ma// ru swal skyes ma sgom pa mo// spyi ma dang ni sgra sbyin ma// dngos ma su ma na de bzhin// la la na dang ra sa na// a wa d+hU ti spro ba'i ngag/ pra man dro ma grub ma dang // rgan mo skye bo kun 'thun ma// 'dar ba mo dang sIng / 
68b4(rgyud): phyi ma// ngang pa gsum skor 'dod ma klu// gtum mo bdud kyi bu mo dang // zla ba nyi ma me re hu// sum bcu rtsa drug rtsa rnams la// re ri la ni bcu gnyis te// thams cad dbye ba phye ba ni// slar yang phyag rgya mdor bstan pa'o/ 
68b5(rgyud): sor mo gcig ni bstan byas te// de yi sor mo gnyis bstan bya// 'og dang steng du mnyam par ni// slar yang mthe bong bstan par bya// 'di rnams rtsa ni thams cad rnams// 'og dang steng tu mnyam rengs pa'o// thams cad
68b6(rgyud): mkhyen pas 'gro bya mchog/ sna tshogs rim pos shes par bya// de yi mthe'u chung rab bstan bya// de dang yang dag gnas byed pa'o// gang gi ming ni ston pa na// de yi rab tu ston pa ster// rdo rje nyi ma he ra ka dag/ rkyang ma snyed/ 
68b7(rgyud): ka'i pad mar ro// gang gis sdigs 'dzub ston ma ni// gung mo rab tu bstan par bya// rdo rje pad ma'i rab sbyor bas// bde ba steng tu 'phang bar bya// gang gi dpral ba ston pa na// de yI dar sbyangs rab bstan bya// rang gi rig
68b8(rgyud): pa'i bde ba ster// phyag rgya dang bcas 'ching par 'gyur// gang gi 'khor lo ston pa na// de yi sa gzhi rib stan bya// gtsug ter dang ni lter 'gro ba// lag pa gnyis kyis rengs par bya// gang gi mig ni ston pa na// de yi
69a1(rgyud): #/ me long rab bstan bya// lha rdzas dbang po rnams kyi rgyus// 'od gsal ba ni mthong bar 'gyur// gang gi lto bar rdeg byed pa// de yi lte bar rab bstan bya// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du// rnam shes brgyad
69a2(rgyud): po snang bar 'gyur// gang gi nam mkha' ston pa na// de yi nyi ma rab bstan bya// stong nyid snying rje yang dag par// rtsa ba'i rnal 'byor nyid kyis mthong // gang gi khro gnyer ston pa na// de yi 'tshams kyi mtha' bstan bya// 
69a3(rgyud): bdag nyid yang dag sbyor rol cing // rang gi rjes su myong ba shes// gang gi chu bo ston pa na// de yi rgya mtsho rab bstan bya// sa gcig gi ni rab sbyor bas// thams cad sar ni rab tu bsngags// gang gis pus mo ston pa na// 
69a4(rgyud): de yi rkang pa rab bstan bya// bde 'gro ba'i dus su ni// dbang po'i dngos po de 'gro'o// gang gi nu ma ston pa na// de yi gdan ni rab bstan bya// bde ba long spyod bdag nyid skyes// kun nas srid pa 'dzag par du'o// gang gi
69a5(rgyud): dpung pa ston pa ni// de yi lag pa rab bstan bya// 'bar ba dbyug pa bzhin snang la// bdud rtse lnga rnams bsreg par bya// gang gi brla ni ston pa na// de yi gsang ba rab bstan bya// gzhu'i dbyug pa'i rnam pa'i srog
69a6(rgyud): dbu ma rnams su'ang thim pa'o// gang gi lce ni ston pa ni// de yi rkan ni rab sten bya// gtum mo thams cad rtsa ru ni// bsdus nas rnam par gnas pa yin// gang gi mchu ni ston pa na// de yi kos ko rab bstan bya// 
69a7(rgyud): thams cad chos nyid rjod med pa// dbang po kun gyi dran pa bral// gang gi sor mo'i rtse ston pa// de yi sen mo rab bstan bya// srid pa'i rtse mor bde ba'i gzugs// gcod parba mthong bar 'gyur// gang gi sgra ni ston pa na// 
69a8(rgyud): de yiyi phreng ba ra bstan bya// g.yo can sems tsan gyi ni sde// ye shes gzugs can du lta'o// gang gi spyi gtsug ston pa na// de yi rkang mtheb rab bstan bya// nor bu'i skud pa bzhin du srog/ dbu mar 'ong ba mthong ba/ 
69b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ gang gi mgrin pa ston pa na// de yi skye ba rab bstan bya// spyi blugs bdud rtsi ji lta bar// pad mar skyes 'gro thams cad mthong // gang gis nyi ma ston pa na// de yi nam mkhar bstan par bya// snying kha las byung
69b2(rgyud): 'jig rten kun// mchog tu zag med las shes 'gyur// gang gi sa ni ston pa na// rkang pa'i mthil ni rab bstan bya// pad ma'i mdab 'dra'i chu yis ni// bdud rtsi'i myu gu 'dzag par 'gyur// gang gi dur dgongs ston pa na
69b3(rgyud): de yi 'khor bar rab bstan bya// sems can kun gyi rtsa rnams kyi// nus pas nam mkha'i gnas rnams su// gang gi ling ga ston pa na// de yi rlig pa bstan par bya// 'gyur med 'gyur bar 'gro 'gyur ba// de ni rlig
69b4(rgyud): 'tshams phyag rgya skyes// gang gi spyi blugs ston pa na// ri bo de rab bstan par bya// ri las thur du chu bo bzhin// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur// bud med gang zhig rnam par reg/ rgyab kyi rgyud ni rab bstan bya// gang
69b5(rgyud): gis lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub// thos pa'i spyod yul du thob 'gyur// gang gis gos ni ston pa na// de yi tshon rtsi rab bstan bya// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du// skad cig gis ni bdag med mthong // gang zhig so// 
69b6(rgyud): yis mchu 'dzin pa// so ni krig krig bstan par bya// bza' ba thams cad med pa nyid// bag chags stobs kyis rnam par 'phel// gang gi lce ni bskyod pa ni// za ba'i lag pa rab bstan bya// bde ba kun gyi tshim pa
69b7(rgyud): ni/ don yod pa las 'thob par 'gyur// gang gi lag pa'i 'khrig ma ston// de yi thal gong rab bstan bya// srog gi rlung rnams la rdung pa// bum can 'khrul 'khor sogs kyis so// gang gi rtsib logs ston pa
69b8(rgyud): na/ de yi mchan khung rab bstan bye// nang du lhan cig skyes pa dang // snying rje la yang reg pa'o// gang gi lag pa'i dbus reg pa// lag pa'i rgyab ni bstan par bya// bdag gi gzhan yang rang gi dus// mchog kye he/ 
70a1(rgyud): @#// mi shes pa'o// gang gi rgod pa ston pa na// de yi du ba rab bstan bya// mchog tu gnyis med zhugs pa las// 'dod chags 'dod chags bral ba 'ang nyams// gang gis gar ni ston pa na// de yi glu na
70a2(rgyud): rab bstan bya// khams gsum thams cad sgra ma ru// gnyis kyi dngos po las mthong 'gyur// gang gi keng rus ston pa na// de yi rtse mo rab bstan bya// rtswa gsum po ni 'brar ba yis// 'chi bslu bar 'ong ba yin/ 
70a3(rgyud): de ltar phyag rgya sum bcu drug/ phyag rgya'i lan naM de bzhin mchog/ sun dang sring mor spyod par ni// rdo rjer 'khor lor shes par bya// rab gtum rigs kyi bdag mor ni// gnas kyi rtse mor shes par bya// rab tu
70a4(rgyud): gsal ba'i mthar gyur gzugs// srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'byung bar 'gyur// ji srid gnyis su med spyod yul// g.yo ba'i chos kyang shes par bya// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgya mtshor
70a5(rgyud): 'dus/ rab gtum yi ges shes par bya// thams cad bud med sgyu ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya kun gyi 'dun pa yi// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rang bzhin du// gsungs pa'i rang bzhin ma lus pa// de ni rdzu 'phrul rkang par
70a6(rgyud): 'dod// phyag rgya'i gdan ni ma lus pa// rnal 'byor ma bskyed mtshan nyid do// sngon chad chung ngu'i bde mchog gi/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ste// sum bcu rtsa bdun bdag nyid dbus// sngags 'di thams
70a7(rgyud): cad rnal 'byor na'o// mkha' 'gro ma sogs bcu gnyis kyi// dus sbyor chu srin la sogs te// rab gtum la sogs nyi shu bzhi// dus de rnams su 'byung ba yin// skad cig yud tsam la sogs pas// thams cad
70a8(rgyud): kyi ni 'pho ba cig/ shin du phra dang rags rnams kyi// skye bo rnams kyi dus kyis ni// lo 'gyur ba yi tshad kyis ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor ma rnams rtsis// kha ra sogs su dus byas nas// ldog pa gnyis dag gis ni
70b1(rgyud): mtshon/ gnyis dag bcu gnyis bsgre byas pa// lo yi chu tshod de bzhin no// brgyad bcu rtsa lngas ldag pa'i brgya// chu tshod lnga la shes par bya// nyi ma gcig gi tshad kyang ni// nam mkha'i mig dang lag pa mig/ zla ba
70b2(rgyud): gcig gi chud kyang ni// mkha' mkha'i ro dang dus tshod do// lo gcig gi ni tshod kyang ni// mkha' stong mig dang bug de bzhin// mkha' 'gro ma kun shes par bya// gsang sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid de// rtsa ba'i sngags
70b3(rgyud): rnams kyis ni yang // rkang pa gnyis gnyis mnyam par ni// rnal 'byor mI de rkang pa gcig/ de rnams las ni lhag gyur gang // hUM phaT la sogs spang bar bya// oM tra NaM b+hu maHpa shri nai ba kaM dz+ra ya DA kaM pA ma ba hA Na
70b4(rgyud): bri ya re hUM bi hUM ri phaT shwa rA hUM ha hUM pra tsa Na De hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// zhes bya ba ni sngags so// kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma// skra dgrol 'jigs par mdzad pa mo// lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid// lhag ma sngon bshad
70b5(rgyud): mtshan nyid do// lha mo 'di rnams thams cad ni// slar yang rtag tu rgya mtsho mnyam// rab mchog bde ba thob pa ni// dgos pa mang po yang dag rig/ ye shes zla ba'i rang bzhin duSh+Tha 'di ni 'char dang nub pa yin// tshangs
70b6(rgyud): pa'i sgo nga'i 'od gzugs gang // 'od zer mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma// 'od zer zhes bya rab bcing ba'ang // ye shes 'bab par rab tu nus// ri mo'ang nam mkha'i dbus rnams su// bgrod bya rang gi ma la skyes// de
70b7(rgyud): ltar rab gtum ma'i yon tan// rab mchog la sogs su mtshon bya// dus thams cad du kun spyod pa// sngags las byung ba shes par bya// mchog gi dngos grub rgyu yis ni// 'du ba rnal 'byor mar rab gsungs// 
70b8(rgyud): dngos grub rmi lam du ster ma// stes nas dus kyis shes par bya// las ni gang dang gling 'dra ba// de dang de 'dra'i 'bras bu ste// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel nyid pas// rang nyid rnal 'byor pas skye 'gyur// 
71a1(rgyud): rgyu med cing ni 'bras bu med// mngon sum mngon sum min de bzhin// 'di 'dra'i bden pa smra rnams kyi// tshad ma'i bstan bcos las shes bya// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor// 
71a2(rgyud): las/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mnanapa 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
71a3(rgyud): po las// rab tu gtum mo bdag po'i dkyil 'khor du rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams kyi phyag rgya'i brda yis gnas pa'i mchog nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i spyod yul gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// 
71a4(rgyud): / de nas gtum mig ma'i phyag rgya// rgyud gzhan na med bshad par bya// mig gi brdar ni shes bya ste// 'di thams cad kyang kha sbyar yin// btsums pa dang ni ma btsums
71a5(rgyud): pa// g.yas dang g.yon dang g.yes 'gro dang // gyon du skyod dang sna rtser dang // sar lta dngos po'i mig can dang // khro dang zhum dang 'thun bud med// bu dang gnyen dang spun rnams dang // ga ti/ 
71a6(rgyud): mug zhe sdang chags phrag dog/ skyon dngang rgyal tshe rlom dang // 'dod dang snying rje glen pa dang // sgyu mar lta dang ring du lta// 'gro dang bsam gtan phyed phye dang // thams cad phye dang dga' ba dang // 
71a7(rgyud): ched dang nad dang g.yul ngo dang // chos dang bcas par lta ba mchog/ gal te sum bcu drug lte ba// 'di nyid rnal 'byor mas ster na// de nyid kyi ni phyag rgya'i lan// rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtag/ 
71a8(rgyud): sbyin pa me long chu dang mchod pa dang // ral gri mar me mthe bo dang // nam mkha' pad ma ku mu dang // mda' dang zla ba nyi ma dang // nor bu mu tig byi ru dang // gzhu yi gser dang 'dra ba
71b1(rgyud): dang / 'bar ba'i grib ma rA bal dang // bu ma rta glang sa ra b+ha// gar dang skrag dang 'dar ba dang // 'khrig pa rtsod skra nye bar dang // gtor ma ri mo dkyil 'khor dang // zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ 
71b2(rgyud): bsad pa dang skad rnams kyis// lnga ba ru ni bshad gyur pa// brda ni sum bcu rtsa drug go/ ji lta'i rim pas sbyin par bya// de nyid rnal 'byor pa yi ni// de rnams dgos pa bshad par bya// zla/ 
71b3(rgyud): ba'i rgyu bar sen pa'i srog/ g.yon par rgyu ba yi ni mchog/ sum bcu rtsa drug sems 'bab pa// de rnams ngo bor shes par bya// mig gi phyag rgya gang 'dra bar// de 'dra'i srog ni rgyu bar bya// 
71b4(rgyud): mgo la sogs pa'i tshig kun du// rtsa rnams gnas ni bsgrub byas nas// myi phyed ma sogs steng 'og tu// der ni blta bar chen po bya// de ltar bdun bcu gnyis shes bya// phun sum tshogs kun
71b5(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur// gtum mog rnal 'byor ma'i bdag mo// snang ba tshar gcod mdzad ma yin// byang chub phyogs kyi chos su yang // rnal 'byor ma kun shes 'gyur ba// gtum mig rnal 'byor
71b6(rgyud): ma rtag tu/ bsngon 'grus rdzu 'phrul rkang pa nyid// gtu ma'i rnam par rngog kun la// mig gi bsdu ba za bo yin// g.yo ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin no// sems gcig tu ni'i'aching ba yin// dza/ 
71b7(rgyud): co'i rgyu spyod 'jig rten du// 'joms pa phyag rgya mkha' 'gro skyes// kun rdzob dang ni don dam pa// long med par ni gnyis med byed// gnyis med mig ni 'dir de nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab
71b8(rgyud): tu bsngags// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni snang ba byed// rtsa rnams thams cad rab tu ston// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// tshul byed sgom par bya ba yin// gtum mig ma ni thabs ldan pa// sum
72a1(rgyud): bcu rtsa bdun bdag nyid can// de yi tshul ma mngon brjod byas// thams cad byang chub rang bzhin ca ni// sngags kyi yi ge las skyes pas// kun spyod rtsa yi byadag
72a2(rgyud): nyid can/ de yi ji ltar kha dog gzugs// rab gtum rnal 'byor ma yi'o// oM swa daM taSh+To satwa Ta sr-i b+ho ni Sha trA Na ya b+hI hUM bA pa ya Te hUM pha hUM Ta pa hUM Ta paM hUM Ta pa swa Ta hUM phaT swA hA/ oM
72a3(rgyud): DA k+Shi ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// gang bai re'i gnas su yang // rab tu gtum ma dus kun skyes// zla ba nyal bral ba ru// ri bi chen por zla ba 'char// 'bar ba 'dzin par gtum mig ma// rA hUM yAM/ 
72a4(rgyud): ni zas su byas// tshes gcig tu ni yang dag bshad// nyi ma'i rjes 'gror nges bshad pa'o// de ltar rnal 'byor ma re re'i// rang gi zhing du ming rgya che// re re yi yang nyi shu bzhi// slar yang
72a5(rgyud): gnas dang nye gnas so// bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa'ang med// yi ge las byung spangs pa yin// dus dang dus min ngo bo'i bdag/ hUM phaT yi ges 'dod par gyis// yi ge las byung bI
72a6(rgyud): gzugs kyi// ha yi rdo rje'i bdud rtsi 'byung // spun gyi spyod par snum pa gang // 'jug dang ldog par byed pa mo// snying kha'i 'khor lor shes bya ste// mig gi rang bzhin can snying khe/ snying khar gnas/ 
72a7(rgyud): rang rnal 'byor ma// gtum mo lte ba'i steng nas 'bar// dpa' ba thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag
72a8(rgyud): pos 'di gsungs so// / zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gtum mig ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya dang bdag po'i rang bzhin
72b1(rgyud): gyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste/ le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad par bya// ji lta'i cho ga brda yig go// rnal 'byor pa yi 'ching bya las// shes nas myur
72b2(rgyud): du nges par grol// DA dA li ka nA ma dang ni/ bI shi taM/ rA dzi ka/ ba Ta/ ki pi Ta ka TI kun tu ru/ ka ra pU ra/ si lpa ke/ sA yam b+hU/ ka stu ri ka/ hU~M sa ma/ bol+la ka k+ko laM/ kA lanyadza raM/ shAl+r-i
72b3(rgyud): b+hi raM/ a pya k+ShaM/ pi tri ba naM/ bya nya dza naM/ mA lA tin t+ta naM/ rang na sam+b+ha baM/ go/ ku da hA naHbau/ mU/ shu ri ma/ de ltar rnal mo rnams kyi/ de bzhin dpa' bo spun rnams brda// rnal 'byor ma
72b4(rgyud): de'i dgongs pa ni// kha yis brjod pa byed par 'gyur// skyes bu/ rnal 'byor ma/ bud med chad/ sha/ lce/ ba Tu ba/ ceng te'u/ bud med kyi 'khrig pa/ khu bo khrag/ sha la skyes/ khrag/ bud
72b5(rgyud): med kyi/ gcin// bshad ba/ ling ga pad ma/ 'dus pa'am skal ldan/ skye gnyis kyi sha/ shra ba'i ro/ rgyal po'i skyes bu/ dur khrod/ nya'aM'i sha/ bya'i sha/ g.yul ngo'i khrag/ ba lang khyo/ glang po chen/ 
72b6(rgyud): mi bshang ba/ gci ba khu ba/ khrag rkang mar/ de ltar yang ni brda'i lan/ sngags pas rtag tu shes par bya// rnal 'byor dngos po shes rnams kyi// dus rnams kun du bskyed pa ni// sprul pas ses
72b7(rgyud): can sgrol bu lo// zhing dang zhing du skye bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni zhu ba'i khams// sum bcu rtsa drug grangs kyang ni// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha' dang ni ye shes khams// de'i yang khams
72b8(rgyud): ni drug drug 'gyur// mngon pa'i gzugs sogs shes mthar ro// nges pa re bshad don sba ba po// rang bzhin gyi ni brdar shes bya// re re bar tu lha mo ni// 'od ldan ye shes gzugs can no// sum/ 
73a1(rgyud): bcu rtsa drug khams rnams kyi// 'char ba'i dus mtha' mkha' spyod ma// ye shes 'od zer de bsgrubs nas// bde ba kun gyi gnas la bzhugs// gos nas mtha' nas gzung nas/ 
73a2(rgyud): ni/ gnod dang gnad du rtse bar bya// ye shes kun rdzob spangs pa la// sgom pa la yang rnam rtog bdag nyid do// rdo rjes 'og sbyor bdag nyid// rtsa thams cad ni gzhig par bya// rnon po bsreg pa'i
73a3(rgyud): sbyor bdag nyid// mkhas pas 'od ldan yi ge'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ste// ud+yan gnas su de bzhin du'o// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// lha yi bdag po mchog sgom bya// 
73a4(rgyud): gsang sngags bden pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// sna tshogs yi ge rnams su son// sum bcu rtsa bdun lha rnams ni// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nyid// oM kaM bi kA da la yu mA ta la dzi b+ha ha re bA
73a5(rgyud): na ya oM hUM gra hU~M pha ya Ta hUM To pha swa Ta swA hA/ oM pra b+ha wa tI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ kha dog gzug ni sngon bzhin no// rang gi 'od kyis rnal 'byor 'grub// oM yi phye mo 'byung ba'i bdag/ srog
73a6(rgyud): gi rlung ni bskyod cing bskyod// skar ma'i bdag po kun mkhyen rnams// dbang po sogs kyi spangs pa yin// ya yig dang ni a yig gzugs// rkang pa'i mtha' dang mgo bo can// nA da tsam la/ 
73a7(rgyud): thams cad brten// rong byung chos brjod pa yin no// de ltar yi ge bzhi rnams ni// chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang yin// mi ni yid de'i cha'i ye shes// de yod pas ni spyod pa ste// 'jig rten
73a8(rgyud): dbus dang kun la ni// rdzu 'phrul rkang pas spyod lam byed// yon tan kun gyi 'khor lo yang // thar pa'i rgyu yis ster bar 'gyur// yon tan kun bdag stong pa nyid// 'khor bar 'di las
73b1(rgyud): thabs gzhan med// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal
73b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'od ldan ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga zhes bya ba ste// le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor/ 
73b3(rgyud): ma mchog gtso// mtshon cha'i mda' ni bshad bya ste// sna chen ma yi rab sbyor bas// srog dang rtsol ba'i rang bzhin can// 'di la dril bu phub mche ba// gtun shing zhags pa thod pa dang // gzhu dang
73b4(rgyud): kha T+wA~M ka po ti// phub chung dang ni sdigs 'dzub dang // g.yer ka'i phreng dang lcags thag dang // brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni// mdung dang rnga dang lpags rlon dang // skra yi thag pa dbyangs pa dang / 
73b5(rgyud): ro bsreg bskul ba'i shing dang ni// ga ti dbyug pa phub dang mgo/ keng rus dang ni zor ba nyid// mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang / kau sbyin pa yi ni phur bu dang // sa bon gar dang so gau le dang / 
73b6(rgyud): khab dang skud bshus lpags pa dang // sprin chur 'bab drang shing lcags kyu// de ltar rnal 'byor mA ster na// phyag rgya'i lan du brjod bya ba// rdo rje ral gri mdung rings dang // rtse gsum dgra sta gri gug
73b7(rgyud): mda'/ gsal shing phug dang tho ba dang // 'khor lo cang te'u chu gri dang // dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtse gtsog/ dung dang zangs dung dbyug gu gsum// der ni rma ba 'jug ma dang // bya rog sgo dang par
73b8(rgyud): dang ni/ me yi thab dang ri bo dang // dbyug thung mi long pi wang dang // rkang mgo lago mgo glo ba dang // rgyu ma sgra can lcags sgrog dang // spos dang sgrogs dang nya rgya dang // mgo med mar nag 'bar ba
74a1(rgyud): dang / 'jigs byed gzugs can shes bya ba// phyag rgya'i lan du mngon brjod yin// rlung gi rang bzhin ma lus pa// de yi rigs rnal 'byor ma khyim du'o// gang dang gang gi 'i dbyis/ 
74a2(rgyud): de de rnal 'byor ma yi lus// de yi rang bzhin rjes gzung ngam// tshar gcod pa yang byed par 'gyur// stong pa nyid ni bcwo brgyad dang // khyad par du yang snying rje dang // sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres dang // 
74a3(rgyud): de bzhin du ni khams bcwo brgyad// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyal mtshan nyid// skye bo thams cad shes par bya// sna chen ma yi rab sbyor bar// rang gi mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin// 'byung po thams cad kyi
74a4(rgyud): ni ma mngon par sna tshogs nor bu bzhin// hA yig bskyod pa'i ni de'i bdag/ de bzhin kha dog bltas pas 'phyang // nA dar gnas pa'i skud pa gang // bde gzugs gnyis med phreng ba can/ 
74a5(rgyud): sgrub thabs man ngag sbyor bdag nyid// dbyangs dang gsal byed las sngon byung // chos dang las dang dam tshig dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin can// yi ge'i bzhi'i rtog pa las// phyag rgya bzhi'i
74a6(rgyud): mngon brjod nyid do// gonas ni ar bu dar shes bya// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul rkang de bzhin// lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa// nam mkha'i 'khor lor grags pa yin// sum bcu bdun bdag nyid de yi// 
74a7(rgyud): bdag mo sna chen ma yin no// sna yi thog ma tha mar dbugs// 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba can// dbus su mtshon bya mtshan nyid bral// rnal 'byor ma kun rtsa bar 'gyur// bu baM la ni dbyangs/ 
74a8(rgyud): can 'gro// dbus su gong gang 'bab pa mo// gzhu 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis// srog dang thur sel can 'dzin pa'o// rnam shes mda' ru shes byas nas// mtshon cha de yang gzhom par bya// gang du// 
74b1(rgyud): sems ni gtong ba na// der ni rdzu 'phrul gyis dpag bya// ye shes ma yi mngal nyid du// thams du ni rnam par sbyad// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// 'dir ni slar yang bsgom par bya// shes// 
74b2(rgyud): rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni// gsang sngags yi ge rnams las byung // mdog dang dbyibs ni sngon gyi ste// 'jigs byed mtshan mo nag mo'o// oM dzA ko ba Ti lA la bak+Sha lI b+hu D+ha dza la ya ga hUM na hU~M ya pha hUM Ta/ 
74b3(rgyud): hUM Ta swA hA/ oM ma hA nA se hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags las rdzogs pa/ 'dod pa kun gyi rang bzhin can// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa'
74b4(rgyud): bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las sna chen ma'i mtshan
74b5(rgyud): nyid kyi brda'i cho ga'i nges pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas lus kyi ts+tshom ni// mdzes pa'i spyod pa spyad par bya// dpa' bo'i blo gros mi'i sbyor bas// lha
74b6(rgyud): rdzas lus skyes 'thob par 'gyur// mgo dang spyi gtsug dpral ba dang // g.yon dang g.yas pa'i rna ba dang // rgyab kyi rgyud dang de pung pa gnyis// sna dang smin ma mig dang kha/ rkan dang snying
74b7(rgyud): kha lag pa dang // mtshan khung nu ma ts+tsha bi logs dang // lte ba 'doms dang 'phongs ling gabarla dang pus mo byini rkang pa// sor mo 'theb chen long bu dang // rkang pa'i 'thil du thams cad du// khrig
74b8(rgyud): pa lag pa glang po'i lpags// 'khrig pa dpral ba'i ngos dang ni// 'tshams dang lto bar shes bya ste// rtag tu rnal 'byor mas ster na// phyag rgya'i len gyur rnal 'byor pas// ji lta'i rim pas/ 
75a1(rgyud): @// sbyin bya ba// gling bu pi wang mkhar rnga dang // gru rnga rdza rnga rol mo dang // phreng ba sgeg pa gar zangs dung // spos dang dri dang lha bshos dang // 'bras bu ma chag 'bras dang snod// zhabs
75a2(rgyud): bsil mchod yon mar me phul// gos dang me long gdugs dang ni// bla re rnga yab de bzhin du// ba dan me tog phreng ba dang // rgyal mtshan dang ni dri gtsang khang // mdung thung phreng ba phreng phyed dang // slar yang / 
75a3(rgyud): dril chung dra ba dang // seng ge'i gdon dang gcod pan dang // rin chen sna tshogs de bzhin no// go dA wa re'i nye gnas bzhugs// dad pa'i dbang po'i rab bzhin can// dpa'i blo ma yi rab sbyor bas// phyag rgya thA
75a4(rgyud): cad rab tu bshad// lhan skyes skad kyis pa'i zhes bya// sum bcu drug dngos bdag nyid can// phung po khams dang yul dang ni// dbang po las dang las can dang // yul gyi sgra ni de bzhin 'dir// kun// 
75a5(rgyud): la drug dug rim ji bzhini// de rnams nang du so ye shes// lhan skyes gzhan gyi dngos po min// mtshan mo nyin mo'i rab sbyor bas// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid do// lhan skyes rnal 'byor ma de rnaMs
75a6(rgyud): sum bcu rtsa drug dbye bas phye// dam tshig chen po'i 'dus pa ni// pad ma'i lte bar rig par bya// de las skyes pa'i rang phyag rgya// yul dang yul du rnam par bzhag/ rang rig rnal 'byor ma'i bde ba/ 
75a7(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul min// 'dzag bzhin pa na chen po nyid// bcu gnyis mi rnams nong du son// rdo rje'i rlung ni rab zhugs pa'o// der ni kun du rnal 'byor skyes// 'od zer slong ba'i bde ba yi// 
75a8(rgyud): 'pho med rnams kyis bgrod par byos// go da wa rI shes byas nas// dad pa'i dbang po'i rdo rje can// dpa' blo ma yi rang bzhin shes// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi rtse mo yin// sum bcu bdun bdag
75b1(rgyud): nyid rdo rje// rang ming gsang sngags ldan par ro// sna tshogs rnam rtog zas can ni// lhan skyes brtson 'grus ming gis so// oM ka pa la ru pA Sh+yaM ta ya d+ha sho ma d+ya ru ta gra shu ba lA pu ya Sha ya hUM hUM phaT/ hUM phaT hUM/ 
75b2(rgyud): / phaT/ swA phaT hA swA hA/ oM bI ra ma ti ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ kha dog dang dbyibs sngon gyi ru// rnal 'byor ma kun gyi ni bya// gang phyir brtson 'grus yang dge 'pho// mngon par brjod par yang dag 'byung // nam
75b3(rgyud): mkha' lding gi sbyor ldan pas// 'dir ni the tsom med par byed// sngon du bstan pa'i ts+tsha ma ka/ mchog gi lce ru shes par bya// phyag rgya'i lan ni gzhan med te// lan gyi lce ni dbang gnyis kyi'o// sna tshogs
75b4(rgyud): rgyud dang lung rnams su// ngas ni khyod la ma bshad do// rgyud 'di yi ni rab sbyor ba// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ma rig pa dang sdang sems dang // skye bo rmongs gang yul spyod na// sangs rgyas nyid ni mi/ 
75b5(rgyud): 'thob cing / nges par dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur// de phyir gus pa'i sems bdag gis// bya ba gus pas legs rig bya// sngon gyi rmongs pa med 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas nyid 'thob yun mi ring / 
75b6(rgyud): mos pas rgyun du gzhol gyur pas// tshe dang nad med 'phel ba yin// rlung gi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma// stobs ldan dpa' bo'i blo gros ma// rdo rje'i klung dbye rab ldan pas// sems chen por ni thim par
75b7(rgyud): 'gyur// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro dro bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// // dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho
75b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ming zhes bya ba ste/ le'u sum bcu pa'o// / khams thams cad kyi rgyu
76a1(rgyud): @ma ka/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// gang zhig dri med dngos po'i brda// bshad kyis sgrub mo mnyan par gyis// so yis mchu ni yongs bzung nas// bde bas b+ho la 'jib par
76a2(rgyud): byed/ phyi nas ye shes rab ston pa'i// 'di skad kyi tshig smras so// phyi mo'ang yi ge'i sbyor ba yis// bcu pa gsum la drug lhag pa'i// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni// 'di las dam tshig dbye bar
76a3(rgyud): bya/ ka kha ga g+ha dra/ kaM tsa tsha dza dzAH/ tsiT Sha Da D+ha Na/ Ta ta tha da d+ha na/ taM ba pha ba b+ha ma paM ya ra la wa ha yaM/ zhes bya rnal 'byor mas ster na// phyag rgya yi lan slar yang 'di// ke khA gA g+ha bA/ tsA tshA dzA dz+nyA \u0f85 tsaHTA ShA
76a4(rgyud): DA D+hA NA TaH/ ta b+hU dA d+hA nA taH/ pA pA bA b+hU mA pAH/ yA rA lA wA hA yaH/ de ltar phyag rgya'i khyad shes nas// lus can kun gyi sgo glegs yin// bu ga gnyis kyi rab sbyor bar// thams cad kyang ni yi ge/ 
76a5(rgyud): 'dra/ 'og dang snying du 'dus byas nas// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor la gnyis med// skad cig bzhi'i bde rnams kyis// de nyid dag pa bzhi de bzhin// sde pa bzhi dang 'khor lo bzhi// e baM ma ya sku
76a6(rgyud): rnams ni// rgyud 'dis mdor du bstan pa ste// rgyas bshad gzhan du rtogs dran bya// mi'u thung ma'i rab sbyor bas// cho ga sngags pas shes par bya// nam mkha' dang mnyam sgo gleg phreng // mkha' spyod/ 
76a7(rgyud): ma ru spyod pa rang // ngag kyang skad kyi rang bzhin bdag/ 'gog par nye bar 'gro bar gyis// gsang chen soms dang sems byung rnams// mtha' ma gsal bar 'thob par yin// rin chen rdo rje las
76a8(rgyud): dga' gzugs// bltas pa'i 'tshams su mthong bar 'gyur// thams cad bden pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// bzhi po bzhi pa'i bdag nyid can// ra me shwa ra dad dbang por// mchog tu rmad byung shes pa
76b1(rgyud): bya 'dod chags chags bral du bsres pa// de'i skad cig las 'byung ba min// 'byung ba lnga'i bdag can yid las// me ni dbus su bdud rtsi'i gnas// dbugs kyi 'khor lo rtag tu de'i
76b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bza' bar bya// lha dang klu rnams bud med la// mkhas pa yis ni rol pa yin// de rnams kyis ni rol pa du// lus can kun gyi 'pho ba yang // sgo dgu'i bdag nyid
76b3(rgyud): nam mkha' la// de rnams zhi 'gyur du shes bya// de ltar sgo glegs gnas rnams ni// rtag tu sum bcu rtsa drug 'gyur// sgo yi dbye ba mi shes la// skyon dang yon tan ji ltar lags// 'pho ba'i dus tshod kyi ni tshad// yang dag
76b4(rgyud): rab tu sbyor ba nyon// mdzes pa'i gnas ni lam bzang pos// lam ngan gyi ni srid pa'i skyon// thig le lte ba steng rnams dang // mig dang sna dang rna ba dag/ bshang ba dang ki ci ba'i sgo// sgo dgu yi ni mtshan nyid do// lte bas
76b5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i mtho ris dang // thig les gzugs kyi lus tsan rnaMs// steng gis steng gi gnas kyi ni// 'gro dang 'ong bar rab tu grags// gnod sbyin dngos po sna las so// rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha// gal te mig nas ye she
76b6(rgyud): bgrod// mi rnaMs mi bdag sgyu rnams 'gyur// srid pa'i sgo yis yi dgas rnams// gci bas dud 'gro de bzhin no// dmyal ba brgyad kyi dngos rnams kyi// lus can rnas ni bshang ba las// gzhan gyi sgo ni gsum gsum ste// 
76b7(rgyud): mkhas pas rtsa yi kun spyod can// nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams kyang ni// smin dug la sogs rgyu ska ro// rnam dag ye shes gsum po ni// re re'i sgo ma rnaMs kyi'o// brtson 'grus dbang po'i dngos rnams kyis// thas cad nyer spyod mtshan nyid do// sum
76b8(rgyud): bcu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// sngon gyi mdog ca sgom par bya// rdo rje dkar mo sogs sa bon// sgo glegs gnas su bzhag par bya// shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo// sa yi 'khor lo'i sbyor bas so// sngags yig rnams su 'gyur ba ni// 
77a1(rgyud): oM mA bi tri ka ga Ta Na ma pa khA ri hA bu hA ri ra ta b+hU ma yan+t+ra hUM ya hUM hUM \u0f7f hUM phaT bA phaT Tu ba sA Ta hA swA hA/ oM kharba ri ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags las yang dag byung // don dam
77a2(rgyud): sbyor ba las skyes pa'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldani bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha'
77a3(rgyud): 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ mi'u thung ma'i yi ge'i brda'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ste le'u sum bcu rtsa gcog pa'o// slar yang mchod pa byas nas ni// yang dang
77a4(rgyud): yang du zhus pa nyid// dngos po ye shes kyis phyag rgya// bcom ldan gtso bo ji ltar lags// gang gi mtshan nyid bshad bya yis// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// lhan skyes bde dang stong pa dang // rang gis rig dang
77a5(rgyud): bde ba che/ chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs// sprul pa dang ni rmad 'byung che// 'od gsal sems dang bsam pa dang // zhi dang mya 'das sbyor skyes dang // pha rol phyin dang gnyis med dang // thar pa dang ni don dam
77a6(rgyud): dang / ye shes rnam shes byang chubo dang // chos dbyings grong khyer de bzhin du// pad ma dang ni chos 'byung dang // slar yang bdag med mtho ris dang // zhi dang sgra dang blo ma dang // rig dang 'khrul med rtog spangs dang / 
77a7(rgyud): bcud len dang ni sgra bshad te// mkhas pa'i tsam ma'i rnam grangs so// ji ltar de ltar yig dang po// thams cad lan gyi ts+tsham ma yin// ji ltar yi ge de bzhin don// dmyal ba las sdang shes par bya// lang ka'i
77a8(rgyud): dbang phyug ma'i sbyor bar// rnal 'byor pa khyod kyis bya'o// 'phyang bar gyur pa'i sa bon gyi// der ni rlom ma thams cad te// ge sar ye shes khams kyi ni// rang gi rang bzhin du mtshan nyid// rang yod de mnyam
77b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa// pad ma'i snying po ru ni gnas// ri ni rnam shes 'gro ba ste// yid kyi khams rnams thams cad du'o// lang kar bdag skye ba nyid ste// dngos po'i ye shes rnams kyis byung // dbang phyug 'byung po thams
77b2(rgyud): cad kyi/ ye shes min pa dngos kun skyes// de wi ko Ta'i gnas su te// slar yang byang chub dran dbang po// gang du ye shes bsam med pa// der ni bstan pas thos par 'gyur// 'dod chags bral bas gang bdag
77b3(rgyud): gi/ bi ni kun 'gro'i ye shes so// rlung rnams kyi ni mkha' rnams su// dbang po rnams kyi bde de bzhin// Ti ni rdo rje'i nus par grags// yul rnams kyi ni grong du bgrod// dran pa lhan cig skyes ye shes// gang
77b4(rgyud): du yid ni rab brjod pa// der ni dbang po'i byang chub kyang // shes nas rdo rje'i tshul bdag nyid// de ltar de nyid nges shes nas// rang gi rang bzhin du gnas bya// chos dang 'jig rten bcas pa spang // cung zad ming med
77b5(rgyud): bzung bar bya// yang na dngos po kun bdag nyid// yang na thams cad rnam par spangs// dngos dang dngos po can yod min// dngos po med pa gsol mthong 'gyur// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// thams cad
77b6(rgyud): mi bde las skyes blta// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin zhal las// rgyud pa'i rim las phrad par gyis// me yi dkyil 'khor du lha mo// de phyir de'i rang bzhin ma lus// sum bcu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// sngon gyi gzugs
77b7(rgyud): tsan bsgom par bya// thams cad thabs dang ldan par 'gyur// sngags kyi yi ge las byung ba'o// / oM hUM swA hUM hUM ka dza ro su ts+tshan da ra rI na ba muM l+la khA b+ha ya ka hUM rA hU~M ya phaT hUM phaT swA phaT hUM phaT swA hA/ oM li ke shwa
77b8(rgyud): rI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// / de ltar shes byas gsang sngags che// dngos grub yang bas byed pa yin// las thams cad kyi rang bzhin te// rgyal na yang gzhan du min// dngos grub ri yi ming can ni// nyi shu rtsa/ 
79a1(rgyud): brgyad sman du'o// smin drug dang ni snar mar 'gyur// mgo bo dang ni lag de bzhin// nam so dang ni rgyal nyid dang // sgeg dang mchu dang gzhan pa ni// shar gyi gre dang byang gi dbo// me bzhi nag pas/ 
79a2(rgyud): ri dang // sa ga dang ni lha mtshams dang // snron dang sbubs dang chu stod dang // chu smad dang ni byi bzhin dang // gro bzhin mon gru de bzhin du// mon gre dang ni khrums stod dang // khrums smad dang ni nam gru dang // tha skar de bzhi
79a3(rgyud): bre nye dang / zla ba nyi ma ra hu dang // si ma nyid dang spen pa rnams// rang rang dus nyid shes par bya// the tsom med pas gzung bas so// thams cad zla ba'i spyod bdag nyid// nam mkha' la ni mnyam par gnas/ 
79a4(rgyud): 'chad bzhin pa yi rab sbyor bas// spags pas cho ga shes par bya// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag
79a5(rgyud): posra 'di gsungs so// / zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ ling ka'i dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya'i brda'i mtshan nyid dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
79a6(rgyud): lo'i rang bzhin dang ming gi cho ga'i ye shes kyi ste le'u sum bcu so gnyis pa'o// 1/ slar yang gzhan pa bshad bya ste// dgos dang byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub pos
79a7(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zla ba nyi ma gzas bzung bar// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags mtshan nyid// po taM gi ni gsong por smra ba ste// pra ti pau taM ga nI lan yin no// ga mu 'gro ba'o lum pa ni// 'ong ngo zhes ni bya ba nyid
79a8(rgyud): de'i grong khyer ro tsa Tu kaM zhes bya// zungs shig pa'o hi da ya ni dpa' bo yin// kau ra ba ni sod cig pa nyid te// kar+N+Na ka ni dril bu'o// a li byed pa'o// shi ra 'khyil pa'i skra yin te// sra ba Na rna ba'o gzhan pa ni// man
79b1(rgyud): / tha na ni bdud rtsi ste// na ra phrad pa'o ta li ka yang // mkha' 'gro ma'o na ra kaM dkyil 'khor// ka khi la sgo 'o sA sa na// bram ze'o pa ri'i rgyal po'i rigs// ba ri ti rje'u rigs kru ra ni// dmangs so An ta gtol ba can// 
79b2(rgyud): a li ka phyugs Ta ki ni// sring mo'o mu da ki tshal// lce yis so reg de bzhin du// zas kyis ltogs par rig par bya// tre sna dri yis bsgos pa ste// a ga ma na zhes bya gnas gang nas// che ge mo'i kA ra Na me tog go// 
79b3(rgyud): lam ba lto ba dan ta rgod pa ste// ni ro d+hi cher ro bi dz+nyA pa ti tshim pa'o// d+hu mra zhes sprin de bzhin// d+hu mra pri ya ri bo ste// sa nu sa ri ta chu klung // ang gu l+ya ni cha shas te// da na rA dzi ka l+ye// a d+hA ra so yin paM ka ti// rgyal
79b4(rgyud): mtshan tshan ngo phreng de bzhin// tsa la klung ngo mi ga pi ti phyugs// man DA la ni mnyam pa ste// swa si lam gyi bzhi mdor shes par bya// skye bo phal gu shaM ma mo ma hA kA ra ni// phyugs chen no ts+tsha ni ra skyes so// na ni mi 'o ba
79b5(rgyud): na gleng yin ni// ma ni ma he b+hA ni za ba ste// sa ni seng ge bya ni stag de bzhin// sgra ni gnas pa'o kha la reg pa zos pa yin// so la rig pa tshim pa yin// hI ka ngo tsha steng pa la reg pa// 'khrig pa bla la reg pa ni// de ltar
79b6(rgyud): da ltar gyis zhes par// mchog tu 'thun ma shes par bya// 'dir ni dgos pa slar bshad bya// mkhas pa yis ni bsub par bya// byed pa rnal 'byor mer shes bya// dpa' bo kun du dgos pa'o// sna tshogs
79b7(rgyud): dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis// ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin bdag/ bskyed pa srid pa'i sbyor ba dang // sbyor bral kun rdzob de bzhin du// sgyu ma 'thun pa 'khor ba dang // brtse ba rang bzhin brtags pa dang / 
79b8(rgyud): gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs grub dang // tu rI yau 'khor lo bsgoms pa dang // sems dpa' byas tshul khrims dang // gtong ba btung ba dpa'i de bzhin// skar rtsis mkhan dang sman pa nyid// bzo dang khams dang / 
80a1(rgyud): / sman pa nyid// bzo dang khams dang smra ba po// lhag ma rten 'brel yan lag ni// bcu gnyis ma rig stsogs shes bya// ma la ba yi nye gnas su// shing grib ma'i rab sbyor bas// ting 'dzin dbang
80a2(rgyud): po'i phyogs rnams su// 'jug pa med dang 'jug pa mtshungs// dbang po 'dod chags chags bral dang // yang dag phun sum tshogs bdag po// mA ma ki rdo rje'i bu gar ni// spyi gtsug gnas su yongs gan+da
80a3(rgyud): bya/ 'phyang bzhin pa kha 'og tu ste// kam bu dzi yi phyag rgya'i tshul// ba ni yang dag rig pa'i rgyud// rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid// de ltar byas dang ma byas kun// mkhas pas dbu mar ma snang ba'o// zhu
80a4(rgyud): ba'i dngos po'i ye shes 'dir// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi sku can te// smig sgra dang ni 'dra ba'i gzugs// bdag nyid gzugs can mthong bar 'gyur// ye shes shin du bas g.yogs pa// kun 'gro ba mi
80a5(rgyud): lhar dran bya// gang 'dra'i snying rje gnyis byar med// de 'dra'i dngos por skye dran bya// sum bcu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// sngon can grags pa bsgom par bya// gsang sngags bden pa'i gzugs bdag
80a6(rgyud): nyid/ chu'i dkyil 'khor dbus son pa'o// / oM sa marba ha b+ha sh+ma ta shA saM yA na ya ka hu rA hU~M yaM pha hU~M Ta hUM pra phaT Ta swA pha hA Ta swA s+t+waM/ oM dru ma ts+tsha ye hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags gzugs/ 
80a7(rgyud): bdag nyid du// kun du 'gro ma can shes bya// mchod pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du// lhan skyes mdzes ma 'dus pa'o// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dngos bdag/ rnal 'byor nam mkha'i gtso bo yin// dbugs ni smra ba/ 
80a8(rgyud): byas nas ni// slar yang u d+yan kun du 'gro// sa gsum po yi ris su ni// gzugs kyi gtso mo bsgom par bya// yid ni nang du chud pa yis// 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgom par bya// slar yang rdo rje phag mo ye/ 
80b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis rigs ldan mchog/ lha rdzas mi yi bde ba ni// bsdus byas pa bas de mchog go// ma mo'i grong khyer nyams dga' bar// 'gro ba'i gtso bo bsgom par bya// 'di 'dra'i dus kyi ye shes ni// mkhas pas
80b2(rgyud): a ba d+hU ti'i nang du'o// rnal 'byor pas bsgoms sems bdag nyid// stong pa nyid gzugs dmigs pa can// de yi thams cad rig byas nas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rang mtshan nyid// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor lnga
80b3(rgyud): / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ shing grib ma'i rang gi mtshan
80b4(rgyud): nyid kyi phyag rgya'i brda'i cho ga'i nges pa zhes bya ba ste le'u sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po// rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab bdag che// phyag rgya yang dag rig pa'i gzugs// ji lta'i rim pa
80b5(rgyud): bstan du gsol// phyag rgya bzhi yi rab sbyor bas// re re la ni dgu dgu ste// las dang chos dang dam tshig dang // phyag rgya chen po bzhi pa yin// pad rtsa ltar dkar bud med gang // pad ma'i dri ni gtong ba yin// pad ma dang ni
80b6(rgyud): ud pal dri// kha dog tsam pa ka yi yin// dza ti dang ni tsam pa'i dI// de yi gzugs dang mdog 'dzin mo// ga bur dang ni tsan dan dri// pad ma dkar po'i lpags can ma'o// ri dgas lte ba dang mnyam dri// ud pal+la
80b7(rgyud): sngon pa'i mdog can ma'o// ud ngal sdom ba ljang khul// dri na de nyid kyi mtshan bya// ma wI ka dang ud du la dI// m+b+ha men dang ni mtshungs ma'o// k+She ta ki yi dr-i zhes bya// dmyur po bran tu kas bu'o// pa Ta oM ma smig
80b8(rgyud): hU~M slar yang nam mkha'i kha dge go// de ltar gas kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur// chos kyi phyag rgya bshang bar bya// ba gsheg sa tshogs pa la dga' ba// mthar skyes rnas 'byor ma mchog yin// bris ma gtan bzlas btsun
81a1(rgyud): du dga'/ bram ze mo ru rab tu bshad// rtag tu khrus dang brtsang sbra dga'// rje'u rigs kyi bud med do// rnam rtog med bdag nyid mi mo// brtul cing dpa' bo la brtse zhing // rgyal rigs kyi ni rang bzhi
81a2(rgyud): te/ 'di ni mchog tu gtam dga' ma'o// las la yongs su brtse ba ste// dmangs rigs kyi ni rnal 'byor ma'o// bde gshegs 'dus la rjes su chags// mchog tu 'thun ma'i rnal 'byor ma'o// mkhas pa yi
81a3(rgyud): ni phyogs su gzhol// chos kyi gnas su khro med pa'o// dpa' bo yi ni rigs su skyes// rtag par sha ni za ma yin// bde bar gshegs pa'i lam bsrungs ma// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa byed// khro ba'i
81a4(rgyud): gnas la mi khro zhing // mnyes par byed pa'i khur khyer ma'o// de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya ste// dam tshig phyag rgya mngon brjod bya// gtor ma mchod pa la dga' ma// dam tshig can du de mngon brjod// rab gnas dkyil
81a5(rgyud): 'khor 'khor lo dang // don dam pa la dga' ba ma'o// 'gro ba rnams la dbang bsgyur ma// rnal 'byor dam tshig can mar grags// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor zhing // rtag tu dam tshig skyong ma'o// rnal 'byor ma
81a6(rgyud): yi tshogs dbus su// mchog tu rmad byung rtsen ma'o// dus thams cad du dga' dang bcis// rab tu rgyas pa'i bzhin byed ma'o// rnal 'byor pa rnams bu bzhin snang // rdo rje rnal 'byor mar de shes// dus kun du ni dug byed/ 
81a7(rgyud): maHmtshon 'bebs pa yi ming can ma'o// mi mo rtag tu 'gro bzhin du// dam tshig mda' ni skyong ma ste// de ltar dam tshig phyag rgya yin// phyag rgya chen po rab bshad bya// lhan skyes zhing skyes lha mo dang // stegs skyes 'jog
81a8(rgyud): rten mgon po mo// sbyor skyes gnas skyes de bzhin du// dam tshig lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma// pad can ma ni dus kun du// phyag rgya chen po rab bsngags pa'o// de ltar phyag rgya'i rang bzhon te// de mngon tshul ba dag phyag rgya'o/ 
81b1(rgyud): lan/ gang zhig gang gi mdog dang dri// de yi de ltar tshul dran bya// sa bsrungs ma yi rab sbyor bas// ka ma ru pa shes rab dbang // sems can kun gyi dgos pa'i phyir// phyag rgya'i 'di ni bsgrub par bya// e yig ye shes
81b2(rgyud): rlung rnams ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab bzhugs// 'dod chags me yi rang bzhin bdag/ thugs kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma// rdo rje gsang ba las bzhengs rtsa// khams thams cad mi 'pho med ma'o// 'das dang ma byon sang+ga
81b3(rgyud): rgyas rnams// de dag sems can cha can no// sum bcu rtsa drug las can ma'o// lus can gzugs ni des de bzhin// zhing du ka la sogs pa'i gzugs// chen po'i sngags kyi tshul bdag tu// sa la da lta nyid rol 'gyur// sangs
81b4(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi rigs la yang // gzugs dang gzugs med shes mi 'gyur// gzhan gyi gzugs su byas lha mo// sangs rgyas lam ni shes byed me'o// dbang po kun du 'gro sangs rgyas// gang phyir shes rab pha rol phyin// 
81b5(rgyud): de ltar de nyid nges shes pas// rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs dang mtshungs// ye shes 'khor lo lha mo rnams// bdag mo 'dod pa kun sbyin mo// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// sngags kyi gzugs can du byung ba'o// 
81b6(rgyud): oM dza ma Ta hA ka kA la lA ya bAn+d+ha ku ga ta ni ya te hUM dza hUM ya phaT hUM swA pheM hA Ta phaT swA hA/ oM I ra ba tI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// zhes bya sngags kyi sa bon du// mchog sbyin ma ni byung ba ste// khyi dog dbyibs ni sngon gyi can
81b7(rgyud): ji ltar kun nis thams cad du'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyar la me// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// / dpal mkha' 'a/ 
81b8(rgyud): rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ sa bsrungs ma'i sku'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi mog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas lha mos mchod byas nas// 'di skad kyi ni
82a1(rgyud): tshig smras so// gang gi 'byung po thams cad sogs// mthong bas kun du skrag pa yi// thams cad bden po yi ni brda// bcom ldan mkha' 'gro nyid kyis gsungs// phyag rgya kun gyi nang son pa// snying
82a2(rgyud): popo'i phyag rgya de nyon cig/ rgyud gang du yang ma bshad pa// de ni khyod kyis bskul bas te// rdo rje me yi rab sbyor bas// phyag rgya thams cad rab tu brjod// lte ba'i 'khor lor lha mo gang // shing reg mtha' yi spyod yul can
82a3(rgyud): 'gro dang 'ong ba'i rim pa ni// sna tshogs rtsa yi rim pas song // thig le nyi ma'i son phyag rgya// bsam dang sems ni dbyangs gsal te// sum bcu rtsa drug ring dang thung // phyag rgya de ni mngon ster na// phyag rgya dang ni phyag
82a4(rgyud): rgya'i lam/ shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can// byang chub sems son pa yi dbugs// 'di kun sems can la thim pa'o// 'jigs byed chen po'i sbyor ba yis// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// phyi mo
82a5(rgyud): de nyams myongs byas nas// gang dang gang gi ngag las byung // ha ha rnams kyis dgod kun rnams// ljon shing rtsa ba can du bya// dag pas der ni 'du ba ni// khams dang skye mched rnams kyang ngo // bag chags thams
82a6(rgyud): cad dang bral ba// 'jigs byed 'chad bzhin pa yin no// i DaM'i gnas su dod pa'i stobs// ji lta'i grangs kyi spyod yul tsan// nye bar mjal ba'i khyim dbus su// de yi phyir bstan 'gro ba ni// thim pa'ang dngos po/ 
82a7(rgyud): kun gyi bdag/ mkhas pas phyag rgya rnams kyis brlan// nam mkha' ru ni 'phur bzhin pa// 'gro ba kun gyis ye shes mchog/ dad pa'i shugs las shes byas nas// lus can kun gyi stobs ldan yin// sha chen po/ 
82a8(rgyud): la za bzhin dang // yid kyi khrag ni 'thung bar byed// he ru ka mar byed rig ma// ljon shing drung du yang dag zhugs// de ni dkyil 'khor 'khor dbus su// 'jigs byed chen mo rnam par bsgoms// thugs kyi 'khor lo
82b1(rgyud): dbus su ni// sngags rnams yi ge las byung ba'o// oM ma khA hA TaM sa baM mu ga DA ka me yA kha la la sku ya la hU~M b+hi hUM paM d+ha Ta ri phaT Ne swA hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA b+hai ra bI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// zhes bya'i gas
82b2(rgyud): sngags sbyor chen las// rnal 'byor ma yi sku thugs can// yid ni nang du chud pa yis// 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed// dpa' bo tha mas cad mnyam sbyar las// rdo rje sems dpe' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de
82b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// / dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'jigs byed chen mo'i nang gi cho ga rgya'i cho ga 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid
82b4(rgyud): kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas 'dod ma'i rnal 'byor ma// phyag rgya yi ni brda yi rgyu// snying rje bshad bya rnal 'byor pa'i// mthong ba yis ni dngos grub 'gyur// snang ba rnams su gang
82b5(rgyud): dngos// dbang po'i spyod yul du mthong 'gyur// gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang dmar sder ljang khu dang // ser dang sngo skya khra bor snang // sna tshogs pa dang du ba'i mdog/ sngo dang dmar ser 'dres pa dang // slar/ 
82b6(rgyud): la yang ni dkar nag mdog/ dmar ser dang ni ljang sngo skya// sngo ba dang ni dmar ba'i mdog/ dkar sngo dang ni dmar ljang dang // sna tshogs dang ni ser po'i mdog/ ser ljang dang ni ljang ser dang // dmar po dang ni dung mdo
82b7(rgyud): tsan/ dud kha dkar po sna tshogs sngo// ser dang dmar ba bsres pa can// dud kha dang ni sngo skya'i mdog/ dkar dang sna tshogs pa mdog can// skya bo dang ni du ba'i mdog/ skya dkar dang ni dmar skya dang // sprin dang skya bo lnga
82b8(rgyud): skya dang / sna tshogs pa dang skya bo'i mdog/ thams cad mdog gi kha dog tu// khams bcu gnyis kyi kha dog can// gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags// mkhar ba dang ni ra gan teng // phan tshun 'dres pa'i kha dog gis
83a1(rgyud): brtse ba chen po de bcu gnyis// rnal 'byor rnams kyi khams thams cad// der ni snang ba skye bar 'gyur// de yis snang ba'i dus su ni// 'phrul chen mo ni 'byung bar 'gyuraro// phyag rgya gnyis dag
83a2(rgyud): rnams shes pas// kha dog mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur// sngon dang phyis ni bsdus pa las// gal te lhan skyes sbyor bdag nyid// rlung shugs ma yi rab sbyor bas// tri sha ku ni'i gnas su ni// lha mo brtson 'grus
83a3(rgyud): stobs su ste// de ltar yi ge'i don rnams kyang // pa ni dbu mar 'bab pa ste// bag chags stobs kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur// dus 'dzom thams cad chos rnams so// slar yang mthong lam bdag nyid yin// bai ni yul dang / 
83a4(rgyud): ldan pa nyid// bdag nyid rnams kyi sgom pa'i lam// de kho nyid pas dam mkhyud pa// skyob pa rnams kyi grol lam mo// mtho ros mi yul sa 'og gi/ grol ba rnam pa gsum zhes bya// mnyam pa'i bde ba mthong 'gyur ba// je
83a5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'tshams na gnas// bum pa kun spogs byas gang phyir// gtum mo phra ba'i rtsa can no// pade mar rtsa ni thams cad can// de dang 'dra ba'i ye shes med// de phyir brtson 'grus 'byung bar 'gyur// stobs su
83a6(rgyud): ye shes ye shes can// de ltar shes byas rtag rnal 'byor// 'dod can ma la 'dod spyad kyi// dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag mo dang // gsang sngags yi ger yang dag byung // lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub mchog tu// lha mo chen/ 
83a7(rgyud): mo skye bar 'gyur// oM be b+hu ta g+ha la tsa saurma g+ham+b+ha ma ra d+ha d+ha Na ri ka Ne rA hUM hUM pha hU~M Ta phaT swA phaT hrI phaT swA hA/ oM bA yu be ge hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// kha dog gzugs ni sngon ji bzhin// sum bcu bdun gyi dbus su'o// 
83a8(rgyud): khams gsum snying po'i phyag rgya yis// gang de nus pa rdzogs par grags// gsung gi 'khor lo gsang ba cher// bdag gi gang zhig rim pa yis// thams cad bden par shes par bya// de phyir rdo rje 'chang dbugs
83b1(rgyud): dbyung / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi
83b2(rgyud): rgyal po chen po las/ rlung shugs ma'i kha dog gi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba ste le'u sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas rdo rje phag mo yis// ji ltar tsho gas mchod byas pas// nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// bla
83b3(rgyud): ma rang gis lha'i phyag rgya// 'o byed de bzhin la ma dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can ma// yongs gyur ma dang rjes 'jug ma// rnal 'byor pa phyin drug bzhin ma// lag pa g.yon pa yis ni brda// rnal 'byor dbyes pas
83b4(rgyud): ston byed pa// re re la yang rnam gsum 'gyur// dpa' bo'i rnam pa gsum nyid de// de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje nyid// e ro la ga dang rta mchog dang // he ru ka rnams lag g.yon pa'o// mkhas pas gnyis sbyar rnal 'byor te/ 
83b5(rgyud): spyan ma dang nI mA ma ki/ sgrol ma gos dkar bdag med ma// de bzhin rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ pha rol phyin drug du shes bya// de ltar rnam gsum shes bya ba// dpa' bo 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ sa yi snying po la sogs der// de bzhi
83b6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sogs gtso bo// lha mo lag pa'i rgyab son te// sor mo rnams la de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin lha mo dbus tshigs su// lag pa'i 'thil du de bzhin gshegs// dpa' bo de bzhin sen skogs la// lag gdub
83b7(rgyud): gnas su rnal 'byor ma// lag pa'i rtse mos brda byas te// mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs gsol bya// gang zhig gang gis bdag po nyid// de yi de nyid kyi mtshon bya// chang 'thung ma yi rab sbyor bas// ko sa la dang sna rtse mo// 
83b8(rgyud): dran pa'i stobs kyi bdag nyid kyis// bza' ba dang ni ston mo bya// gnyid log dus kun las skyes par// phyag rgya chen po legs par zung // ra hu dum me nyi ma ru// zos pa sna rtser de bzhin te// phra mo gnyis su med gzugs lnga/ 
84a1(rgyud): yul kyang bza' bar byas nas ni// me tog sems kyi sa bon las// k+Shi ni bdud rtsi'i skud pa 'jog/ de ltar nges byed rnal 'byor pa// lte ba'i chang sngon song las so// gzhu yi dbyug par son pa'i sems
84a2(rgyud): rang gzugs yang dag rig pa tsam// ro mnyam pa ni myang ba yang // the tsom med par 'dir byed 'gyur// rkyang ma'i bde ba'i nus pa yis// sa bon zag pa med par son// dus de nyid du rtag phyag rgya// dpa' bo'i brda yis
84a3(rgyud): thob por 'gyur// byang chub 'khor lo dga' byas su// 'jug 'gyur mchog gi zhal can ma// brda dang bral na 'khor ba ru// grol ba'i thabs gzhan yod ma yin// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs bdag mo// chang 'thung grags pa/ 
84a4(rgyud): chen mo yin// sum bcu rtsa bdun 'khor lor tshor// gsang sngags las byung mchog zhal ma'o// // oM sha ma tru hA ni ba~M su g+ham+b+ha na Na ni d+ha ri ra ya Ne hUM hUM hUM hUM pha phaT Ta pheM phaT Ta swa swA hA/ oM su ra b+hi k+Shi ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 
84a5(rgyud): / deltar sngags rgyal mngon par ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'byin dang sdud pa dag gis ni// gnyis gnyis kyi ni rkang par gsungs// shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo// kha dog dbyibs ni sngon can no// kun mkhyen
84a6(rgyud): bgrod bya phyag rgya'i lan// mngon par shes pa sbyin mi bya// ma shes pa yis rnal 'byor ma'i// phyag rgya chen po 'di 'grub 'gyur// sbrul dang kun sogs pas bsad nas// dmyal ba sogs su 'gro ba yin// sna tshogs lung
84a7(rgyud): 'dzin dpa'i rnams la// yang dag yid ches bya phyir ster// bla ma'i drin gyis yod pa ste// mkhas pa de yi rkyen gyis brda// dngos grub dngos po bdag nyid kyis// byed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// de yi drin gyis 'grol ba/ 
84a8(rgyud): ste/ mkhas pas/ zhing du gnas par bya// bla ma'i man ngag zhing yin te// de ni gnas dang byang chub phyog/ gnas pa tsum ma ka rnams te// rang bzhin med pa tsu ma'i lan// yang na 'di kun bla ma 'am// bla ma thams cad
84b1(rgyud): thams cad pa'o// man ngag dang bcas ye shes che// ngag gis lam 'das spyod yul can// sku yi 'khor lor dngos grub che// theg pa kun gyi bde bar bzhugs// bde med dbye ba med pa'ang med// thams cad der ni gnyis med che/ 
84b2(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtshon la 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rgyas
84b3(rgyud): 'thung ma'i rab tu sbyor ba'i brda'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas phag mo pad bzang mo'i// lha mos mchod pa byas nas ni// las dang rnal 'byor ma'i bdag
84b4(rgyud): po/ rdo rje chen pos bdag la gsungs// skyems can kun gyi dgos byed pa// lha rdzas las ni bshad par bya// gang gis thams cad dbang sngogs su// lha sogs thams cad de bzhin 'ong // thog mar rdo rje phag mo'o// rtsa ba'i gas/ 
84b5(rgyud): sngags kyi ni las// ka ling ka ru ljang lha mo// mngon par bka' sgo byed par 'gyur// de yi rigs rnams su skyes pa// bdag dang bdag gi gnang bas so// sum bcu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// mchog gi dbang phyug ma bsgom bya
84b6(rgyud): rkang pa gnyis kyi rtsa sngags su// sa byon yi ge las skyes pa'o// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du// de dang bral bas dngos grub med// oM sa tri ta swa saM ha ha sra sra ma mu ha khA sa ya ha hU~M sre hUM ka phaT ro sA mA hA bar+t+ta n+yA rbar+t+ta ne hU~M/ 
84b7(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sh+yA ma de bI hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog 'di ni// bsgom bya bzlas dang bsam gtan no// rdo rje phag mo gnyis byar med// 'bad pas rtsa ba'i sngags rnams su// zla mtshan gyi ni me tog/ 
84b8(rgyud): gis/ rlan pa'i gos na li gos bskams la// garga Ta yi thun gyi ni// dngos grub 'dod pas bdug spos sbyin// sngags pas bdug spos 'di yis mo// bcom ldan 'das ma nye bar bya// phag mo y-i ni sbyor ldan pas/ 
85a1(rgyud): @#/ 'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so// 'thun pa'i rtsa dang 'dus pa las// 'gro ba thams cad g.yon las byung // rang gi rgyud ni mdzes bzhin la// zla mtshan gyi ni rdul gos so// blun kyang 'jig rten gsum po dang // ye
85a2(rgyud): shes bsres pas spos su 'gyur// bye la bzhin du bzhag pa'i sems// ha yi yi ger tshig 'di'o// ljang khu'ang snying rje'i sbyor ba ste// lha mo de bzhin dbu ma'o// ci zhig bde ba rig pa ci// ci zhig don dam pa'i spyod yul// go
85a3(rgyud): sbyin pa ni rnal 'byor cher// rnam par shes pa lhar 'dod do// skye bo kun gyi bdag nyid ches// bgrod pa 'tshams rnams kun du'o// thod pa kha sbyar bcings byas nas// skra rnams kyis ni sbyin ba sreg brjod// 'di ni tog
85a4(rgyud): tu grags pa ste// dam tshig so sor bskyong bar byed// rtag tu rnal 'byor ma mchod bya// zhi ba'i btung ba nyin rer ro// de ltar byed pa'i sngags shes pa// dngos grub thams cad rab ster po// bai glang shi na chang btags pa// lag/ 
85a5(rgyud): / popo g.yon pas sbyin bsreg bya// lha thams cad dang rgyu skar bcas// klu sngogs sum bcu'i gnas pa dang // sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur na// phra mo'i mi ni slar yang ci// lud pa dang ni so shing dang // rang lus dril phyis
85a6(rgyud): de bzhin du// ming gis chang btags sbyin bsreg gis// 'jig rten dang bcas dbang du byed// zla mtshan gyi ni khrag dang ni// bza' ba zos pa'i skyugs pa ni// mi yi sgra dang yongs ldan pas// da lta nyid du 'gug byed
85a7(rgyud): mchog/ rang lus mar gyi skyugs pa dang // rang gi sgra ni mkhas pas bsreg/ nim pa'i mi ni 'bar ba yis// mod la sdang bar byed pa'i mchog/ bya rog gshog pas sbyin bsgeg byed// mnyam gzhag du du ra yi ma// mar
85a8(rgyud): nag tshad de yongs ldan pas// modado la bsod dang skrod pa yin// stong phrag dgu'i bsreg blugs kyis// yun mi ring bas rgyal po thob// gang zhig bsreg pa'i bsreg thugs ni// mkhas bras brgya ni sha yos te// de la b+h+rUM/ 
85b1(rgyud): ba gsum rjes la// skad cig la ni phongs pa 'joms gang gis rgyun du dran byed na// de ni skye bo'i 'thun par 'gyur// mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// lus med tshogs mchog bud med rnam// 
85b2(rgyud): myos pa'i bsam can 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod pas myos pa'i 'jig rten rnams// mi 'jigs pa ni sbyin par byed// bud med bye bas yongs bskor nas// grub pa sa yi steng du rol// dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sbyor ldan pa/ 
85b3(rgyud): dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor mnyam// rdo rje slob dpon gzhan dang 'dir// dpa' bo kun gyis phyag byed te// dam tshig spyod pa srun pa yi// 'jig rten gsum la dngos grub ster// sngon bshad rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis// de ltar
85b4(rgyud): sbyin bsreg byas pas 'grub// rnal 'byor las gzhan las med de// las dang bral bas sbyor ba med// 'phro ba bcu gnyis rnams kyi las// rlung 'bab pa ni de rnams son// gnyis kyis 'tshams ni 'dus pa las// sbyin
85b5(rgyud): bsreg thab kyi nang du blta// lte bu gnyis ni 'dus pa ste// slar yang 'tshams rnams thams cad du'o// de yi dus su shes par bya// sngags kyang yi ge la 'bum phrag/ bzlas byas bskul ba gsang ba yis// byas pas kun
85b6(rgyud): nas dngos grub 'gyur// rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor rab bya ste// de nas gcig gis dman lnga bcu// re migs la bzhag par bya// sngags pas gnod mdzes rgyal po'i sngags// de la thog mar rnam snang mdzad// bdun pa la yA slar
85b7(rgyud): yang de'o/ dgu pa ra su yi yig sbyin// bcu gsum bau la gri yig go/ bcu bdun par nI bA yig ste// slar yang bcu dgu pa la hA// sum bcu gcig par gri yig sbyin// sum bcu gsum par ni yig go/ sum bcu bdun par sbyin
85b8(rgyud): bya ba mkhas pas hU~M yi gage sbyor// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig po 'dir ni// de bzhin su yaM yige sbyin// bzhi bcu rtsa gsum bar de sbyin// ye shes sa don sbyar bar byaM// bzhi bcu rtsa dgu par sbyin pa// thams cad shes pas rbA / 
86a1(rgyud): yig/ dum bu gnyis par sbyin par bya// rig byed rnams kyi thog dbyangs so// dum bu drug par de bzhin 'dir// rlung ni dus thams cad du'o// bcu par gri yi yi ge sbyin// bcu gnyis pa la bu yig go/ 
86a2(rgyud): bcwo brgyad pa la hA yig ste// sum bcu gnyis par ya yig go// sum bcu brgyad par hA yig ste// bzhi bcu pa la ya'i sa bron// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhir de bzhin 'dir// gri yi yi ge slar sbyin bya// bzhi bcu brgyad par
86a3(rgyud): sngags pa yis// rtag tu hUM yi ge gzhom med pa'o// brgyad par de bzhin du ni 'dir// slar yang yi ge kun dbang phyug/ bzhi bcu pa ru dza yig ste// bcu drug pa la b+ha yig go/ nyi shu pa la a'i yi ge/ nyi shu bzhi par ga yig
86a4(rgyud): go/ nyi shu drug par na sla sbyin// sum bcu pa la wAn sbyar bya// sum bcu bzhi pa ra yA sbyin te// ra yi ga sum bcu drug de bzhin// bzhi bcu gnyis par hUM sbyin bya// rdo rje 'khrul 'khor bsdus pa'o// dum bu bcu gnyis
86a5(rgyud): rnams la ni// bsgrub par bya ba'i ming bzhug bya// hU~M yig dum bu thams cad kyi// bsgrub bya rnams kyi dbus su bri// rtsa ba yi ni yongs su bskor// rdo rje yi ni phreng bar bya// 'khor lo'i gzungs ni bri bya ste// dbang po khaM/ 
86a6(rgyud): pho si mthil la'o// 'khrul 'khor rdo rje las byung ba// dbang gi rdzas kyis yang dag bri// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'tshang ba yang // de tshe myur du byon par 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga rnams phab pa las// dam tshig der ni bya ba yin/ 
86a7(rgyud): nang gi bdag nyid sbyin bsreg gis// sngags kyi gtso mo shes par bya// dpa' bo gnyis med sbyor ba yis// de las las mchog bshad par bya// rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsang mchod bya// rtag tu mkhyud pas mchog
86a8(rgyud): rab byed/ mtshan mo kun du sgrub pa'o// de nas pho nya mchod par bya// sha za'i rtsa ba khar bcug nas// ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du ni// de srid ling gi las rung 'gyur// gzhan du nga yis ma bshad do// saM yi lcag ma til mAr/ 
86b1(rgyud): dubatsos pas rkang pa byug par bya// mkhas pa de yi mtshan ma ni// dus thams cad du rengs pa mkhas// pA tha ka Tu ro ha ni// rta yi dri dang 'di rnams ni// cha rnams mnyam par bya ba ste// brtse chen cho ga'i lhag ma ni// arga'i
86b2(rgyud): maM dang brtags nas// de yos lo dag dril phyis bya// gang gi tshad du 'dod pa yi// de yi tshad du gyur zhes bya// myur ba ru ni chu dron gyis// bkru ba byas ni sngon gyi tshad// pad ma dkar po'i ge sa re// sbrang dang btags pa'i byung ba
86b3(rgyud): niHbyin na ling ga brtan pa ru// de 'grub 'dod pa la spyod do// pad ma dkar po'i ge sar ni// til dkar po dang de bzhin gzhan// mar sar dang ni dpa' gcig gis// rtsa ba sbrang dang lhan cig tu// btags nas lte bar byug
86b4(rgyud): byas nate de srid lid ga mi ltung ngo // rdul can ma dang yu ba gnyis// yongs su bzung ba'i dar ba dang // bre do bsdu bar bya ba ste// bre gang mar gyur par du'o// de ltar 'thungs pas nyin gu// bcud len rdzogs par byed pa yin// 
86b5(rgyud): dau lder sbyor ba mchog gtso bo// yang dag dpa' bos gsungs pa'o// spre'u ki mchil bzung nas ni// phye ma zhi ba me ru ni bya// rang gi dbang po yang dag ldan// ba su byed pa bla med pa'o// gang dang gang du gnas nas ni// rdo rje
86b6(rgyud): phag mo zlos gyur pas// lan gcig bzlas pa'i sdig 'dzub kyis// g.yon dang g.yas su bskor bar bya// gang gang bsams pa thams cad rnams// de ni thams cad rab ster byed// so ba gos dang gser dang ni// bza' ston
86b7(rgyud): zas dang btung ba dang // de thams cad ni thob byed de// sngags pas de bzung yongs rdzogs byed// rnam 'gyur med pa dang ni khrag/ sgrub pos gcig tu byas nas ni// rig pa lan bdun bzlas pa yis// de naso mi la bskus pa
86b8(rgyud): yis// rnyeg pas skyes bu nam phye bar// 'gyur te tshig ni gzhan du ma ni// 'di yi rig pa len gcig ni// bzlas pa'i chu yis 'grel pa yin// de ltar gang dang gang gi ni// sems can gyi khrag rnams kyis ni// bsgos pa'i/ 
87a1(rgyud): skud pas bcing ba yis// bzlas pas gzugs ni 'dzin pa ste// 'di rnams thams cad chud grod par// 'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med// bud med gzugs mdzes rgyal po dang // sa yi bdag po la
87a2(rgyud): bltas ni/ sgrub pos ma mthong ba yang ni// de rnams thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur// lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas// de yi mtshan po 'ong ba ste// nub bdun na ni mda' shugs kyis// 'ong ba la ni the tso/ 
87a3(rgyud): med/ de ltar bya ba bya min pa'i// las kun rdo rje'i nor son par// rang gis rig pa sbyor bdag nyid// ye shes pha rol son pa 'grub// 'khrul 'khor khams kyi re'u mig tu// rtsa ni phra mo'i gzugs can ma// yi ge'ang rlung
87a4(rgyud): chen po yin te// lha ni kun tu 'gro ba'o// ljang khu gnyis med bdag chen ma'o// lha mo ye shes rgya mtsho yin// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshes
87a5(rgyud): bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje phag mo dang gnyis su med pa'i ljang lha mo'i dbang du bya ba'i sbyin bsreg dang 'khrul 'khor gyi
87a6(rgyud): 'khor dang rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba ste le'u sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan mkha' 'gro yi// bdag po yis ni slar gsungs pa// lam pa ka yi rab sbyor bas// 
87a7(rgyud): shin bzang rnal 'byor ma'i sbyor ba// shes rab spobs su shes bya ste// 'khrul 'khor rta yi 'gros de bzhin// rab tu dga' ba'i sbyor bas bzhugs// rtswa sngags rnal 'byor pa yis so// ye shes ldan pas dbus
87a8(rgyud): rgyu'i bdag/ kun rdzob bden po 'dzin rtsa'i kun du spyod lugs las// stobs ni las rnams thams cad du'o// gnyid log pa yis rab bzhugs pa'i// srog ni de yi nang du'o// las chen po la za bzhin pa// rtsa bani/ 
87b1(rgyud): sngags kyi byas nas ni// bdud rtsi dron mo bzhu byas nas// de dbus rnams kyis 'khor lo'o// de ni sum bcu bdun bdag nyid// 'phyang bzhin pa ni byang chub skyes// me yi rnam par rtag lha mo// gtso mo rnams kyi snying bdag
87b2(rgyud): nyid ke rus rlung dang rnam shes la// phye nas dur khrod bdag nyid rnams// de yi sa bon yig shes nas// pho nya rnams kyis rtag tu bskyod// re re yi ni sa bon gyi mthar ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so// // oM ma drA hI na gyi/ 
87b3(rgyud): sA sa~M ge du ra pra d+hi b+ha ra ya ba hUM sa hU~M ha pa ri Ta Ne pha hU~M swA phaT swA hA/ oM su b+ha dre hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags lasaM yang dag byung // las kyis kha dog dang ni gzugs// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can/ 
87b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya// gtor ma dang ni sbyin bsreg bya// phyi nas las ni yang dge brtsam// sngags pas lha yi sbyor ba yis// 'bum phrag bzlas pa byas nas ni// sems can kun la bde 'byung ba'i/ 
87b5(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bshad par bya// 'khor lo sngon ma'i gzugs can ni// byas nas gsang sngags 'dir dgod bya// rnam par snang mdzad thog mar te// gnyis par de nas nir dgod bya// gsum par hU~M yig
87b6(rgyud): sbyin bya ste/ lnga par oM gyi yi ge'o// drug par dri yi yi ge sbyin// hUM gi yige kun bsdu'o// brgyad par m+b+ha bi yi ge sbyin// bcu pa ra pu yi yi ge'o// bcu gnyis par ni hU~M yig sbyin// bcu bzhi par ni dri yig go/ bcoM lngar
87b7(rgyud): m+b+hi'i yi ge ste// bcu drug de bzhin hUM yig go// bcu bdun pa ru su yig ste// bcu dgu ba ru hA sbyar bya// nyi shur phaT yig sbyin par bya// hA yig nyi shu rtsa gcig par// nyi shu dgu par rnam snang mdzad// sum bcu pa yi yi ge/ 
87b8(rgyud): gnyis/ sum bcu gcig par slar da'o// rig byed dang po sum bcu gsum// sum bcu bzhi pa ra ya yig ste// rA dza'i yi ge dag sum bcu lngar// sum bcu drug pa ra hA yig sbyin// sum bcu brgyad par gr-i yig go/ 
88a1(rgyud): bzhi bcu pararA ni wAn sbyin bya// bzhi bcu gnyis par a de bzhin// bzhi bcu gsum pa ru ni d+hU// bzhi bcu bzhi pa hUM hUM dag/ bzhi bcu lnga pa ru ni gri// bzhi bcu bdun pa ru ni na// bzhi bcu brgyad par sbyin/ 
88a2(rgyud): byabyebya baHhUM hUM gi ni yig gnyis so// b+ha gau'i sgra ni slar sbyin te// bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// lhag ma la ni rtsa sngags bri// 'khor lo bzhi ru bsgrub bya'o// kun nas yongs su 'khor bar ni// sngags pas rta mgrin bri b.raro// 
88a3(rgyud): byaM// gnyis pa g.yon du bskor bar ste// 'khrul 'khor kha sbyar 'khrul 'khor bya// gsang ba'i yi ge las skyes par// shes bya lhan skyes rnal 'byor pas// klu dgug pa dang dbang dang ni// lha la sogs pa bsad pa
88a4(rgyud): min/ rnal 'byor rtse bdag nyid can gyis// rang sems rtag tu bsad par bya// gang yang de'i yang sdang ba ni// de yis thams cad bsad pa yin// snang sems can gyis gzhan du na// bsad pas dngos grub rnams
88a5(rgyud): ni thob/ bde mchog phyi ma'i las gang ni// de kun nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// re re yi ni las byung zad// mdor bsdus 'di ni bshad par bya// klu yi rgyal po de bzhin brgyad// mtha' yas rim pas bsgom par/ 
88a6(rgyud): g+ha/ nor rgyas srog du gos par bya// thur du shes pa dung skyong ngo // mnyam gnas pad ma yi ni kra/ bisamya gtan pad ma chen po'o// khyab gnas 'jog po yI ni klu// klu ni slar yang hU lu hu la'o// rus skal mtha' yas
88a7(rgyud): shes par bya chungs pa rgyal po s+ya ni klu// lha sbyin nem por rgyal ba'o// mtha' yang nor lngas rgyal ba'o// 'jug pa yis ni dgug pa ste// btang ba yis ni gshegs su gsol// bum pa can gyis tshar dbab pa
88a8(rgyud): nyam pa'i rlung gis gal la pa'o//  me sa brgyad po de bzhin du/ 'dir ni bu sor zhes par bya// la gis rnam mkha' ding gnyis gzhan// nasde brtsigs pa btsus n+ya/ blo tshig brgyad sbyin bya/  tsho/ 
88b1(rgyud): sna tshogs de bzhin noH/ phan tshun skyes pas bkris pa ste// klu mo de'i mchan khung du'o// rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro'i gzugs chen gyis// klu'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// ji ltar rim pas kha dog rnams// thun 'tshams kyi
88b2(rgyud): nithun tshod brgyad cu sngags mngon par brjod pa nyid// klu dang klu mor shes par bya// dbang po thim par byas nas ni// yi ge la 'bum bzlas pa nyid// gang gang las ni phyi rol gyi// de de'i las kyi dbang tshul bya// gzun
88b3(rgyud): ni gang 'dod par bya ste// khro bo 'am zhi ba'i gzugs dag tu'o// sems ni gzugs su yang dag grags// de phyir shing bzang ming can no// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi bdag// de yis lha ni byed par 'gyur// sla
88b4(rgyud): yang phyi nang bdag nyid kyi// gzhan pa'i lha ni ma bshad do// de yis thams cad mngon brjod pas// rnal 'byor pa yis gang 'dod 'gro// sems can rnams kyi bag chags sgron// phyi rol du yang smin mthong 'gyur
88b5(rgyud): phyag tshogs sad pa'i dus su ni// sprin dang klu rnams mthong mi 'gyur// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag
88b6(rgyud): pos 'di gsungs so// // dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang shin du bzang mo gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can
88b7(rgyud): rta'i sngags mdor bstan pa/ rigs kyi klu'i lus kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba ste// le'u sum bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas de phyir slar la yang // lha mos mchod pa 'dir byas te// phag mo 'dod
88b8(rgyud): chags bcas pas so// mnyes nas lha yis ston par mdzad// rta rna ma yi rab sbyor nas// dus kun du ni kAn tsir ro// ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag dang // snying kha ru ni yang dag bzhugs// ha yig na dang lus
89a1(rgyud): gartse/ kun d+hu/ snying kha'i dbus las kyang ni langs// ya yig bskyod pa yi ni srog/ rdo rje'i rlung gis bskyod pa yin// d+hA tsam de bde dang bcas pa// slar yang mdab mad pa gsum gsum// sku dang gsung dang thugs
89a2(rgyud): kyi chos/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi mdab ma brgyad// bcu gnyis lte ba'i bud ma ru// rnal 'byor ma rtag sum bcu drug/ de tshe re re'i 'dir rnams kyis// 'tshams kyis rta la sogs pa rnams// Na yig lha mo de ma yin// gso/ 
89a3(rgyud): dang mi gsal ring bzhin can// 'dod pa'i khams su yang skyes so// thar pa'i gzugs kyis las can no// ts+tsha yig 'pho ba yi ni chos// thams cad rig pa'i 'tshams las grol// sum bcu bdun bdag nyid dbus su/ 
89a4(rgyud): gsod pa'i las la brtson par bya// gang gang gsod pa'i las rnams kyis// bla ma gsod la byed par 'gyur// bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa 'am// de bzhin mtshams med lnga byed la// dug dang skye tshe ldan tshwa dang // 
89a5(rgyud): dur khrod kyi ni sol ba dang // rang gi sdigs 'dzub khrag gis ni// 'khor lo 'bad pas bri bar bya// gshin rje'i 'khrul 'khor rtag tu de'i// byed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// sngon bshad re'u mig shes byas nas/ 
89a6(rgyud): gsang sngags phreng ba 'di dgod bya// thog mar rnam par snang mdzad te// gnyis par su ni rnam par brjod// gsum par mA'i yi ge brjod// rig byed dang po sngar de bzhin// drug pa gri yig de bzhin te// slar yang // 
89a7(rgyud): bdun par hA yig go// brgyad po la ni hUM yig gnyis// dgu par phaT yig de bzhin no// bcu par ni yig de bzhin te// slar yang bcu gnyis par hUM yig/ bcu gsum par ni phaT yig ste gri yi yig bcu par
89a8(rgyud): de'i hUM gi yi ge bcwo lnga par// rtswa'i mig bcu drug par// bcu bdun pa ru su yig ste// hUM yig bcu dgu pa la'o// nyi shu pa la hUM yi ga sbyin// hA yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig par// rnam par sdang mdzad nyi shu dgur// 
89b1(rgyud): sum bcu pa la gri yig go/ sum bcu gcig par hA yig ste// sum bcu gsum par rnam snang mdzad// sum bcu bzhi par a yig dang // na yi yi ge de sbyar bya// sum bcu lnga par ya'i sa bon// ho yig der ni sbyin par/ 
89b2(rgyud): bya/ sum bcu drug par hUM gnyis hUM sbyin bya// sum bcu bdun par phaT yig go// sum bcu brgyad par ba yi ga gnyis// kha ni bcur hU~M gnyis de bzhin no// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa la phaT/ bzhi bcu gnyis par b+ho ga ga / 
89b3(rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa la ni// ba yi gnyis dag yi ge'o// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa hA// bzhi bcu lnga par gri yig go// bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa la ni// rA dza'i sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bi d+ya'i sgra ni slar sngags pas// dum bu bzhi bcu brgyan
89b4(rgyud): par ro// wAn yig slar yang sbyin bya ba// bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa la'o// lhag ma rnams la go cha'i sngags// bsgrub bya'i ming nang bcug pa'o// gshin rje'i gdong ni grwa kun du// lag pa rkang pa phyogs su dgod// snying kha gshin/ 
89b5(rgyud): rje'i sa bzhin ni// de yi dbus su bsgom par bya// ye shes rnam shes sbyor bdag nyid// mkhas pas sngags kyi kun spyod bya// bla ma'i dam tshig la brnyas pa'ang // rnam par shes dang blo dman pa'o// bstan pa la ladigan+do/ 
89b6(rgyud): byed da pa/ mi la sogs pa'i skye mched do// mtshams med lnga po byed pa ni// phung po khams dang de bzhin gzhan// sems can thams cad gcig pa yi// rigs ni phung po sogs dang khams// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams/ 
89b7(rgyud): kyis te/ bsad pas sems can khams bsad pa'o// gang dang gang gi gdong bltas nas// de dang de bdag nyid gzugs can// bag chags ye shes kyis sad par// 'gyur ro sem can gang+gA bsad min// de rnams gsod
89b8(rgyud): pa'i las sam yang // byas pas bsad pa de dang 'dra// sbyin bsrog dug la sogs rdzas kyis// yang dag rigs gzugs can gyis bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo de dran bya// bsreg pa btum mo la ni'o// sa bon/ 
90a1(rgyud): / yi ge las skyes pa// dkyil 'khor rta ma yi'o// kha dog dang ni dbyibs sngon gyis// shes rab thabs kyis mchod pa che// oM shrI sa shrI swaR+sha sa~M ma hA ra ra ba kA la ra thAM kA si ya Ne hUM hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ 
90a2(rgyud): phaT sA swA hA hA/ oM ha yaM kar+Ne hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// / 'khor rnams ngo mtshar skyes nas ni// skrag nas sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur// kye ma tshul 'di mi shes pa'i// 'jig rten rnams ni rmongs pa nyid// gang gi
90a3(rgyud): bde ba kun gnas nas// srog gis 'di la tshar gcad pa'o// mtshar nas sems can sar 'gyel bas// lag na rdo rje sogs bzhengs nas// pus mo'i lha nga sar btsugs nas// bdag nyid chen po bdag 'di
90a4(rgyud): go/ ci yis bdag dgra ga nyid// 'bras bu dang ni rgyu'i rang bzhin// bcom ldan gang du rnam par bzhag/ gal te nyid kyis 'bras rnams kyis// gsod pa de dang 'dra bar gsungs// yang ni rgyu ni bcom ldan
90a5(rgyud): la/ 'bras bu skyes bu gsod pa yin// bdag gi bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ the tsom bsal bar mdzad du gsol// bka' stsal rtse gcig pa yis tshig de la// rdo rje khyed kyis mnyan par gyis// 'bras bu las/ 
90a6(rgyud): kyi rjes su 'thun// bdag ni bde ba kun gyi gnas// de las dbang gis sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams so// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni// gnyis su med pas gcig tu gyur// de ni
90a7(rgyud): dngos po kun gyi rgyu// mkhas pa la ni rkyen yin no// dmag dpung la sogs sa chen la// mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba yis// thams cad gnyis med bdag nyid bya// de phyir gsod dang ldan pa'o// bdag nyid
90a8(rgyud): bsad pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// skye bo gzhan kun gyis ma yin// dus kyi dbang gis rgya srid na// tshegs chung las ni 'grub par 'gyur// de yi phyir na sngon gyi las// mkhas pa rnams kyis brtags byas nas// 
90b1(rgyud): khams ni dpa' bo'i rang bzhin du// de dang der ni gdags par bya// de yis bdag nyid bsad pa yis// sems can khams rnams de nyid do// 'bad pas brtse ba bskyed byas nas// nges par bsad par bya ba yin// 'jig
90b2(rgyud): rten 'di dang pha rol du// brtse ba dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs
90b3(rgyud): so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rtarna ma dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga dang / rtsa ba'i sngags kyis cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyis bsad pa zhes bya ba ste/ 
90b4(rgyud): le'u bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas skyo bar byed po yi// sbyor ba kun du rnyed dka' ba// bya gdong ma yi rab sbyor ba// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// brtson 'grus byang chub yan lag chos// hi mA la yar
90b5(rgyud): yang dag zhugs// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'khor lo'i gtso mo bsgom par bya// mkha' gzugs nyid bdag po nya mo// rkan dang rdo rje'i chu skyes dbus// rnam shes rlung dang lhan cig tu// mda' yis shugs
90b6(rgyud): kyis gyen 'phang ba// lus ni 'dar 'dar bya ba ste// drag shul sbyor bas bya ba yin// rtag tu byed bzhin rnal 'byor pa mchog tu zag med 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ji srid mi 'dod par// rlung dang rnam shes g.yo
90b7(rgyud): bapar 'gyur// sna yi bu gar sngon srog la// lte ba'i dbus su bskyod par bya// lte ba sna gnyis sbyor ba yis// 'dzin bzhin pa yis g.yo mi 'gyur// rlung dang rnam shes lhan cig tu// de ni smyo bas 'khor ba yin// de
90b8(rgyud): dus sbyor ba'i bdag nyid la'ang // dngos po thams cad mthong ba gang // de dang 'dri ba'i dngos por 'gyur// da du ra me'i sbyin bsreg gis// shing la dbyangs pa'i sgra dang ni// sha za'i rtsa ba bsreg par bya// 'di
91a1(rgyud): / yi las kyi rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kyang skad gcig skyo 'gyur// de phyir brtson 'grus byang yan lag/ de rnams las ni mngon par bya// brtson 'grus rdzogs byang chub mthong bas// rtag tu myur/ 
91a2(rgyud): du thob par 'gyur// hi yig 'chang ba'i ye shes su// rang nyid dpa' bos bshad pa yi// mA yig kyang ni rang rig pa// bdag nyid rnam pa'i gnas bzhugs te// thim dang longs spyod rnam pa'i gzugs// sangs
91a3(rgyud): rgyas sku can skye bar 'gyur// rang gis rig bdag rig pa rnams// sems can don byas nas gshegs 'gyur// sum bcu bdun bdag nyid dbus su// las kyi rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya// mdog dang gzugs
91a4(rgyud): ni sngon gyi bzhin// gsang sngags sbyor bas yang dag byung // / oM a san+na rba mA nA lA gA d+ha na ri Sho Ne Sha hU~M Na hUM s+t+waM/ phaT na swa bau ha pra ba NA ya hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM kha gau na ne hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'i/ 
91a5(rgyud): sngags kyi sbyor bdag nyid// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can// ji lta ba ni sngon gyi bzhi ni// 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bshad par bya// yaM dregs 'khor lo rtag tu ni// sngags kyi phreng ba 'di dgod bya// thog mar/ 
91a6(rgyud): rnam par snod mdzad de// gnyis par m+b+ha sbyar bar bya// gsum par de nyid de ltar sbyin// lnga par rig byed rnams dang po// hA yig drug par sbyin par bya// hUM gi yige bdun par dgod// brgyad par su yi yi gi ste/ 
91a7(rgyud): dgu par de nyid sbyin par bya// bcu pari hUM gnyis sbyin bya ste// gri yig slar yang bcu gnyis par// bcu gsum pa la hA yi ge/ bcu bzhi pA la hU~M yig go// bcwo lnga pa la ni yig ste// hUM yig bcu drug pa la dgod/ 
91a8(rgyud): bcu bdun pa la phaT yig ste// gr-i yig bcu dgu pa la'o// hU~M yig nyi shu pa la sbyin// phaT yig nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// rnam snang mdzad pa nyi shu dgur// sum bcur hA yig slar dgong bya// sum bcu gcig
91b1(rgyud): par de nyid sbyin// sum bcu gsum par rnam snang mdzad// sum bcu bzhi par a ho gnyis// sum bcu lnga par rA dza gnyis// gri yig sum bcu drug par sbyin// sum bcu bdun par de nyid do// sum bcu brgyad/ 
91b2(rgyud): par hUM hU~M gnyis// bzhi bcur a na ya yi tshig/ bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa la wan// hUM gnyis bzhi bcu gnyis pa li// bzhi bcu gsum par pa ya ste// bzhi bcu bzhi par de nyid do// bzhi bcu lnga par hUM dang phaT/ 
91b3(rgyud): b+ha ga bzhi bcu bdun par ro// bzhi bcu brgyad pa ru ni hUM// bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa la phaT// stong par snying po yi ni sngags// bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcug pa'o// kha yis 'khrul 'khor la 'dzin pa'i// thams cad du ni yi
91b4(rgyud): dgas bri tra dur khrod kyi ni ras la ni// kha sbyor rnam par bya ba yin// lte ba'i gnas su 'khor lo 'di// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// yi dwags chos dbyings ngo bo nyid// rtog pa gsol phyir snying rje yin// rta
91b5(rgyud): yang gnas dang gnas min du'o// snying po byang chub kyis rdo rje// klu'i 'gros theg pa rkyen rnams kyis// rang bzhin skye bo thams cad kyi'o// dge dang mi dge ro langs te// sems can slu bas dgod pa'o// gzhan ni theg pa
