113a3(rgyud): ste/ 'bad pas zhi ba blta bar bya// skye gnas dbus su rim ji bzhin// bdag nyid bsam bya rnal 'byor pas// po nya'i 'od zer kun nas 'khrigs// 'bar ba'i phreng ba rgya mtsho blta// da ltar rnam par bsams
113a4(rgyud): gyur pas// rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba'i gnas// rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag dos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni keng rus kyi cho ga ste/ rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// // de nas
113a5(rgyud): mche ba rnam gtsigs pa'i// ting 'dzin sbyor gnas bshad bya ste// gzhu 'grangs rim pa 'ong ba ni// rdo rje rnal 'byor pas yod te// sgrog gi thig le son bsam pa// 'tshams thams cad du de rgyud te// gzhu dbyug
113a6(rgyud): mtshan mar bsam par bya// sgra thams cad ni bskul ba yis// kun nas 'gengs bzhin pa yi mda'// dbus ma'i lte bar 'dzem pa yis// rnam par shes pa'i dben gzhom bya// 'byung gnas thams cad gsad pa yin// 
113a7(rgyud): bgrod bzhin pa yi bde ba cher// re reg pa yis gzhan du 'gro/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa yi// rab sbyor rnams kyis nges 'byung 'gyur// mtshon bya zad pa med 'joms pa// skye bo kun la 'jug par 'gyur// mya ngan
113a8(rgyud): 'das pa'i spyod yul las// gzhan gyi grong rnams su 'jug pa'o// sngon gyi sprul pa'i bag chags ni// de la rgyun du 'joms par byed// rnam par zhu ba'i bdag nyid che// zhi ba'i gzugs su ster bar 'gyur// Sh+Tha zhes rkang
113b1(rgyud): pa'i 'thil bar du// nor bu'i skud pa bzhin du bgrod// na de mtshams kyi don dam par// sra gsum po la lta bar 'gyur// de phyir skye bo thams cad la// mtshon bya mtshan nyid kyis 'byed do// dbang po dri rnams thas/ 
113b2(rgyud): cad la// bdag nyid kyis 'bugs slar ci smos// 'gro ba gzhan du rab 'jug par// mchog tu rmad byung 'gro bar 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra bar yang dag gnas// smra ba kun la rnam par lta// mig sogs rnam par shes pa ni// 
113b3(rgyud): nang rnams su ni bskyod par byos// mkha' 'gro rnam pa de zhes bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs kyi gtso// dkyil 'khor sngon du sprul par ni// mche gtsigs la sgrogs bsgom par bya// rang gi khams ni bde ba'i gzugs// 
113b4(rgyud): rang rang gtso bor bya ba yin// de las skyes pa'i mkha' 'gro che// mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs// thams cad chos 'byung sna tshogs pa'i// snying por gzhom du med zhi ba// chos kun gcig tu yongs bsdus pa// 
113b5(rgyud): sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri// a li ka li mnyam byas nas// snga tshan rnams kyis yongs brjes pa// 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed bya// der gnas dpa' bos yang dag tu// ye shes la sogs sku bzhi po// zhes/ 
113b6(rgyud): bya tho 'gyur the tsom med// stong 'og rtag tu dngos grub ster// bdag nyid po nya kun 'gros so// yi ge lnga bcu sde tshan brgyad// de nyid mkha' 'gro mchog rmad byung // sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor ram yang ni// chu ngu rgyud dang 'dra ba
113b7(rgyud): mchog/ yi ge thams cad kyi ni tshad// sdom pa sogs su mtshon par bya// yi ge rnams dang ming rnams dang // sdom pa rnams su de rjod do// dkyil 'khor rnams dang rgyud rnams dang // le'u rnams ni de bzhin du// la ste chog/ 
113b8(rgyud): rnams ni thams cad te// nyis 'gyur thung ngu ring ba'o// de nyid du ni kun nges rgyal// 'byin cing bsdud par byed pa'o// sems can rigs zhes 'dir de bshad// ra re yi ni mtshan nyid do// re re yi ni sgom pa ni// ji lta'i
114a1(rgyud): rim pas shes par bya// ma ga man mang gadrug / na sams can gzugs su 'ad// gas sdugs dran rnas ldanan pa// nyung dun rab gtsugabya// ma thun thun ma dang bras pa// dam bya/ 
114a2(rgyud): mo rnam par spangs// A yig thig lo dang bcas pa// de phyir mtshal gyi rigs can no// gunya dzi'i me tog dang mnyam par// i yig la ni brgyad par 'dod// I yig sin d+hu ra'i mdog/ bzang po lnga par shes par bya// 
114a3(rgyud): u yig dbang po'i gzhi'i 'od// U yi ge drug pa nyid// klog gnyis dang ni 'dri ba'o// ri yig du ba'i kha dog ste// phra me'i lus ni spangs pa'o// rI yi yi ge mun pa'i gzugs// li ni bya rog gshog pa'i mtshungs// 
114a4(rgyud): lI yi yi ge mtshal gyi me dog/ e yi yi ge dmar skya ste// a yi sin d+hu ra dmar mdog/ oM yi yi gnyi ma 'dra// 'od zer stong phrag gyen du 'bar// oM yi yi ge rtag 'bar ba// nyi ma bye ba dang mnyam yod// zla byed de bzhin
114a5(rgyud): du thig le// uM yig sngon du bshad pa can// zla bo gnyis dang tsheg phrag ste// uHyig rgyal po de bzhin no// de ltar stong pa nyid bcu drug/ las rnams kyi ni dag pa'i rgyu// myos dang brla rdol rmongs pa dang // sem tha dang bani
114a6(rgyud): / snyistong nyid do// rmongs pa dang 'khrugs dbang dang ni// myur du thams cad ster ba'o// bsam bral ba dang myos pa dang // brlag rdol du ni gsal ba'o// stong pa nyid kyi las bsgoms pas// de ni dmugs dang dbang du'o// 
114a7(rgyud): yang dag rmongs dang rnam rmongs 'gyur// lus brlan pa dang sems dpa' bral// dbang du 'ong dang dgug pa dang // ye shes shes bya can mchog go/ bskrad pa dang ni bzhu ba'i las// rnam pa bdun du 'dod pa yin// sa yi zil// 
114a8(rgyud): gnon 'dzin bzhin dang // sngags min pa dang rmongs pa'i sems// skye ba 'di la nam du yang // de yi slar yang 'ong min pa'o// rnam par sdang dang thams cad kyi// 'jig rten gyis ni smod pa'o// 'jig rten kun dang mthun med la// skad / 
114b1(rgyud): cig gnas pa spangs pa'o// yid kyi las ni thams cad rnams// de phyir 'jig rten gsum gang 'gyur// bde ba'i kha yis bkug byas nas// dbugs med ri mo 'dzag pa nub// phyi me'i yal ga rnams kyis bya// dam tshig dbang phyug ma'i gnas kyis/ 
114b2(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin ni// gnyis stong mchog tu zag pa med// sangs rgyas ri mo stang 'og tu// pad+ma sna can la rab tu gnas// a li ka li mdor bsdus pa// bcud lan khams kyi lus las so// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lnga/ 
114b3(rgyud): zhal du yongs su 'gyur ba'o// de yi 'og dang gang gzhan du/ yi ge thams cad nges par gnas// so sor snang ba ma byung bar// bsrung ba gyis zhes bdag gis bshad// sems ni rjes 'thun dbyangs su 'gyur// sems stong pa yi/ 
114b4(rgyud): rang bzhin can// zla gnyis yang dag sbyor ba ni// phyag rgya mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// de ltar khams kyi rang bzhin kyang // ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o// ra yang thams cad byed pa yi// stong pa nyid ni so sor dged// thog ma nyid ni rkang
114b5(rgyud): gnyis dgod// brla dang gsang ba rkang pa dang // lte ba snying kha sdang dang ni// mgrin pa dang ni rkan de bzhin// kha dang sna dang rna dag dang // dpral ba mgo bo rgyab tu ste// rang gi khams ming 'du shes kyis// dbang la sogs pa'i las byed
114b6(rgyud): do// slar yang re re yi yang ni// las ni nyi shu lnga'i bdag nyid// stong nyid de nyid rig byed pa// rgyun du nang du bsgom par bya// kaM yig la sogs ma yig mthar// lha mo bdag nyid chen po nyin// gang gis sa gsum gyi ni lha// thams cad/ 
114b7(rgyud): lha ma yin dang mi// sgrub pa'i legs par dris pa ni// de rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur// de nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// ka yig sngogs su 'du shes so// bdag dang dkyil 'khor lus dang ni// lha dang bla ma dang ni sngags// rnam shes
114b8(rgyud): ye shasta snying po dang // dus dang rgyu dang 'bras de bzhin// 'bugs dang bcud lan las dang ni// gtor ma so dang phyag rgya gzhan// dbang po dbu ma sgyu ma dang // mtshams dang rigs rus de bzhin te// lung ni rjes su rig pa
115a1(rgyud): 6/ dang // mig 'phrul 'dra ba rim ji ltar// de ltar de nyid las mdzes pa// shes rab chen pos shes par bya// rang bzhin gyis ni brjod pa'i las// dus kyi me yi mdog can no// ji ltar dbang la sogs pa'i las// lnga
115a2(rgyud): lnga ru ni gsal ba yin// dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin dkar// ser dang ljang khu de bzhin no// sgrub pa'i bsgrub bya'i 'dod pa ni// de rnams de nyid 'gyur gyis 'ong // ya yig la sogs dgu rnams kyi// ji lta'i cho gros yi ge rnaMs
115a3(rgyud): phung po khams kyi rigs rnams dang // yan lag dgu rnams brjod pa pa'o// ji lta'i rim pas blo ljin gyis// dgu dgu ru ni shes par bya// las ni de rnams shes bya ste// 'dus pa bde mchog bla ma dang // bde mchog rdo rje mkha'
115a4(rgyud): 'gro dang // 'bud ba de nyid 'dus pa dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed sam bu Ta// ji lta'i cho gaste gzhan yang ngo // de ltar nges brjod 'bum gsum las// phyung ba ba mchog chung ngu ste// a yi ge la sdigs kA yig mthar// le'u rnams ji lha'i rim
115a5(rgyud): pa yis/ dri kho na nyid ldan par sbyar// sdom pa rgya mtsho mkha' 'gro skyes// mkha' mnyam nang du rab bshad pa'i// de yi sgrub thabs bshad par bya// ji ltar dbus ma'i pad mar ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gsal bar sgom// 
115a6(rgyud): sku yi rgya mtsho ser sna rgya mtsho dang // 'dod chags rgya mtsho phrag dog rgya mtsho ste// phyogs bzhi por ni bsgom par bya// pade mdang rnams su rnal 'byor ma// rdo rje rgya mtsho rin chen rgya mtsho ma// pad ma rgya mtsho sna tshogs rgya mtsho ma// 
115a7(rgyud): / g.yon bskor du ni bsgom bya ste// mdab ma bzhi la thod pa ni// rgya mtsho bzhi po yi ni gzugs// dngos kun bdud rtsir son pa'o// slar yang gro bzhi po rnams su// ji lta'i rim pas dgod bya ba// rnal 'byor ye shes de kho na// thar
115a8(rgyud): pa'i rgya mtsho ga yon bskor du'o// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg dang chos dang yid dang sems// kun kyang rgya mtshor shes bya ste// g.yon dang g.yas kyis dgod par bya// sa dang nam mkha' lce dang ni// rna ba thams
115b1(rgyud): cad mtsho ste// ye shes shes bya'i rgya mtsho dag/ sngon gyi rim pas dgod par bya// sgo skyong ba yi lha mo che// g.yon bskor du ni dgod bya ba// glang po rgya mtsho rta rgya mtsho// seng ge rgya mtsho ma ha rgya mtsho'o// grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo ni// 
115b2(rgyud): sgyu ma rgya mtsho rmilam rgya mtshom// gsang snang rgya mtsho snang ba'i rgya mtshom// kho dog 'khor lo gzhan gyi bzhin// byang chub chung ngu bdag nyid che// dkyil 'khor de yir shes par bya// dur khrod brgyad kyi rim pas ni// sgrub thab sa/ 
115b3(rgyud): rim pas bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi zhal nas ni// pad ma'i yu ba nges par 'thon// kha dog dkar ba 'bor chen po// pad ma mang ma stong blag can// de yi dbus su bsgom bya ba// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho bde mchog
115b4(rgyud): ste// phyag stong pa'i rnam par bsgom// zhal ni sum bcu rtsa bdun no// zhabs bcwo brgyad kyis gar du mdzad// spyan gsum pa lnga sna tshogs mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan can gyi gzugs// sna tshogs rdo rje zla byed can// rgyab tu/ 
115b5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po 'dzin// lhag mar dpa' bo dpa' dbang mo// bcu gnyis bdag nyid can 'khor lor// ji ltar bdag gis sngon bshad pa'o// shes rab phyag g.yon du bshad tre// g.yas par rgyun du thabs yin
115b6(rgyud): no// khyab 'jug drag po de bzhin tshangs// gshin rje dang ni log 'dren dang // bden bral dang ni thags bzangs ris// dbang po tshogs bdag kun tri ka/ dgra bcom zla ba nyi ma dang // bla ma skyob pa bla de bzhin// nor rgyas dang ni skyes bu ma/ 
115b7(rgyud): myos pa zhabs kyis gnon pa ste// rang rang khyim thab yang dag ldan// mdog dang mtshon cha yang bya'o// phag mo yis ni mkhyud pa ste// de yi gzugs can nam phyag gnyis// sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin rab myur ma// slor yang
115b8(rgyud): rang 'dra'i gzugs can ma'o// mdab ma stong du bsgom bya ba// rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma kun te// bcom ldan kha dog gang 'dra ba// de 'drar de rnams mtshon par bya// thung ngu ring po yon tan 'phar/ a yig la sogs sde
116a1(rgyud): brgyad to// byi mo bcu gnyis kyis phye ba// stong phrag rnal 'byor ma'i yang ngo // ka rdo rje sogs zhes bya ste// khrims kyi rkyen gyi yid kyis so// 'khor lo drug bdag rnal 'byor can// dri thams cad
116a2(rgyud): ni gar du mdzad// thams cad kyis ni rol gnon// phyag gnyis pa'am mkha' 'gro'i bdag/ thod pa kha TaM ka 'dzin ma// bad chen rnam pa'i gzugs can ma'o// sangs rgyas thugs kha nas spro ba// 'khor lo gsum
116a3(rgyud): 'gro 'ad zer phreng // srog ni 'og dang steng lta bas// sdom pa rgya mtsho dgug par bya// slar yang dbugs kyis dbyung ba ni// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho gnyis med bdag/ thams cad sdom pa'i sgrub thabs su// ji lta'i rnal 'byor/ 
116a4(rgyud): gzhan bya'o// de ltar byed bzhin pa nyid kyis// phyag rgya'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// gzhung thams cad ni blta bar bya// gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor dmigs mi bya// dam tshig ga ni spyod pa tsam// sdom pa chung ngur rab tu
116a5(rgyud): bashrad// thams cad sog mya bzhin dor la// thams cad sdom pa gzung bar gyis// mche ba rnam gtsigs rab sbyor bas// gzhu 'gengs rim pas 'ong bar gyis// de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yang // sngon gyi
116a6(rgyud): sbyor bas bsgom par bya// 'ogo dang steng nyid mche ba gnyis// byed mchog mkha' 'gre'o rgya mtsho dag/ rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la// hU~M phaT yi ge mthar sbyar gyis// yang dag ting 'dzin rdo rje yi// gsang sngag#
116a7(rgyud): thams cad rgyan ni rab bshad pa// sngags rig pa yis sngon bzhin no// bdag gi bdag pos rgyud 'di ni// gsungs pas yang dag dga' brir 'gyur// nyid dang lhan cig bya ba byas// phyag rgya 'og ste ji ltar legs// 
116a8(rgyud): khyod kyis 'og dang steng phyag rgya// rab bshad bya yis lha me nyan// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho shes rab che// thabs ni sdom pa rgya mtsho'o// 'og dang steng du snyoms 'jug pas// de yi phyag rgya mngon brjod 'gyur// zhal nas tre
116b1(rgyud): par 'thon yu ba// ngag gis spros pa'i bdag nyid do// de ni mkha' 'gro spyod de yang // rnam par shes dang thams cad 'ong // zhu ba'i gzugs ni snying kha ru// 'od kyis thams cad sdom par gyis// de ni theg pa cher sdom pa// bdag nyid
116b2(rgyud): chen po ye shes gzugs// de ltar gnyis su byer med gzugs// der ni phyag rgyar mngon par brjod// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho che// bcom ldan bdag pos
116b3(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// / rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// de nas lha mos mchod byas nas// phyag byas nas ni 'di skad gsol// sems can rnams kyi sbom byung ba// bcom ldan bdag po nyid kyis gsungs/ 
116b4(rgyud): lha dag yis ni rab sbyor bas// rab bshad bya yis lha mo nyan// byang chub sems kyi cha can gyi// bde ba 'ong ba'i gang zhig rtsa// sdom pa sems can smin byed pa'i// rnal 'byor dar ni rnam par spro// 'dod chags chags bral/ 
116b5(rgyud): rnam 'dres bya// sdom pa skye 'gro'i gzugs can no// gang phyir de nyid kyis sdom pa// sngon gyi spyod pas sdom pa'o// de nam mkha' nam mkhara' te// sku gsum rnams kyi yang dag bzhugs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs
116b6(rgyud): sprul pa// thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// gang tshe sa mas ni 'gro bzhin pa// gzugs kyi dbus su thim par gyis// rang rig bdag nyid byang chub ldan// lhan cig skyes pa'i sku thob 'gyur// ting 'dzin skad cig rig med
116b7(rgyud): ba// gang gi srid gsum la thim gyis// de ni 'byung bar shes bya ste// lus can gzhan rnams kyi sdom min// rnal 'byor rnams kyi gsang sdom pa// de ltar de nyid de so shes bya// nang gi bdag nyid nyin zhag gi/ de yis sdom
116b8(rgyud): bar bshad par 'gyur// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs ldan pa'i// a li ka l+li sogs sde tsha na// dang po'i yi ge'o cha la sogs// gang du ming ni nges par mthong // rigs ni de ru shes bya ste// / ang ka sems can yad
117a1(rgyud): n+ya/ dag ldan/ mtha' yas la sogs klu gang dang // nyi ma la sogs bza dro bzhin// mkha' 'grom ming thog blas nas// ma mo de rnams su rab grags// lha rnams kun gyi bskyod pa dang // sngags rnam bya// 
117a2(rgyud): dang rgyud kyi do// 'jig rten kun gyi ma yin te// de yis me la yang dag brten// rtsa ni dgu po 'gog pa las// srog rgyu rnams su shes par bya// a A ka tsa Ta te pa dang // ya sha'i sde tshan yi ge dag/ i I kha tsha Tha tha pa dang // 
117a3(rgyud): ra Sha gnyis par brjod pa'o// u U ga dz+ra Da da ba dang // la sa sde tshan gsum pa'o// e e gA dz+nya DA dA b+ha dang // wa ha sde tshan bde bzhi pa'o// o au aM aHnga nya Na dang // na ma da ltar dgu'i bdag nyid// bzhi po yongs
117a4(rgyud): su grags pa ste// nyi can lnga rnams kyis/ de bzhin// de ltar 'jig rten kun gyi do// bsdud pa dang ni 'byin par gnas// sgyu chen bcu gnyis de rnams kyis// sa bon gzugs kyi tshogs dran bya// de rnams ra sir yang dag grag/ 
117a5(rgyud): rgyu skar kun dang yang dag ldan// zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i chas// 'og dang steng gi kha de bzhin// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba gnyis// rgyu skar dang ni ra sir bshad// srog zung du ni de bzhin grags// ri dang chung ngu rgyal dang 'jam// steng du/ 
117a6(rgyud): de yi rgyal bar bshad// 'og tu 'chi ba mnyam mi mnyam// nyi ma'i rgyu bar son pa kun// rgyu skar rA si gza' de bzhin// rA si rnam gsum spod gang phyir// nyi mar gnas par 'char bar 'gyur// srog 'char ba dang yang dag
117a7(rgyud): ldan pa ra si kun gyis shes par bya// ka ra ka Ta seng bu mo dang // bum pa rigs drug yang dag ldan// 'char bar 'gyur dang shar ba yang // ji lta'i rim dag gza' kun gyis// bri sh+tsi ka dang rta nyid dang // ri dgas bum par yang dag
117a8(rgyud): ldan// cha shas lnga yi tshad kyis ni// gza' lnga shar ba'i 'char bar 'gyur// ri bong lug de bzhin nyid dang // skan d+ha ru ni song bya bzhin// cha shas kying ni bzhi pa nyid// 'chang ba'ong bar 'char bar 'gyur// zhag gi 'char ba ma
117b1(rgyud): lus po 'du N+Da 'bras bu'i ming dang yang dag ldan// nag mo sogs nas 'jib ma'i mthar// yongs su rim pas nyi shu bzhi// gang dang 'dra ba'i ming de 'dra'o// de rnams 'bras bur shes par bya// nyis 'gyur longs spyod bris pa
117b2(rgyud): dubya dbang po rnams kyi cha shas ldan// thob pa zhag tu shes bya ste// bdag gi rtag tu zhag lha mo// bdag nyid kyis ni dgos kun dang // gzhan rnams la yang de ltar sbyar// de phyir phyi dang nang rnams su// dge dang mi dge'i los zhes bya// 
117b3(rgyud): sdom pa 'byung ba'i dus su ni// rnam rtog med pas mtshon par bya// gza' gang de rnams dbyangs zhes bya// dbyangs gang de rnams rA sI'o// dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin skar// rang gi gzugs rnams kyang blta'o// dngos grub 'bras bu
117b4(rgyud): ster ba po// yang dag sbyor dang bral na med// g.yo ba'i tshor pas g.yo ba'i las// nges par bstan pas g.yo med 'gyur// 'dren ma yis ni 'dren mar 'gyur// sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgyus// lha rnams grol ba'i// 
117b5(rgyud): rgyu nyid pas// lha yi dgra ni bsgom par bya// sum bcu bdun bdag nyid 'khor lo// rnal 'byor dngos grub byed pa'i gtso// kha dog dang ni mtshan nyid dbyibs// las rjes 'brangs pas bsgom par bya// lce 'am lha min sbyin byed
117b6(rgyud): kyi// dag ni 'khor lo sdom pa'o// dpe' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro lnga yi dgra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed
117b7(rgyud): pa lnga pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad// 'dus par byas nas 'dri ba ni// lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi// sdug bsngal ster po ji ltar lags// gal te kun rang bzhin ston pa// dge dang mi dge de 'dri ba// de nas
117b8(rgyud): bcom ldan lha la sogs// sems can kun ster po tsaM lags// 'di la bdag ni the tsom mchis// gtso bo gsal bar mdzod cig kye// phag mo la sogs mang po yi// lha mo sgyu ma chen mo nyon// rang rang las kyi rjes 'brangs pa// 
118a1(rgyud): @// lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi// bdag gi rang bzhin du ni med// byang chub chen por zhu las yod// rang gi rang bzhin yon tan nyid// bdag gi las kyis yang dag 'byung // de phyir dge dang mi dge lta/ 
118a2(rgyud): sna tshogs kun rtog 'thob par byed// de yis lha dang sbyin byed rnams// gza' dang rA si rgyu skar can// rang gi lus 'bras la za ba// ster ro gzhan du ci yang med// ston pa ji ltar grol bar 'gyur// glu 'di yis ni dgas
118a3(rgyud): par byed// a mi tA b+ha dzi na tA sa mA d+ha mA ga ma d+ha mA d+hau&/ ma pA nyi rA sA ma nya/ ri ga mA sa nya mA rI gi ma b+hU ya te/ sa rI re sA rI rI sa ni sa nya shru ta nI saM mA nya sA ni/ shI rI b+ha ga mA d+ham+ba d+ham+ba sA nya pa yA mAM pA bA ma dang mi ta/ 
118a4(rgyud): 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas// 'di 'dra'i grol ba bsgrub par bya// a wa d+hU ti'i 'ang dbus su ni// rnam shes 'gro ba la mtshon bya// srog la sogs pa'i rlung thams cad// rnam 'gyur byas pa'i bar thim byas// 
118a5(rgyud): rnam par shes pa 'ang 'dres gyur pa'ang // khams thams cad kyi bcud len de// 'thungs pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dbang po rnams dgrod mtshan nyid las// rkan gyi phyogs su gnas pa'i lce// a wa d+hU tIr
118a6(rgyud): darab bshad// cha shas can gyi tha ma yi// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur// rtsa thams cad du bkang ba ste// yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su thim// mdor bsdus pa sa ni khams lnga ste// gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir ma brjod// 
118a7(rgyud): dbang chen la ni ma yis bsreg/ chu yi dbus su rang tu thim// myur du nu nas 'gro bar 'gyur// rlung gi nam mkha' la gnas so// chu ba'i tshogs ni bskam byas pas// de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro/ sems ni stong nyid la son
118a8(rgyud): bya stong nyid nam ma lagi khams la'o// nam mkha'i ye shesi la'i jug bya// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid// mkhas pas ye shes shes bya bdag/ de ltar 'od dpag med pa sgom// rgyo bas brgyad legs par rgyan/ 
118b1(rgyud): pa yai/ shes bya'i 'khor lo 'dri bsgom bya// pu med bri ba mi u ku/ d+ha si me ro ma ka 'drar// rlung du tu ka bi mi dbang ldan du// rI sa'i 'khor lo rimI ji bzhin// de bzhin 'di la 'di rnams dgod// oM i u o o au
118b2(rgyud): sna bon rnams// bkra shis la sogs gza' lnga ni// shar la sogs par dgod par bya// ring po de nyid du dgod bya// aM au nyi ma zlar shes bya// nyi ma zla ba 'dir gol ba// ku li ri la nyi ma ste// gza' lhag gdong
118b3(rgyud): lnga pa 'dir gnas pa// mthar ni gang zhig lhag ma yi// so so'i cho gas za bar 'gyur// rA sa rnams kyis brgyan pa yi// 'gro kun la phan 'khor lo do// de ltar do la'i 'khor lor 'gyur// rgyu skar ra si dus dang zhag/ 
118b4(rgyud): lug rnams sA rI hi ta sogos dang // zla ba dang ni nyi ma rnams// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni// mdor bsdus pa yi bshad par bya// rgyu skar dus tshod yang dag ldan// gza' dang nad ni de bzhin te// do lA rA sa'i
118b5(rgyud): tshad kyis ni// skye ba'i lasA su brjod pa yin+da// karA ti ka dang bzang po'i tshe// mig dmar de bzhin smin dug ste// de la 'chi bar shes par bya// gal te rnal 'byor pa med na'o// mA ra ga shIr Shi mgo dang ni// gza' lhag
118b6(rgyud): nyi ma la smyo ba// mgul pa'i nad kyis nyin bzhin// khyu mchog la ni rtag tu 'chi// rgyal dang mri gra'i rgyu sker dang // gza' lhag 'khrig pa la 'chi'o// ku lir mchu yi tshes brgyad kyi// tho rengs pa wa sangs la 'chi// 
118b7(rgyud): gri dang mo chu yi rgyu skar dang // tshes bcu spen pa seng gi la// nub mo 'chi bor shes bya ste// gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur kyang dro// bu me nyi mar gul ma sa 'chi// sra ga dang ni bcu bzhi dang // gzhu dang pur bu'i ri
118b8(rgyud): mo dang / gal te sangs rgyas mnyam gyur pa// srang la 'chi bar shes par bya// snron dang bcu gcig nag pa dang // phur bu sdig pa la 'chi'o// chu stod chu smad tshes dgu dang // gro zhin gzhu dang ba sangs
119a1(rgyud): @2/ 'chi/ gro bzhin tshos bdun zla ba dang // zla ba rgyal dang chu srin la nor med// khrums stod khrums smad bcu gsum pa// zla ba mon gre bum pas mdzad// tha skar brgyad pa nam gru dang // spen pa dang / 
119a2(rgyud): ni nyal 'chi// sems can kun gyi skye ba'i rtsis// dus smra bas nI shes par bya// se bon gcig las skyes yon tan// gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyis so// rig gnyis su ni shes byas nas// de'i dus skye rtsis brtsam
119a3(rgyud): par bya// sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mkhas pas de yi rigs ske'o// de yi 'bras bu shes bya ste// mtshan nyid kyis ni rjes su gnas// rA si sogs 'khor 'bral pa de// rnam shas kun gyi mnyan nyid do// / 
119a4(rgyud): 'od dpag med kyis rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom par bya// dbus su 'od dpag med mgon po// lhag mar mkha' 'gro ma sogos so// de ni rnam shes skye gsal bar// las kyi 'bras bur da
119a5(rgyud): d+hun byat+ta thams cad bde bo kun sbyor las// de tshe gnyis med la brten pa'i// 'od dpag med kyi sbyor ldan pa// bcom ldan ston pas 'di gsungs so// / zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa drug pa'o// 
119a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'od kyi rab sbyor bas// ye shes de kho nyid bshad bya// lha mos slar yang mchod byas nas// de kho na nyid ye shes zhus// sems can rnams kyi rnam nges pas// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gang 'dra ba// de 'dra bdag
119a7(rgyud): gis bshad byo yis// rtse cig pa yi yid kyis nyon// lus la rtsa rnams mtshan ma ni// de rnams ji ltar gsal bar byed// rtsa chen sum bcu rtsa gnyis te// de rnams kyi ni gtso bo mchog/ bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha
119a8(rgyud): mo// dbyangs rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan nyid te// dkar po nag po'i phyogs kyis ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru ni brjod// dor ni rnying pa dgu po mchog/ lus kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid do// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis
119b1(rgyud): nr-i/ 'chi ba'i dus lta bur gnas so// dbugs ni rnam par spros tsam gyis// lus can 'bri ba drug gnyis ni// snga dwe ro yi ta yI char// de yi rtags ni mtshon par bya// sna dang mig gi phyogs drung ni// 'grus pa dang // 
119b2(rgyud): ni rna ba'i rtsa ru// lce dang mche ba'i mtshams dang ni// mgrin pa rtsib logs de bzhin du// snying gi gur dang lte ba dang // boR+Ya dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan// 'doms dang ling ga dag de bzhin// mgo bo dang ni spyi bo'i phyogs
119b3(rgyud): 'tshams ni de rnams thams cad du// dbugs ni 'chad cing 'chad pa'o// lus kyi mtshan ma dgu rnams te// 'chi ba'i dus ni bstan pa yin// nyi ma'i tshad kyi grangs rnas ni/ 'khor lo dus bdag nyid can dga'// gang
119b4(rgyud): tshe nyi ma drug rnams zhon// gcig brjod pa ni brgyan pa yin// der ni lo gsum 'gyur can te// sum brgya drug bcu rnams de bzhin// cha shas de ltar kyi ni tshig/ mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// nyi ma bdun ni/ 
119b5(rgyud): yongs thob nas// gang tshe rlung gi 'bab pa na// lo gnyis yang dag brjod pa dang // dus kyi grangs can zla ba dang // nyi ma rnams ni bcwo brgyad kyi// gang zhig tshad du yang dag brjod// zhag brgyad rnams su yongs gtong bas// 
119b6(rgyud): rlung ni gang tshe 'bab pa na// li gnyis su ni yongs bshad par// de yi 'tsho ba yi ni grangs// nges par de tshe 'chi ba ni// de yi zla ba rig byed grangs// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad// 'tsho ba yi ni dus grangs so// lha mo nyi ma
119b7(rgyud): dgur 'bab na// lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho ste// zla gnyis nyi ma nyi ma yi// tshad ni sbyor ba'i dus can no// lha mo nyi ma bcu rnams kyis// lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho'i// nyi ma bcu gcig de bzhin du// gang tshe rtsa ni rab tu 'jug na// 
119b8(rgyud): lo gcig gi ni lam bcas pas// zla ba yang ni dgu'i grangs kyis// nyi ma bcwo brgyad rab tu bshad// the tsom med par bshad pa'o// zhag ni bcu gnyis rab 'bab pas// lo gcig tu ni rab tu grags// zla ba yang ni lo grang
120a1(rgyud): can// nyi ma rnams ni dus kyis mdzes// bcu gsum du ni gang tshe rtsa// g.yas su bgod par 'bab pa na// lor ni yang dge bshad pa ste// zla ba yang ni rig byed grangs// nyi ma rnams ni dgu'i grangs
120a2(rgyud): na/ 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o// lha mo gang tshe bdun gnyis su// rtag tu rlung ni 'bab pa na// lo ni tshe ru yang dag bshad// zla ba'i tsher ni yang dag gags// nyi ma rnams ni bcu gnyis te// de tshe 'tsho ba'i tshad
120a3(rgyud): yin no// gang tshe lnga bcu nyi mar ni// rlung ni de bzhin 'bab pa na// de tshe 'chi bar shes byar ba// lo gcig na ni the tsom med// nyi ma mchog ni phan pa yi// gang tshe brgyad gnyis su 'bab na// 'tsho ba zla ba bcu dang ni// 
120a4(rgyud): nyi ma rnams ni mchog grangs kyi// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nyin rnams kyi// tshad du bdag gis bshad pa'o// nyi ma rnams ni bcu bdun du// nges par gang tshe rlung rabab na// de tshe de yi tshad kyis ni// zla ba rnams ni dgu dang ni// 
120a5(rgyud): mu bcwo brgyud na de bzhin// 'chi ba'i dus la the tsom med// nyi ma pocwo brgyad rgyu ba yI/ zla ba yang ni brgyad na dang // nyi ma rnams kying nyi ma'i grangs// dus kyi grangs ni bshad pa'o// gang tshe gcig dman nyi shur ni// dril
120a6(rgyud): blon pa spyod pa na// nyi ma yang dag bshad bya ba// 'tsho ba zla ba bdun dang ni// nyi ma rnams ni dus grangs bshad// dus 'di rnams kyis mchog sdong can// gang tshe nyi shu ru ni spyod// zla ba gnyis na tshe dang 'bral// 
120a7(rgyud): sbyim nyi shu gcig rnams su// gdu tshe nyi ma raba' bab na// zla ba lnga ru yongs 'tsho ste// nyi ma rnams ni nyi ma'i grangs// nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang tshe rab be// zla ba'i rig byed ni tshe 'gro/ nyi ma rnams ni ny+Ni shu bA ni// zla ba
120a8(rgyud): rig byed du bshad do// lha mo gang tsha nyi shu gsum// rlung ni rgyun du 'bab pa na// de na zla ba zhir 'tsho ste// nyi ma dus rnams su dran bya// nyi shu rtsa bzhir rab 'bab pas// zla ba gsum du bshad pa ste// nyin bcu
120b1(rgyud): gcig la de bzhin du// 'chi ba'i dus su rnam par brjod// dus kyi grangs ni mdor bsdus na// gong du sngon du bshad phyir// bar gyi nyi ma ma bshad gang // bcu gnyis nyid kyi grangs kyis ni// cha yi rim pas de sbyangs nas
120b2(rgyud): thar ni gsal bar byas pa yin// blo dman rnams kyis rtogs don du// dus ni 'di rnams rab tu bsten// rnal 'byor ma rnams shin tha mo'o// mdun ma dus ni bdag gis bshad// lha mo de rnams kyis yid ches// khas
120b3(rgyud): ni mnyam pa can du 'gro/ sna'i sha ni rnam chad cing // steng bltas ma ni de bzhin 'bab/ de yi 'tsho bar shes bya ba// nyi ma bdun na the tsom med// mig gi gos ni yang drag tshad// gyen khe bltas ma mchog de bzhin// cha/ 
120b4(rgyud): shas dgu la yang dgra zhe ni// lngas lhag pa na 'chad de bzhin// go da be r+ya 'khur ba yi// ngos su steng du 'gro ma'o// nyi ma btsu ru shes bya ste// nub gcig gis lhag de bzhin no// rna ba g.yas la yongs brten nas// bzang
120b5(rgyud): mo stang du yang dag brtan// bcu gcig cha shas la zhon te// 'chad pa bcwo brgyad na de bzhin// bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// lce lA ri mo nag po can// lus can kun gyi 'chi ba ni// nams zla'i mtshan mos shes par bya// 
120b6(rgyud): bcu gsum su yi bar du ni// gdong nag mo ni reg de bzhin// nam zla'i grangs kyi nyi rnams kyis// 'byung po rnams kyi bgrod pa yin// rgyun du mchi ma 'bab gang tse// steng bltas mar ni rab tu grags// bcu bzhi pa yi dab
120b7(rgyud): lu zhon// bcu phyed kyis ni the tsom med// snying kha'i gzeb ni zhom pa dang // steng du blta ma de mchog ma// gsung dang lnga rus mdzes lha mo// zla ba phyed du the tsom mo// lte ba'i dbus su son lha mo// bcu drug cha bdag can yo nges
120b8(rgyud): rdzogs// sen me'i khrag med de bzhin zhag/ nyin rnams bcu ru the tsom za// bcu bdun pa yi rtsa yang ni// bla yis stang du skams pa ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag grags// nyin gzhan nyin la the tsom med// byin pa zung gi
121a1(rgyud): gang shig sa// steng du b.las ma de bzhin mchog/ bco brgyad pa ru shes bya ste// nyi ma rnams kyang nyi grangs kyis// gcig gis dman pa'i nyi shu 'doms// 'chi'i stong du khA ba ltas mchog/ mnyam
121a2(rgyud): byas 'chad par 'gyur ba la// 'di yis 'tsho ba the tsom med// mtshan mar rol ldan mar grags ma// steng bgod mchog gis dbang phyug ma// bcu gnyis su ni yang dag gags// nyin rnams rkus chod the tsom/ 
121a3(rgyud): zaHbar gyi nyi ma gang bshad pa// bcu gnyis nyid la the tsom med// lo yi rim pas de sbyangs na// bdun bcu rtsa gnyis rim pa yi sa// dug dang sum bcu bcwo brgyad bcu// 'di ni zla bas rim ji ltar// shes
121a4(rgyud): bya de ltar lha chen mo// rim gyis rim gyis dbye ba'o// lhag ma nyid ni bsdus 'gyur bar// 'tshe ba yi ri ni shes par bya// yang dag cho ga 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya// rab tu sbyor bas srog
121a5(rgyud): bkang bas// sangs rgyas lus la 'chi ci smos// rab tu sbyor ba 'di brten nas// mdor bsdus pa yis 'chad par 'gyur// rdo rje'i lam nas son pa'i sgrog/ snal me'i bcu gnyis mtha' ba raM du'o// sangs rgyas/ 
121a6(rgyud): rjes su dran sbyor bas// 'dod pa lnga can la za 'gyur// gsang sngags chen po'i 'od la ni// gnas nas kun du baglod par bya// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid 'chi med 'gyur// rnam pa'i dri za'i ris can no// rtsa'i kun nas
121a7(rgyud): 'gengs bzhin pa// dngos po kun la gnas pa yin// ske bo kun kun gyi khams rnams kyi// ye shes rnam par 'thob par byed// chos bdag med pa 'tshag par 'gyur// gang zag rnams la skrod par 'gyur// / 
121a8(rgyud): gnyis ka sgyu mtshan mo ste// snying rje'i dbang gis bzhugs pa yin// mthar thug pa yi sbyor bas sems// mtshams rnams kun du 'chi ba yin// 'chi ba chen po sangs rgyas gzugs// rnal 'byor nas/ 
121b1(rgyud): la bde ster byed // dkyil 'khor thams cad bzung ba yis// thams cad bde ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i rab sbyor bas// bde ba'i dam pa yang dag myang // rdo rje'i 'od ni bsgom par bya// bcom// 
121b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi gzugs mtshungs ma// lnga ni mngon rtogs gzugs can te// shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid can// srog kun yong dag sbyor ba las// mchog tu zag med bzhugs ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dus
121b3(rgyud): 'khor grags// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed po bdun pa'o// / de nas phyag na rdo rje srogs// byad sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi// mchod pa byas shing
121b4(rgyud): phyag byas nas// 'di skad du ni gsol pa'o// gtso bo lha rnams bsgrub thabs dang // de rnams rang sngags bdag la gsungs// gang gis thams cad dbang gyur pa// gang gis rab sbyor nyid kyi lugs// lha la sogs pa'i
121b5(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i thabs// rdo rje sku yi rgyal po nyon// gang gis yang dag cho ga yis// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ dkyil 'khor bri ba byas nas ni// sku bsgom bya ba 'dir bshad te// de la ma mo lho rnams dang // 
121b6(rgyud): pe nye 'byung po gza' de bzhin// lus sprul po ni chen po dang // rig pa'i gsang sngags 'dir brjod bya// dbus ma yi ni nang gnas pa// srid pa dag pas bsgrub pa yin// dus thams cad du bskyed pa ni// dkyil 'kho// 
121b7(rgyud): du ni rab 'bab can// ma mo dbang chen bsgrub bya dang // lha ni chu yi dkyil 'khor du// 'byung po ma la bsgrub bya dang // gza' ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// lus sbrul po ni na mkhar te// rdo rje'i sku yi rab sbyar bar// ye
121b8(rgyud): shes dkyil 'khor cha yis ni// A wa d+hU ti 'bab pa yin// dkyil 'khor lnga rnams kyi tha ma// de yi dus su shes par bya// de blta snga nas ni phyi rol du// ras bris la srogs dkyil 'khor dgod// nag po'i brgyad dang / 
122a1(rgyud): bcu bzhi la/ 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// 'bum phrag bzlas pas de nas ni// ster 'gyur mdun du mngon sum du'o// tshangs ma zhi mo de bzhin du gang ya pa sa mya mamad / 
122a2(rgyud): tshogs kyi dbang mi mi gdan mo// gnyis pa'i dum bur dbang po dang // go shin rje chu la lus ngan dang // yid tags dbang dang me stan can// bden bral dang ni rlung de bzhin// dum bu gsum par dgod bya ba// nyi ma
122a3(rgyud): zla ba mig dmir dang // gza' lag pur bu pa songs dang // spen pa dang ni rA hu'o// bzhi par tshangs khyab 'jug de bzhin// drag po gzhon du nges par sgor// saM dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'byung ba chen po'i khams
122a4(rgyud): rnams dang // mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib ma dang // kam po dzI khyab bdag de bzhin// 'byung po 'byung ba'o gzugs kyis ni// rtag tu cho ga bzhin bsgru ba bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba ya saM// kun nas phyi yi
122a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bri// ri mo sum skor dbus byin pas// brtul shugs can gyis mdzes par bya// pad ma mdab brgyad bri bar bya// lte ba zab pa'i spyod yul can// de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sku// zhal gcig pa la phyag
122a6(rgyud): bzhi pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// bzhad pa'i zhal le khro dang bcas// kha dog sngon po drag chen po// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgya no// nyi mar gar mdzad re la bzhugs// sum bcu pa rnams 'jig
122a7(rgyud): par mdzad// stag gi lpags pa'i na za 'dzin// bzang po'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa// thod pa dang ni khA T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug gi ni brgyan// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni// byang du rim pa ji lta bas// 
122a8(rgyud): mkha' 'gro kam po rnga nyid ma// 'jib ma dang ni mar me ma'o// de ltar rdo rje sku yo don// mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya// lte bar rdo rje'i rnam par 'gyur// pho nya rkang pa drug bgrod ma'o// snying kha gas pa
122b1(rgyud): mgrin pa ru nya de nyid rnam par slar dgod bya// de nas srog ni 'dzin bzhin pas// bsam gtan sems te gzhan gyis min// lha rdzas 'od zer bskyed par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang lus skyes// las dang po yi
122b2(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// phyogs bcu rnam par spro bar 'gyur// hrIHyig las byung ba'i lha mo// brag mo phyag ni bzhi ma ste// gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin du// rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid// kha dog sngon po drag chen mo// phag gi
122b3(rgyud): gau gdong can 'jigase rung ma'o// pad yig gis ni zhi ba mo// kha dog dmar mo 'od chen mo// thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid// kha TaM DA ma ru de bzhin// hI yi yi ges gzhon nu ma// kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma// rtse gsum pa
122b4(rgyud): dang ba dan gsumate gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin no// ho Ni ges tsa mun ri// kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma// kha T+wA~M ka nyid thod pa dang // cang te'u chung snod de bzhin no// oM yig las ni tshangs pa mo// kha dog dkar mo phyag ba ni ma/ 
122b5(rgyud): pad ma nyid dang thod pa dang // gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin mchog/ gaM yig las ni tshogs dbang mo// kha dog ljang khu phyag bzhi ma// rtse gsum pa dang thod pa dang // bgrang phreng dang ni la tu'o// bI yig las ni khyab 'jug ma// kha dog
122b6(rgyud): sngon mo phyag bzhi ma// 'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang // zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog/ I yig las byung ba'i dbang mo// kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma// rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang // sdig 'dzub bcas zhags de bzhin
122b7(rgyud): nota thams cad 'bar bzhin gyen brdzes skra// sna tshogs rgyun gyis rnam par klubs// ro la bzhon ma spyan gsum ma// rkyed par stag gi lpags pa dkris// shar spyir tshangs pa bri bya ba// kha dog dkar po phyug bzhi pa/ 
122b8(rgyud): thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang // spyi blugs pad ma de bzhin no// byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ni// kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa// ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang // thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin ni// lho ru drag po zi bya ste/ 
123a1(rgyud): du ba mdog can phyag bzhini pa// rtse gsum thod pa de bzhin du// zhugs pa phreng ba 'dzin de bzhin// nub du gzhon nu bri bar bya// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// dpa' byom dung thung dbyug pa 'dzin// 
123a2(rgyud): thod pa bgrang phreng 'dzin de bzhin// dbang ldan khyu mchog la bzhon pa// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin// phyag gzhan thal mo sbyar ba'o// dbang po glang po la bzhin pa// kha dog sAr
123a3(rgyud): bo phyag bzhi ste// rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang // thal mi sbyor ba byas pa mchog/ mA ru lug lo bzhon pa ni// kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa// me yi thab dang thod pa dang // skrag nas de bzhin lag thal sbyar// gshin
123a4(rgyud): rjer ma he la bzhon pa// kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa// dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang // kun du skrag nas thal sbyar 'dzin// bden bral khyil bzhon pa ste// kha dog sngo skya phyag bzhi pa// ral gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin// 
123a5(rgyud): kun nas skrag pas thal sbyar mchog/ chu lhar chu srin la bzhon pa// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// zhags po de bzhin thod pa dang // thal mo sbyar ba de bzhin gzhan// rlung du ri dwags la bzhon pa// du ba'i
123a6(rgyud): mdog can phyag bzhi ste// bden dang ni thad pa dang // de bzhin thal sbyar 'dzin pa mchog/ lus ngan du ni gter la bzhon// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// rin po che dang thod pa 'dzin// thal sbyar byas pa'o/ 
123a7(rgyud): de bzhin gzhan// thams cad rgyu skar dang ni gza'// rang dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsgom// rang gi dam tshig las byung ba// de rnams rdzu 'phrul stobs ldan che// ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma// 'byung po
123a8(rgyud): rig ma de bzhin gzhan// de lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// de phyir re re bsgrub par bya// dur khrod la sogs gnas rnams su// sna tshogs dam tshig za rnams kyis// rnal 'byor la sogs rtag dga' ba la// po ny+dza'i/ 
123b1(rgyud): las ni yang dag brtsam// zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis//  sems dpa' 'byung bzhin no// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis// thams cad kyang ni bran bzhin byed// gnas sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// de phyir rim
123b2(rgyud): pas mchod par bya// de nas dri sogs dbul bya zhing // sngags kyi zlas pa yang bya ste// rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la// oM hUM phaT sogs nang du bcug pa'o// dbus su bcom ldan 'das rjes nas// der ni thams/ 
123b3(rgyud): cad bsgrub par bya// de nas gzhan rjes pa'i nang du// bcom ldan gzhan gyi gzugs can te// ba den gsum la 'bar ba dang // rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog/ gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i
123b4(rgyud): phyag gis 'phyar// lha mo sngon gyi gzugs can te// lus dang zhal sogs sngon gyi don// nges par dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ thams cad lus
123b5(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin can// gzugs thams cad kyi nang ba zhugs pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// // zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa brgyad du'o// / de nas 'dir ni bde rgyal po// rnal 'byor ma yi/ 
123b6(rgyud): sad mdzad nas// ngag 'di yis ni 'dri bar mdzad// blo gros chen po dus ci lags// kye rnal 'byor ma rnams khyed nyid dus// myu gu can gyis skyes pa'o// sna tshogs sa bon sems chen po// myu gu can gyi sbyor bas
123b7(rgyud): bshad// gza' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs ni// sems kyi dus su mngon par brjod// gzugs med grangs ni de yi dus// rnal 'byor rnams kyi bde ba'i rgyu// 'jig rten gyis ni dus tsam du// thub pa skyes mche go rnams
123b8(rgyud): kyis gsungs// de tshe myugu can sgom pa// sa bon sa bon gyi mtshan nyid// myu gu sems kyi gzugs can te// sems las byung ba myu gu can// rgyu skar rA si gza' sogs pas// gang zhig du ni myu gu
124a1(rgyud): tra/ skyes nges byas/ rang bzhin rang bzhin du sbyang bya// dge ba dang ni mi dge kun// tshes grangs rgyu skar gza' 'char bar// de rnams thams cad dus rnams su// thams cad
124a2(rgyud): bde bdag nyid skyes sgom// ro ta mi ni rnyed byed ma'o// ma b+ha ma nod dang 'joms pas spangs// ku swa A dus gzugs su ta// tshes grangs de ni yongs su spangs// mo bum bzang dang bka shis so// ra
124a3(rgyud): bu a 'joms par byed pa'o// b+hu bu b+ha dus kyi gzugs kyis so// b+ha bu gu rnyed par byed pa'o// mi gu dA nair la sogs par// tra gu a dus kyi gzugs can no// bri shu pU dge bri rnams byed do// 
124a4(rgyud): b+hu shu pU nad 'joms pa yin// b+hu b+ha shug gshin rje'i mche can no// kau me kri grags dang bsod nams 'thob// bya ma a gdung ba byed pa po// pU ra ma 'chi ba'i dus can ni// me yi gdan can
124a5(rgyud): dus can du mi kir// slar yang gshin rje rar Na Da spang // srin por bcwa lnga pa nyid dang // khyu mchog chu lngar spang bar bya// sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms nyid du// gter du rmi lam can de bzhin// 
124a6(rgyud): bzang po mig gsum pa nyid du// 'byung ba'i nyi ma shar de bzhin// zla ba dang ni nyi sogs chas// de rnams res mo rab bshad dang // bzang po yugs mo de bzhin// sems g.yeng 'byung po'i nyi mar
124a7(rgyud): gnas maskye bo kun gyi nyi ma yi// cha yi rgyu ba shes par bya// khyu mchog mi ka ra nyid dang // rmi lam bcwo lnga de bzhin te// zla ba'i rgyu bar yang dag grags// rim pa 'di rnams yang dag brjod// nya la mA ru
124a8(rgyud): yang dag gnas// snying pa rlung du gi gnas su'o// de ltar de'i dbus gnas pa ni// phyogs su gdung byed yang dag gnas// zla ba nyi las byung ri mo// mnyam par lta bas mnyam par 'gro// zhi dang sdig pa
124b1(rgyud): bltas pa yis// shes rab can gyis des de spang // mche ba dang phrad ma bltas pas// bden par 'chi bar byed pa yin// dus smra ba ni mdor bsdus pa// ra hu'i rgyu bar grags pa yin// dkar dang
124b2(rgyud): gcig shos cho ga yis// blo gros mthar thug pas shes 'gyur// rgyu skar sogs dang mi mthun par// rmongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed// skye bo rang gis byis pa yi// las 'odi shes par ma gyur to// las de yis// 
124b3(rgyud): ni dus rnams ni// the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur// lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa// de srid du ni dus rab 'jug/ rnal 'byor pa rnams nyams su myong // yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur// de ni myug yi gzug
124b4(rgyud): can du gags// kha dog dmar po 'odi chen po// myu gu myu gu'i gzugs can ni// lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa bsgom// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khor lo'i nang son pa// gzugs de lta rdzas kyi ni gzugs// ye shes myu gu
124b5(rgyud): rnams bsgom pa// las rnams thams cad mthong mi 'gyur// thams cad bdag med sbyor chen las// sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad pa// rgyu rnams su ni brtag bzhugs pa'i// rdo rje rgyu yis 'di gsungs so// / 
124b6(rgyud): / zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje'i gar byas nas// rnal 'byor mas ni 'di dris so// ji ltar ston pa sems dpa' che// las dang bral bas 'byung bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi lnga
124b7(rgyud): ni nam nyams pas// rgyun nyams pas na 'ong med pas// 'di la bdag ni the tsom mchis// snying rje mnyes gshin pas bka' stsol// sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang // sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa// mdor
124b8(rgyud): bsdus pa yis bshad bya yis// khyod ni yid gcig pa yis nyon// rdo rje ral pa can sbyor bas// las kyi nang du bsgrub par 'gyur// re re yi ni sbyor ba yi// de ni rang byung du gnas so// shin du dad pa la gnas pas// 
125a1(rgyud): dbang po thams cad 'du bar bya// de yi ral pas rtag 'jig rten// ral pa'i ming gis 'ching ba yin// dga' ba kun las khyad 'byed pa'i// rdo rje'i sku khyod 'thob par 'gyur// de phyir bag chag
125a2(rgyud): thams cad dang // dge ba'i las las zad par 'gyur// skye bo chen po de 'byung ba// gcig nyid lam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur// rtog pa yis ni rtog med 'byung // dril bu'i sgra ni
125a3(rgyud): thob byas nas// de rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rtse dgu rtse mo gcig pa dang // rtse lnga rtse mo gsum pa can// de ltar la sogs dril bu che// rtse mo stong gi bar du'o// sgra brjod pa yi dngos po yis// spros pa
125a4(rgyud): med cing yi ge med// rnal 'byor pa yis du mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag/ sgra las rtog pa yang dag byung // de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa'i bdag/ gnas rnams gang la nges par zhugs pa yin// sngon bshad rtse
125a5(rgyud): can de rdo rje// gang du yid ni rnam 'phro ba// chos dang sprul pa'i ris sku can// de nyid du ni gsor bar bya// phyi yi dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni// dpa' bos gsungs pa bshad par bya// dril bu rtag tu cha gsum
125a6(rgyud): can talha yi yang dag rgyan par byas// ra re yi ni lha'i bdag po// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du ji ltar// rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pa// de bzhin thams cad zhal bya'o// lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan// dril bu de la
125a7(rgyud): pad sogs bya// ji ltar de rnams kyi ni rgyan// de bzhin dril bu'i skye rags so// lha ni sgo dang grwa rnams su// phyogs brgyad rnams su bya ba nyid// ji ltar rnal 'byor po'i mtshon cha// de rnams zhal nas rtse mo 'thon// 
125a8(rgyud): bum pa sogs dang zhal gnyis la'ang // steng du rang rigs mtshon ma can// 'di 'dra ba yi dril bu che// tshad ni gzhan du bshad pa yin// de ni nang gi gzugs can bdag/ de phyir sgra ni rnam mtshon bya// thig
125b1(rgyud): gzugs ni khyab bdag tshe// rdo rje'ang de dang mnyam par bya// de ltar ral pa'i sbyor ba las// sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya// ral can dril bur yang dag grags// rdo rje rdo rjer brjod par 'gyur// rdo rje ral can
125b2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor du yang bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro kun// de tshe nang du mngon par zhugs// thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las// rdo rje ral pa can byung ba// rdo rje dril bur bsas brten/ 
125b3(rgyud): bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsungs so// // zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan gyi sbyor ba che// dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas// bdag gis mngon sum du bshad kyis// rnal
125b4(rgyud): 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis// lus can kun gyi lus gang la// gdan ni stong phrag gnas pa ste// de rnams la yig dgod pa ni// ka sogs ha yig mtha' de bzhin// yon tan la sogs dbyangs rnams yig/ khas
125b5(rgyud): re re la yi ge rnams// slar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye bar byed// gtum mo stong phrag bdag nyid can// 'tshams kun du ni gnas pa 'bar// khams thams cad kyi bde gnas las// 
125b6(rgyud): dpa' bo'i longs spyod 'thob par 'gyur// 'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs chen po'i// bdag med pa yi bdag tu gzhag/ gnyis med chos 'byung nang du'o// de ltar stong phrag gi
125b7(rgyud): nilceHdpa' bo chen po'i go 'phang gnas// sman thams cad dang nye ba yon// sbas pa'i bcud ldan gsungs pa'o// phyi rol rnams kyi yi ge'i bdag/ de'i ming nyid du shes par bya// me tog 'bras sogs sde mtshan
125b8(rgyud): gyis// dbang po'i ming ni stong phrag ca na// de rnams kyis ni bcud len sgrub// gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur// ji lta'i rim pas rigs sogs kyis// ka sogs thams cad sman chen te// las smra ba yi rgyud gzhan/ 
126a1(rgyud): der ni nges par gas la rig bya// dang po'i mgon po rnam bsgoms pa// brtag rnams thob par bya ba yin// yang na grub rnal 'byor rnams kyi// bcud kyis lan ni gang mthong bya// des// 
126a2(rgyud): kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sde tshan rnam pas yongs sbyor las// bdud rtsi'i tshogs 'tshams gzugs ldan pa'i// grub pa'i sman rnams rang bzhin can// bcom ldan
126a3(rgyud): 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// / zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor me dpa' mo// 'dres pas mchod pa byas nas ni// grong khyer gsum gyi nang byung ba// ston pa rdo rje
126a4(rgyud): che ci lags// gang gi gzugs kyis byon pa lags// sprul pa gang du bzhud pa lags// chos nyan pa yi dus su yang // ci zhig gis ni brtan par byas// lU dang lha ma yin dang mi// ci yi gang gis 'gro dang 'ong // 
126a5(rgyud): mngon par tshigs 'tshams mtshan nyid ni// sngon gyi ji bzhin bshad du gsol// mngon par tshigs 'tshams mtshan nyid ni// ji lta'i rim pas bshad kyis nyon// shin du zab mo'i don chen po// sangs rgyas 'jig
126a6(rgyud): rten gyis ma shes// sems can rnams kyi rang snang can// bdag gis nges par mdor bsdus pas// rdo rje sems 'od gzhan nyid du// khams dang mtshan mar gnas min can// lus dang ngag sems dag pa yi// / 
126a7(rgyud): gong khyer gsum rnams su byung ba'o// sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ongs// nges par las byung bar 'gro'o// yang na dus rnams thams cad du// ji ltar me long la bzhin mthong // sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas// / 
126a8(rgyud): sems kyang de'i gnas la'o// rdo rje la sogs ting 'dzin gyis// lha la sogs pa de rnams rmongs// de yi rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// rab tu sbyor bas rtag tu sprul// rdo rje'i rtse mo 'jis skul// 'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste// 
126b1(rgyud): hU~M gau yi ge'i sgra yis ni// ston pas 'khor lo can mchog byas// chos 'byung khang pa brtsegs pa ru// nyi shu'i lhan cig skyes gdan du// ngag gi spyod pa nyan par byed// der song nas ni de la thim// de ltar rnal/ 
126b2(rgyud): 'byor dbang po yi// slob dpon khyab bdag ches shes bya// rdo rje la sogs de'i ming nyid// de yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya// sems can kun la phon bdag nyid// mi 'jigs pa ster ba nyid dang // sngags dang rgyud
126b3(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba shes// sbyor dang bzo dang sgyu rtsal sogs// 'thun pa'i ngag dang thams cad la// bu gcig pa ltar 'thun pa dang // gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin de mchog gzhol// ji ltar/ 
126b4(rgyud): smras pa de bzhin byed// mtshe ba med cing bden pa'i ngag/ sems can kun la thug brtse dang // lam du 'jug pa de mthar phyin// kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang // bstan bcos kun gyi pha rol son// mgon med rnams
126b5(rgyud): kyi pha dang ma// phyag rgya brda ni byed pa po// de sogs yon tan rnams kyis gang // skye ba 'di la de bzhin gshegs// rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dbus su// rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgom pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub seMs
126b6(rgyud): kyis ste// bde ba'i rgyal po rnal 'byor ma// sgra rnams su ni sgra'i ye shes// rdo rje hU~M mdzad can khyab bdag/ 'pho sngo pa'i lhag mar gyur ye shes// dang po'i mgon pa'i rgyu yin no// sems kyi nyams su myong ba ni// da phyir
126b7(rgyud): pra me'i rang bzhin can// spar sha'i khams su yang dag grags// de nyid kyis ni khyer nas 'ongs// mkha' 'gro rgya mtshor rtag nges par// sa gsum de'i rang bzhin byas// de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo// shin
126b8(rgyud): sprin gzhan ni sog ma bzhin// 'di yi bgrod pa ma shes pas// byis pa mi shes pa yis bcings// mtha' yi bde ba gsungs pa po// bstan bya ston pa rdo rje 'chang // lhon cig skyes gzugs ston
127a1(rgyud): pa po/ bcom ldan ye shes kyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gang gis sgrub pa po// 'grub pa'i bsam
127a2(rgyud): med sbyor bshad bya// de ni shin bzang rab sbyor bas// spyod dang brtul shugs bshad par bya// lhun gyis grub 'gyur de'i spyod pa// dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis bya// phyi rol gnyis med sbyor
127a3(rgyud): bdag nyid// spyod pa de ni rab tu bsngags// kun gyi bdag nyid yid bzang la// dbang po'i grong khyer yang dag brten// grong de rnams su skyed pa dang // yid kyis brtul shugs bstan par bya// 
127a4(rgyud): srid dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis// gang der bdag nyid kyis 'gro bya// bdag nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin can// yang dag me long la mthing 'gyur// zhu ba'i sems la brten byas nas// 
127a5(rgyud): lus ni las la thim par gyis// sdom par bdag nyid kyis bsdams pas// phyag rgya chen por yang dag grags// phyag rgya la sogs lus la gnas/ sa hU~M N+ya Sha TaM 'dzin// bdud rtsi lnga
127a6(rgyud): la sogs pa zla// lhan cig rnal 'byor ma rol ldan// chags pa'i sems kyis sgom pa ste// mi 'dod kyang ni de phyir 'gro// gzung dang 'dzin gyi ro ngag la yo si 'di la ni gos pa med// 'jig/ 
127a7(rgyud): med rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// mtshan mo dur khrod sogs par 'gro/ sa gzhi gang du spyod pa na// rnam shes brgyad du shes par bya// blo ljon spyod dang ba na/ dwe ba can du dertsen to// drang po'i sgo/ 
127a8(rgyud): bar yongs brten nas// byi nas yid kyi rab tu bshad// srog thams cad na mnyam sbyor bso// dpung po'i grong khyer bde ba yi// ye shes spyod pa'i btsum zhugs / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs/ 
127b1(rgyud): / zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas skye bo'i rigs kyi ni// khyad par bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rdo rje bzang po'i rab sbyor bas// de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur// de la dang po lnga
127b2(rgyud): dang bdun// brgyad dang bcu gsum bcwo lnga dang // bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog/ tha skar la sogs shes bya ste// lha rnams tshogs su dran par bya// bzhi pa dang ni shar ba gsum// 
127b3(rgyud): gnyis pa dang ni drug de bzhin// byang phyogs pa rnams de bzhin gsum// mi yi cho ga su dran par bya// gsum dang ni bcu nyid dang // dgu pa dang ni nyi shu gsum// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// bcwo brgyad pa dang
127b4(rgyud): bcu dgu pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de grags pa// srin po'i rigs su dran par bya// ra rigs gsum pa dang brgyad pa// klu ni bzhi dang lnga pa'o// khyi'i dngos por bshad pa'o// bcu dang bcu gcog byi ba ste// byi lha de bzhin
127b5(rgyud): dgu pa'o// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// rtag tu de ltar brjed pa'o// bcu gnyis pa dang nyi shu lnga// khyu mchog gi rigs 'thob pa'o// thog ma tha ma bud bu yi// rigs su de rnams rab tu grags// bcu gsum
127b6(rgyud): pa dang bcwo lnga pa// de ni ma her mngon par brjod// thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug/ rta yi rigs su rab tu brjod// nyi shu pa dang nyi shu gnyis// spre'u zhes bya bar brjed pa'o// gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin// glang po'i
127b7(rgyud): yi ni rigs su 'gro// nyi shu gsum dang nyi shu bzhi// mi ste stobs ni che ba yin// nyi shu gcig pa sre mo ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad// stobs dang bdag med pa'i rgyu skar// bshad kyis
127b8(rgyud): da ltar mnyan par gyis// mi rnams srog ni rgyu skar te// gzhan du rab tu 'thob pa min// skar mar dus kyis soni par// 'dzin papo ni nges par 'chi// lug dang srang dang kar ka Ta// mu smin
128a1(rgyud): mngon pa rju m+b+ha//  ma yo khru mchog no// brnyan pa bya ba rab tu rdzun// 1 du 'khyog pad+mo non 'dor// gzhudang bu rlon pa 'o// rgyus sa pa'i sbyis // / 
128a2(rgyud): spong rwa hUM zla bud med// gza' lhag bkra shis ma ning ste// mkha' dkyil 'khor la gza' gang yin// de ltar rigs rnas so gzhan du// byang chub sras pa mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje bzang por de bo shad de// 
128a3(rgyud): rab sbyor rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// g.yon pa'i rtsa ru son pa'i sems// dbu ma'i tha ma'i sbyor bar ldan// byang chub sa bon rnams 'bab la// byang chub sems rnams kyis rigs so// snying rjer son pa'i yid
128a4(rgyud): kyis ni// las kyi nyi ma 'dzag pa yin// yang dag rab ster rtag tu ldan// rigs med rigs can kyang med do// srid par rtsed mi tsom du ni// bsam gtan rnam pa'i lus son pa// me long gi ni yul la
128a5(rgyud): gzugs// gang 'dra mthong ste de med do// de 'drar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can no// de yi nang du zhu ba'i sems// de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod min// nges par dkyil
128a6(rgyud): 'khor rnams dbus su// rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// gsang snga gos mchod pa can sngon gyi can// dus dang dus min cha'i bdag nyid// dngos mad ma yin byed por bzhugs// 
128a7(rgyud): byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid che// bcom ldan sems dpas 'di gsungs so// / zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang gis// bad kun bdag nyid/ 
128a8(rgyud): du skyes bshad// don dang yi sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid du rab 'dug bya// 'atigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis// sngags kyi phreng bar rang nyid byon// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// sa rnams la ni rab tu bshad// 
128b1(rgyud): 'khor lo drug dbyibs ri mo ni// sa yi dbus su bya ba yin// thams cad du ni gsang sngags tshig/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya// de rnams sngags kyi gzugs rnams ni// srog ni yi ge'i rnam pa can// yi ge'i cha rnams
128b2(rgyud): rnams bzang po ni// spangs nas dbus ma'i gnas pa yin// stong par nges par thim byas nas// 'og dang steng du blta bar bya// rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo bo ru// rnal 'byor dbang phyug de srid byed// khams kun rab tu
128b3(rgyud): zhugs pa la// sems kyi spyod pa can ci smos// de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa// dpa' bo chen po'i don can no// dbus mar rab tu zhugs pa yi// bsnun dang sgrub pa la sogs spangs// mthor rlung 'dzin bzhin pa
128b4(rgyud): yis ni// nyi ma dang po zod med can// rdo rje'i lam nas langs pa'i sems// gang phyir rgyud pa'i rim pas so// de ltar sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'dir// rtsa ba'i sngags sogs re'u mig can// dpa' bo kun gyi
128b5(rgyud): re'u mig rnams// sngags kyi 'khor lor dgod par bya// ting 'dzin mgon po'i dpa' bo rnams// bcu gnyis kyi'ang 'khor lor son// gang zhig gang gi ming sngon gyi// de dang de yi gnas su bri// gzhan gyi
128b6(rgyud): sngags kun 'di rnams la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sku la sogs pa'i zlas pa kun// de bzhin ngag sogs bzlas pa tsan// sems sogs bzlas pa thams cad dang // de bzhin ye shes
128b7(rgyud): sogs bzlas can// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yin// de nas dpa' bo 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs byed chen po dbugs rnams su// me yi gzugs can bsgom par bya// shes rab rigs kyi nus pa yis// 
128b8(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs de kun spyod bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang dbang // drag po rings par byed yi ge/ las dang rjes 'thun gzugs bsgoms te// 'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgod bya// 'chi ba bru zhing de nyid kyis// rnam
129a1(rgyud): sh+tsaH/ 'byor dang ni ldan par 'gro// nA da nA dar 'dzem bya zhing // thig le theg ler thim par bya// de ltar cho ga'i bya ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas nas pur bu gdab// 'di rnams sngags kyi gtso bo yis// 
129a2(rgyud): rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad te/ oM hUM hUM phaT yi gi mtha'// dzaM lta'i rim pas 'di kun la'o// na ma shrI badz+ra DA ka ma hA bI rA bI re sha rA ya tri b+hu wa na kam+ba ka m+ba ba nA ya/ daMSh+Tota ka Ta b+hi Sha Na b+ha ra bA ya/ sha tA
129a3(rgyud): sa ha sra ne tA ya tawi d+yud d+hI hA yA/ ki kai laM mA lA b+ha ra No grA yA/ ko Ti la kA b+hu dzA ya/ dzA lA wa lI TA lag+na yaHpa ra shu pA sho d+ya ta shU lA ya/ kalpAn ta d+hAd+hu mra u gra ba gu ra ya/ baM ki Ta mU la hwe hA rA wA ya/ mA tri ga na pa ri pU ri
129a4(rgyud): ta man tA yaM/ sa ha dza sun d+he ri bal+la b+he ka rA ya/ huM huM ka ro tsu ru Na mu khA ya/ ma hA sh+ma shA na pri yA ya/ saR+Wa b+hU ta sano tA sa na kA rA ya/ me hA kailpag+ni ti dzA ya/ dza Ta ka pa la mu ku TA ya/ kha T+wAM ga ka pA la shU la
129a5(rgyud): b+hin+na d+ha ri Ni/ ma hA sa mu dra ma kha l+yA yA/ bya g+ha tsar+m+ma mA ra d+hA ri Ne/ bai tA lA saM g+ha maR+Sha na ka rA ya/ ma ha big+h+na ni bA ri Ne/ sha tru ni suM b+ha nA ka rA ya/ tr-i sa ha sra mu hA sa ha sre ka ro mA baM l+yer+N+Na ba l+yAr+d+ha ni/ sha ta sa ha sr-i mu
129a6(rgyud): khA ya/ dz+nyA na sA ga ra pra b+hA ya/ ma hA pi shri ta ru d+hi ra wa sI hA ri NaM/ sar+b+ba mA re ba la d+ha na si ne/ shriSh+Ti saM hA rak+Sha raMk+Sha ye/ saR+Wa nA grA nA shro sha Na staM b+ha na bi drA ba NA ya/ muH mA lA d+hA ri Ne/ su me ru kam+bi ta na rA ya/ kro d+ha bi gra ha
129a7(rgyud): d+ha ra Na ya/ ma hA kA shA sha ti la kA ta ma ne/ bud+yA ko Ti sa he sra k+Sha NA niSh+pA da na ya/ dz+nyA na mr-i ta baR+Sha pa NA ya/ sar+thi kar+m+ma pra bar+t+ta nA ye ne/ b+han+ta ka rA ya/ sar+b+ba wi kalpa b+hany+dza na ka rA ya/ mur+b+ha wa lI lag+na sha rI rA ya/ pa ra kr-i ta yan+ta/ 
129a8(rgyud): man+ta ne sha nA ya/ ma hA rak+Sha ka rA ya/ duSh+TA naM baM dA la ne/ d+harmo d+ha ya ka yA ka rA yai/ kro d+he skA ra s+phA ra NA ya/ in+d+ra dzA la sanA saMta taM ma ne/ gra sta bA daM pra bA da ma hA ma ta// / da ltar la sogs gsang sngags gang // rab tu mang po rgya/ 
129b1(rgyud): chen po/ sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i ming // sems can ming gis shes par bya// sngags rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// khams gsum rnams su yongs bzhugs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun
129b2(rgyud): byi gco/ bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// // zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcwo lnga pa'o// // de nas mig la sogs dbang po// kun gyi mngon shes cho ga bshad// mig mi bzang gis ra
129b3(rgyud): sbyor bas// rdo rje gsum ni rab bsgrub bya// gang la byang chub sems gnas pas// der ni mig gis nges par blta// rnal 'byor rnams kyi zag med mchog/ sems ni ni mig tu shes par bya// rtsa rnams kyi ni rab
129b4(rgyud): sbyor bas// so sor rlu'i dbab par bya// gang nyid du ni skyes dus su// de yi dus su thim nas 'gro// de ni mngon shes mig rnams kyi// sems 'di yis ni 'gro bar 'gyur// skye 'gro'i nang du son pa'i gzugs// 
129b5(rgyud): yod kyis sgra ni nyan par 'gyur// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i cho ga ni// lha rdzas dri ru rjes mtshon bya// lha rdzas ro yi rab sbyor bso// lce ni dga' ba dang bcas kyis// lce yi mngon shes la brten nas// dbu ma'i pho ny+dza skyes pa
129b6(rgyud): yin te lus kyi reg pa'i rnam pa yis// mchog tu zag med de bsgrub bya// sngon gyi bag chags dran pa las// de nyid rnal 'byor ldan par 'gro/ nyon zhag mtshan mo mnyam byas nas// chu tshod drug bcu nyid dang ni// 
129b7(rgyud): chu srang drug bcu tham pa dang // g+ha Ti ka ra sbyar bar bya// rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis la// dpangs su sor brgyad nyid yin te// gun dza drug bcu'i tshad la ni// spor bcu gnyis pa'i thur ma'o// skad cig thang cig yud
129b8(rgyud): tsam dang // kaSh+Ti mig btsums phye ba dang // se gol rtogs pas shes pas so// pha rol phyin drug tshul dag gis// chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya// dus dang dus min sel ba po// mig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya// 
130a1(rgyud): / mtshon bya mtshan nyid rnal 'byor ma'i// dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid// sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs can te// srog chags rnams kyi gar 'grod pa// bdag med rang bzhin 'thob par/ 
130a2(rgyud): 'gyur// mdud pa rnams kyi phrad pas gnas// gzugs su byed 'gyur de'i dngos po// mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can// chos kyi 'byung gnas gang gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' 'gror de shes bya// thur spel lam
130a3(rgyud): la rtag brten nas// slar yang re re'i nang du ste// srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga yis// mig ni lnga ru shes par bya// 'dzag pa med pa'i sa bon 'dzag/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ldan// sa bon lnga rnams thig le yi// mngon
130a4(rgyud): shes byed po sogs lnga pa// de lta'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs// rnal 'byor kun gyi yang mchog go// dngos po'i ye shes can ma lus// ring du yongs su spangs pa yin// thams cad lus su mnyam sbyor las// 
130a5(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyin 'dzum pa// dngos kun dngos po med 'dzug pa// // bcom ldan mig gis 'di gsungs so// / zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o// // de nas lha mos
130a6(rgyud): phyag byas nos// de bzhin mchod pa chen po byas// stobs po che yi sbyin bsreg ni// bdag po chen pos bstan du gsol// mkhas pas rgyun du nang pa drag gi/ sbyin bsreg bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// 
130a7(rgyud): stobs po che yi rab sbyor bas// khams rnams kyis ni dgang blugs te// bde ba thab tu yang dag 'thob// nyi zla dgang gzar blugs gzar ro// slob dpon gnyis med do de la// yang dag rig pa'i gzugasu bsreg
130a8(rgyud): sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams 'di mi// gsang sngags rang bzhin mtshan nyid do// yam shing rtsa ru yang dag grag/ gang phyir si lu lus skyes 'bras// tshal ni rtag tu zho zan yin// 'di ru mar ni byang chub sems// 
130b1(rgyud): khrug ni sbrang cir shes par bya// srog sogs rlung rnams dur bya'o// gcin dang gshing ba dag de ltar// tsan dan dang ni gla ci'o// me tog khrag tu grags// mchil ma lud pa 'bras thug yin// bud shing so son rus pa'o// 
130b2(rgyud): mdor bsdus pa yis lpags pa gos// me yi thab kyi dbus su ni// skra dang bu sU lnga ru 'gyur// sna tshogs phra mo'i khams gzhan ni// sna tshogs 'bru ste de la bsreg/ rim gyis 'kha' 'gro rdzogs ston pa// gang ba'i bsreg
130b3(rgyud): blugasu shes bya// dbang po thams cad gar byed de// de yi bag chags glu len no// sna tshogs sgra chen pos rol mo// snying rje sogs pas ston mo yin// srog rnams kun gyi bdag po ni// stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// l+le thams cad
130b4(rgyud): de'i sbyin bsrog ni// des mnyes pa yis dngos grub 'gyur// 'jig rten mchog gi khams kun du// yid ni de ru yang dag rolo// gang tshe'i dus bde gyur pa// de tshe'i dus su rab tu gnas// sbyin bsreg nang bdag nyid mthong bas// smod/ 
130b5(rgyud): dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ye shes// de rnams dbus mar 'thob par bya// mtshams rnams kun du khong khro bo// ses chen po ni bsod par 'gyur// rtog pas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni// de las byung
130b6(rgyud): ba bza' bar bya// mtshon cha mtshon byed rab bcom pos// gnyis dag shes par 'os pa yis// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid mtshan nyid ni// de la thim par byed par 'gyur// khams kun yang dag sbyor ba las// ye shes gnyis byar med// 
130b7(rgyud): mtshan nyid// mi yi gzugs su rtog bzhugs pa'i// bcom ldan thag khung gis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje pad 'du ba/ 
130b8(rgyud): ji bzhin gyis bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rin chen rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas// a wa d+hU ti can dngos grub/ rnal 'byor ma la yang dag rol// don dam pa yi nyams la gnas// de yi gri sbyor las grol baM yaM// 
131a1(rgyud): @/ na// gnyis med rgyu rnams kyis 'gyur ro// lus kyi nyams su myong bzhin pa// byis pa rnams kyi byang chub 'ong // ha yig drug pa dang ldan pa'i// sa bon rdo rje'i nor bu dgod// a ba dU ti'i rtsar
131a2(rgyud): 'bab ste// steng du khe bltas dpral bar son// bsrung ba'i dus su blo ldan gyis// rang gi lag pas rdo rje gzung // byang chub sems la rtsen byed la// rgas dang 'chi ba ring ba yin// srid pa'i skyon las 'goms pa yis/ 
131a3(rgyud): srid gsum de'i rang bzhin 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya rab sbyor bas// nyi ma re re bsgrub par bya// de'i dus su gang mthong ba// dngos po kun la ltung bar bya// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul bdag nyid// rtag tu bdag nyid la
131a4(rgyud): 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rgyu yi don// bstan bya ston pa por 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni// sems can don ni nges par byas// sku bzhi po yi rnal 'byor gyis// bden min bdag gis bshad mi bya// 
131a5(rgyud): rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin can// sbyor skyes ye shes gyen du bgrod// po nya rnams kyi rtse nyid bya// 'dod chags me yis dges par bya// byang chub sems ni rtag bzung bya// lce yi bya yis lag pas min// lhan skyes
131a6(rgyud): 'phos pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mkha' lding phyag rgya nyid kyis bzung // phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin te// de nas btung bar bya ba yin// stobs thams cad kyang bza' bar bya// sa li skyes sogs 'bad pas so// sbyin
131a7(rgyud): bsreg kun kyang de nyid kyis// dbang la sdigs gang byed pa// de de'i thod par bya ba ste// de nas sa bon gdab par bya// de rnams rdzas kyis spang ba dang // gtor ma dang ni bsrung ba bya// de yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// 
131a8(rgyud): de dang 'dra ba'i gzungs 'jug 'gyur// ril lu'am ni skud pa ni// dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa'o// b+ha ga'i dbus rnams su bsgom pa// rin chen rdo rje can de sman// dkyil 'khor khams rnams
131b1(rgyud): kun gyi ste// spangs pa rab tu bstan pa yin// gang dang gang gi las kyi ni// de dang de'i ming can sngags so// sa bon kun gyi yongs sbyor las// de ni rtag tu sman rnams te// bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya ni// rtag tu 'ching bas
131b2(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcwa brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'khor ba'i mthar gnas pa'i// mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rta mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas// pho nyi mtshan nyid bsgrub
131b3(rgyud): par bya// ha yig skye gnas dbus su te// ya yig mgo bor gnas pa'o// gri yig dbu ma'i pad mar te// wa yi yi ge snying khe ru// rnal 'byor che la 'dzin bzhin pa// dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed// rmongs pa nyid ni thams
131b4(rgyud): cad 'phrog/ gang phyir gzhung ni rjes 'jug 'gyur// mgrin par rtag tu tshigs cad ni// mgrin par ngag tu gnas pa nyid// 'tsho ba rta yi dbyibs 'dir ni// gnas pa rnal 'byor lhag ma yin// de'i sbyor bas 'gro
131b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba// sngon du nyi ma'i gdun du'o// nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// khams gsum po ni skor bar 'gyur// nam mkhar nyi mas mdzes byas nas// byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar 'gyur// phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus
131b6(rgyud): rtogs// rnal 'byor na yi chu skyes mchog/ sems can kun gyi rmongs nyid dang // lam mthong ba ni nyams can la// de nyid nyi ma rtag snang bar// mtshan mo'i mun pa drag po 'phrog// rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus son par// / 
131b7(rgyud): rta yi mgon po bsgom pa yin// gang gi sangs rgyas su 'gro ba// bsgrubs thabs yan lag 'char bar 'gyur// bgegs rnams rnam par nyams 'gyur te// sprin las sogs pa'ang nyams par 'gyur// kun gyi sdig
131b8(rgyud): pa'ang 'phrog par byed// rang gi dga' ba shar mtshan nyid// mchod sbyin dus kyis 'jig rten du// thams cad skad cig la sgrub 'gyur// khams bdun rnam par bzung ba yis// de tshe sa 'og dngos grub 'gyur// bdag
132a1(rgyud): / med 'di rnams de lha mo// yan lag gcig gis rol par byed// sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ste// sbyin sreg a ke sogs de bzhin// ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur// 
132a2(rgyud): 'dod chags kyis ni 'dod chags sgo// me yis tshig la gdung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags// bsten par gyur pas mi 'ching ngo // de nyid thabs so yid kyi las// dge ba'i mtshan nyid can bya'o// 
132a3(rgyud): nang du byed pa ma yin no// gus pa yid kyi dbu mar gnas// phyi rol ye shes can rnams kyi ye shes// de nyid sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs// sems can 'jig rten sngogs 'byung ba// de rnams spangs pas sangs
132a4(rgyud): rgyas med// mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas par// kun du dbye ba yod ma yin// lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste// tshad ma pa rnams the tso can// thams cad tshig ni rnam shes pas// ye shes can rnams de phyir shes// mkha'
132a5(rgyud): 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor lus// nam mkha' rnams su bzhugs pa yi// bcom ldan 'jig rten par// rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o// de nas rab tu 'joms
132a6(rgyud): yon tan// bshad kyi sgrub pa po rnams nyon// nam mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje rlung gi mtshan nyid de// 'chags pa dang ni 'jig rnams su// gang zhig stong pa de srog chags// khams rnams de 'drar shes bya ste// 
132a7(rgyud): dul ba'i sbyor bas yang dag gnas// zla ba'i gzugs su yongs grags pa'i// rang gi rang bzhin las skyes 'dzag/ rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang // de ni rab 'joms la brjod do// dus thams cad du g.yo ba
132a8(rgyud): med// g.yo ba'am 'dir ni mi mthong ngo // de ni thams cad bdag nyid rlung // bsam pa thams cad rab 'jug po// de lA phAr sogs sbyar ba// rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar ster po// sgra dang thig ler de shes bya// 'od
132b1(rgyud): gsal ba dang snang ba gsum// de phyir nam mkha'i snying po yang // mkha' 'gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes bya// nang gi dbu ma'i sbyor ba yis// srog de'ang rab tu bsngags pa yin// de yang kun gzhi shes bya ste// me long du yang
132b2(rgyud): rab tu bshad// chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang de// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla ba'i lam du gang tshe mkha'// rnal 'byor rnams kyi lhag med 'pho// de'i dus rnam par gzhag med
132b3(rgyud): 'gyur// rnal 'byor byis pas bgrod bya min// nem mkha' khams rnams thams cad kyi// de yi snying por rab tu bstan// de dag shes rab thabs gnyis so// gnas skabs de ni gnyis nyid do// srid pa rnam par 'phro ba nyid// 
132b4(rgyud): dbang po'i dbus su sbyor bar bya// sangs rgyas 'jig rten mtha' yas rnams// sa yi nang du rtsen par 'gyur// de ltar rnam bcus de nyid dang // rnam pa med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs// sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun// 
132b5(rgyud): gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur// dbu mar lha rnams kyis 'grub ste// ye shes der 'di rdzogs pa'o// gal te sangs rgyas rjes chags yod// chos dge 'dun la de bzhin mchog/ gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi// 
132b6(rgyud): tshul chen chos de 'dod pa dang // gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor// stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can// gal te thams cad mi rtag bdag/ tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin// 'dir mang smras pas ci bya ste// chos dbyings ga
132b7(rgyud): te 'dod kyang ngo // nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs can gyi// sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgom par bya// shan pa smin mkhan la sogs// gsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa// de kun de gnas nyams dga' bar// lam rjes skyob
132b8(rgyud): rnams kyi grol 'thob// nges par dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su// gzugs su sdom pa bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du'ang // rnam pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub 'thob// rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid// stong
133a1(rgyud): nyid snying po gtsug zul/ bcom ldan 'das rab 'doms nam pa y-in/ nal 'byor bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi pa'o// dus nas lhams mchod byas s+ho/ 
133a2(rgyud): phyag byas nas ni 'di gsol to// rang gis rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan rdo rjes gsung bar mdzod// rang rig ye shes las byung ba// ji lta'i rigs pas bshad par bya// dpal he ru ka'i rab sbyor bas// rnal 'byor zla
133a3(rgyud): ba'i bgrod pa rang // dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas// ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur// thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gnyis par nam mkhar 'gro ba'i gzugs// gsum par mad yi dbyibs dang 'dra// bzhi
133a4(rgyud): par 'ben gyi gzugs can no// lnga par rtse mo'i mnga' bdag nyid// drug par khams drug 'byung ba yin// bdun pa rgya mtsho yi ni gzugs// brgyad par pad mar brjod pa yin// dgu pa ru ni bcud len te// bcu par ldan skyes gzugs
133a5(rgyud): kyis sa so// bcu gcig pa la zhi ba'i gzugs// bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs// bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste// bcu bzhir zla ba de bzhin no// bcwa lnga pa nyid ra hu ste// thig le zhes byas bcu drug pa// rnam pa bcu drug
133a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// rang gis rig par shes par bya// dpal he ru ka'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo bzhi rnams su bsgrub bya// rgas pa med cing 'chi ba med// nad dang mdze sogs spangs pa yin// lte bar shri yi yig ger gyur// he yig/ 
133a7(rgyud): snying khar dgod par bya// ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lor te// thod par ka'i yi ge'o// thig le bzhi yi rab sbyor bas// rang gis rig par 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni// rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog
133a8(rgyud): zag med// gnas dang gnas su 'pho ba nyid// dbu ma'i nang du rab tu gzhug/ 'khor lo bzhi yi 'dab son nas// rang gis rig pa mtha' yas mchog/ rigs de rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ byung bar rnam par shes par
133b1(rgyud): bya// sems chen po ni srad bzhin pas// don yod mthong ba thob par 'gyur// rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyur te// dus thams cad du nges par gnas// longs spyod sprul pa'i mtshan nyid du// gnyid log pa yis de tshe mthong // / 
133b2(rgyud): bzhi pa rab mang bdag med de// de phyir de rnams mtha'i longs spyod// de ltar 'khor lor bzhir gnas nas// nges par lam du 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab de nyid rtogs byas nas// nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid du// rdul gyi sbyor po
133b3(rgyud): 'byung ba ste// nag po'i phyogs su gang 'dis yang // bcu drug rnams kyi cha rnams kyi// nyi ma nyid ni bar bar du'o// stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba las// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhing 'bar// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus rnams su// 
133b4(rgyud): dpal he ru ka bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i dga' bar 'gro bar gnas// gnas/ skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor// gtso bo rang rig bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar// rtag
133b5(rgyud): tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so// // zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// de nas lus sogs lha rnams kyi// ston mo mngon par bshad par bya// pAd ma gar dbang phyug nyid kyi// rab tu sbyor ba
133b6(rgyud): 'di byung ngo // rtsa ni pad mar yang dag grags// srog gi rlung gis gar byed do// byang chub sems kyis dbang phyug ste// de rnams kyi ni nang du zhugs// rang gis rig pa bza' bar bya// snying rje'i kha yis btung bar bya// gnyis med/ 
133b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma dang rol// sgyu ma'i rjes su 'gro rnams 'grub// thams cad de'i rang bzhin du// bza' ba bza' ba med par bya// pad ma gar dbang sgom par bya// ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya// ba yig gzhan gyi grong du 'gro// 
133b8(rgyud): byurtan pa thams cad rma yi yig/ na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te// rta yig bde ba'i lha can yin// sha yig rta la sogs pa'i stobs// ra yig dga' rol rgyu can yin// srid dang mya ngan 'das kun la// de yi rab tu sbyor ba bya// 
134a1(rgyud): / 'tshams kyi skad ni 'di rnams kun// bde mchog phyi mar shes par bya// bgrod pa 'di rnams la gton nas// pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug rang // he ru ka dang bde mchog nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' sog/ 
134a2(rgyud): gtso bo// pad ma gar kyi dbang phyug de yang // sbyor ba kun la shes par bya// pad ma ye shes yang dag grags// gar gyi dbang phyug rnam shes can// gnyis po gnyis med yang dag byung // lha kun 'dir ni byung ba yin// 
134a3(rgyud): shes po thams cad de la gnas// khams gsum du ni gar dbang phyug/ gar byed pa yi sku chen la// de nas rtags ni mtshon par bya// nam mkha' zhen pa'i sbyor ba yis// mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro// rnal
134a4(rgyud): 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su// lhan skyes gzugs kyis rol par gyis/ 'di yis rtag tu dbang gi las// de rnams kyis ni dga' bar byed// glang dang gang gi rnams las la// dri dang de yir sgom par bya// sgrub
134a5(rgyud): po rnams kyi byang chub car// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'ong // de nas bdud ni bcom byas nas// gar byed bzhin pas padad+ma ma 'dzin// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms shing // tshe son pa rnams gnas
134a6(rgyud): par byed// 'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur cing // rnal 'byor rnams kyi srid pa spyod// rang gi sems kyi dngos grub 'thob// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// gzhan du srid pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// sems can thams
134a7(rgyud): cad rab 'jug pa// 'khrul zhing chud zos mu stegs rnams// bstan pa rnams la rab 'jug bya// bag chags ngan pa yongs spangs nas// phyi nas rang bzhin bstan par bya// bza' ba thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ 
134a8(rgyud): bza' ba med par rtag tu gnas// bcom ldan pad ma gar mdzad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ 
134b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid bshad kyis lha mo nyon// gzugs las 'das pa'i ye shes gang // de ni ye shes chen por brjod// rnam par snang bzhin pa de bzhin// sems dpa' chen po'i ming can no// spu khung rtse mo thams cad las// 
134b2(rgyud): de rnams nges 'thon stobs chen po// de rnams bu gar rab zhugs pa// 'khor lo bzhi yi mtsho skyes son// ji ltar mar la mar zhugs pa/ de bzhin du ni khams la zhugs// g.yo ba 'gog par byas pa yis// de 'drar
134b3(rgyud): thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// gang mthong ba ni de mthong yin// gdong gis bdod ni blta bar bya// mi dang mi mo lta sogs kyi// gzugs ni pad ma'i mdab chu bzhin// srog chen po der shes bya ste// shi ba'i lus las nges
134b4(rgyud): par 'thon// aM gi yig gi yid la bya// dbugs rgyu ba yis mtshon par bya// bdag nyid kyis ni hU~M yig spro// gsor ba yi ni rnal 'byor ldan// sems la oM gyi yi ger 'gyur// lus la gnas par mtshon par bya// haM yig mchog
134b5(rgyud): gi dang po yis// ye shes dngos po rnams su sprul// chos kyi dbyings kyi dbus rnams su// rnam snang mdzad kyi bsgom pa'o// bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa rnams kyis// sngags pa la ni 'bar bar bya// bye ba stong phrag grangs kyi
134b6(rgyud): ni// rnal 'byor ma la 'dod spyod 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams kyis mi 'pho ste// 'dod na bde ba rnam par spro// de tshe rnal 'byor pa mnyes nas// dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed// sdug dang mi sdug rnam spyod pa// rnal 'byor
134b7(rgyud): ma la mi bya'o// myur bar stong phrag rnams kyi gzugs// rnam par snang mdzad du sgrub bya// sna tshogs du ma'i skad kyi chos// de rnams lus ris can gyis nyan// rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang // rin chen dbang dang a
134b8(rgyud): ro lig/ don yod rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang la sogs// shes rab pha rol phyin sogs kyang // de rnams rnal 'byor ma las rig/ 'gro drug grol bar byed nyid dang // bde 'gro rnams su 'jug pa po// blo
135a1(rgyud): / 'an so yor sems das/ sa yo sa pos da byabyu / gas na ma sa thunam ngon rgyu dis dun pos pa gyu//  lams cad kyi mas // dan la pa bya / 
135a2(rgyud): yin// rnam snang sbyor bas bdung bya'am// byug pa'ang de nyid kyis bya'o// de yis snga nas sbyin par bya// rdo rje'i lam gyis rtag tu'o// rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid la'o// gnyis pa
135a3(rgyud): thams me kun sbyo las// rnaM la byor mas 'dod thar gcol// bcom ldan thams cad dag pa'i sku// rab grol mdzad pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu ma gsum pa'o// de nas gas
135a4(rgyud): chen bshad pa ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rgyas par min// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor bas// gnas thams cad du yang dag zhugs// rdo rjes mi phyed ye shes te// sems dpa' snying po ston pa'o// stong nyid snying rje dbyer//
