135a5(rgyud): med pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags// zla ba rdo rje'i rab sbyor bar// gnas rnams bgrod pa bstan par bya// pu li ra las lte bar 'bab// dz+wa lon dA rar yang dag gnas// u rgyan du ni kun du spyod// Ar bur bza' dang / 
135a6(rgyud): btung can no// go da ba rir rol pa ste// rA me shA rir rgyal dang pham// de bi ko Tir rjes su 'dzin// ma la war rnal 'byor ma'i gtso// kA ma ru par tshig 'grub po// oM drer mngon gsum dngos grub ster// tri sha ku nar dbang
135a7(rgyud): rnams kyi// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ ko sa lar rnal 'byor dngos grub ste// ka ling kar phra mo'i dngos grub ste// lam pa ka ru rtag pa 'grub// kanya rtsir bsad pa'i dngos grub bo// hi ma la yang 'thun pa 'grub// 
135a8(rgyud): pre ta pu ring ring gi rtags// gri wa di ba bikas gnang ba// lhan skyes 'pho med so raSh+Ta ra// gser gling du ni ring don 'grub// nag rang gnas dngos grub ster// sin du stobs 'grub de bzhin du// ma ror 'chi me/ 
135b1(rgyud): dngos grub bo// ku lu ta rang bzhin smos grub su//  nyid rnal 'byor rnams la s+ho// rdo rje sems dpa' drug bsgoms nas// thams cad dngos grub 'gro bar byos// gnas sogs rnal 'byor par byos/ 
135b2(rgyud): ma dbus su// khams su gyur pa'i ro chen po// gseng ba'i tshig tu shes par bya// mchog ni lhan cig skyes par dran// dges pa ye shes zhes bya ste// thams cad bdag nyid yon tan gnas// rtag bzhugs gnyis med/ 
135b3(rgyud): rnam pa ste// sems can 'jig rten la gnas pa'i// las ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis// nA da'i dbus las yang dag byung // de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro// gnas par de ni mngon
135b4(rgyud): par brjod// de ltar thams cad cho ga bzhin// dpa' bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya// de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag/ de ni nus par rab tu bshad// skyes pa dang ni skye bzhin pa'i// nus pa thams cad rab 'jug
135b5(rgyud): gis// dngos med ma yin pa'i gzugs kyis// dbyangs dang phyi ma gsum spangs po// thig le'i gzugs ni sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rnal 'byor
135b6(rgyud): ma rnams kun gyi gtso// sgyu ma'i gnas kyi dngos grub ni// 'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyi 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu byed pa ste// / nyi shu rtsa bzhi po'o// // de ltar
135b7(rgyud): dpa' bo gtso bo yi// las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya// nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyams dga'// thams cad gsang chen gyi gnas su// gsang chen rgyas par bshud pa can// kun spyod cho ga bshad par bya// sngon bshad
135b8(rgyud): khams kyi 'du shes ni// gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnam can// de rnams brgyad brgyad shes par bya// dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi rnams kyi// re re'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// zlum po'i rnam po'i rnal 'byor du/ 
136a1(rgyud): @#// thig le nyid ni bzhag par bya// de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol du// bskor bas ting 'dzin rdo rjer 'gyur// shar la sogs pa rim bzhin du// rdo rje'i 'khor lo sogs par 'phro// dkyil 'khor du
136a2(rgyud): ni lha thams cad// rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya// bdun bcu drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya// nyin zhag rnams su yongs 'pho bya// re re yi ni srog 'gyur ba// sum bcu rtsa bdun phyed bcas pa'o// nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug ni/ 
136a3(rgyud): nyin zhag la ni shes par bya// lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa// de rnams kyi dus rab tu 'jug/ rnal 'byor de dngos sgrom rnams la// sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu bskor// 'di rnams kun nyid dpal po rnams/ 
136a4(rgyud): gnas sogs nyi shu bzhi can la// thim dang longs spyod bdag byed pas// dus dang dus tshod za bar byed// 'di lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// kun du gnas pa bdag ma yin// rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang dpa' bo// de ni
136a5(rgyud): bdag dang bdag rim bzhin// sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad du// bdag dang bdag gi spyod yul med// yid ches tsam du myang 'das pa// gzhung smra ba la bstan pa'o// de kho na nyid ma rig pa yis 'jig rten rmongs/ 
136a6(rgyud): dri kho na nyid rnam par spangs pas dngos grub mi 'thob po// rnal 'byor rnams la rgyud rgyal du// de dang de yi cho ga ye shes// 'od gsal sgyu ma bdag gis ni// sgyu ma'i 'jig rten la bshad do// kye lhan cig
136a7(rgyud): skyes pa'i rang bzhin cig pu bstan// lha dang lha min sA gsum 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal// dbang po dang ni 'jig rten pa yis mi sho sa te/ mchog tu bde ba chen po'i glu yis mchod pa gyis// gang zhig/ 
136a8(rgyud): las thams cad pa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o// srid dang mya ngan 'das par ston pa ga la ci// sgyu ma gti mug gis ni mi mor gnas// sems can theg pa da dung nyams par ga la byed// de ltar yongs// 
136b1(rgyud): su dges pa'i mgur// bcom ldan rang nyid kyis gsungs so// de nyid dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni// byang chub dus su byung bar gyis// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i
136b2(rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsugs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga 'i bdag nyid thams
136b3(rgyud): cad kyi don ston pa po gsung chen thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u lnga bcu pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' mo// rnam pa du ma'i 'khor gyis kyang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab pa'i bdag// bcom ldan bdag
136b4(rgyud): po la bstod pa// khyod ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul// dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin can// dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni gzugs// chos rnams bstan pas tshim par bya// chos dang chos mon pa yi gzugs// chos dang chos
136b5(rgyud): min khyod gnyis med// bdag gis sprul pa'i dngos po yis// 'jig rten kun gyi don can te// bdag nyid chen po ster ba po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'jug byed pa// khyod kyis dam tshig sten pa ste// gzhan min dam tshig nyid
136b6(rgyud): lus byung // bdag gis bsod nams rjes bsgoms pas// byang chub tu ni yid bsgrubs so// ston pa mchog tu bde la bzhugs// dri yis sems can don mdzad pa'o// hU~M gi yi ge'i sgra bsgrogs pas// nga rgyal can gyi
136b7(rgyud): bgyegs skrag 'gyur// khyod kyis nye bar bsten pas ni// de rnams la ni skye 'chi med// bde ba'i rgyal po nyid du rtsen// byang chub kyi ni yid du bgrod// khyod dang thabs cig 'dres par 'gyur// gong bu gcig pu gnyis
136b8(rgyud): med bzhugs// de ltar bstod pas rdo rje che// mchod pa bzhin rab ston mdzod// dkyil 'khor bdag dang gnyis med nyid// mchod pa rnams ni gnyis med byed// phyi nang nyid bdag nyid can rdzas// gnyis pa yi ni
137a1(rgyud): mchod par dran// bza' dang btung sogs la rol pa// gnyis med mchod pa gsum pa'o// bzhi pa chos dang rnal 'byor dag/ 'dzin pa yi ni mchod pa'o// de lta'i mchod pa la brten nas// thams
137a2(rgyud): cad byas pas las rgyal por// 'gyur ro rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// gru gsum du ni mnyes bya ste// sngon du dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// lag pa g.yon pas thams cad du// pad ma yi ni bskor bas snod// sngags pa rnams kyis
137a3(rgyud): gzung bar bya// sngon du rnal 'byor ma la ni// skra grol ba yis gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor ma kun chu skyes ni// kha yis bzung nas dkrug par bya// de yi lag par son pa'i dpal// gang su yis kyang dbrog mi nus// ji
137a4(rgyud): ltar bde bas bde ba bzung // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog mnyes bya// rtag tu dam tshig bskyong bar bya// spyan gyi spyod pa'ang brten par bya// snying rje'i mchog dbang gyur bya zhing // dbang po rnams ni mi rtag par// 
137a5(rgyud): sgom bya snang ba med pa yi// rang bzhin dbang du gyur pa gnas// rdo rje pad ma snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya nang gi bdag nyid mchog/ stong nyid gnyis med rnal 'byor pas// dngos po thams cad spang bar bya// don dam can
137a6(rgyud): de de nyid 'dir// rtag tu byang chub sems dran bya// man ngag gcig ni bsgoms pa yis// man ngag thams cad mtshon par bya// ji ltar sa gcig thob pa yis// sa thams cad ni 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin man ngag
137a7(rgyud): thams cad kyang // man ngag gcig gis 'thob par 'gyur// byis pa rnams dang rgad po dang // rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad du// mnyam pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin// mi mnyam pa yis
137a8(rgyud): dngos grub 'joms// dmyal ba sogs par ltung bar 'gyur// rgad po yon tan kun gnas pa// de rnams mnyes pas byang chub ste// khyad par mchod pa nyid ni 'dir// byis pa rnams dang de bzhin yang // gnyis bcas/ 
137b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// me tog bskur ba la sogs bya// kun du smod pa'i ngag mi bya// 'dod dang 'dod min sbyor bral bya// ma byin par yang blang bya zhing // rtag tu srog chags bsad par bya// sems can rnams
137b2(rgyud): la brdzun smra zhing // ma sogs rnal 'byor ma la bgrod// 'khor lo mchod pa rgyun du bya// bzo' bya la srogs mchod pa sprin// de yi bsod nams kyis 'thob pa// dus thams cad du bgegs med dang // grub pa'i
137b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma mthong bas// bsam pa gzhan ni rab tu 'jug/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung
137b4(rgyud): so/ dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor mi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las// bstod pa dang mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig bsten pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ 
137b5(rgyud): lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // rgyud 'di rab tu byung ba ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs// sum bcu bdun bdag nyid
137b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dang gnyis med// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rgyud chen po// 'dus pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs can te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// dus thams cad du zhal na gnas// yi ge kun gyi
137b7(rgyud): zla ma tog/ 'bum phrag sum bcu drug dang po// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rab bshad de// chen po chu ngur gsungs pa'o// ri rab kyi ni rdul chad kyi// mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis gsungs so// 'tha' yas shing nA ma
137b8(rgyud): med nyid// bcod pa'i dus kyi sa nang du// bcom ldan mtha' yas pas 'di gsungs// shAkya sing gis gsungs pa'i rgyud// rnal 'byor pha rol son pa'o// nyan pa ston pa rang nyid de// 'chad pa skye bo
138a1(rgyud): gzhan kyang ngo // legs par gsungs dang 'chang 'gyur ba// de'i rang bzhin du'ang bgrod par 'gyur// bsdu ba mdzad pa sogs rnams kyis// bdag las bgrod pa de thob bo// ma mo
138a2(rgyud): thams cad 'dus rnams kyis// rdo rje'i gnas rnams su bsdus so// gcig la gcig gi bzhed pa ni// gsol ba 'debs shing gsol 'dre bas mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// tshig 'di
138a3(rgyud): la ni mngon par dga'// sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gro// srid pa las ni 'gro bar byos// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// 
138a4(rgyud): bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// // dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rgya mtsho drug la stsogs// pa la rnal 'byor dang ye shes dang sdom pa dang bya ba dang mkha
138a5(rgyud): de kho na nyid rgya 'tshor gyur pa dang mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las/ 'di rnams mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba// // rdzogs so// / dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen yu tung lhun / 
138a6(rgyud): gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgyu rag gyi paN Ti ta chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus ding sang 'gran pa med pa snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul can phyogs
138a7(rgyud): sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshom par mdzad pa dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa shAkya'i sras po rgyal ba'i sde zhil snga nas/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i
138a8(rgyud): dge slong d+harma yon tan gyis mnyan cing bsgyur ba'o// // phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang bstun to// zhus gtugs legs par byas so// mkha' mnyam bde
138b1(rgyud): rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// des gsungs dri med sna tshogs gdul bya'i bsam dbang gis// gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'// de ltar yin yang ji ltar
138b2(rgyud): mi bdag shing rta cherare zhugs nas// g.yul ngor 'jug dus rkang gis bgrod rnams 'thab par mi brtson nam// de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brangs nas// kho bos gzhan don nus min na'ang phan
138b3(rgyud): pa'i bsam pas bskur// 'di la gzhung dang bla ma rang gi blo gros skyon gyis ni// sgra don 'gal 'gyur bcom ldan dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang // mkha' 'gro'i tshigs dang bstan dga'i lha rnams mkhas pa rnams
138b4(rgyud): kyis bzod par rig so// 'di las thob pa'i dge ba dri med cung zad des// 'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob gyur cig/ bdag gis srol btod tsam 'di la// sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnaMs kyi// skad gnyis smai bas gzi/ 
138b5(rgyud): pa na// skyon du gyur snang bcos par zhu// phrag dog sgo nas mi bya zhing // rjes su yid rang ba yang mdzod/ rdzogs so// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA sa~M b+ha ro drA ya tan+t+ra rA dzA s+ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal
138b6(rgyud): bde mchog sngo 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs/ 
138b7(rgyud): rdo rje btsun mo bA ga la bzhugs te// 'phags pa dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis bskor cing // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba
138b8(rgyud): phrag brgya bcu'i dbus su phyag na rdo rje la gzigs nas 'dzum pa 'dzad pa dang / phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ 
139a1(rgyud): @##// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ kye rnam pa kun mchog sdom pa yi// bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid dang // rdzogs pa yang ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par
139a2(rgyud): 'tshal// rlung dang me dang chu dang sa// de bzhin nam mkha' ji ltar lags// rnam pa lnga ni ji ltar lha// rtse bo'i yul drug de bzhin ci// phyi dang nang du gnas pa yi// sku gsum byin brlabs ji lta bu/ 
139a3(rgyud): lha yi sku ni ji ltar lags// gtso bos de bzhin lha mos gsungs// zla ba nyi ma ci zhig lags// lam lnga po yi ji ltar lags// lus kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu// de bzhin rtsi'i gzugs ni ci// rtsa'i grang
139a4(rgyud): kyi tshad ni du// de bzhin lus kyi gong bu ci// sbas pa'i dam tshig gi ni brda// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi// gnas la sogs pa'i brda du zhig/ ji ltar sA la sogs/ 
139a5(rgyud): pa thob// mtshan ma ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur// khyod kyi las ni bcu gnyis gang // sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar 'gyur// bgrang phreng dag ni ji ltar rigs// bzlas pa'i grangs ni du zhig lags// lnga yi rnam pa'i
139a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ci// dkyil 'khor bri ba du zhig mchis// sngags kyi dngos grub ci zhig lnga// gzhon nu ma'i mchod pa ci// bya dang bya min nyi ma gang // gtso bo myos byed gtor ma ci// bdud rtsi lnga stsogs ji ltar lags// 
139a7(rgyud): lcags kyu lnga stsogs ji ltar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bri ba bshad du gsol// thig gdab pa ni ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar sa ni yongs su sbyang // bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar 'gyur// slob dpon gyi ni bya ba gang // 
139a8(rgyud): ji ltar slob ma yongs su gzung // dbang skur pa yi grangs kyis ni// bzhi pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// dus kyi nges pa ji lta bu// de bzhin 'chi ba bslu ba gang // dus bzhi'i ming ni du zhig mchis// gling bzhi po ni ji ltar
139b1(rgyud): lpags// dus dang dus min dngos grub ci// spyod pa ji ltar bshad par bgyi// rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ni du// rnal 'byor rgyud ni ji ltar 'gyur// mdo sde'i grangs ni ji lta bur// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa du// rab gnas
139b2(rgyud): sbyin bsreg mchod sbyin dang // sngags kyi dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur// bcud kyis len ni ji ltar lags// myos byed btung ba ji ltar 'gyur// gasdang sngags ji ltar 'byung 'gyur lags// ji ltar sngags ni btu bar
139b3(rgyud): 'gyur// tshar bcad dan na cog pagras pos rje 'chung kyi bcom ldan de nyid rnams ni ci// stong pa nyid dang snying rje gang // stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ci// ji ltar de bzhin nyid kyang bzhin// chos rnams thams cad yongs shes pa'i
139b4(rgyud): sgom pa'i mtshan nyid gtso bos gsungs// dpal bde mchog 'byung ba'i rgyud las// // zhu ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje gsang ba 'byung ba 'di zhus// 
139b5(rgyud): pa legs so legs so// de nas de phyir bskyed pa yi// rim pa'i sgom pa yang dag bshad// sna tshogs las kyi rang bzhin gyis// skye gnas bzhi po rnams su 'gyur// sgong skyes mngal las skyes pa dang // drod
139b6(rgyud): gsher dang ni rdzus skyes rnams// ngang pa khrung khrung rma bya dang // ne ts+tshe bzhad sogs sgong skyes te// glang po ma he ba glang rta// bong bu mi stsogs mngal nas skyes// srin bu 'bu dang phye ma lib// nya la sogs pa drod gsher
139b7(rgyud): skyes// lha dang demyal ba'i sems can rnams// de bzhin par de'i srid pa dang // skal po dang po la stsogs pa// 'di rnams brdzus skyes sems can no// shar gyi lus 'phags pa lang spyod// de bzhin byang gi sgra mi
139b8(rgyud): ston// gling gsum po yi mi rnams ni// longs spyod chen pos yang dag 'tsho// blun rmongs bye brag me phyed cing // rtog med rnam par spyod med pa'o// 'dzam bu'i gling du legs skyes pa// las kyi sa bor rab tu// 
140a1(rgyud): grags// legs byas nyes par byas dang las// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams// skye ba sngon gyi rnam smin 'dir// skye bo rnams la snang bar 'gyur// rgyags dang ser sna gdug sems
140a2(rgyud): rnamams// g.yo sgyu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang // chags dang nad la sogs pas gzir// 'dzam bu gling ba'i gtso bo mchog/ yul dbus su ni skyes pa ste// sngon gyi dge ba la ltos nas// dbang po rno 'bring
140a3(rgyud): rtul por 'gyur// mi ru skyes pa 'bras bu'i dam pa dang po ste// rang gi khyim nas nges 'byung rnyed pa gnyis pa yin// rab tu byung nas dge ba sgrub pa gsum pa ste// rtse cig yid ni thob pa bzhi par gsungs// 
140a4(rgyud): sgyuskye ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin// mi rnams kyis rab mi shes te// thog med dus kyi nyon mongs kyi// bag chags rab tu bsags byas pa// de phyir sngon byis las kyis ni// skyes dang 'chi ba yang dag 'byung // tshogs pa
140a5(rgyud): mi rnyed de srid du// zhag bdun par de'i srid par gnas// srid pa bar de'i sems can ni// 'gron po bgrod pa zi bzhin du// 'di ltar las kyi zhags pa yis// 'gro po drug du rab tu skyes// pha ma'i kun du sbyor
140a6(rgyud): srogs ni// srid pa'i skye bos mthong 'gyur nas/ rta la zhon bzhin rnam shes ni// rlung gi bzhon pa zhon nas ni// skad cig thang cig nyid la ni// shin du myur bar 'ongs gyur nas// shin du dga' dang bcas
140a7(rgyud): stobs kyis// kha yi lam nas 'jug par 'gyur// rtsa ni stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis// rab bskul de yi skad cig la// a ka li li zhu byas pas// mchog du dga' ba yang dag thob// khu ba khrag de yi dbus su
140a8(rgyud): ni// thig le gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// dang po'i rnam pa nur nur po// mer mer po'i gnyis pa yin// ltar ltar po ni gsum pa ste// de bzhin bzhi pa gor gor po'o// rlung rnams kyis ni bskul tsam gyis/ 
140b1(rgyud): sha yi rnams pa lta bur 'gyur// zla ba lngar gyur sa bon las// yan lag lnga ni rab tu skye// zla ba bdun na swa dang spu// sen mo rtags ni skye bar 'gyur// zla ba brgyad na dbang po dang // lus kyi yan lag
140b2(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur// zla ba dgu na yang dag rdzogs// zla ba bcu na sems dang ldan// nur nur pe ni mi bskyod pa// mer mer po ni rin chen 'byung // 'od dpag med mgon ltar ltar po// gor gor po ni don grub po// 
140b3(rgyud): mkhrang 'gyur rnam par snang mdzad de// rnam pa lngar ni bstan pa yis// dri chu khrag ni mi skyod pa'o// sa bon rang bzhin 'od dpag med// gong bu rin chen 'byung ldan te// ro cig gyur pa rnam snang bzhugs// skye gnas
140b4(rgyud): dbus su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas// g.yon nas zhu ba zhes bshad do// g.yas nas de bzhin khrag yin no// de dag gcig du 'dus gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no// las
140b5(rgyud): kyi sa bon dbang thob pas// rlung gis yang dag bsgyur nas su// chos kyi 'byung gnas sgo ru ni// gdong gi nges par phyogs par 'gyur// sku yi g.yas su brten nas ni// cog pur mngon par phyogs te gnas// 
140b6(rgyud): sku g.yon yang dag brten nas ni// shes rab ltar ni mngon phyogs 'gyur// mkhas pas sa bon ltung ba'i rim// dus kyi skad cig yang dag mtshon yi g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba grang // thams cad du ni skyes
140b7(rgyud): bu ra 'gyur// g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang // nges par bud medo rnams su 'gyur// gnyi ga'i dbus rgyu sa bon gang // rtag tu mA ning 'gyur ba'o// chu khams pa'i shes par bya// me yi khams ni ma yin no// lpag
140b8(rgyud): pa sha dang khrag rnams ni// me las skyes zhes bshad pa ste// rus pa rkang mar khu ba rnams// pha las skyes zhes bshad pa yin// drug po 'di dag 'dus pa'i lus// rdo rje sems dpa' gang gsungs pa/ 
141a1(rgyud): gzugs dang dor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes de bzhin te// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin du// phung po nges par skye ba yin// srid pa'i skye ba'i rim shes pas// rdzogs pa'i
141a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir// 'di ni phung po yongs mkhyen pa'i// de nyid gsung ba rnams kyis bshad// 'di ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste/ gnyis pa'o// / 
141a3(rgyud): nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa ni// yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// lus kyi dkyil 'khor la brtan nas// chos dang longs spyod
141a4(rgyud): spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim sgrub pas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs so// dbang po dman pas bskyed rims kyi// dkyil 'khor gsam zhing bsgom par bya// dbang po rnon
141a5(rgyud): pos skad cig gis// rnam pas sems tsam dkyil 'khor bsam// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni// khams gsum gzhal yas khang bdag nyid// srog chags
141a6(rgyud): rnams ni dkyil 'khor ba// de dus rnam pa skad cig gis// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnal 'byor pa'o// oM AHhU~M gi sngags kyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyis dkyil 'khor te// mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og
141a7(rgyud): skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur// skad cig rnam pas rnal 'byor te// skad cig rnam pas gsang sngags 'don// dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde ba mchog/ khams bzhi po dang phung
141a8(rgyud): po dang // de bzhin yul drug bdag nyid dang // khrag 'thung lha me ye shes te// de la tha dad mi brtag go// dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid rgyas btab// de bzhin nyid mnyam stong pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin nyid
141b1(rgyud): bdag med// thabs ni snying rje stobs yin te// zung du 'jug pa rnam rtog bral// dkyil 'khor snying po mchog yin no// rnam par rtog pa sbyor bsams kyang // de tshe mi rtog bsam mi khyab// de yang rnam pa kun gyi
141b2(rgyud): mchog/ bde ba'i dbang po rnam pa med// rtag tu sring nyid dngos dang dngos min bdag/ rtag tu srid pa 'byung bar mdzad// sna tshogs spros pa'i rtog pa med// rtag tu 'byung ba'i bde ba che// skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis
141b3(rgyud): de nas skye ba yang dag 'byung // bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig/ mi shes rnam par mi mthong ba// gzugs med gang du'ang mi gnas shing // 'gyur ba med cing rtag pa'o// kun rdzob skye ba 'byung bas na// chad pa med
141b4(rgyud): phyir dngos med min// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang dngos su// chos rnams thams cad lhan cig skyes// bdag byin rlab pa rang byung ba// mi shigs 'jigs pa med pa ste// skye ba med pa'i ro myong bas// sgom pa'ang ni de nyid de/ 
141b5(rgyud): stong nyid so sor rtog pas na// bsam gtan shes rab du yang 'gyur// chos kun yongs su shes pa'o// sgom pa de nyid sgom med pa'o// rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba che// phyag rgya chen po bde ba mchog/ de nyid chos la 'jug/ 
141b6(rgyud): bya'i phyir// de rnams dbye bas rab bstan pa// bla ma dam pa'i gdam ngag gis// gsal bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// e waM ma la ni rab tu gnas// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi las// rnam
141b7(rgyud): rnam kun mchog gi sdom pa'o// sdom pa byang chub bde mchog ste// de ltar med brjod du med pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni// 'dus pa bde ba'i mchog yin te// bdag byin brlabs pa'i rim pa 'di// bla ma'i drin/ 
141b8(rgyud): gyis gsal bar 'gyur// 'di ni rdzogs po'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rim pa phye ba ste/ gsum pa'o// // de nas de phyir 'byung ba bzhi'i// mtshan nyid yang dag bshad par bya// dngos po dag ni ma lus
142a1(rgyud): / gang // de ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin to// sa de la ni dngos po brten// mes ni thams cad 'tshed par byed// chu yis 'jig par byed pa dang // rlung gis lhan cig bskyod par byed// nam mkha'i' yul gyis
142a2(rgyud): stong par byed// gnas des thams cad de las skyes// gang du gcig ni gnas pa der// bzhi po kun kyang nye bar gnas// rtsa shing ljon pa 'khris shing sogs// bems po lta bu'i rnamo shes tsam// gang dag 'gro/ 
142a3(rgyud): drug sems can rnams// rnam shes bcas pa lta bur gnas// de ltar srid pa'i dngos po kun blo dang ldan pas shes par bya// sems can rnams ni 'chi ba na// yan lag nyidang lag thams cad kyi// rlung ni thams cad
142a4(rgyud): bskyod par 'gyur// skad cig de la me drod 'dor// chu ni rtag du skams gyur nas// tshigs dang tshigs ni thams cad du// song nas tshor ba med par 'gyur// lus la sogs pa'i sa khams kyi// sra ba nyid tsam gnas par
142a5(rgyud): 'gyur// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba dag/ thams cad du ni 'byung ba 'gro// lha dang lha min mi rnams ni// 'byung ba med par skye mi 'gyur// lha dang 'jig rten skyeng la sogs// thams cad la ni lhan cig gnas// rig byed grub
142a6(rgyud): mtha' thams cad kyis// rtag du 'dod cing sgom pa ste// gang phyir thams cad kun du 'gro// sa stengs skyes pa kun la gnas// 'byung ba bzhi po gtso bo mchog/ bstan chos kun las yang dag bshad// rlung ni srog du yang
142a7(rgyud): dag blta// me ni 'tsho ba'i mtshon nyid de// chu ni bdud rtsi'i ngo bo nyid// sa ni zhing tsam nyid du gnas// de la rtag tu gnas pa'i lha// rnam shes mchog gi dbang phyug ste// lha lnga yi ni rnam pa ru// rnam shes de ni yongs su
142a8(rgyud): 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // de bzhin 'du byed rnam par shes// me long lta bu'i mnyam nyid dang // so so kun du rtog pa dang // chos dbyings shin du rnam dag ste// rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung // 
142b1(rgyud): 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// de bzhin mi spyod pa nyid de// rnam lnga ro cig rdzogs byang chub// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya chos de bzhin// yul drug du ni shes bya ste// 'di dag rno bar dag par bshad// 
142b2(rgyud): khams ni bco brgyad shes bya ste// de dag phung po'i rang bzhin nyid// yi ge mchog ni sgom par bya// sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir// mig la sogs pa sgom bya ste// mig gi dbang po'i rnam shes ni// thugs kyi rdo rje'i rnam
142b3(rgyud): 'phrul yin// ngo bo nyid gsum rnam dag don// 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang 'gyur// sgra dang rna ba rnam shes ni// dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid// sna dang dri dang rnam shes kyang // de bzhin rnam dag shes par bya// ro dang lce dang
142b4(rgyud): rnam shes ni// don dam nyid du rnam par dag/ lus dang reg bya rnam shes kyang // sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bor skyes// yid dang chos dang yid rnam shes// snying po nyid du rnam par dag/ rnam shes drug ni kun gzhi ru// 'jug pa de bzhin
142b5(rgyud): gshegs pa ste// 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang 'thob// he ru ka dpal yang dag gnas// yul dang yul can sbyor ba yis// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang 'gyur// rnam pa kun gyi mchog gnas pas// yul ni rnam dag
142b6(rgyud): shes par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// gcig la de bzhin gsum du rtags// skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum// sku gsum rnam par grol ba gsum// zhal gsum yig gsum lho gsum ste// khams
142b7(rgyud): gsum pa'i rang bzhin nyid// dkyil 'khor gsum dang rnal 'byor gsum// lam gsum du ni bstan pa ste// dam tshig gsum dang dge ba gsum// de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs// shes rab dang ni thabs nyid dang // 
142b8(rgyud): de'i sbyor ba rnam gsum ste// chos kyi 'byung gnas rang bzhin nyid// ji ltar gsung gsum mthong ba dang // 'khor gsum mi dmigs sbyor ba yis// sngags gsum gyi ni rang bzhin nyid// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi// 
143a1(rgyud): // gsum gyi ni rang gi dngos// phyi rol 'jig rten pa yi chos// lha la sogs pa'i bdag nyid nang // phyi nang dag pa nyid kyi phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni sangs rgyas thob// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du// lha ni
143a2(rgyud): mngon sum dmigs par bya// rnam pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin// lha mo yongs su brtag par bya// dang po'i lha yi rang bzhin du// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bzhugs// gnas dang zhing la sogs pa'i brda// dpa'
143a3(rgyud): bo rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa// de bzhin gnyis med mnyam sbyor las// lha rnams yang dag 'phro ba ste// tshad med lha yi 'phro ba la// dkyil 'khor tshad can rnam par brtag/ lha yi rnal 'byor bsam mi khyab// sangs
143a4(rgyud): rgyas rol pa'ang bsam mi khyab// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i gzugs kyis ni// he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor// de dag mi phyed ngo bo nyid// sgom pa nga yis bshad pa yis// de dag thams cad gnyis med thob// gzung dang
143a5(rgyud): 'dzin dang rnam bral ba// rags pa smra zhes bshad pa ste// phra ba sems kyi rang bzhin 'gyur// bsam dang bral ba'i de nyid ni// go 'phang mchog ces yongs su bsgrubs// 'di ni 'byung bzhi dang phung po rnam pa
143a6(rgyud): lnga yul drug dang lha'i rnam par dag pa'i rim par phye ba ste/ bzhi pa'o// // de nas zla nyi ma yi// rab tu dbye ba yang dag bshad// g.yas dang g.yon du sbyor ba yis// rim pa ji bzhin rgyu ba ste// g.yon du/ 
143a7(rgyud): rgan nas bzung nas ni// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'jug pa ri// zla ba'i rtswa ni 'og ltas par// a li zla bar yang dag 'brub// g.yas su lte ba nas bzung nas// rkan gyi gnas su rab 'jug pa'i// nyi ma'i rtsa yi steng ltas
143a8(rgyud): te// ka li nyi ma rA rab tu 'bab// sna yi sgo ni gnyis po nis// rtsa gnyis rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rtsa g.yon 'jug pa'i lam yin te// g.yas pa'i 'byung ba'i lam yin no// nyi shar nas brtsams ji snyed de// nub kyi bar du
143b1(rgyud): nyin mo ste// nub pa nis brtsams ji srid de// shar ba'i bar du mtshan mor gyur// nyin dang mtshan mo zhag yin te// mel tshe thun zhes brjod pa yin// thun bzhi nyin mor shes bya ste// de bzhin mtshan mo thun bzhi'o// 
143b2(rgyud): zhag cig la ni 'pho ba yin// yan lag bcu drug rnams yin te// thun ni phyed phyed rtag tu rlung // sna'i bu gar yang dag rgyu// yar de'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum du thun phyed la// zla ba'i rlung ni rgyu ba ste// 
143b3(rgyud): de nas zhag gsum nyi ma'i rlung // go rims 'di ni ji srid du// yar tshes bcwo lnga'i bar du'o// mar de'i tshes cig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum du snga dro ni// nyi ma'i rlung du drag par 'gyur// de bzhin tshes ni bcwa lnga'i
143b4(rgyud): bar// thun re yi ni bzhi cha rnams// chu ched du ni brjod pa na// nyin zhag gcig la rtsa rnams ni// sum bcu rtsa gnyis shes par bya// nyin zhag cig la dbyug gu ni// drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i tshad kyis ni// rtsa dang chu tshod phyed dbyu ga// 
143b5(rgyud): thun ni brgyad cha zhes su bshad// sna sgo'i rung ni 'byung 'jug la// dbugs gcig du ni rab tu grags// rlung ni sbyor ba la mkhas pas// dbugs drug srog du shes par bya// srog ni lnga bcu tham pa dang // dbus gsum
143b6(rgyud): rkyang ba'ang de dang ldan// nyi ma byung du rgyu dus kyi// nyi ma dang po'i dbyu gu ni// nyi ma lhor ni rgyu dus kyi// mtshan mo yong ni de bzhin 'gyur// dbyu gu re re'i 'phel 'grib ni// dus kyi dbye bas shes par bya// dbugs ni drag
143b7(rgyud): por bzhi char bcas// 'phro ba so so'i 'phel ba yin// dbugs kyi sum cha de yi ni// drug char nyi ma re rer 'gyur// thun ni phyed phyed rgyu ba las// phyin ci log du 'phos 'gyur na// brtsod pa la sogs nges 'gyur bas// 
143b8(rgyud): mkhas pas 'di dag yang dag rtag/ nyi ma cig gnyis gsum dang bzhi// lnga dang drug du gang tshe rlung // phyin ci log du rtag rgyu na// de tshe brtsod pa chen por 'gyur// zla phyed rtag tu log par rgyu// nad ni chen po yang dag
144a1(rgyud): @#// 'byung // zla ba cig du log par rgyu// snying sdug gnyen ni brlag par 'gyur// phyed dang gnyis su log par rgyu// zla ba drug na 'chi bar 'gyur// thun mong dus su shes par bya// gzhan yang khyad par bshad
144a2(rgyud): bya ste// mnyam po bdun du nyi ma song // gang tshe skye ba'i nyid zla la// de tshe rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus// 'chi ba'i nges pa'i dus yin no// mi ni khyim gang las skyes pa// gang zhi gzhan yang bdun de'i phyir// der ni nyi ma mnya
144a3(rgyud): bdun po// mnyam po bdun zhes bya bar bshad// nyi ma lam nas thams cad du// rlung ni rtag tu rgyu ba dag/ rgyun mi 'chad par yang dang yang // mkhas pas dus ni mtshan par bya// dus kyi skad cig gang la rlung // 
144a4(rgyud): bgrod pa gzhan du 'jug 'gyur na// dus de skad cig rdzogs pa ni// 'chi 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// nyi phyed dang por byas te nyi ma rdzogs pa de bzhin nyin zhag gi ni bar// de la zhag gnyis zhag gsum dang ni de
144a5(rgyud): bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa'i bar dag du// rlung ni gang zhig rtsa la brten te g.yas pa med pa 'am nyi ma'i lam gnas rgyu// de las sa dang nyi ma phyogs dang bkra shis drug bzhi 'di dag shes par bya// lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i
144a6(rgyud): bar du nyin zhag 'di dag lnga lngar spel bas 'gro bar 'gyur// de las re re spel bas bcu ni sum 'gyur ji srid gsum ni lhag pa'i bar// de las rgyas pa'i dus su gsum mig zla ba'i lo drug gsum zung zla ba'i/ 
144a7(rgyud): zla// lcug ma tshes dang phyogs mda' yon tan zung d+ha'i zhag du 'tshe ba yin// ri mig sum bcu bdun bcas pa'o// mkhor lo rom gsum bris nas no// tshe dang srog gi rlung dgA dang // nyin zhig mtshan mo rim
144a8(rgyud): bzhin bri// zhag ldanas ni nyi shu lnga'i// bar bar gyi ni nyin zhig la// grangs ni bcu drug ma bshang gang // de rnams tshang bar brjod par bya// zhag ni drug bdun brgyad dgu 'i// rim bas gal te rlung rgyu na// 
144b1(rgyud): yon tan ldan yang nyin zhag ni// nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gsum na'o// drag po nyi ma yan lag pa'i// zhag gi rim pas rgyan ni// yon tan ldan yang nyin zhag ni// nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gnyis na'o// zhag ni bcu
144b2(rgyud): drug de bzhin du// bcu bdun dang ni bco brgyad dang // bcu dgu yi ni rim pa yis// rlung rgyu yon tan can yang zhag/ bcu gnyis nyis 'gyur ma tshang ba'i// lo cig nA ni skyabs med gang // de ni gshin rje'i grong
144b3(rgyud): khyer du// the tsom med par 'gro bar 'gyur// nyi ma nyi shu gcig gnyis gsum// nyer bzhi'i rim pas rlung rgyun// yon tan ldan yang zhag drug ni// ma tshang zla ba drug na 'chi// re'u mig sum bcu gnyis ldan pa'i// 
144b4(rgyud): rim gnyis 'khor lo bris nas ni/ der ni tshe dang yan lag rlung // grangs kyi mtshan ma rims bzhin bri// 'chi bir rtags ni 'di dag kun// rnam pa thams cad shes byas nas// blo ldan 'chi ba smra ba yis// gal te brtan
144b5(rgyud): po'i go 'phang 'dod// rtsa ni yang dag sdung byas nas// de srid rlung ni sbyangs 'gyur te// so so'i rims bzhin rnal 'byor pas// yang dang yang du gnas par bya// g.yon pa'i bu gar bkug nas ni// rtsa ni bsdams nas/ 
144b6(rgyud): mnan bya zhing // de bzhin du ni g.yas po'i rlung // bkug ste dral bus mnan par bya// sems can rnams kyi zhag cig la// rgyu ba'i dbugs kyis grangs kyi tshul// brgya phrag drug gis lhag pa yi// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig
144b7(rgyud): go// me yis 'chi ba dag tu 'gyur// rlung gis nor rnams zad par byed// dbang tshon gyis ni rgyal srid de// chus ni don rnams yang dag byung // me yi rlung ni rnam rgyu bas// bkres skom dub dang sdug bsngal nad// bya ba thams cad
144b8(rgyud): nyams 'gyur zhes// rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog gis gsungs// rlung gis brtsod dang skyo dang mongs nor nyams nyon ni mongs par byed// dbang chen nor dang 'bru la sogs// rnyed pa thob dang sdug byed pa'o// chu yi rlung ni rnam
145a1(rgyud): rgyu bas// 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun byed pas// de'i sbyor ba mchog gtso bor// rdo rje sems dpa' gang gsungs pa'i// rlung ni bcom ldan he ru ka/ rang bzhin nyid de gsung du 'gyur// g.yon
145a2(rgyud): pa shes rab rang bzhin te// g.yas pa snying rje bdag nyid do// gnyis po mi phyed sbyor bas yang // ga ki nas ni rnam par rgyu// de bas de nyid reg pas bde// dge mi dge sogs shes par bya// dug sngogs
145a3(rgyud): gzhom dang lhag ma ni// bkra shis dpal ni skyed pa la// shes rab dag ni rab tu bsngags// rtag tu dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs// g.yul bsham rol rtsed ston mo dang // bcad pa dang ni dgug pa dang // bsreg
145a4(rgyud): drang btso ba'i las la ni// snying rje'i bdag nyid rab tu bsngags// gzhan yang gnyis bdag rdo rje can// the tsom 'gyur bar shes bya ste// dge dang mi dge nges med par// rlung rig pas ni 'dir brtsam bya// mgon
145a5(rgyud): po dzi ste a li rgyu// 'ga' zhig ka lir gnas 'dri 'am// ka li rgyu la a lir gnas// de yi 'dod don nyams par 'gyur// gang nas mgon po de rgyu ba// der gnas 'ga' zhig 'dri byed na// de'i don kun yang
145a6(rgyud): dag 'grub// gnyi gar gnas la the tsom 'gyur// rlung gi bdag nyid mgon po yi// sku gsum po yang shes par bya// 'jug pa chos kyi sku yin te// gnas pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// 'byung ba sprul pa'i
145a7(rgyud): sku zhes bshad// 'di dag sku ni gsum por bzhed// 'dri ba po 'am rang gi'ang rung // chos smras thams cad dge ba ste// longs spyod rdzogs pas the tsom 'gyur// sprul pas 'thab mor bstan pa'o// rnal
145a8(rgyud): 'byor pa'i srog rtsol ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bor gnas// g.yon dang g.yas kyi gnas gang nas// rim pa ji bzhin rnam par rgyu// g.yas nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// 
145b1(rgyud): nas kyi me tog lta bu'i mdog/ de ni 'od dpag med kyir blta// g.yon nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od// rtag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor de// kha dog ldang skar snang la// lha ni don yod mchog yin no// gcig nas ni rgyu ba'i 'od// 
145b2(rgyud): gser gyi kha dog ltar snang ste// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi ni rlung // 'og nas dal bar rgyu ni// kun du zla ba lta bur dkar// chu yi dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ste// 'od chen rdo rje mgon po'o// lus kun las ni rjes 'gro'i rlung // ses
145b3(rgyud): kun rab tu 'jug byed pa// mgon po rnam par snang mdzad ni// 'byung ba rab tu grags pa yin// rnal 'byor pas ni mnyam gzhag pas// 'jug pa'i rlung ni bgrang bar bya// ji srid 'bum la sogs pa'i grangs// sgra dang
145b4(rgyud): bral bar rtag du bzla// sgrub pos sgra dang bral bar ni// 'bum bzlas yongs su rdzogs pa ni// tshe nyams pa'ang lo wA ru// 'tsho bar 'dir ni the tsom med// rtag du nang par langs nas rgyu// stong phrag cig tu bgrang bya ste// de/

145b6(rgyud): can la brtan byas nas// dbye ba gsum gyis gzhom par bshad// tha mar sum bcu rtsa drug tsam// de yi gnyis 'gyur 'bring de bzhin// sum 'gyur chen por shes bya ste// bum pa can des rgyal bar bya// bum pa can
145b7(rgyud): sngar shes byas nas// bdag nyid dkyil mo dkrung bcas te// lag pa lan gsum mnyes nas ni// de nas lan drug se gol gdab// ji srid sum bcu rtsa drug par// de srid bum pa can gyis bya// sum 'gyur chen
145b8(rgyud): pos gzhom pa ni// rgya las rtsa brgyad lhag po'o// brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod pa yis// brtson pas de nyid kyis rgyal bya// gsum pas sbyor bas rgyal bas na// 'chi bdag las ni ring du 'gyur// bum pa can ni shes// 
146a1(rgyud): byas nas// 'gog pa brtan par gnas pa ni// de la bskal pa stong du yang // 'chi bdag nye bar 'ong mi 'gyur// snying gi chu skyes dbus son rlung // hUM yig dkar po'i rnam pa ni// gang gis
146a2(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag bsams na// de la yul sogs dmigs mi 'gyur// rlung gis 'khor ba'i steng du 'gro// mya ngan 'das pa gong du bgrod// snying ka'i nang du chu skyes la// mi gnas mya ngan 'das par gnas// 
146a3(rgyud): steng dang 'og du rgyu ba'i rlung // kha sbyar du ni yid kyis byas// de yi sbyor ba goms byed na/ des ni brtan pa'i go 'phang 'thob// rlung gi rnal 'byor mi shes pa'am// gang zhig 'gro dang 'ong ba'i rlung // blo dang ldan
146a4(rgyud): pasas rtag bya ste// rlung gis thams cad byin gyis brlabs// rlung gis kun du 'gro 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i man ngag gi rim pa phye ba ste/ lnga pa'o// // de nas lam lnga bzang po
146a5(rgyud): mchog/ rnam par nges par rab bshad bya// bdag gzhan don ni phun tshogs pa'o// sgrub pos dge dang mi dge brtag/ me dang rlung ni nyid dag dang // de bzhin dbang chen dang ni chu// dkyil 'khor yang
146a6(rgyud): dag rgyu ba las// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ de bzhin bsad dang bskrad pa yi// mtshan nyid mkhas pas brtag par bya// de yi sbyor ba mi shes pa// de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur// mes ni 'chi bar 'gyur/

146a8(rgyud): dmar zhing gsal ba ni// pad ma mgon po 'thung ba'o// g.yon pa nas ni rtsu ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog lnga 'azhing gsal ba ni// las kyi mgon po 'byung ba'o// g.yon pa
146b1(rgyud): gnyis ka nas ni rgyu ba'i khams// gser gyi mdog lhur gsal ba ni// dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// rin chen mgon po'i rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ 
146b2(rgyud): dag pa shel ltar snang ba 'di// rdo rje mgon po'i rgyu ba'o// khams rnams kun ni yang dag bsdus// rten dang rten pa yang dag 'dzin// rnam par snang mdzad rlung chen te// 'chi ba'i lus las rnam par rgyu// rlung gi de
146b3(rgyud): nyid mi shes par// las dang las min mi 'grub ste// rlung ni thams cad bgrod gyur pas// rtog ge pA yis mi shes so// rlung gi de nyid sngon 'gro bas// sngags kyi de nyid sgrub par bya// sems can rnams kyi srog
146b4(rgyud): gyur pa// rlung zhes bya ba las kun byed// 'di ni rnam shes bzhon pa ste// sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob byed pa'o// rgyud rnams kun gyis gsang ba ste// byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs yin no// 'di ni lam lnga nges par
146b5(rgyud): brtan pa'i rim pa phye ba ste/ drug pa'o// / de nas mA yi 'khor lo ni// rim pa bzhin du rab bshad bya// lus kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rtsa// stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis 'gyur/ 
146b6(rgyud): rtswa rnams dang ni nye ba'i rtsa// de dag gnas la rten pa ste// brgya las nyi shu lhag pa'i rtsa// gtso bo zhes ni bya bar bshad// rtsa ni gnas dang yul rnams ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi grangs yin te// de rnams dbus
146b7(rgyud): kyi rtsa gsum gang // thams cad khyab ning rten pa'o// mgo bo pu li ra yon te// so dang sen mo 'bab pa'o// spyi gtsug dz+wa lan d+ha ra ste// s+tha dang spu ni 'bab par gnas// u rgyan rna ba g.yas pa'i rtsa/ 
146b8(rgyud): lpags pa dang ni dri ma 'bab// mgo rgyab ar bu ta yin te// sha ni yang dag 'bab pa'i rtsa// go ta wa ri rna ba g.yon// rgyas pa yang dag 'bab pa'i rtsa// smin dbus ra mi sha ra'i ste// rtag tu rus pa
147a1(rgyud): !\u0f7f/ 'bab pa'o// mig ni des go cir gnas// mchin pa 'bab pa'i ma yin no// ma la we ni dpung pa gnyis// snyid 'dab pa yi rtsa gnas so// mchan khung kam ru bya ste// rtag tu mig ni 'dab pa'o// 
147a2(rgyud): nu ma gnyis ni o De ste// rtag du 'khris pa 'bab pa'i rtsa// tri sha ku ni lte ba ste// rtsa ni glo ba 'bab pa gnas// sna rtse ko sa la yin te// rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab pa gnas// kha ni ka ling gA yin te// rtag tu
147a3(rgyud): minyi ma 'bab pa gnas// mgron pa lam pu ka yin te// rtag du lto ba 'bab pa'i rtsa// kan tsi snying kha'i rtsa yin te// gshang ba 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no// 'doms par hi ma la ya ste// 'tshogs ma'i 'tshams
147a4(rgyud): ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// pre ha pu ri mtshan ma ste// bad kAn 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no// gri ha de ba gshang lam ste// rtag tu rnag ni 'bab pa'o// baR+Sha gnyis so ra Sh+Ta yin ste// rtag tu khrag ni 'bab pa'o// byin pa
147a5(rgyud): gnyis ni gser gling gnas// rdul 'bab pa yi rtsa yin no// rkang pa'i sen mo na ga ra// rtag du tshil 'bab rtsar shes bya// rkang pa'i bol ni srin du ste// mchi ma 'bab pa'i gzugs can ma// ma ru de shes

147a7(rgyud): byed pa'o// ra sa na zhes grags pa yin// dbus kyi char ni yang dag 'jug/ snying khi'i chu skyes dbus son pa// chu shing skye ma me tog bzhin// 'phyang ba kha ni thur du bltas// tIl gi mar me ltar 'bar
147a8(rgyud): zhing // byang chub sems ni mnyam 'bab de/ a Sh+Ta sa bya ste ldan cig skyes byed pa'o// la lan la sogs pa'i rtsa// rtsa rnams kun gyi gtso bo ste// dpes 'dir ni gzhan rten pa// gang gis ni dur gzhan 'jug pa nin/ 
147b1(rgyud): gcig gyur kha ga ma kha ste// de nyid skye gnas gzhan ma yin// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rang bzhin gyis// lus la brten par shes par bya// bud med rnams la'ang gtso bo gsum// la la na sogs rtsa rnams yin// 
147b2(rgyud): shes rab rang bzhin la la na// ra sa na ni thabs su gnas// dbus na a bi do ti ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs sku la la na// ra sa na ni sprul pa'i sku// oM ba d+hU ti chos sku ste// sku gsum
147b3(rgyud): po ni bshad pa yin// rtsa rnams de dag thams cad ni// lus ni skyed par byed pa ste// de yi tshigs las yang dag byung // gong bu lha yi bdag nyid do// gzugs las 'das pa'i gong bur 'gyur// gong bu las 'das
147b4(rgyud): lha nyid de// de phyir bsam mi khyab sbyor bas// de bzhin nyid bdag kun 'gro ba'o// bsgrub pos cho ga gang dag gis// gong bu las 'das go 'phang gnas/ den 'i da/ du byung byasangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'di ni rtsa'i 'khor
147b5(rgyud): lo'i rim par phye ba ste bdun po'o// / de nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o// dam tshig kyang ni rim pa bzhin// yang dag par ni bshad par bya// rang gi khyim 'am gas
147b6(rgyud): ba'i gnas// dben zhing yid ni dga' ba dang // ri bo chang tshing ri sul dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni// ma mo'i khyim dang dur khrod dang // chu bo 'dus pa'i dbus su ni// blo med 'bras bu 'dod pa yis//
