190b1(rgyud): dag ldan// phran pa sbyor sbed du ste// thig les munan cing brgyan pa yin// dri zhes kun du brjod pa yin// kun nas thugs kyi 'khor lo la'o// nyi shu bdun pa 'og tu sbyin// sngags la sogs pas phye ba yin// spyi bo da du/ 
190b2(rgyud): yang dag sbyar// yi ge lho yi gzugs kyis ni// nyi shu rtsa drug yang ni sbyar// dbyings yi ga gnyis pas brgyan pa yin// nyi shu rtsa gsum yang ni blang // 'ag gi cha ni sbur bar bya// dbyangs kyi gsum pa yang dag ldan// bzhi pas
190b3(rgyud): sbyar bar bya ba yin// de yi dbus su yang dag gsungs// yIg+ne dbang phyug gis ni brgyan// bcu drug mtha' ni yang dag bshad// stong dang 'og du khyab pa yin// de la dbus su yang dag gsungs// stong pa chen po'i yi ge/ 
190b4(rgyud): sto// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhig tu med// drag pa yi ni shel lta bur// rdzas 'di rnams ni bza' ba yin// rnal 'byor 'di rnams mchog yin te// rnal 'byor kun las mchog tu 'phags// khyod la mdo ru bsdus pas bshad
190b5(rgyud): bza' ba rnams ni yang dag brjod// gang gis rig pas thams cad bza'// dngos po ro mnyam bsres nas ni// dag dang ma dag mi byed par// de bzhin nyid rnams thams cad dang // bza' ba thams cad bza' bar bya// de nyid
190b6(rgyud): bcu yis rab tu shes par bya// dbye bas gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par grol// sbyin pa'i snying po sbyin par bya// sems kyi rnal 'byor rdzogs nas ni// thams cad rtswa stsogs bzhin du btang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrim
190b7(rgyud): gyur// de nyid kun gyis mi 'jigs pa// skye ba thams cad brtse mo byed// dang por snying rje ba na med// bzod pa tshul khrims bgegs med pa// gzhan gyi gnod pa bgegs pa ste// gur dang phur bu dro ba dag/ gdug pa'i ba
190b8(rgyud): 'joms par byed// bcud med 'chi bo med yin// bdag ga soms ni bcing bar bya// gang gis rang sems btul ba yis// bdud kyi gnod pa smos ci dgos// mnyam pa'i sems kyi dro yis ni// gu bi zhi pa rul ste/ 
191a1(rgyud): / dag bri// lus la ste'u can dan dang // sems kyis mnyam par rgyud pa na// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes brjod// dngos po bdag med bsres pa ste// gang zhig dbang ni bsrur bar 'gyur// gang gis rnam
191a2(rgyud): 'byor ma yi ni// zhu ba rnams la za ba dag/ de yi sa stengs mtha' dag tu// rga dang na ba rnam par 'joms// rnal 'byor ma bzhi kha sbyor las// dam tshig chen po'i bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba'i brtog pa ste/ gsum pa'o// 
191a3(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sbyob dang po'i sgrub thabs ste// 'byor pa rnam bzhir shes par bya// dram tshig bzhi ni sgrub pa ste// dang po khu ba rnams shes bya// gnyis pa de bzhin khrog nyid do// rdo rje chu dang dri chen ni// dam
191a4(rgyud): tshig bzhi ni bsten pa ste// 'dod tshogs khu bar rnam par bshad// phrag dog khrag ni nyid dag go// gti mug rnam snang rgyal po ste// zhe sdang du chur gyur pa yin// dam tshig bzhi yi rnal 'byor gyis// dam tshig bzhi la spyod
191a5(rgyud): pa pos// dang po sbyor ba 'grub 'gyur zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur// bris skur gzhug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// dam tshig de nyid bsgrub bya ste// stong pa'i rdo rje brjod bya ste// ye shes sems dpa' na mo pa
191a6(rgyud): bsam// mdor bsdus pas ni bsngags bzlas bya// hUM dag sngags ni brjod par bya// dngos po skem pasde sgom par bya// spro dang sdud par byed pa po// bdud bzhi rnam par gzhan las rgyal ba yi// go cha mtshon cha 'di yis
191a7(rgyud): bcing // rab phur blo gar sogs kyis// phyogs bzhi lis sogs bcing bar bya// khams bzhi por ni yang dag byung // bdud zin pa ni nom par brjod// bad kan sha dang gang dag dang // rus pa'i khams su yang dag byu / 
191a8(rgyud): spyan dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang // gos dkar la sogs bzhi pa'o// khams bzhi dag ni rnam gnas pa// sbyor ba dang por brjod pa'o// rtsom chen zhes su rnam bshad pa// rlung dang me ni mchog yin na te// de la dbus su
191b1(rgyud): yang dag gnas// dzA ta ra yi rang bzhin ming // dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa// kha dog med par rab tu grags// dbyangs dang yi ge'i tshul dag tu dbyangs med yi ge med pa'o// tshangs min khyab 'jug drag po mni// nam
191b2(rgyud): mkha' med cing 'dod pa min// zla ba med cing skar mo min// nyi ma med cing rlung yang min// gnod sbyin srin po lha min mi// 'byung po yi dgas nyid min ci/ snod dang bcud ni sna tshogs dang // khams gsum po ni mra lus pa/ 
191b3(rgyud): bdag nyid gcig po de yis khyab// bems po nyid la yid kyis rtogs// de nyid 'jig rten pa ru 'gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// zla ba gzas zin skar ma lha// de nyid thams cad bde ba che// rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams
191b4(rgyud): snang mdzad// pad ma nyi ma khrag 'thung rta// rdo rje rnal 'byor pho nya mo// de nyid rdo rje bde chen po// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// de bzhin pad ma pad ma 'dzin// nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid// rigs 'di rnams su gyur pa'o// de nyid dkyil 'khor
191b5(rgyud): bri ba nyid// rdul tshon kha dog lnga pa'o// de nyid sngags su rab tu bya// hU~M hU~M phaT Ta kyi yi ge nyid// dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dgas dang // lha dang mi dang lha min na dang // dmigs pa'i sems su gyur pa yis// 'khor ba 'di ru
191b6(rgyud): 'khyam par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po mdor bsdus pa// rdo rje ci ni la gsungs pa'o// lha mo chen mo slar yang dri// 'gro dang 'ong ba ji ltar gyur// gnas nas 'di'i sems// dag ni// skye ba ji ltar brjod pa yin// khu ba
191b7(rgyud): ji ltar gzugs su 'gyur// skye bo'i skye ba ji ltar yin// de yi gzugs kyi skye ba la// khrag la ji ltar byung ba lags// 'byung ba rnams kyi byung ba ci// de yi skye ba ji ltar lags// sa drong chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang
191b8(rgyud): nam mkha' nyid dang ni// skye gnas kun la chags pa ni// dngos po rnams la ji ltar khyab// zhi ba'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin// thams cad du ni ji ltar skye// 'di rnams yang dag bshad par ni// lha mo bden par bdag la gsung
192a1(rgyud): / ji ltar de bzhin re rje nyon// sems can kun lngas skyed pa dag/ 'khor bar yang dag bsrubs pa las// deng 'di'i thabs kyis 'dir 'gyur ro// thog ma tha ma med dus su// sems can thams cad yang dag
192a2(rgyud): byung // rgya mtsho 'khrug sogs gting ring bar// blo gros chen po bsrubs pa yis// de las de dag skye bar 'gyur// sa me'i khams dang yang dag ldan// me yis mnyam par nges par bsrubs// chu drang rlung gi bye brag
192a3(rgyud): go// yid kyis de ru rab zhen pa// mngal ni bzungs zhing blangs pa ste// de ni 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur// rga dang mya ngan ldan pa ste// de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni// so sor skye bar smra ba ste// de bzhin ches dag zab
192a4(rgyud): mo nyid// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas brjod// de nyid 'di rnams mnyam bshad pa// sum bcu pas kyang rnyed par dka'// rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i khwa sbyor las// de kho na nyid kyi man ngag/ sbyor ba bzhi'i cha zhes bya
192a5(rgyud): ba ste// rtag pa bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang drag bshad bya ba// sbyin bsreg las na rab tu sgrub// sbyin bsreg rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// phyi dang nang du gnas yang dag gnas// phyi ru ji ltar gsungs pa lag
192a6(rgyud): nang du yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// nyon cig rdo rje nang gi ni// ji bzhin sbyin bsreg rab sgrub bya// me chen po dag rab tu sbyar// rnam rtog med pa'i bsreg lugs bya// bza' dang btung ba gang yang rung // de ru thams cad sbyin bsren
192a7(rgyud): bye// bsreg rdzas rang bzhin gsungs pa dag/ gzugs phung la sogs lnga po dag/ rnam rtog med pa'i sbyin bsreg bya// de dag thams cad sems las byung // khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha// dri chen dri chu lnga po dag// rnam
192a8(rgyud): tog med pas bda' bar bya// blo ldan rang bzhin med pas so// gti mug nga rgyal de bzhin chagras// zhe sdang de bzhin 'did chags nyid// phrag dog ser sna pri ma dag/ dam tshig de nyid dri ma med// ji ster nyim 'byo
192b1(rgyud): bzhin// de ltar dri ma med par 'gyur// ji ltar ston gyi blo gsal ba// de ltar 'di 'i dbus gsolnga yin// 'dod chags chen por gyur pa ste// rdo rje sdang byed sgron ma bzhin// de nyid thar par gsungs pa ste// bla med go 'phang
192b2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// sbyin sreg 'di la rab gnas na// lha rnams dga' bas tshim pa yin// sbyin bsreg las ni rab gsungs nas// rab gnas dag ni brjod par bya// sngon gyi rnal 'byor la gnas nas// de nas rab gnas
192b3(rgyud): bya ba ste// rab gnas sku sogs thang ka dang // rnal 'byor can gyis gle gras bam ste// dpal ldan g.yon gyis dril bu 'dzin// g.yas kyis rdo rje yongs su bzung // don kun rnal 'byor kun gyis ni// mdzes par sku gzugs mchod
192b4(rgyud): pir bya// shi dang chang le rab dag rab tu bkang // ro yi steng du yang dag gnas// par pa ti ba le ka swa ma ka li// mchod pa kun gyis dwages par bya// mi tig+sa spos drang mAr me dang // dri nyid dang ni rnam pa bzhi// glu dpyod sa de bzhin grir
192b5(rgyud): dag dong u sgrub pos pa ta ha sogs te// sku la sogs pa 'di rnams la// rab gnas chen po bya ba yin// pa a mu si pa i saM ha dz+ha i// ma i hiM sA d+hum+b+ha pa hi dz+nyA i// tsi ta hI tsid ta ha tsid ta ta d+harmA tsid d+ha dz+nyA au// sa li e la sa d+hA
192b6(rgyud): sarta tha kA rI b+hU si// / glu ldidi dag ni blangs pa yis// dbang rnams kun kyang bla ma ste// chos rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bzhi// mchod pa kun gyi sprin chen po// spro zhing bsdu bar brjed
192b7(rgyud): du'o// rwa yis re ma gnas bshad pa ni// rgyud rnams kun las rnyed pa de Sha// rnal 'byor ma pa ni gi basbyor lngas// sbyin pasreg dang rab gnas kyi brtag pa ste/ sde pa'o// // de nas mdor bsdus rab ba shid pa/ 
192b8(rgyud): de nyid gtan la dbab pa'i mchog/ rtag tu sems ni rtog med pa// rnam rtog bcas pas ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar mi dag rab 'bar ba// rtag tu shing rnams chog par brjod// de la tshig pra shing rnams te// 'di yis tshig par
193a1(rgyud): / mthong ba yin// de yis tshig pa ji bzhin du// blo ldan nus rtog med pa yis// phung po'i lnga yi shing rnams te// de bzhin gzugs kyi 'ang po ny-id// rus pa rkang dang bad kan drang // khrig dang zla ba dri chen dang // mi
193a2(rgyud): gnyis de bzhin na ba dag/ de bzhin du ni sna nyid dang // sa dang chu dang de bzhin me rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang // 'byung ba lnga po thams cad lnga// de nyid nyi shu rtsa ltar drag/ de yi gnas ni bye brag tu// nga yis bye brag brjod pa ste/ 
193a3(rgyud): lte bar gnas pa'i 'khor lo'u tshes// mdab ma bcu drug yang dag ldan no/ shes rab gnas su rab tu gsungs// zla ba'i gzugs bzhin gsal ba ste// de yi dbus su gnas pa dag/ me lta bur ni 'bar ba yin// 
193a4(rgyud): me chen de ni 'bar ba ste// / de yi rtse mor mthong ba ni// de yAs de ni gzugs mthong yin// dngos po thams cad gzugs 'dzin pa// blo yis gnas su gsungs shing brjod// hUM yig nga ro tshul 'dzin po// rdo rje can ni
193a5(rgyud): rtag tu 'byung // rdo rje 'dzin chen gzugs bzhin no// rlung gi nus pa ma yin no// de yi dbus su rab tu grags// gang zhig ri bong can gzugs gsungs// shes rab de nyid mder bsdus pa'o// ji ltar nyi mor rab tu brjod// 
193a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'byung // sde tshan brgyad kyi tha ma gzung // thig le ma dang ni zhabs kyu bcas// de nyid nyi ma zhes su gsungs// 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba can// de yi dbus su yang dag byung // rdo rje can gro nas/ 
193a7(rgyud): mnyam par 'gyur// ji ltar gnyid kyis bzung ba ni// cung zad kyang ni mthong ba med// gzugs la sogs pa'i gzung ba dag/ langs na rtag tu mthong ba yin// de ru thabs ni bsgoms pa yis// de yi rang bzhin
193a8(rgyud): mchog tu grags// sems can thogs med bde chen brjod// de ru der gnas dngos po yis// shes rab pha rol phyin pa gsal// de phyir de nyid dngos po yis// blo ldan sems kyis de nyid gsum// sems
193b1(rgyud): de rnam par dag pa ste// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams par 'gyur// sngags pa gar 'dod 'gro ba yin// skad cig gis ni gnas par 'gro// 'dod can rnams ni chags par 'gyur// drag po rnams la drag po mtshon// 
193b2(rgyud): zhi ba rnams la zhi ba ste// 'di ni mdun rgyal rgyal ba rim// ji ltar 'di ru pad ma bzhin// 'dod chags skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur// sna tshogs bag chags skyon mi chags// khams gsum po ni de bzhin dag/ stong pa ma
193b3(rgyud): yin mi stong min// dbu ma nye bar thob pa'o// shes rab 'phra rol phyin rnal 'byor// thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid do// 'di ni byang chub sems rdo rje// sems dang sems 'byung rung bzhin gyis// dngos po med par sgom
193b4(rgyud): por dongos// de la sgom par brjod pa min// phreng ba med cing bya ba med// bsrung ba med par brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni// dbu ma'i mchog gi go 'phang ngo // bla na med pa'i ye shes ni// bla med pa'i rig
193b5(rgyud): zhes ni rig pa med// 'dis ni 'khor ba rnam par grol// phyir mi ldog pa'i go 'phang mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su gsungs// de yi rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub// skye ba 'di la grub pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam
193b6(rgyud): 'gyur// khrag dang khu ba za ba ste// dri chen dri mu sha dang lnga// de yis che ni rgyas par 'gro// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur// ba tu bi ha hUM tra ta ga ti bahU bi ha tu bA ra ri NA~M swa ba hu bi ha rA ga bA dze tra/ ba hu bi hi pra t+ya ga ti tsa/ bi/ 
193b7(rgyud): dzAdza ba spyad tu she Sha na sha Sha sad ta pa ni la bi ti kris sma ru sa bi shu gahag ho// a hos ca ba si dzum du ma ho su ka he u pa ru a la laM la li hi// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa ste// rtag pa kun gyi blan med// de yi tshen rgyas pan+d+ha
193b8(rgyud): 'gro// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma bzhi kha sbyor las// de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa'i brtag pa ste// drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bye ba// de nyid rnal 'byor thams cad ni// 
194a1(rgyud): / sbyin drang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson// bsam gtan bzod pa shes rab dang // stobs dang de bzhin thabs dang ni// smon lam ye shes yang dag 'byung // pha rol phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa// 
194a2(rgyud): sbyin pa rnam po bzhi ru gsungs// tshul khrims gsum gyi ngo bo nyid// bsam gtan rnam bzhiru gsungs pa ste// brtson 'grus rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// bzod pa rnam pa bcur shes bya// shes rab rnam pa drug du 'gyur// stobs
194a3(rgyud): ni rnam bcur rab tu gsungs// thabs ni rnam pa lngar 'gyur te// smon lam gnyis su shes bya ste// ye shes rnam lngar gnas pa'o// chos dang mi 'jigs rdzas dang byams// sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi po ni// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin
194a4(rgyud): pa'o// rab 'dzin med cing khyengs pa bral// bden pa gnyis med gnas pa ni// tshul khrims rnam gsum brjod pa ni// tshul khrims phra rol phyin par gsungaso// gang gi rnal 'byor ma gnyis dang // phyi yi rnam pa gnyis
194a5(rgyud): su gsungs// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa ni// dri chen dri chu de bzhin sha// khrag dang khu bar yang dag 'byung // 'di rnams brtson 'grus lnga po na// dam tshig sgra yi brjod pa'o// tshig rtsub brdzun dang ngag 'khyal dang // chags
194a6(rgyud): dang zhe sdang phra dog dang // nga rgyal khro dang de bzhin dbyen// bde bcu rnam par bshad pa ni// rdo rje can ni bzod bcas 'gyur// yang dge lta ba yang dag rtog/ yang dag ngag dang yang dag las// yang dag 'tshe dang yang dag rtsol// 
194a7(rgyud): bdag gis mdo ru bsdus nas ni// shes rab rnam pa drug tu brjod// dag pa'i stobs dang dran pa'i stobs// ting 'dzin stobs dang shes rab stobs// las kyi stobs dang ngag gi stobs// ye shes stobs dang smon la stobs// 
194a8(rgyud): brtson 'grus byin skabs rnams te// di rnams sgo'i mi ni cu 'i/ ma skyes pa'i dge bskyed// skyes pa'i mi dge yang dag sdong // mi dges skyes ni kyi de// dege ba skyes pa 'phel bani// lnga pa thams cad chos rnams kyi// 
194b1(rgyud): dge ba sa chos rnams gsungs pa'o// rdzogs par bskyed par nyid dag ste// smon lam rnam pa gnyis su gnas// me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog/ bya grub chos dbyings rnam par dag/ ye shes rnam pa lta ru 'gyur// 'di rnams bcu
194b2(rgyud): bran po dag ni// pha rol phyin pa mdor bsdus pa// bdag gis de nyid brjod pa ste/ rdon can nyon cig gtan la dpag// bcu gnyis mtha' dang dgu yi mtha'// mgo nas rkang pa'i 'jil bar du// de yi dbus su nges 'byung ba// 
194b3(rgyud): lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas// rtag tu shar bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ru rdo rje can gyis mthong // lus ngag sems kyi dbus dag tu// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar ba'o// steng gi sgo ru rtag gnas pa'o// nyi ma'i 'od zer phreng ba can
194b4(rgyud): cung zad lus la mthong ba med// 'gal mi 'khor lo'i gzugs can te// de nyid rnal 'byor lam gyis ni// rtag pa'i dus su rnam par gnas// de la dbyar gyi dus med cing // dpyid med ston yang yod ma yin// dgun med sos
194b5(rgyud): kyang med pa ru// rnal 'byor pas na rtag tu bsgom// sngags pa'i seng ge bzhin du spyod// sngags dang rgyud la ji ltar gnas// nyi dadzi sha ni bza' bar bya// chang gi btung ba mchog yin no// bcud kyis len gyi cho ga yi swA// sngags brjod/ 
194b6(rgyud): pa ni mi bya'o// mtshon bya'i gnas la dus rtog par// mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid mtshan par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la// 'khor lha dang / mi dang mi dang lha ma yin rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid
194b7(rgyud): tshangs to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lang mngon par bstod do// rnal 'byor mo bzhi'i kha sbyor zhes bya ba// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ rdzogs spyod// dpal oM d+hi ya na las nges byung ba'i rnal 'byor
194b8(rgyud): ma'i rgyud chen po snying phrag bcu gnyis pa las// 'jig rten dang 'jig tan las 'das pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rjes pa dipon dpal// yin du b+hu ti 'i nabs kyis bkol cing // gsal bar mdzad pa'o// // bod kyi sa rgyan/ 
195a1(rgyud): / la chings yon tan 'bar gnyis kyis bsgyur te// slad kyis pra wi ta gnyis pa la yang gtugs te// gtan la phab pa// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rnal 'byo/ 
195a2(rgyud): gshad bya ba// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i// phyi mu lus kyang phyi ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sdom// phag mo yi ni rtse mo yang // rnal 'byor rnams kyi grub ster ma'o// rnal 'byor ma lus rnaMs kyis yang // snying po
195a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma lus btus pa'o// sgrub pa pa la phan po'i phyir// bla mi'i rgyud pa'i gsal ba'o// pha rol rnam rtog med pa dang // kun du dam tshig chos nyid dang / dpyid dang dogs pa med pa dang / kun du ser sna rnam spangs te/ 
195a4(rgyud): tshes grangs dang ni rgyu skar med// bsnyen gnas cho ga mi byed de// dag dang ma dag pa yang med// chu yi tsang sbra bya ba med// dus dang tshod las rnam par grol// gtsang spro'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// rang rgyud sngags dang rnal 'byor/ 
195a5(rgyud): shes// sems can kun gyi don rtson pas// ri sul tshang tshong phug gtum mo// chu bo'i 'gram dang 'das pa dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang // shing gcig pa dang khang stong dang // ma mo'i khyim dang dur khrod dang // skyod
195a6(rgyud): mos tshal dang mchog sna tshogs// lha khang dang ni mchod rten gnas// khyim 'am yang na bzhi mod ru// 'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba// bsgrub pa pA yis sgrub par bya// gnas ni bstan par byas pa 'am// gang du yid ni dga' bar
195a7(rgyud): bsdus// sdom pa sna tshogs par 'dod pa'i// der ni dngos grub yang dag 'grub// 'dul ba'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgom pa'i bya ba mang po yi// ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi yis// sa bzhi byug par bya ba dang // bzod pa'i pha
195a8(rgyud): rol phyin nan tan// me tog gcal du dgram par bya// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gdan dga' ba// stong pa shin tu mnyam par gzhag/ bsam gtan pha rol phyin dmigs te// sems ni rtse gcig pa yis su// tshangs pa'i
195b1(rgyud): gnas na bzhi po dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhi dang // sems can kun la bde 'byung ba'i// dge 'acu ni dmigs par bya'o// chos rnams stong pa nyid du ni// phyi nang bdag nyid mthong bya ste// de nas sems tsam du gnas
195b2(rgyud): te// byang chub kyi ni tshigs mchog go// snying gi kha dbus pad dbus gnas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom par bya// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin zhi// mchog gi de nyid dor mthong ste// 'od zer sna tshogs rang bzhin bzang // kun tu
195b3(rgyud): rnam par spros pa las// sngar 'grub rnams ni yang dag bskul// nam mkha'i khams ni nyams dga' bar// dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong ba ste// byin gyis brlab pa dag kyang byed// til gyi glang bu bzhin mthong ste/ 
195b4(rgyud): khro ba lha mo thams cad dang // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // bla ma byang chub sems dpa' dag/ mchod dang mchod pa byed pa'i bdag/ lha mo rnam pa'i sku mthong ste// sangs rgyas chos kyi sprul pa spros// khro ba'i
195b5(rgyud): rgyal po rnal 'byor ma// 'gro ba rigs drug sems can yang // de ni sangs rgyas nyid du gzhag/ nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba'i dbus// de nyid du ni bzhugs mthong ste// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// thams cad du/ 
195b6(rgyud): ni skyabs su mchi// sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams// sangs rgyas go 'phang la gzhag bya// bsgrub pos de la gsol ba gdag/ rtag skyabs su gsol bar bya// phung po lnga la nga rgyu la ni// sems bzang po ni bskyed/ 
195b7(rgyud): par bya// gzugs dang tshor ba'adu shes dang // 'du byed rnam par shes nyid dang // b+h+rUM ma~M hri ha~M ts+tshi nas pa// rnam par sdang mdzad de je nyi ma dang // de bzhin pad ma gar gyi pang // de rje rgyal po zhes grags dang // de bzhin rdo rje mi
195b8(rgyud): dpa'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid /  la gra dzi ru kaM/ mig dang ni bai sna dag dang / ngag dang de bzhin lus dang yidi// oM ts+tshaSh+Ta ma kha \u0f7f// gti mug zhi sdang phrag dog dang // 'dod chags ser sna kyang
196a1(rgyud): nyid do// skye mched kun la rdo rjed dbang // sa dang chud nga de bzhin mo// rlung dang nam mkha' nyid kyang ngo // lam pi te/ kha zhes pa// ltung bar byed dang gsod byed du / 'gugs par byed dadrugar byed nyid// pad ma'i dra
196a2(rgyud): ba'i lha mo na// nam mkha' dang mnyam lta bu'o// de ltar phung po dang khams dang // skye mched rnams la rnal 'byor pas tha mal pa'i rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i chos thams cad ring bzhin gyis dag pa'o// zhes pa
196a3(rgyud): rgyal bya'o// de 'og gsum la skyabs gsol te// sngags kyi lus su gyur par bya'o// bdag nyid he ru kar gyur to// sems can kun gyi don yang byed// he ru ka yi gnas thob par// bla na med pa'i gro 'phang la// sems can
196a4(rgyud): / thams cad gzhag bya ba// oM sar+b+ba pA shud d+ho sar+b+ba/ d+harma sa b+hA wa shud d+ho ho// zhes lan gsum brjod do// nyi ma'i 'od zer phreng lta bu'o// dngos po kun rtsi phyogs btsu ru// 'od zer de las ra ba dang // de bzhin du ni dra byar lta// rdo rje sa
196a5(rgyud): bzhir byin gyis brlab// bla re mda' yi dri ba dag/ rdo rje me 'bar dra ba ni// de yi phyi rol ring du bsam// oM badz+ra me d+hI ni badz+ri pA ba wan d+ha hUM// oM badz+ra pra ka ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra pany+tsa hUM yaM hUM/ oM badz+ra bid+h+wa na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ra dz+wa la/ 
196a6(rgyud): traM sa tr-i// oM badz+ra dza la a na la rka hU~M hU~M hU~M// 'dzub mo the bo dang sbyar te// se gol togs pa phyogs bcur yang // oM sum b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM hUM phaT// shwar du'o// oM gr-i hUM g+hi hA hUM hUM phaT// byang du'o// oM gI hA pa ya g+ha hA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ 
196a7(rgyud): nu du'o// oM a na ya he b+ha ga wa ni bodz+rA rA dza hUM hUM phaT// lho ru sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bgegs thams cad kyi mgo la phur bu btab ste g.yas skor dang g.yon skor ma yin pas so// oM g+hu g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sar+b+ba duSh+Ti ba~Mg+ha nen
196a8(rgyud): hU~M phaT// ki lA ya ki lA ya sar+b+ba pa paM hUM hUM badz+ra kai lA ya badz+ra d+ha ra adz+nyA pa ya ti// sar+b+ba duSh+Ta big nan ka ya waM ga tsit+ta badz+ra ki la ya hUM hUM phaT// brdung bar bya ste rdo rje'i phur pA la stod khro bo'i lta bas bltas na// go rims dang / 
196b1(rgyud): gro rims ma yin pas rdo rje sgrub pa pos brdung ste// oM badz+ra mu dkar badz+ra ki la ya a ko T+Ta ya hUM hUM phaT// bdud med bdud kyi lus kyang med// rang gi sems kyi bcings pa bzhin// rang gis rung gi sems 'dul na// gang las bdud
196b2(rgyud): ni gnas par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes rdo rje yas mnyam par bzhag dang dran par bya// oM shun+ya ti dz+re na badz+ra swa b+hA thA a da ma ko haM// oM a ni ta mI dzun badz+ra swa bA wa ad ma ko haM/ oM pra ni ta na badz+re swap+na g+na adA ki ha~M// mig yor tsam gyi
196b3(rgyud): ye shes ni// sems tsam rnam par brtag par bya// nam mkha' lta bu'i chos 'od dag/ chos can med cing tshe sna nyid med// nam mkha' lta bu gos pa med// dngos po med cing rtog pa med// rdo rje'i bdag nyid phan par bya// smon la
196b4(rgyud): dbang gis dmigs bya ste// ji sridas yi 'og dmigs la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// yaM gi yi ge lngas byung ba// gzhu 'dra kha dog 'od dang ldan// rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan bsam bya ste// du ba'i phreng pos 'khrug
196b5(rgyud): pa'o// de yi steng du raM las ni// me yi dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// gru gsum pa laM kha dog dmar// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrug cing 'bar// nyi ma bye ba lta bur gzhag/ rdo rjes mtshan pa yong bsam bya// de yi steng du
196b6(rgyud): chu nyid kyang // baM las byung ba mchog tu 'bar// zlum zhing 'od zer phreng bar ldan/ kha ba lta bur nyid kyang ngo // de yi steng du bsam bya ba/ las byung ba yi ser por ldan/ gro bzhi pa la rdo rjes
196b7(rgyud): mtshan// 'od zer ser po'i 'od 'khrungs pa'o// / de stengs rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pa/ ri yi rgyal po ri rab mchog/ zur bzhi rin chen bzhi rang bzhin/ 
196b8(rgyud): rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ sum las byung ba bzang po'o// 'od zer bzang po mchog gi mchog/ de yi steng du/ bsgom bya ba/ dngos pa
197a1(rgyud): b+h+rUM las byung ba brtag pa ste// de yongs gyur las 'khor lo mchog/ gzhal yas khang pa rnam par bsam// grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan// dar dang me
197a2(rgyud): tog chun pos brgyan// grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang // sgra skad kyi ni 'tshams rnams su// rdo rje rin po che yis spras// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// pad+ma ma mdab ma brgyad pa bri// sna tshogs kha dog mchog gi mchog/ lte ba
197a3(rgyud): dang ni gi sar bcas// pad ma dag pa nyid kyi gdan// de yi dbus su zla ba'i cha// gsal ba'i rang bzhin dri ma med// de steng a li ka li ni// dbus su baM gyis brgyan pa'o// de yi dbus bzhengs lha mo ni// phag mo rdo rje rnal
197a4(rgyud): 'byor ma hA zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis te// spyan gsum shin du chags pa'o// gdan la dkyil dkrungs phyed bzhugs te// shin du mdzes par gar byed pa'o// phyogs kyi go chas skra grol ba// phyed ni bud med dbang phyug rgyal
197a5(rgyud): dkar dang dmar ba 'di 'dra'i gzugs// thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan mdzes// rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams// pad ma bskor zhing bskor bar ldan// dpral bar phyag rgya 'bar ba dang // mi yi lpags pa'i bla gos dang // thod pa kha
197a6(rgyud): T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa gzhan// cang te'u gri gug mgo bo yang // zhal bzhi po yi tshangs pa yi// sngo dang ser dang ljang khu'i zhal// bzang po'i zhal gyis nyer mdzes pa'i// zhal ni mche ba gtsigs pa sto/ 
197a7(rgyud): zla ba phyed pa steng du brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu brgyan mtshan// dngos grub thams cad rab 'byin te// lha mo phyag rgya drug gis mtshan// dum bus brgyan pa'i ska rags ni// ska rags sil sil sgra bsgrogs pa'i// na
197a8(rgyud): gdub kyis ni nye bar mdzes// dbu rgyan mdzes par byed pa dang // dpral der rdo rjes phreng ba dang // phyag rgya rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// shin du gzugs bzang yid du 'ong // shar gyi mdab mar mkha' 'gro ma// seng gdong ma ste
197b1(rgyud): 'jigs par byed// byang gi phyogs su phag gdong ma// lha mo la ma 'jigs byed ma// nub tu lha mo glang po'i gdod// dum skyes ma ni drag mo'o// lho ru lha mo gzugs can ma// rtswa yi gdong ma lhag pa'i gzugs// spyan gsum sna
197b2(rgyud): tshogs gzugs can ma'o// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // mgo bo gri gug 'dzin pa can// gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste// garo byed pa yis shin du mdzes// yid dgas gdan la phyed dkyil gyis// drag cing gtum pa'i 'jigs pa
197b3(rgyud): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan yang // lha mo'i zhabs kyi 'og tu man ne// me la sogs pa'i 'tshams bzhi ru// byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod// bum pa'i steng du rnam bkod pa// dung dang kun d+ha 'dra ba yi// shar byang la sogs
197b4(rgyud): / phyogs cha ru// rtsibs drug pa yi 'khor lo bri// 'khor lo'i dbus su bri bar bya// rigs kyi lha mo bzhi po ni// lha me mA ma ki dang spyan// sgrol ma gos dkar mo dag ste// sngo dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // lha mo rdo rje'i rigs dbang phyug/ 
197b5(rgyud): dkar dang sde dang dmar ba yi// lha mo rtag pa'i rigs can no// ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba yi// lha mo las kyi rigs rang bzhin// dmar dang ser dang ljang khu yi// lha mo pad ma'i rigs las byung // spyan gsum skra ni grol ba tsam
197b6(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa yi// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // rang gi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje 'khor lo rgya gram dang // pad ma dmar po mchog/ 
197b7(rgyud): gi mchog/ de bzhin thams cad dril bu 'dzin// pad+ma ma bskor bar byed pa'o// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs kyis mnan// gar dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal// sna tshogs pad mar zla dbus bzhugs// rigs kyi dngos grub rab
197b8(rgyud): 'byin byed// mgo dang cang te'u phyag na bsnams// rdo rje gri gug gis kyang mdzes// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan cing // mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o// 'tshams kyi cha ni thams cad du// gnas la sogs pa'i rim pa bkod
199a1(rgyud): nang gi 'khor lo rtsibs drug la'o// lha mo ji ltar rjes 'thun bkod// 'khor lo rtsibris drug dang po la// pu li ra ma la yar rab tu gtum mo'o// rtsibs gnyis la dza lan da rar gtum pa'i mig can no// 
199a2(rgyud): gsum pa ur+yan du 'od ldan ma'o// bzhi pa ar+Ya tar sna chen ma'o// lA pa go ta wa rir brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// drag pa ru mi sha rir mi'u thu ma'o// gnyis pa byang gi 'khor lo rtsibs drag dang po da wi ko Ta ra la ka'i
199a3(rgyud): dbang phyug ma'o// gnyis pa ma la yar shing grib ma'o// gsum pa ka ma ru bar sa bsrung ma'o// bzhi pa o Tar 'dzegs byed chen mo'o// lnga pa tri sha ku ner rlung gi shugs can ma'o// drag pa ko sa lar chang 'thung ma'o// 
199a4(rgyud): gsum pa nub kyi 'khor lo rtsibs drug gi shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ka ling kar ljang lha mo'o// gnyis pa lam pa kar shin du bzang mo'o// gsum pa kan+du ri rte rna ma'o// bzhi pa kha can du bya gdong ma'o// lnga pa pre ta pu rar
199a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// drug pA gri ha de bar du ma skyes ma'o// bzhi pa lce'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs drug gri shar du sau ruSh+Ta ra chang 'tshong ma'o// gnyis pa gser gyi gling du 'khor lo'i ga che'o// gsum pa na ga rar shin du
199a6(rgyud): dpa' ma'o// bzhi pa sin dur stobs chen ma'o// lji pa mo rir 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// drug pa ku lu tar brtson 'grus chen me'o// dang po kar ljang thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga ding 'khor lo dang // cang te'u dang / gri gug go
199a7(rgyud): gnyis pa byang du ljang se ra/ rdo rje dang thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u dring / gri gug go// gsum pa nub du dmar ser/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang / pad ma dang / tsang te'u dang / gri gug go// bzhi pa lho'i lha mimo dmor sa
199a8(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ cung te'u dang / kri gug dang thod pa dang // kha T+wA~M grwa 'dzin pa'o// lha mo thams cad phyed bud med// byed dbang phyug spyan gsum pa// phyag bzhi ga/ gcer bu skra grol ba/ byed dkyil gyi gar gyis
199b1(rgyud): bzhugs pa/ yid dgas kyi gdan gyi steng na thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ rkang gdub dang / skye rags dang / dpung rgyan dang / sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// de nas 'khor lo'i phyi skor bskor te rdo rje'i
199b2(rgyud): phreng ba shar du'o// 'khor lo'i phreng ba byang du'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba nub du'o// pad ma'i phreng ba lho ru'o// dbus su rdo rje ra bas mdzes// mtshams kyi cha rnams thams cad du// sna tshogs rdo rje yang dag hriH/ blo ldan da yi
199b3(rgyud): phyi bskor baH/ yid dgas phreng ba sna tshogs ldan// phyi rol dkyil 'khor sgo rnams dang // mtshams kyi tshan bzhi rnams su// mkha' 'gro drag po'i gzugs can ma'o// de la mnyam par gzhag pas dgod// kha gdong ma
199b4(rgyud): ni shar du dgod// kha dog sngon po yid 'phrog ma'o// 'ug gdong ma ni byang gi sgor// dmar zhing ljang la mdzes pa'o// khyi gdong ma ni nub kyi sgor// drag cing ser mo du ba 'dra// lho yi ngos su phag gdod ma// ldang zhing sngo ba'i
199b5(rgyud): gzugs can ma'o// spyan gsum drag mo 'jigs pa'o// phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ 'bri tshugs lta zhing bong thung ma'o// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis zhugs// sna tshogs pad ma nyid bus gnas// phyag rgya
199b6(rgyud): lnga yis rnam par brgyan// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan cing // dbu skra grol zhing rnam par brtags// gshin rje brtan ma ma he gdong // me yi phyogs su bzhugs pa'o// gshin rje'i pho nya ma ni bung ba'i gdong // bden bral
199b7(rgyud): gyi ni phyogs su bzhugs// gshin rje mche ba rnga mo'i gdong // rlung du bsten cing drag por ldan// gshin rje 'joms ma rta yi gdong// dbang ldan rten cing rnam par 'khor// thod pa'i blang ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogasu gzugs
199b8(rgyud): can yid 'phrog ma// gcer bu skra ni grol ba dang // phyed dkyil gyi ni gar dang ldan// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// spyan gsum zhel ni g.yo ba ste// sna tshogs pad ma'i nyi dbus gnas// 'dod pa drag pos
200a1(rgyud): \u0f7f/ brtags pasdu so// 'khor gyi lA mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams// thams cad yid dgas steng du bzhugs// thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing // gli gug mgo bo 'dzin par byed// lag pa g.yas na rje chung ni// brdung bar byed/ 
200a2(rgyud): cing shin du 'jigs// phyi rol skor ba'i rnam pa ni// gzhan yang rnam pa mang por 'gyur// glu dang gar gyi yo byad dang // sna tshogs mchod pa'i mchog rnams dang // spos dang me tog mar ma sogs// dri dang phreng ba
200a3(rgyud): byug pa dang / lha yi nam bza' gzhal yas khang // lha yi rol mo mchog rnams kyis// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yis// phyi yi rnal 'byor mas mchod byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i
200a4(rgyud): khams ni yongs gang bas// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog/ phag mo mngon par 'byung ba mchod// gsang ba chen mo gsang 'di ni// cung zad smra bar mi bya ste// phyi rol yid dgas phreng ba dang // dkyil 'khor
200a5(rgyud): dam pa bsgom par bya// 'di ltar dgod par bya ba ni// ji ltar 'khor lo de las dgod// sen mo dang so dag la rab tu gtum mo'o// skra dang ba spu dag la gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// lpags pa dang dri ma dag la 'od
200a6(rgyud): ldan ma'o// sha la sna chen ma'o// rtsa rgyus la brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// rus pa la mi thung ma'o// mkhal ma la ni kau lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// snying la ni shing grib ma'o// mig la srung ma'o// 'khris pa la 'jig
200a7(rgyud): byed chen mo'o// glo ba la rlung gi shugs can ma'o// rgyu ma la chang 'thung ma'o// gnye ma la ljang lha mo'o// lto ba la shin du bzang mo'o// lgang pa la rta rna ma'o// 'doms su bya gdong ma'o// bad kan la 'khor lo'i
200a8(rgyud): shugs can ma'o// rnag la dumra skyes ma'o// khrag la chang 'tshong ma'o// rdul la 'khor lo go cha ma'o// tshal la ni shin du dpa' mo'o// mchin pa la ni shin du stobs tshon ma'o// mchil ma la 'khor lo bsgyur
200b1(rgyud): ma'o// snabs la brtson 'grus chen mo'o// pu li ri ma la ya ma ste/ mgo la rab tu gtum mo'o// dza lan dA ra ste spyi gtsug tu gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// ur+yan te rna ba g.yas pa la 'od ldan ma'o// a ar pu ta
200b2(rgyud): ste lhag par snga can chen me'o// go ta wa ri ste rna ba g.yon pa la brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// ra mi shwa ris te smon pa'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o// de wi ko tri stau mig gnyis su lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// ma s+yai wa ste
200b3(rgyud): phrag pa gnyis su shing grib ma'o// ka ma ru pa sta mchan khung gnyis su sra bsrung ma'o// o tra sti nu ma gnyis la 'jigs byed chen mo'o// kri sha ku ne ste lte ba la rlung gi shugs can ma'o// ko sa la ste sna rtse
200b4(rgyud): la chang 'thung ma'o// ka ling ka ste kha la ljang lha me'o// lam pa ka ste mgrin par shin du bzang mo'o// kan tsi ka ste snying khu rta rna ma'o// hi ma la ya te 'dems su byA gding ma'o// pre ta pu ri ste gsang bar 'khor lo
200b5(rgyud): shugs can ma'o// gr-i ha de ba ste gshang lam du dum skyes ma'o// sau ra ste brla gnyis la chad 'tshong ma'o// su brna ni ba ste rje dar gnyis la 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// na gu re ste sor mo rnams la shin du dpa' mo'o/ 
200b6(rgyud): sin+d+hu ste rkang pa'i bol la stobs chen mo'o// me ri ste mthe bong gnyis la 'khor lo bsgyur ma'o// ku lu tA ste pus mo gnyis la brtson 'grus chen mo'o// sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma'o// chu'i khams ni gsod byed ma'o// 
200b7(rgyud): me'i khams ni 'gugs byed ma'o// rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o// na mi mkha'i khams ni pad+ma ma'i dra ba can no// gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do// tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o// 'du she/ 
200b8(rgyud): kyi phung po ni pad mA gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o// 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o// rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dpal he ru ka'o// mig gnyis la/ 
201a1(rgyud): gti mug rdo rje'o// rna ba gnyis la zhe sdang rdo rje'o// sna gnyis la phrag drog rdo rje'o// khwa la 'dod chags rdo rje'o// reg bya la ser sna rdo rje'o// skye mched thams cad la dbang phyug rdo rje'o// thugs la rdo rje mi
201a2(rgyud): bskyod pa'o// kha la rdo rje 'od dpag med// sku la rdo rje rnam snang mdzad// oM baM lta ba la rdo rje phag mo'o// haM yoM snying kha ra ya ma nAM'o// hri mo kha la rmongs byed ma'o// hraM hraM kha la skye mched ma'o// hUM hU~M spyi gtsug la skrag
201a3(rgyud): byed ma'o// phaT phaT yan lag thams cad la mtshon bya ste// gtum byed ma'o// de ltar rab tu dgod bya ste// ye shes 'khor lo dri mthong na// de yi rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// dngos po kun gyis ngo bo 'dis// 'dzub
201a4(rgyud): mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar// mthe bong rdo rje brtan po rab sbyar te// de ni dpral ba'i gnas su gzhag byas nas// bskor zhing bskor bas kun du bskor bar bya// rkang pa mnan cing gyen du blta// gyen du pheM gyi sgra
201a5(rgyud): bsgrogs pas// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams gnas pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gugs// dza hU~M baM haM rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang dbang du bya/ 
201a6(rgyud): / drapa' bo rnal 'byor rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su gang bar lta ste/ bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pas mngon par dbang bskur ba'i tshul gyis de dag la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o// ji ltar lham pa tsam/ 
201a7(rgyud): gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba'i// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol loH// oM saR+Wa te thA ga tA a b+hi she kA ta sa ma ya shrI yai a hU~M/ rlung dang me'i dkyil la
201a8(rgyud): gyi stang du a las byung ba'i thod pa ye shes lnga bdud rtsis gang ba che bcu drug dang hUM dang / oM gyis byin gyis brlabs te/ yi ge gsum du gyur par bsams te/ 'khor lo gsum bsgom par bya'o// oM swa b+ha/ 
201b1(rgyud): shud d+hosar+yA d+har+thasA b+hA lpA shud dz+nyAH/ chos thams cad kun du ro gcig par gnas par sems kyis bya'o//  shes bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yi// ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu btung ngo // oM a mr-i ta u ta ka tahU~M hU~M thA tha we d+hAH
201b2(rgyud): khaM hU~M phaT// ye shes zla ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo'i tshogs mchog spro bar bya// rus pa chen po'i phreng ba yis// phyis ni bzlas pa de nas bya// srog dang rtsol ba rab bsdams te// bsdams na skad cig de 'bar ro// 
201b3(rgyud): dbang skur mchod dang dam tshig ni// ro gcig byas te sgom pa'o// de snying ye shes sems dpa' dang // mchod pa ye shes bdud rtsi ros// lus dag ngag yid dam tshig ni// sems ni bsam med shin du brtan// bzlas
201b4(rgyud): dang sgom pa yang dag ldan// rtog pa thams cad spangs pa yi// dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yin// gsang sngags rgyal po mechog bzlas so// oM bai ro tsa na hUM hUM phaT swA hA// oM saR+Wa bud d+ha DA ki ni hUM hUM phaT swA hA// oM/ 
201b5(rgyud): dang ming ni yang dag ldan// hUM hUM phaT dang yang dag ldan// rab tu gtum sogs de sngags sogs// bzlas pa'i mchog la sbyar bar bya// oM saR+Wa bud d+hA DA ki ni ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA// oM badz+ra b+ha ri hi pro ti gi pro taM gi hi na ha na/ 
201b6(rgyud): pra na kaM ki ni khi khi ni d+hu na d+hu na badz+ra ha de sh+lo sha ya/ badz+ra kha T+wAM ga ka ba la Da ki ni ma hA bri sha ta maM sa sha ni/ mA nu sha Ta pra bi te sa naM di d+ya na/ shra ri ra ma la gra thaM ta d+ha ra na sum+b+hA ha na ha ne pra nan saR+YA pa shra wa nAn/ mahA na ma san+ne
201b7(rgyud): d+hi ni kro ta mur te/ Da~MSh+TaM ka ra li ni mahA mu Sh+TaM shrI he ru kA/ dwe bAM s+ya gra mu te sneh+ma// sA g+ha we swa ha sra bA ha be sha ta sa ha s+ya a na ne dza lpA tA tre/ dza shaM dza la mu kha bi kha lA lo tsa ni badz+ra sa ra re badz+ra sha ni mau li ti/ tsi lI te he he hUM hUM kha
201b8(rgyud): d+hu ru d+hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ a b+hi te mi hA yi gai ni pi tha ti sid d+hi/ DeNi De/ gr-i gr-i he he ha he b+hi mra ha sa ha sa bai re ha ha ho hi hUM hU~M ti lo kya ba ni sha naM/ sha ta ha sra g+ho Ti ta thA ga ta pa ri wa ra hUM hU~M phaT/ sing ha ru po kha gar+b+ha
202a1(rgyud): / ru be sa tre lo kyA u d+ha re sa mu d+h+ye me kha le tras hU~M bAT/ b+hi ra hUM hU~M hU~M ha ha mra bya shu mo han yo gA shwa riH/ DA ki ni saR+Wa lo ka na~M b+han d+ha ni sat+ya pra satwa ya kA ran hU~M hU~M phaT/ b+hU tAtrA sa ni ma mA hA dza/ 
202a2(rgyud): ba ra mr-i si ta yo ge shwa ra phaT/ hUM hU~M phaT swAtA// de ltar rdo rje pheg me'i mchog tu grub pa'i snying po dam pa'o// na mo bAM ga we te badz+re b+ha ra hi bi hUM hUM phaT/ oM ar+yA pA ra dzi te tre lo kya mai tai bi Sh+ya shwa ri hU~M hUM phaT/ oM saMR+Wa/ 
202a3(rgyud): b+hud+d+ha b+hA ya bi ha ma hA badz+re hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ro sha ni a tsi te p+ta shaM ka ri ne tra pra mA ni hU~M hUM phaT/ oM a sho Sha ni kro d+he ka ra le hUM hUM phaT/ oM tra se ni ma ra ni pra be d+ha ni pA ra dza ye hUM hU~M phaT/ oM bi dza ye dza~M ma~M bA ni stam b+ha na~M
202a4(rgyud): me ha ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+ha ra hi me hA yo gi ni ka me shA ri khA ge hUM hUM phaT/ sngags 'dis thams cad bya ste/ a li dang ka li rdo rje pheg me'i bdag nyid kyi dngos por bya ste/ rkang pa brgyad pa'i cho ga yis bdag nyid kyang mchod/ 
202a5(rgyud): par bya'o/ bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni// zhi ba'i btung ba btung ba'i mchog/ chos rnams mnyam nyid dam tshig mchog/ sum bcu rtsa bdun gnas kyi mchog/ de 'og rnam par dag pa sgom// lus
202a6(rgyud): rjes su dran pa mkha' 'gro ma'o// tshor ba rjes su dran pa la ma'o// chos rjes su dran pa khan Da ro ha'o// sems rjes su dran pa ru pi ni'o// 'dun pa rdzu 'phrul dran pa bskyed pa ni rab tu gtum me'o// brtson
202a7(rgyud): 'grus rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa ni gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// dpyod pa rdzu 'phrul bskyod pa ni 'od ldan ma'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa sna chen me'o// dod pa'i dbang po brtan pa'i blo can mo'o// brtson 'grus
202a8(rgyud): kyi dbang po me'u thung mo'o// dran pa'i dbang po ni laM ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o// shes rab kyi dbang po ni brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed
202b1(rgyud): ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o// dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni ljang lnga ma'o// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin du bzang mo'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byung/ 
202b2(rgyud): chub kyi yan lag rta rna ma'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub r+ya
202b3(rgyud): yan lag ni dum skyes ma'o// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshang ma'o// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// btang snyoms yang dag byang
202b4(rgyud): chub kyi yan lag ni shin du dpa' mo'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor lo bsgyur mo'o// yang dag pa'i ngag brtson 'grus chen mo'o// yang dag pa'i las kyi mthu
202b5(rgyud): khA gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma ste/ sasus na gol dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje
202b6(rgyud): ngapag mo'o// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams rjes su gnas pa dang / bsrung bar byed pa ni gshin rje'i pho nya ma'o//  dge ba'i chos rnams spong
202b7(rgyud): bar byed pa ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed par byed pa ni go shin rje 'joms ma'o// chos bdag med pa'i lom gnas su'o// 'khor ba bsdams par zhugs pa ni// shes
202b8(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// de bzhin rnal 'byor pas gnas bya// snang ba med pa'i gnas la gnas// snang ba med la yang dag rten// spyod pa med pa'i chos rnams la// chos can med cing chos nyid med// rten
203a1(rgyud): 'brel mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos// dngos med mtshan ma med pa'o// 'di ni go nyid go 'phang gnas// ye shes dag gi mig gis mthong // phra rab rdul phran dang mnyam pa// 'khor lo gnas mtho/ 
203a2(rgyud): shin du mnyes// skra rta stong phrag brgya yi ni// cha dang cha ru yongs su brtag/ he ru ka dang mnyam sbyor ma// lhan cig bA ga'i dbus gnas mthong // 'khor lo bsgyur ba rab brtson pas// khwa gdong ma yi phyi rol
203a3(rgyud): dgodaHhe ru ka sogs bdag po khyod// mkha' 'gro bzhi yis yongs su bskor// phan tshun du ni bdag po byed// rdo rje sems srogs sbyor bar ldan// phyi rol dur khrod drag po dang // kha dog sna tshogs mchog gi mche
203a4(rgyud): shing mchog sna tshogs mdzes pa dang / khyi dang lce spyang 'jigs pa dang // khwa dang 'ug pa byi dkar rgod// lce spyang de bzhin ro bsreg po// keng rus gsol shing gis phug nas// bsgreg dang 'phyang dang phyed bsregs
203a5(rgyud): dang thod pa skam po pus mo dang // mgo med lag po thod pa dkar// rnam pa sna tshogs sbrul gyis mdzes// drag po'i sbrul dang de bzhin rnga// seng ge phag dang stag dang ni// de bzhin ra dang lug dang ni// glung
203a6(rgyud): borta dang bong bu wa// rnga mo sna tshogs dam tshig mchog/ rnam pa sna tshogs chung dang ni// 'bru ching btung ba mchog rnams kyis// dpa' bo'i bzang po 'dus pa dang // sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma mchog rnams// thod pa/ 
203a7(rgyud): baT+wAM ga dag dang // gri gug cing te'u mchog rnams 'dzin// sna tshog snga rol mo bzang po dang // bza' ba longs spyad ra mchog dang // sna tshogs 'o dang mkhyud pa dang // bca' ba ldag pa mchog rnams kyis// rnam pa/ 
203a8(rgyud): de ltar dur khrod ni// gnod sbyin ro langs srin po dang // he ru ka yi nga rgyal gyis// de la gtor ma sbyin par bya// cang te'u rdo rje dril bu dang // ga ri dang rol mo byed pa dang // phyogs kyis cho gas phyag rgya ldan// hUM hUM phaT ki li ki
203b1(rgyud): li byaH/ g.yas brkyang ba yi sbyor ba yis// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// dam tshig kha ru bcug nas ni// sngags ni rjes su dran par bya// / oM a a ra li ho/ dza hUM bAM ho/ badz+ra DA ki ni sa ma ya s+t+wa~M
203b2(rgyud): tri shwa ho// de skad du gsum dang bzhi dang lngar brjod par bya'o// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor gyis kyang thod pa'i nang gi sbyin par bya ba rnams rdo rje thal mo khwa gyen du phye la/ sngags 'di brjod do// oM kha ge khA hi/ 
203b3(rgyud): khA hi saR+Wa yak+Sha rak+ShA/ saR+Wa b+hU ta pre ta bi sha tsa ud ma ta a pa sma ra Da ki ni d+ha ya/ i maM b+hi laM grih+na du sa ma ya rak+Sha na du ma ma saR+YA sid d+ha pra ya tsAn du/ ya the baM ya tha~MSh+TaM b+hun dza tha dzaM ga tha/ pi pa tha ma ti kra ma thA/ ma ma/ 
203b4(rgyud): saR+Wa ka ra sad su kha bi shud d+ha ye swA hA/ ya ka b+ha wan+d+ha hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ de ltar cho ga dang tsho gas thu ni mtshams bzhir sbyin par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gas
203b5(rgyud): ba'i gsang chen 'di gsungs so// dngos po med pa'i chos nyid ches// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis// stong pa nyid du rnam par sgom// legs so zhes ni bya ba byin// rgyud rdzogs
203b6(rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba yis// legs so legs so ye shes che// bshod pa'i rgyud kyi phyi ma las rig mo mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba rmugs su/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ma yi tAn+ta tra/ 
203b7(rgyud): rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro lnga phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo bsgyur// ye shes
203b8(rgyud): lnga dang sku gsum nyid// 'gro ba skyeb la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// kun du rtog pa 'chi ngo gcod cing // 'jig rten bya ba rab 'jug pa// de snyed rnams la rtag phyag 'tshal// de nas de las
204a1(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis// mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i// rgyud 'di yang dag shad par bya// gang zhig gis ni kun khyab pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu tshangs sgo dang // lha mo
204a2(rgyud): thams cad bskyed byed cing // tshangs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid che// de rnams kyi ni gsang chen 'di// sgyu 'phrul chen mo dbang phyug cha// sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo// 'byung ba yang dag sdud mdzad ma// gang gis
204a3(rgyud): 'di kun la khyab pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// 'di ni de yis 'di bsdus nas// 'jig rten gsum po yang smre'o// gsang ba pa rnams ma 'di ni// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid zhes rnams grags// 'jig rten
204a4(rgyud): gsum sgrub rig mu ste// 'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba// gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub pa'i dbang phyug rig pa nyid// lha dang nor bdag dri za dang // gnod sbyin lha min mi dang bcas// rig pa 'dzin dang
204a5(rgyud): gang yang rung // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// srin po dang ni sha za rnams// sgrub po rnams la 'grub par 'gyur// dbang du 'du 'gyur 'byung po rnams// chu las skyes dang thang las skyes// chos rnams rang bzhina'o// 
204a6(rgyud): gsal ba/ gdod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// thabs brjod pa yi de las ni// rang 'byung ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams sbyor ba'i ma// khams gsum po ni ma lus kun// ma lus lus pa med 'grub
204a7(rgyud): cing sgyu ma kun gyi rnam rol pa'o// sangs rgyas kun la phrogs nas su// lha mchog les skyes bu mo spyod// rnal 'byor dbang phyug byed rig po// de bzhin du ni dmig 'phrul byed// rmongs pa dang ni rengs pa dang // bsad
204a8(rgyud): dang skud pa la sogs pa// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang // nam mkha' 'gro ba nyid kyang ngo // gzhan gyi grong sogs bya ba dang // mi snang ba dang gang yang rung // zha 'gras pa dang rmugs pa nyid// de bzhin sa 'og
204b1(rgyud): 'gro ba'o// rigs 'dzin 'khor lo bsgyur nyid 'gyur// 'chi ba med cing rgas pa med// rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i rig pa ni// 'di yis na ba med nyid 'gyur// sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs kyis su// rnal 'byor pas ni rnam par
204b2(rgyud): byed/ klags pa dang ni bsam pa dang // sgom pa dang ni ting nge 'dzin// klags pas byed pa'i rig pas te// rig pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur// brtul zhugs dang ni dka' thub med// dka' spyod bsrung ba sdom med
204b3(rgyud): paHdga' dang bde pas 'grub 'gyur te// rtag tu shes rab thabs sogs kyis// lte ba'i dbus nas dpa' thub ste// ga sar gsang ba'i spyod yul la// sems dang sems med bsam pa'i gzugs// ye shes sha
204b4(rgyud): bya'i rang bzhin dag/ de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste/ zab mo'i sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// a li kA li mnyam byas te// ri me de la sbyar bar bya// ri mo'i steng du 'bar ba ni// 'og tu 'bar bar byed pa'o// khu hUM/ 
204b5(rgyud): tshul gyis 'bab pa ni// bdud rtsi thigs pa'i gzugs la sogs// gang yang dbang po'i lam nas ni// de de'i rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur// mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'bab// 
204b6(rgyud): dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub dang // ril bu chen po bsgrub pa yang // sgyu 'phrul chen po rab sbyor dang // sdom pa'i sbyor bas byed par 'gyur// mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bcas// 
204b7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i dbang pos shes bya ba// dngos grub shin du brtag pa'o// gang zhig shes pa'i dngos grub kyis// lha yi gnas su myur bar 'gyur// de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste// lha mo bden par nga smra'o// sgyu 'phrul chen
204b8(rgyud): mi khyod la ngas// 'jig rten gsum 'grub de bshad bya// rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyi ni// bzang po'i yi ge'i phreng ba rnams// gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'grub 'gyur ba'o// 'dod pa
205a1(rgyud): kun la longs spyod pa// ji ltar 'dod bzhin bstan byas na// rnal 'byor pa chen rtag rol te// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su ni// rnal 'byor bdag nyid ston par byed// de bzhin
205a2(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi dpal// dngos grub chen po ster bar 'gyur// bcud len rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rtag tu sems can don byed pa'o// khu ba dgug dang chang dang ni// gong bu chen po dgug pa nyid// sha chen po ni bkug nas kyang
205a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig rol// tsha ring brtson 'grus chen po dang // gzi brjid che zhing stobs cher 'gyur// lha yi mig dang rdzu 'phrul ldan// nyin re zla ba 'thung ba'o// de yi tshe ni 'phel 'gyur te/ bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas/ wA
205a4(rgyud): bas mi ngoms lus dang ni// cho 'phrul dag ni ston pa byed/ yid la bsas ma thag zhi rang gi gzugs ni yongs rje nyid// klags pas 'grub pa don yod pa// rig ma'i dbang phyug sgyu 'phrul che// 'jig rten gsum po ma lus na// nga yi
205a5(rgyud): rig dang mnyam pa med// rgyud rnams kun gyi lung 'di ni// mdzes ma khyod lnga bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig ma chen mo las/ dngos grub kun gyi mtshan ma snyan pa ste/ dang po'o// 
205a6(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mAM rnams kyis sbyor ba'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba yi/ gsang ba'i yi ge bzang po bshad par bya ste// gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni// rnal 'byor ma mchog
205a7(rgyud): ster 'gyur ba// dang po'i yi ge sbyor ba yis// rtag tu dbugs ni gtong bar byed// brgyad pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// u dang thig ler bcas pa yis// rnal 'byor pa yis dbugs rngub byed// dngos dang
205a8(rgyud): dngos med rnams spangs pa'o// de la brtul zhugs ma bshad de// sngags dang phreng ba bzung ba dang // sbyin bsreg gin las rnams kyang // gcig nas gcig tu ldog par 'gyur// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos/ 
205b1(rgyud): bdag nyid/ sbyor ba rnam gsum shes bya ste// ye shes rnam pa gsum gyis ni// srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// de ltar rgyun du rnal 'byor pas// rtag tu goms pa nyid kyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'/ 
205b2(rgyud): zla ba drug gos de 'grub 'gyur// dbang po'i mdog dang yang dag ldan// dang po'i yi ge bsgom bya ste// gang gis rig pa la sbyar na// de yi mod la myur du 'gugs// yi ge gnyis pa dang ldan par// bsam zhing rnam par
205b3(rgyud): sgom byas na// sa gsum po ni ma lus par// de yis thams cad dbang du 'gyur// tshangs po dang ni khyab 'jug dang // de bzhin dbang po 'dod dbang phyug/ ye shes yi ges bskul byas nas// de dag chung mar
205b4(rgyud): bcas te 'gugs// yi ge las byung cha byad ni// sku gsung thugs la legs par gnas// sbyor ba rnam gsum sgrim byas na// gang du 'gugs pa'i dam pa yin// yi ge kha dang yang dag ljon// sku mdog dkar po zhal
205b5(rgyud): bzhi paHlag na thod pa chags pa'i bdag/ khu ba 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no// yi ge ci dang ldan pa yi// kha dog ser po kun du 'od// rta yi zhal gyi tshul byas na// chang 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin// yaM ga re dang
205b6(rgyud): yang dag ldan to/ kha dog dmar po 'od chen po// phyag bzhi dang ni zhal bzhi pa// lce sbyang tshul du legs par gnas// khro bo'i sems kyis sgom byas na// khrag 'gugs pa yi dam pa'o// kha dog drug dang yang dag
205b7(rgyud): ldan gnas drug tu ni nges sbyar bya// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub// mig gnyis dang ni rna ba dang // de bzhin sde dang yid gnyis dang // seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya
205b8(rgyud): yis// rnam rol pa yis btsong bar bya// srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas su// bsgoms na skad cig de la dbang // 'og min srid pa'i mthar thug par// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten bdun// thams cad du ni de bsgos
206a1(rgyud): / kyang / de ni rtogs pa ma yin no// gal te thams cad rab rtogs nas// 'gro ba'i rol pa rnam par 'jig/ de phyir ye shes 'di gsang zhing // mi gsal yi ge med pa'o// gang phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ 
206a2(rgyud): mkhyen// rnal 'byor nyid dang yang dag ldan// gong bur song ba'i yid de yis// gzugs gcig tu ni sgom pa byed// sgo dgu las ni gang byung ba'i// rdzas kyi bdag nyid rnam bsgoms la// rang bzhin med pa'i blo ldan
206a3(rgyud): pa'i/ rnam par mi rtog pa yis bza'// mthe bong dang ni bskyod byed kyis// kha ru yid bzhin nor legs gnas// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin las byung ba// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma'i dbang
206a4(rgyud): phyug ma'i rig pa chen po las sbyor ba gtan la dbab pa ste/ gnyis pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam tshig sgrub pa'i dam pa ste// rdzas gzhan tshogs rnams bza' bya ba// thams cad
206a5(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i 'bras ster ba'o// gang zhig zos pa tsam gyis ni// 'byung po ma lus 'grub 'gyur ba// brtan pa dang ni myur 'gro nyid// de bzhin du ni ba lang khyi// chen por yang dag ldan pa ni// de bzhin ye shes
206a6(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga// bcu bzhi dang ni tshesra brgyad la// lhan cig bsgos te sbyar byas nas// nyi ma bdun du lce spyang gi/ dbus su bzhag pa de nas bton// lnga po dag la yungs dkar gyi// 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyi ril bu
206a7(rgyud): bya ba ni/ rgyud 'dir gsungs kyi 'bras bu chen por gzigs nas thams cad rgyud du sbas pa'o// de nas 'dir bsgrub thabs 'byung ba ni// yid kyi pad ma bsam par bya// kha dog dmar ba kun 'od la// lha ma
206a8(rgyud): bo ni dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa'o// shar dri ud pal sngon po'i mdog/ lho ru ser po lta bu'o// nub du dkar zhing dmar ba'o// byang dum dgang 'od yin no// 'bar ba'i phreng
206b1(rgyud): ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum mdzes// shar gyi lha mo ni spyan gsum pa phyag na rdo rje dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / dril bu dang thod pa bsnams pa bsam mo// lho phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na mdung rtse
206b2(rgyud): gsum dang rin po che dang // ba dan dang lce sbyang bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na/ gzhu dang mda' dang / sna tshogs pad ma dang / thod pa bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na ral gri dang / 
206b3(rgyud): zhags pa dang rnge'u chung dang / thod pa bsnams pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// da yi dbus su bsdam par bya// thod pa nyid dang kha T+wAM ga/ de bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid do// dang po'i sngags dang yang dag ldan/ 
206b4(rgyud): bsgoms la skad cig de la 'bar// de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs nas/ rdzas kyi dngos grub 'bras rab ster// rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub sbyor bas// 'phral du yang drag yid ches 'jug/ thams/ 
206b5(rgyud): cad kyis ni ma mthong zhing // stong phrag gcig tu snang bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun la phrogs pa dang // lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod// gang ga'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams// nyid kyi rdo rje'i gnas bzhugs pa/ 
206b6(rgyud): lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rje mig gis mithong bar 'gyur// gang ga'i bye snyed zhing dag dang // sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid dang // dngos po kun gyi mtshan nyid rnams// sems kyi rol mo las byung mkhyen
206b7(rgyud): yi ge gi bzlog sbyor ba yi swA// sngags ni de ru sgom par bya// rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan// ril bu re re bzla bar bya// yi ge brgyad kyi mthar ldan pa// u dang thig ler bcas pa ni// mtha' ru yang dag spyir byas
206b8(rgyud): rdzogs ni kun du brjod bya te/  ts+yai bo k+Shas pa snom gyi gyi hU~M sminas kyis so// rna'i byor b.lo'o// nga ga dang mi ga 'an// ga ge ngo sa man thun gyis rdzu yid do// 
207a1(rgyud): lan bdun mngon sngags rnal 'byor pas brtag bza'// yi ge gsum mtha' zhes bya ste// brgyud kyi mtha' mar logs gnas pa// u dang thig ler yang dag ldan// yi ge mchog tu gyur
207a2(rgyud): pa'i gnas// yi ge dang po'i sbyor ba yis// hri zhes bya ba yang dag ldan// yi ge rnams kyi mtha' sbyor ba// sa bon lngas ni rab dag bya// yi ge yis ni rab bsgoms te// pad ma rab tu rgyas par bya// ci ste rdo
207a3(rgyud): rje can 'grub 'dod// de lta'i sbyor ba kun shes bya// de nas 'dir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sbyor ba/ dgongs pa dpal rdo rje'i glus srid pa shin du sgrub pa blangs pa/ he le sa hi biM a sri/ a ka ma lu pra
207a4(rgyud): b+ho d+hi u badz+ra/ kye grogs po rdo rje pad mA kha 'byed par mdzad pa/ A la la la lo ho// bde ba chen po'i gar gyis rab tu dgos par mdzod cig/ nyi ma'i 'odi kyis pad ma'i kha ni rab phye ba// bde ba chen po'i gar
207a5(rgyud): gyis rab tu mnyes par mdzod// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la// de nas 'dir ni glu tsam gyis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams gar// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskul// de ltar rtag tu gu sngo ldan pas// sbyor ba'i dngos
207a6(rgyud): grub 'gyur ba nyid// dus bzhi rab tu sbyor ba yis// 'grub par 'gyur ba sgom pa'i mchog/ rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // spos dang me tog phreng bas brgya ni// ji ltar sku gsum mchog ster/ 
207a7(rgyud): bla'i/ dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyen tsam du// 'di ni rab tu snang bar byed// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// sgo dgu las ni 'byung ba'i rdzas// sangs rgyas byang chub gnas
207a8(rgyud): zhig/ de nyid bla na med pa 'thob// 'dir ni tshigs bcad du gyur pa ni// gzugs rnams dang ni de bzhin phyag rgya yi// mtshan ma bsam gtan rnams dang sgom pa yi// cho ga'i thabs ni rnam pa sna tshogs
207b1(rgyud): bstan pa ni// lha mo yid 'dod sna tshogs rnams ni bshad pa'o// gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di gnas pa dang // rgyun du 'chang ba dang ni klog pa dang // sgom pa de la nad 'byung mi 'gyur zhing // rgas pa dang bgegs mi
207b2(rgyud): 'byung la 'chi bar mi 'gyur te// rgyun du dus thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug rnams kyis bgegs bsrung bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dgongs pa mchog tu gsang ba// gsang ba
207b3(rgyud): chen po'i nye bar spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs// sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho/ rgyu gar gyi mkhan po a t+yA la ta da sa badz+ra dang bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po gyis lhas btsas kyis
207b4(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan le phab pa/ slad nas pan Ti ta chen po zhi ba bzang po dang / klog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis gtan la phab pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ gu h+ya badz+ra tan tA rA dza/ bod skad
207b5(rgyud): du/ gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// gsang ba'i 'khor lo mi gsung ba// bdag gis zab mo'i don ma rtogs// de phyir khyod kyis
207b6(rgyud): bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo spyan bzangs ma// gsang ba'i 'khor lo shin du zab// rgyud rnams kun du ma gsungs pa// khyod kyis ngor mdzad nga yis bshad// lha mos gsol
207b7(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das// gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'khor lo ji ltar lags// de yi rdo rje ji ltar lpags// de yi pad ma'i ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// gsang ba zhes bya rnam/ 
207b8(rgyud): pa bzhin/ bse pa'i pho brang dang po ste// de nas gsang ba'i dbang skur phyir// gnyis pa rig pa'i 'i brang ste// bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir// gsum pa rta mgrin pho brang ste// de yi mgrin par gnas pa'i phyir// ba ni tra/ 
208a1(rgyud): @gang ba bde skyong ste// sdig pa spong zhing bde skyong ste// de rnams don ni gas ba ste// brtul zhugs spyod cing za phod che// e baM zab cing chags la dga'// khu ba 'dzag cing rag tu 'bab// 'di la ston cing
208a2(rgyud): gzhan la gsang // rdo rje pad ma zhes bya ba// bzhi po gnas pa'i gtan yin te// dper na khang brten ka ba bzhin// rgyud kyi don ni rgyun yin no// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// re rI'i dbye ba ma 'tshal bas
208a3(rgyud): 'jig rten kun rdzob nyid du ltung // 'khrig pa'i zug rngu mi zad pas// bdag ni 'di nyid du ni 'gum// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa// gsung ba'i pho brang rnam pa drug/ mdab ma'i grangs ni nyis 'gyur ro// 
208a4(rgyud): rta mgrin grangs ni dgu ru shos// gsang ba skyong ba rim pa gnyis// brgya dang lnga bcu'i grangs yin no// rim pa'i pho brang mdab ma lnga// rigs ni me tog lta bu'o// bA ga rab 'bring gsum yin te// rnal 'byor mkha
208a5(rgyud): pas btsal bar bya// sman dang snum gyi ril bu yis// rnal 'byor sor mo lnga bsku ste// gshang kha nas ni phye ma gdug/ gsang ba'i gnas kyang snum gyis gdug dan rnal 'byor po 'am mos// rtswa de sor mos
208a6(rgyud): legs par btsal// ring thung tshad ni sor gnyis nas// sor brirgyad par ni gang legs pa// shes rab bag che chung dang // de bzhin bA ga grang gro dang // bde ba che zhing bde ba chung // de la rnal 'byor mkhas pa yI/ 
208a7(rgyud): ba ga che dang bde ba chung // bA ga chen chung ngu bya// chung dran de bzhin bskyed par gsungs// chu rnams chen chung bar bya// 'di 'dra'i bA ga ga la yod// bud med 'di la bA ga mnga'// de phyir bud med bcom ldan 'das/ 
208a8(rgyud): thabs kyi rdo rje 'phro sbom dang // ring ba dang ni thung ba ste// shes rab ji bzhin thabs la'i// de yi gzugs su bzung bar bya// lce mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// e baM rnam pa'i dbus gang du// bde ba'i
208b1(rgyud): khyad par rtsol ba las// 'di las khyad par med dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// shin du bde ba'i gnas btsal ba// bza' ba bcud can sna tshogs dang // btung ba zhim po mang po dang // gur gum la srogs
208b2(rgyud): dri zhim dang / shin du 'jam pa'i sngon bting la// rnal 'byor ma yi gnas bcu ru// dri zhim thig le re re byi// rnal 'byor ma yi gnas wA ru// de bzhin thig le lnga yang byung // de nas mkha' gsang byin gyis rlub/ 
208b3(rgyud): las gru gsum gting ring bsam// de yi nang du paM lus ni// pad ma mdab ma brgyad du bsam// de yi dbus su 'khor lo bsam// 'khor lo'i dbus su rag mi phod// de nas thabs kyi rdo rje yang // hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga
208b4(rgyud): bsamraH/ oM las rdo rje mgo bo bsam// phaT las rdo rje ba ga bsam// de nas bde ba'i stan thog tu// sbyor ba rnam pa gsum bya ste// yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos// 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa dgu 'am// chags pa skye/ 
208b5(rgyud): ba'i dri yis byug/ bde ba skyes pa'i zas zos na// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nus su// thabs kyis gnas su 'o yang bya// shes rab kyis kyang gnas lngar bya// thabs kyi shes rab pad ma la// 'o bya pad ma rgyas su
208b6(rgyud): bzhugaHshes rab kyis kyang de bzhin no// chags pa skye ba'i rtags 'byung ste// de nas gcig gis gcig mkhyud te// he ru ka dang phag mor bcas// shes rab rkang pa gnyis brkyang nas// thabs ni thabs lhan
208b7(rgyud): gyis bskyod na// nang rtags phyi ru bstan par bya// shes rab thams cad rtags gsum 'byung // lus 'phrar 'dar ba sku yi rtags// mi bzod gtam 'don gsung gi rtags// shes pa rgyal ba thugs kyi rtags// 'di na
208b8(rgyud): / skra dkar gnyer ma spong // nad kyi zug rngu thams cad 'joms// 'di ni gsang ba'i bcud kyis len// phyi yi dkyil 'khor sgom pa min// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la gnas// sbyin po sreg le sogaso bya ba min// 
209a1(rgyud): / gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rgyud 'di ni// kun gyis thos par mi 'gyur te// glegs bas sor ni bcu gnyis bya// glegs byam gsad pa'i gnas su sa// yongs su sbyin pa'i rnal 'byor ma// lcug yang/ 
209a2(rgyud): mthong zhing gzhag la rtsa// gsang ba ston pa'i bla ma ni// sangs rgyas nyid pas btsun pa yin// gzhan yang 'dod pas stan thog tu// gsungs pa'i sbyor thabs kun byas nas// lnga bcu nas bzung stong gi bar// 
209a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma kun bad med kyang// sbyor thabs mkhas pas skyong byas na// bcu gnyis ma dang bde ba mnyam// sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor pa// rlung mkhrigs bdo kan kun gnas kyang // shes rab pas kyang
209a4(rgyud): thabs la ste// sbyor thabs mkhas pas rnal 'byor mas// thabs kyis rtag tu bsten par bya// sbyor thabs mkhas pas rnal 'byor pas// rnal 'byor ma ni gsang la brten// gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar lpags// 'on
209a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ming sring tshul lam rje 'bangs tshul// pha sbed tshul lam mkhan slob tshul// gzhan gyis mi rigs ngo tsha bsrung // dben pa'i gnas su sbyor ba bya// gal te ma rten dam tshig nyams
209a6(rgyud): tshe 'di nyid la dmyal bar 'gro// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// thabs med rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// bde ba khyad med ji ltar lags// phyag rgya ma bstan ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
209a7(rgyud): stsol pa/ bde ba la gnas gsang ba'i don// khyod kyis ngor mdzad pa yis bshad// sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor dang // stan yang gcig la mi 'dug ste// 'dod chags bsam pa'ang mi bya'o// gal te de 'dras
209a8(rgyud): sten gyur na// 'jig rten pa yi 'dod chags ste// shi nas mnar med dmyal bar skye// 'dod chags spyod pa shal ma ri// lcags gri sor ni bcu drug pa/ yar la 'dzag cing mar la babs// thabs med rnal 'byor
209b1(rgyud): dra ba 'bod rjede phyir thabs ni mkhas pas stan// sbyor thabs las ni bde ba skye// de phyir bde ba khyad par 'phags// bde ba khyad med lus zung nyams/ rlung 'khris bad kan kun nas skye// las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu sten
209b2(rgyud): phyag rgya ma sten dam tshig nyams// phyag rgya sten pa'i dus su yang // rnal 'byor ming sring brda yis mtshon// gang zhig 'dzub mo ston pa la// 'ongs sam zhes ni dri ba yin// sor mo gnyis ni ston pa dang // mthe bong
209b3(rgyud): drang por ston pa dang // de bzhin srin lag drang por ston// rdo rje bo la zhes bya ste// pad ma ka k+ko la zhes bya// da ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams// brda yi bye brag ma lus pa// saM pu Ti ru shes par bya// lha mos gsol/ 
209b4(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje pad ma dga' ba'i gnas// de ru gzung ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ru gzung ba rnam pa gnyis// rab kyis dbugs dang shes pas gzung // dang po btsan
209b5(rgyud): thabs thob par 'gyur// sbyor ba rnam pa bcu drug gsungs// gcig ni sbom po khro mos gzung // gzung ba'i rten ni rnam pa bzhi// man ngag can gyis shes par bya// gal te de ru ma zin na// 'khor bar ltung bar rang gla bu/ 
209b6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyis gtam lo bsdu// lce yis byang chub sems blangs la// ri mo'i 'khor lo ru ni bstim// de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// shes rab sbyor thabs 'ba' zhig/ 
209b7(rgyud): gam/ thabs kyis bskyod pa 'ba' zhig gam// rnal 'byor pha dang rnal 'byor ma// bde ba khyad par med dam sI// bde ba'i ngo bo ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bskyod pa bud med kyis kya
209b8(rgyud): bskyod/ sbyor thabs kyang ni thabs kyis bya// de las bde ba khyad par 'phags// dper na dar dang snal ma bzhin// thabs kyis snal ma'i tse tsam myong // shes rab dar gyis sham bu tsam// de phyir rnal 'byor
210a1(rgyud): / ma yi rgyud/ rnal 'byor ma yis 'grub par gsungs// rgyud kyi nang na mchog yin pas// rab gnas sbyin bsreg dbang bskur dang // mchod dang bzlas pa gtor ma dbul// khyus dang bsgyur/ 
210a2(rgyud): ba lnga sogs praH/ gsang ba 'di las gzhan med pa// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog ste// ye shes lnga yi spros dang bral// de nas lha mo dang 'khor dpag ka med pa dang // mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'dod chags kyis
210a3(rgyud): yongs su zad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun gyis mkhyud nas/ gsang ba'i mchod pa'i bde ba chen por rol// gsang bas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i yang gsung ba rmad du byung ba'i gsang ba// rdo
210a4(rgyud): rje rgyud kyi rgyal po 'khor lo sdom pa'i rtog pa rdzogs kyi/ rgya gar skad du/ shrIM g+hu h+ya me d+hA tan tA r+yA te/ bdi skad du/ dpal gsang ba gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// 
210a5(rgyud): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so// 
210a6(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dbu'i rdo rje snying ba la sogs pas/ g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
210a7(rgyud): 'dzin/ gsang ba zhes ni ji ltar lags// de yi spyod pa ji ltar lagaso// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lpags// de yi rgyal po ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba zhes pa rnam par zhi// dang
210a8(rgyud): po bum dbang dang 'brel ba'i// bskyed pa'i rim po'i rnal 'byor te// rten dang brten pa sgom pa ni// snod bcud gzung 'dzin rnam rtog pa// spang phyir nga yis gsungs pa yin// de yi khyad par dgos pa'i don// 
210b1(rgyud): dang po stong pa nyid la sogs// rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs// rten dang brten pa'i bye brag las// dang po rten gyi dgos pa yang // thugs khe'i yi ge hUM las ni// mer me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// kha dog nag po
210b2(rgyud): e 'phel las// gru gsum rgya che gting rings bsam// gru gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dug gsum 'joms pa dgongs pa'i don// logs ni rnam pa gsum yin te// lus ngag yid gsum las byung ba'i
210b3(rgyud): mi dge bcu 'joms dgongs pa'i don// chos kyi sku ni dri med kyis// rang bzhin gyis ni kun la khyab// de phyir rgya cher dgongs pa'i don// 'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
210b4(rgyud): kyang / chos sku rtogs pa ma yin pas// gting rings pa ru dgongs par bshad// de nas thugs kha'i hU~M las kyang // hUM spros pa las rdo rjer 'gyur// rdo rje gur du gyur pa yang // dang por che'i bar chod dang // gnyis par
210b5(rgyud): thar pa'i bar chad de// bregegs ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// phyi yi bgegs drang nang gi bgegs// phyi yis tshe yi bor chod byed// nang gis thar pa'i bar tshod byed// bar chod rnam pa gnyis bsrung ba// rdo rje gur gyi
210b6(rgyud): dgongs pa'i don// yaM dang byung ba'i gong dang 'dra// dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu ste// rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang // mi rtog pa ni skye ba dang // dbang du byed pa dbang gi don// ba dan bzhi yi dgongs pa yang // chos
210b7(rgyud): rnams dus gsum gnas pa yi// dgongs pa yin por nga yis gsungs// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor ni// zur gsum grag po dgongs pa yis// rdo rje rtse gsum sgo gsum don// baM las chu yi dkyil
210b8(rgyud): 'khor ste// zlum po spros pa bzhi ru gsungs// bum pa chos sku'i yan lag bzhi// laM las gser gyi sa gzhi ste// gru ba ni rgyas bu'i rang bzhin gyis// rdo rje rtse lnga ye shes lnga// de stangs ri rab rtse mo
211a1(rgyud): brgyad/ rnam par brgyad kyi dngos po yin// snod bcud rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yon// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya// de yi bye brag rnam rtog kyang // bla man/ 
211a2(rgyud): zhal las shes par bya// gnyen po'i stobs ni yongs su rgyal// shing rnams rims bzhin rtag tu dgod// rnam rtog mi dge bcu yi don// 'joms pa'i rtags su phyogs skyong dgod// 'dod chags zhe sdang
211a3(rgyud): ma rig paHgdug pa 'joms shing klu brgyad dgod// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// gzugs brnyan gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis// lus ngag yid kyi sems can gyi// dri ni mdzad phyi na char sprin dgod// nang dang
211a4(rgyud): gsang bas de bzhin no// de bzhin mthar thug bzhi pa las// snyan nas rgyud pa shis par bya// de nas nang du gzhal yas khang // b+h+rUM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de// rtsibs brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi dngos// 
211a5(rgyud): yong su gyur pa rnam snang sku// phyi nas bltas pas nang du gsal// de bzhin nang nas phyi ru gsal// thams cad gcig tu snang ba'i don// rin chen sna lnga sku yi dron// kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga'i don// gru bzhi/ 
211a6(rgyud): tshangs pa gnas bzhir gsungs// logs bzhi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste// sgra ba ni dran pa nyer bzhagu bzhi// ku ba brgyad ni rnam thar brgyad// gdung bzhi ye shes bzhi yi don// ta ra ne la sogs pa kun// stobs
211a7(rgyud): la sogs pa yin par gsungs// de nas nang du gdan rnams ni// pad ma'i sa bon dbyangs las skyes// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs kyis// ma gos rtags su pad ma'i gdan// de steng nyi ma zla ba ste// tha/ 
211a8(rgyud): dang shes rab gnyis kyi brdas// dang po ro ni nga bdag gam// rnam rtog med phyir gsungs pa yin// yan lag bzhi ldan gtso bo'i gdan// 'khor lo re re gdan du sbyin// gtso bo'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir// dgod
211b1(rgyud): ba'i don dang bcas pa yi// rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o// de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni// skye ba bzhi yi tshul yin te// skad cig las byung rdzus pa'i tshul// dper na chu klung las ni nya// rkyen las skyes pa'i
211b2(rgyud): drod gsher tshul// dper na nyi ma pad ma bzhin// spro zhing bsdu ba sgong skyes tshul// dper na rdo las zangs bzhin no// sbyor ba las skyes mngal skyes tshul// yar la sreg cing me re la gso// dper na spra tshi lo las ni
211b3(rgyud): gzugs/ pheM brang rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs// rjes su bskyod pa he ru ka/ dbang bskur bcom ldan mi bskyod pa// bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin// bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med// mchod pa don yod grub
211b4(rgyud): pa yin/ yan lag drug las byung ba yi// dngos grub 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de nas bzlas dang sgom pa dang // dbang po rab 'bring tha ma ste// rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa yi// sgom pa 'am bzlas pa bya
211b5(rgyud): khar gsungs// 'bring gis gtso bo yab yum yin// tha ma dbu ma'i spyan lnga 'jug/ dbu ma'i spyan la rtag gyur na// sum bcu rtsa bdun rdzogs par sgom// 'bring gis kyang ni de bzhin te// gnas pa rdza dang gi yo/ 
211b6(rgyud): ba rlung / bkod pa'i sems dang dman pa'i dbyings// zab pa sngags dong thig le dang // mthar thug chos dang yan lag bdun / 'di ni bstan pa shin du zab// gong du bstan pa thams cad kyang // rnam pa bzhi ru shes
211b7(rgyud): bar bya// ra ra la yang bzhi bzhi ste// du ma'i tshul ni shin du zab// phyi dang nang gi sngags kyi don// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyi yi don// phyi la ltos la nang yin te// de nyid gsang ba gsang ba'i don
211b8(rgyud): las su rung ba mthar phyin don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor byi yi don// nang du dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ni// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // de lta bu ni byin brlabs pa// lnga dang / 
212a1(rgyud): drug la sum bcu bdun// g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo la sogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// sum bcu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba// yongs su ma rdzogs// 
212a2(rgyud): ji ltar lags// bskyed pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi rim pa ji ltar lags// gzhan yang rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang // thun dang thun 'tshams ji ltar lags// lta spyod zung du ji ltar 'jug/ dpa'
212a3(rgyud): bo bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sum bcu rtsa bdun yang yang rgyu// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed// de phyir 'bras bu sngon 'gro ba'o// rgyu nyid gtso
212a4(rgyud): bor 'gyur ba yin/ he ru ka gyur gcig pa yang // rgyu rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ste// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi spogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyu nor pa las mu yin te/ gro las nas kye myu gu min/ 
212a5(rgyud): me tshang ba las ma yin te// 'byung nyams pa las myu gu med// rgyu med pa las ma yin te// nam mkha'i me tog las ni dri// rgyud rkyen med pa las min// nags bsregs ma las rlung med bzhin// de ltar
212a6(rgyud): yan lag bzhi ldan pa'o// las dang po pa'i rnam rtag spangs// lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas pas// bskyed pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// phyi dang nang dung ma yi cha// de yi rim pa bshad pa yin// rten gyi
212a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang // khyams dang bla gab med pa dang // bla gab bcas dang rnam pa gsum// mos pa'i dbang du gsungs pa yin// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yin// thun bzhi ru ni gsungs pa
212a8(rgyud): yis// 'tshamos kyang bzhi ru shes par bya// dbyug gu chu tshad 'pho ba dang // thun brgyad bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thun dang 'tshams ni mnyam par gsungs// 'tshams kyi tshe ni rnal
212b1(rgyud): 'byor pa/ dbang po 'bring dang tha ma dang // lha rnams rdzogs par spro byas pa// mar me gcig lngas gnyis kyi tshul// mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin byas// lta ba zhes bya mnyam gzhag ste// 
212b2(rgyud): rjes thob spyod pa ru ni bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa la/ rgyan drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnang // gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba la// rgyan dang bdud rtsi spyod pa gnang // rdo rje rigs dang
212b3(rgyud): rin chen rigs// pad ma rigs dang las kyi rigs// spyod pa gnang bar nga yis gsungs// shes rab ye shes dbang 'brel la// gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste// khyad par phyag rgya'i
212b4(rgyud): pad ma gnas// lta ba mi ldan spyod pa dang // spyod pa mi ldan lta ba gnyis// 'di ni gsang sngags dam tshig ste// mnar med sems cin dmyal bar skye// de phyir lto med spyod pa spang // 
212b5(rgyud): srin po rag sha'i spyod pa'o// spyod mod lta ba spangs po ste// dka' thub kyis ni lus gdungs shing // phung sogs rnam snang la sogs pa'i// brnyas pa rtog ge skam po yin// lto spyod zung
212b6(rgyud): tu 'jug pa yang // glang chen bzhings kyang mnyam par bzhengs// glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par bzhugs// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bdude rdzi zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi spyod pa ji ltar
212b7(rgyud): legs/ de yi phan yon ji ltar 'byung // rgyan la sogs pa'i don rnams kun// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi rnam pa gsum
212b8(rgyud): du gsungs// dang po phyi yi bdud rtsi ste// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la// lcags kyu lnga ni bkod pa ste// brgya dang bcu gnyis dang por 'dzag/ si lA mi bskyod mun kam blang // bcu gnyis
213a1(rgyud): bcu drug dang por 'jug/ he ru ka dang rnam snang dang // lung kum snying por blang bar bya// yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo'i// brgyud dang bcu bzhi bcwo lnga la// thabs bzang po yi dus
213a2(rgyud): su gsungs// seng gi'i gzugs ni dkar la bzang // lus ngag sdom zhing nyes pa med// 'di ni sha yi bsgrub pas brten// glang po glang po chen pa ste// ke ta ka yi rgyu nyid las// gla rtsi la sogs
213a3(rgyud): 'byung ba'i sha/ ba ni gi wang ldan pa'i sha/ rta ni rta yi rgyal po ste// kha dog dkar min dmar po min// dbyibs dang kha dog mi 'gyur sha/ lus ngag yid la mkhas pas brtag/ bzang po'i snod
213a4(rgyud): ni dum bu gcig/ de yi nang du bsgrub par bya// rab 'bring tha ma'i mtshan mi yin/ 'bar dang bud dang lbo ba rnams// mtshan ma phyir ya yin par bshad// gzhan skyes don dang rgas srel cing // 
213a5(rgyud): skad ma byin na don grub ste// sked phyungs pas ni tshangs par 'gyur// nang gi bdud rtsi rang byung yin// dri can bu ga rgyu lam nas// 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyun chad nas// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang
213a6(rgyud): ba ste/ a wa d+hu dir dbugs chud pa// steng gi drag pa'i rgyu ba yin// sa li ga phur dbus su gnas// 'gro gi drug pa'i rgyu ba yin// 'di ni gsang ba'i bdud rtsi ste// skra dkar gnyer ma
213a7(rgyud): 'chi ba spong / spyod pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// bskyed pa'i rimya la legs gnas shing // rigs su 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir// phyi yi drug pa'i
