213a8(rgyud): bdud rtsi sbyin// las dang po lo phyi nang gnyis// 'di yi nus pa du ma ste// skra dkar med cing rnam rtog 'joms// dkyil 'khor bzhi la rab tu gnas// lnga po goms par gyur pa yin// 
213b1(rgyud): drug pa gzung bar gsungs pa ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas// sor bzhi nas ni dbus su bzhug/ lte ba'i gnas su dbus gnas pa// steng gi drug pa 'dzin pa yin// 'di ni nus pa'ang du ma ste/ 
213b2(rgyud): srid pa med cing yang ba ste// 'dab chags rgyal po ji bzhin du// nam mkha' 'phur zhing ltung ba med// mchog dang chad par dbus gnas pa// 'og gi drug pa yin par gsungs// gang zag mchog la gsungs
213b3(rgyud): ba yin/ 'di ni nus pa'ang du ma ste// dri chen bu ger 'gag pa med// rgyan gyi dang por zhe sdang 'joms// dur khrod chen po so so yi// ru tra btul ba'i rim pa'o// bdud rtsi rnam rtog la sogs 'joms// phrin
213b4(rgyud): las bzhi yi thun mong yin// phyag rgya 'dod chags rnam par dag/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa ni// drug pa zhes bya ji lta bu// gang zag mchog ni ji lta bu// 'dod chags rnam par ji ltar dag/ dpa'
213b5(rgyud): bos yang dag bka' stsal ba// g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi las ni// lnga pa nam mkha' 'byung ba yi// lnga pa rang bzhin med pa ni// drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dga' ba mchog ldan lhan cig dga'
213b6(rgyud): bral ba'i dga' ba sngon 'gro bas// lnga pa bde ba chen po 'byung // bde chen rang bzhin med pa dag/ 'og gi sgo yi drug pa yin// de phyir drug pa 'dod pas kyang // bzhi pa sngon du song ba yin// lnga pa yongs
213b7(rgyud): su rdzogs pa sgom// dper na zangs kyi dngos po las// gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa yis// zangs nyid gsar du 'gyur ba ste// zangs las ma gtogs gser nyid dang // lnga pa las gzhan drug pa ni// 
213b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// lo dang zla ba zla phyed dang // nyin zhag dus drug dus gnyis la// skad cig ri tsam drug pa 'byung // las dang po'i spyod yul min// dper na chu yi snod nang du// bdud ni
214a1(rgyud): @// thigs pa gcig gzhag pas// rgyu ru nyams su myong ba las// gcig shos nyams su myong ba med// chu la brten nas bdud rtsi yang // nyams su myong bar byed pa ste// de bzhin spros byas lnga pa las/ rten rna/ 
214a2(rgyud): spros med drug pa byung // rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs// mtshon ma lnga dang ro brgyad dam// sa brgyad don dang mngon shes lnga// las kyi phyag rgya yongs su spangs// shes rab phyag rgya las gnas shing / phyag rgya chen po la 'jug
214a3(rgyud): 'di ni gang zag mchog yin te// 'di yis drug pa 'dzin pa bshad// 'dod chags zhes pa 'khor ba ste// rnam dag mya ngan 'das par gsungs// de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang // gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa ste// rten cing 'dral
214a4(rgyud): pa zab mo'i don/ dang por lho yi nga rgyal bya// mkha' 'gro rtsa ru shes par bya/ dpa' bo byang chub sems su shes// 'khor lo'i gnas dang 'khor lo dang // de nas bsgrub bya shes par bya// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas// tshangs
214a5(rgyud): mdo bar du sor mo'i tshad// bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad yin te// sor gsum lnga ni 'khor lo ro// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin// dbang gi lha mo gnas kyi 'khor lo la// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// tshangs mdo me la
214a6(rgyud): gzhang ka rlung sor gsum sor bzhi mkhas pa brtag/ gnas gsum gseng ba'i gnas yin te// de bzhin gnas gsum rig pa ste// sor bzhi rta mgrin gnas yin te// sor brgyad gsang ba'i bde skyong gnas// rnal 'byor
214a7(rgyud): pa dang rnal 'byor ma// lus kyi rten gyi bye brag las// sor mo bzhi bcu brgyad gnyis las// brgyad ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gnas// bzhi bcu las ni 'khor lo gzhan// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// thams cad
214a8(rgyud): sgal tshigs dbyug gu ste// phyi dang nang du mkhas pas brtad// 'khor lo la yang rnam pa gnyis// dang po 'khor lo gnyis la rtsa// rkyen dang gsang ba rang bzhin dang // dbang dang rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// rkyen la gnyis
214b1(rgyud): bsang ba bzhiHrang bzhin bcu drug gsang ba gnyis// tsan da li ni nyi shu bzhi// 'khor lo bzhi ru stsol ba ste// tshogs nang bla ma mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs// man ngag bzhan pa spel zhing 'phyar la dga'// 
214b2(rgyud): 'dod chags sbyor phyir sbas pa spyod pa'i don// gab pa'i don lnga rgyab kyis phyogs shing bskur ba 'debs// gsang sngags bar du gcod cing gzhan la ga sha/ 'di ni mnar med sems
214b3(rgyud): cin dmyal bar skye// sangs rgyas stong dang rtsa gcig rdzogs tshe'i tshad// 'di lnga sbas kyi thams cad la// nga yi sbas par ma gsungs so// de phyir rgyud gzhan du ni spras// rgyud 'dir nga yis
214b4(rgyud): rgyas par bshad// sum bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas g.yon nas// drug bcu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas// sum bcu rtsa gnyis las ni zung // bcu drug pa ni g.yas g.yon che// sum bcu rtsa gnyis
214b5(rgyud): grangs su spras te/ bcu drug las ni bzhir 'gyur ba// drug bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ru// ro drug la nr-i longs spyod pas// ro ma ljongs spyod 'khor lo sbas// 
214b6(rgyud): rta mgrin 'khor lo mgrin pa sbas// brgyad pa g.yas g.yon tshwa gnyis la// bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin// brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og blo zhi// sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// sum bcu
214b7(rgyud): rtsa gnyis phyogs dang 'tshams// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa yin// spyi gtsug 'khor lo spyi bor sbas// gsang ba bde skyong bde bar sbas// bcu drug la ni zung gyur pa// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pA yin// brgyad las
214b8(rgyud): phyogs 'tshams brgyad kyi cha// drug bcu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas// tshangs mdo de ni ma la sbas// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo ru// chos kun rig pas rig par sbas// drug bcu rtsa bzhi las ni zung / sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangasu sbaso// 
215a1(rgyud): drug bcu rtsa bzhi las ni bzhi// drug bcu grangs su sbas pa yin// drug bcu rtsa bzhi las ni brgyad// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o// gzhang ka rlung ni rlung la sbas// gsang bya'i gtum mo gtu/ 
215a2(rgyud): mor ra sbas// 'khor lo ral gri 'khor lo bzhi// phyi rol 'phrog gi rnam par mkhrud// chu dang chu bran chu bo rnams// sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed kyang // rgya mtsho chen por re gcig 'gyur// lte ba 'khor lo bde chen sku
215a3(rgyud): rnam par thar pa stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// snying kha chos kyi sku yin te// rnam par la sogs de bzhin no// mgrin po longs spyod de dang 'dra// bde ba sprul pa de bzhin no// mtshan rnams steng
215a4(rgyud): la stong pa 'og ta dang por bde chen kha sbyor yin// rnam thor steng la dpe byad 'og// bede chen kha sbyar gnyis pa yin// gzhan ni zhal las shes par bya// stobs bcu rnams dag kha sbyar bcu// rlung ni sgrol ma'i ngo
215a5(rgyud): bo ste// rtsa drug dbugs kyi rang bzhin gang // me ni gos dkar rang bzhin te// zung rtsa gsum ni drod kyis bkang // rang bzhin gyis ni gnas pa la// brgyad dang lnga'i mtshan nyid la// brgyad la dbyings kyi dang po brgyad
215a6(rgyud): lnga la ka li dang po lnga// rig pa'i pho brang mtha' can lnga// rta mgrin dbyangs ni g.yas dang g.yon// a gnyis mthar bzhag 'dab rgyu yin// ma ning bzhi dang a gnyis dbus// byang chub sum bcu rtsa bdun yin// de
215a7(rgyud): nas rtsa'i mtshan nyid kyang // phyi'i stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis// sha las gnas nas tshil skyed byed// nang gi brgyad dang nyi shu ni// cheli la gnas nas rkang par byed// gsang ba sum bcu rtsa gnyis te// rus par gnas
215a8(rgyud): nas ga pur skyed tA de khro kho na'i rtsa gsum ni// gsang bar gnas zhing bde ba skyed// khang pa stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis// khang pa re la khang pa 'bum// khong pa der gnas srin bu rigs// stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa
215b1(rgyud): gnyis teHgrangs ni 'bum du shes par bya// nang dang gsang ba'i rtsa la yang // srin bu'i rigs ni grangs su gsungs// de kho na yi rtsa gsum la// 'dod chags skye ba'i srin bu dgu// nyin mo nub mo mtshams dang gsum
215b2(rgyud): dgu ru mkhas pas shes par bya// rtsa dor gnas pa'i ga pur yang // bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba las byung ba// bdud rtsi la sogs gang du gsungs// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // raM las me'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ 
215b3(rgyud): de steng a las ka pA la// baM las pad ma'i 'dab ma bsam// nang du zla'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de ru sha la sogs pa dgod// rtsa ba'i steng du sor bzhi pa// mthong ba tsam du bsams na ni// yi ge go zlag bsgom par
215b4(rgyud): byaHsngon po dmar po dkar po drang // hUM las gyur pa rdo rje bsam// de stongs yi ge maM bsams la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du bsam// 'di ni bdud rtsi kha sbyor ro// sha lnga las ni gradan du 'gyur// lcags kyu bdud rtsi
215b5(rgyud): lnga ru 'gyur ta las rlung dag gi me bus te// zla ba gtso bo la sogs zhu// tha mal pa'i bdud rtsi yin// yi ge gsum dang nyi ma zhu// lha'i bdud rtsi zhes ni bya// 'od zer kIs bkug ye shes kyi// bdud rtsi yin par nga yi
215b6(rgyud): gsungasak+Sha lam gsum bskor ba sku gsung thugs// 'di ni byin rlabs rnal 'byor ro// de nas bdud rtsi myang dang mchod// mchod pa'i rnal 'byor zhos ni gsungs// de nas ral pa'i rnal 'byor te// g.yon g.yas
215b7(rgyud): dgongs pa shes par bya// de nas zhu ba'i rnal 'byor bsam// mnyam pa'i rlung dang gtum mo'i mes// ye shes bzhi'i ngo bo gyur// kha cig mi bskyod rnam snang ste// sha'i mkha' 'gro mnyam nyid yin// cha cig bya ba nan
215b8(rgyud): tan taHsrin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod// cha gcig rlung dang 'khris pa ste// 'khris las bad kan la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin// so sor kun rtogs ye shos mchod
216a1(rgyud): sdugacigarang bzhin med pal// 9ska sna'i mi shes kyi// de rnam par 'gro samyod par ma nga/ rlu na rdo rnam par 'groste//  ni mi shes sa pa' 'gro min// buman pa ma par 'a na// na
216a2(rgyud): bu las kyi mkha' 'gro yin// gzhan yang rtsa la sogs pa yi// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bye brag kun// go rims bzhin du shes par bya// sku ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// gsung ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro'o// thugs ni ye shes mtha
216a3(rgyud): 'gro yin tebade chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// gzhan yang 'khor lo'i dbus gnas ni// mkha' 'gro'i bye brag shes par bya// dga' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// mchog dga' sha zla mkha' 'gro'o// rang bzhin dga' ba ye shes
216a4(rgyud): yin/ bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o// dpa' bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' 'gro las ni nyi ma'o// tsan da li ni nyi shu bzhi// spras pa'i 'khor lo bzhi ru sku// bde chen longs spyod 'khor lo bsdu// longs spyod chos kyi 'kho
216a5(rgyud): lo bsdu// gong du bsdu ba'i rim pa yang // thig le las ni thams cad 'dus// dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid la// nyi ma 'od zer phyogs bcu du mar snang // du ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gcig du bsdu// dper na
216a6(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur ba'i gdugs// shing gi 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba ji bzhin no// gnyi ga chos kyi 'khor lor bsdus nas kyang // nyi ma zla dkyil rtsa na ka'i tshad// de'i dus na thig le yungs dkar tshad// sngags kyi phreng ba ba spu'i nyan
216a7(rgyud): ma tsam gyis ni ti g.yas skor g.yon skor a li ka li sbrul ltar 'khyil// 'di dag thig le'i rnal 'byor te// 'di la sems ni brtan gyur na// de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor sgom// zla ba a li ka li la// a li nyi ma la thim nas// 
216a8(rgyud): nyi ma zhabs skyed la thim bsam// zhabs skyed 'al sogs pa thim// yan lag lnga ni ye shes lnga// de ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor te// de nas na da phra mo la// sems ni rim par sgom pa'o// de nas rang gi ye shes te// chos kun stong
216b1(rgyud): par ro gcig pa'o// gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo dang // sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo gnyis// 'bar ba dang ni 'dzag pa'i tshul// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// phyi yi rnal 'byor rtsol ba ste// nang gi rnam rtog srog gi rlung // srog
216b2(rgyud): rtsol gnyis 'gags dbu ma ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas// sor bzhi nas ni rtsa gsum gcig/ dbus bkag pa'i gnas yin pas// dang po de ru bzung bar bya// de nas sprul pa'i gnas su bzung // yang na bgrung bar shes
216b3(rgyud): par shes te shes rab ye shes dang bral bas// dga' ba mtshan nyid bshad par ni// gzhang ka g.ya' zhing ba sra ldang // dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa'i// bcu gnyis rang bzhin yin par gsungs// byang chub sems rgya
216b4(rgyud): mi rtog snyamata mchog dga' mi dmigs nyi shu lnga// gsang ba'i nor bu yongs su gang // lhan cig skyes dga' mi dmigs pa// chos kyi sku ni yin par gsungs// bde ba rgyun chud bral ba'i dga'// de'i dmigs po gzugs sku
216b5(rgyud): gnyisagazhan yang sngon du 'gro ba rnams// yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba'i dngos// dgongs dang bcas pa'i rim pa'o// skar ma'i tshogs ltar du mar 'phros mod kyang // nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung zhugs kyang // sgra gcan lta bu gnyi
216b6(rgyud): su med pa'o// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// skar ma'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// zung du 'jug pa ji ltar lags// gnyis su med pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sum bcu rtsa bdun ni// rgyu yi khyad par smos
216b7(rgyud): pa'o// sku gsum dang ni ye shes lnga// 'bras bu yi khyad par spros pa'o// rgyu rnams bdun du spros pa dang // 'bras bu gsum du bsdus pa'o// rgyu rnams 'bras bu la thim ste// 'bras bu gnyis su bsgom par bya// chos kun sems kyi ngo
216b8(rgyud): bo ste/ sems ni stong pa'i ngo bo yin// thams cad stong pa'i ro gcig pa// 'di ni blang dor med pa'i dbyings// 'dod chags rnam dag byang ba'i phyir// 'dod chags sku'i phyag rgya lnga// phyag rgya chen po ye shos gnyis// dam tshig chos
217a1(rgyud): dang las phyag rgya// 'di la brten pa shin du za ba// 'di ni bde ba chen po ste// skyed dang rtogs pa rang bzhin bral// bde chen 'khor lo rnam pa gsum// gsang ba'i sna rtse a la gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor
217a2(rgyud): lo gang yin paHri bo la sogs de bzhin te// gsang ba'i bde skyong pa la gnas// rang bzhin bde chen 'khor lo ste// bde ba chen po'i ros gang ste// til dang til mar ji bzhin te// dper na shing ni bcad pa las// 'o ma
217a3(rgyud): 'dzag pa ji bzhin no// bde ba chen po de gnyis las// skra'i rtse mo brgyad stong dang // khri dang 'bum ni rnam pa ste// dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o// gsum pa glog gi rnam pa ste// bzhi pa mar me lta bu'o// / 
217a4(rgyud): 'di dag kun gyi rim pa'o// sprul pa la sogs rim bzhon no// sprin gyi rnam pa skye ba ni// a li skye ba'i mtshan ma yin// mar me lta bu 'dzin pa yi// 'di'i mtshan mar gsungs pa yin// lnga pa nam mkha' lta bu ni// 
217a5(rgyud): gnyis su med pa bar do yi// mtshan ma stong par shes par bya// gzhan yang 'dir ma la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// shes rab ye shes 'brel pa ste// dga' ba bzhi'i mtshan nyid kyang // gzhang kha
217a6(rgyud): g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang // lus 'dar dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// gsang ba'i rdo rje rtsa lam nas// byang chub sems su bde ba snyam// mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo ste// rdo rje 'am pad ma 'gag pa snyam// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo
217a7(rgyud): yinan/ bde ba rgyun chad bde ba snyam// bral ba dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// 'di rnams kun gyi mtshon nyid kyang // byang chub chen po la sogs pa// gong du gsungs pa shes par bya// dga' ba snang ba zhes bya te// mchog dga' snang // 
217a8(rgyud): ba mched pa ste// rab tu dga' ba snang ba thob// lhan cig skyes pa 'od gsal lo// ye shes bzhi'i rang bzhin te// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i gnyen po ste// rags pa'i bdud bzhi gseng 'joms po// phra ba bdud bzhi'i
217b1(rgyud): rang bzhin gyi/ 'khor lo bzhi ru 'joms pa yin// 'khor lo la rten dga' ba bzhi// de nyid ye shes bzhi ru snang // de phyir bdud bzhi 'joms pa yin// 'dod chags la rten dug gsum ni// nyon mongs pa'i bdud yin te// 
217b2(rgyud): 'dod chags rnam pa bcu yin te// gsang ba bde skyong nyon mongs 'joms// kha dog dbyibs ni phung po'i bdud// rta mgrin 'khor lo phung po 'joms// sbas pa'i gzhi ni lnga'i bdud// rig pa'i 'khor lor lha bdud 'joms/ 
217b3(rgyud): ske dang bcas pa'i 'chi ba ste// gsung ba skye med 'tsho bdud 'jom// 'phra ba'i bdud 'joms de dang 'dra// skad cig bzhi dang sde pa bzhi// bzang po bzhi dang bden pa bzhi// 'byung ba bzhi dang yum bzhi dang // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi
217b4(rgyud): lo sogs pa// ye shes chen po 'di nyid las// khyad par gzhan ni mi 'byung ste// rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag dang // gzhan yang mos pa'i bye brag dang // chos tshul du ma'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin// dbang
217b5(rgyud): gsum dgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste// 'di yis thams cad bya bar gsungs// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol ba// dge slong dbang gsum ji ltar lags// de yi bya ba ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis
217b6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong la sogs rnam pa gsum// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// rigs 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong ngo // gcig dang bzhi dang bcur ldan na// nyis brgya lnga bcu'i rims kyi ni// bsnyen gnas dge snyen dge tshul
217b7(rgyud): dang / dge slong so sor thar pa yin// gtong dang gtong ba chen po dang // shin du gtong dang rnam par gtong // bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yin// dkyil 'khor du 'jug dge ba ste/ 
217b8(rgyud): de las gnas pas bsnyen gnas yin// bdud dang ldan zhing chen po yin// bum pa'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de la bsnyen pa dge bsnyen yin// de phyir bdun ldan chen po yin// gsang ba dbang gi dge ba ste// de yi tshul ldan
218a1(rgyud): dge tshul yinapa bdun dang ldan pa chen po yin// dge ba shes rab ye shes yin// de nyid slong bas dge slong yin// bdun dang ldan pas chen po ste// chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang // phyir mi ldog pa gsum
218a2(rgyud): yin te/ \u0f7frnam par smin dang 'khor ba dang // spong ba gsum ni 'khor ba yin// theg pa gsum ni nges 'byung zhing // rig 'dzin theg pa 'bras bu nas// 'bras bu 'dir gnas rnal 'byor pa// khyim pa 'am rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// 
218a3(rgyud): lugs su gnas bcas byas la// dbang skur rab gnas la sogs bya// theg gsum phyi'i cha lugs kyis// gsang ba'i spyod par cha gsungs te// dper na rdo la zangs su 'gyur// zangs las gser gyi rnam pa'o// zangs kyi
218a4(rgyud): dus na rdo med de/ gser du gyur pa rdo mi snang // rigs 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// gnyis po snang ba nyid du ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// de nas gsang ba bzhi po ni// bzhi
218a5(rgyud): ba'i dbang du 'brel ba'o// rtag tu g.yeng ba'i sems 'di nyid// gzugs la sogs pa kun nas ni// sgom bya lhan cig bcas pa dang // dbang du bcas te sgom par bya// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa'o// dmigs pa thams
218a6(rgyud): cad rnam bsal te// sems nyid bsam du med pas na// cir yang bsam par mi bya'o// sems nyid stong par bcug nas ni// stong pa sems su rab bcug nas// stong dang mi stong la sogs pa yi// rtog pa bcom pas
218a7(rgyud): mkha' ltar 'gyur/ rten yod ma yin rten pa med/ dper med gnas kyang yod ma yin// de nyid lnga pa rdzogs pa ste// lhan skyes gnyis med rig pa'o// de nas gcod pa bka' stsal pa// khrims tshul gar dang phyag rgya rnams
218a8(rgyud): rgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsgoms// dur khrod chen po drags pa can// snying rje med cing khrag za bo// de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyi nas sbas dang mthar thug gi// dkyil 'khor du gas
218b1(rgyud): dbang mnos nas// sgrom dang bzlas pa la sogs med// gsang sngags bar du gcod cing gtse// rnal 'byor kun la skur pa 'debs// rdo rje spun la 'tshig cing smod// rtse ba yan lag dam tshig nyams// bla ma la slong rnam
218b2(rgyud): smin gyi/ mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo ya// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo'i don ma rtogs// lcags kyi gri sor bcu drug pa// 'dzeg pa ru ni nga yis bshad// gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs pa// sbas
218b3(rgyud): pra myi dmigs rnam gsum gyis// thur du sems can dmyal bar skye// shing rta'i 'khor lo 'khor ba ltar// las kyi rnam pa yin pa 'khor// shes pa rang rig rang gsal dang // rang rig rdo ba grang 'dod pa// rang gi sgyu mar
218b4(rgyud): 'dod pa dang / rang rig shel sgong lta bu dang // dbyings dang ye shes lo sogs pa// lha'i gnod ni 'chang ba'o// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum// bde chen 'khor lo rgyu'i rgyud// gsang ba sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud// gsang ba bde
218b5(rgyud): skyong 'bras bu'i rgyud// bum pa rgyu'i rgyud du gsungs// gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud yin te// shes rab ye shes 'bras bu'i rgyud// skye ba rgyu'i rgyud gsungs// 'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// bar ma do ni 'bras bu'i rgyud// 
218b6(rgyud): rgyud zhes pa yi rgyun yin te// rgyal po gsang ba sten pa ste// gsang ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// bum dbang las dang po la gsang // gsang dbang bum pa'i dus su gsang // shes rab ye shes gsang ba'i dbang // rang rig shes
218b7(rgyud): rab ye shes gsang // gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs ri rab kyi rdul snyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas mi snang bar
218b8(rgyud): gyur to// gsang pa gcod pa'i chung kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / phyo gar gyi mkhan po bya yang ra dang / yo su pa dge slong shAkya me shes kyis po sbyin cing gtan la bab po// ba/ rgya gar zhing du// shri tsig+sa se bAr
219a1(rgyud): @/ g+hu d+ha ya tsa ni d+ha/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/ 
219a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i bA ga la bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos la skyo bar gyur to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dpal
219a3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// kye kyai bcom ldan he ru ka// kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyi// de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sla ba mtha'
219a4(rgyud): dang mtshan mar snang // de nyid kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos// sems nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin no// phyag na rdo rje yang zhus pa// bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid kyi// dbye ba mi mthun grang
219a5(rgyud): / ngag dang / dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dang kyang // 'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams dang // gonas pa'i tshad dang rim pa yang // gtso bos bdog la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bag chags nyon
219a6(rgyud): mongs ye shes kun// rigs drug rtsa shing 'khril lcug gi// rang bzhin ngag gi lam 'das pa// de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo ste// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi gsang // de ni nga yis
219a7(rgyud): bshad kyis nyon/ rtag chad skye 'gag la sogs pa yi// mtha' spangs sems nyid rang rigacig/ bzod nas spros pa med pa nyid// de don bsam mi khyab par nges// de nyid dbye ba kun 'brir yang // rnam pa gsum du
219a8(rgyud): shes bya ste/ dang po rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgya dang lam rnams bsam mi khyab// mtha' dang nyon mongs bsam mi khyab// chos dang ldan spyod pas mo mi khyab// mdor stan de nyid rim par dbye// gzugs sgra dri re reg
219b1(rgyud): bya chos/ de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab// a ni yi ge dam pa ste// khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med// skye ba kun gyi rgyur gyur pa// yi ge dam pa bsam mi khyab// brag byung khrus dang gtsang sbra dang // rgyan cha gcer bu thal gong sogs// chang dang
219b2(rgyud): bdud rtsi chu dang yang // ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs// rol pa spyod pa bsam mi khyab// nga yis 'dul ba'i sems can la// mos pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// de phyir theg pa thug med pas/ de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab// rtag chad
219b3(rgyud): sgo skur ltos pa'i sgo// de nyid mthar gnas bsam mi khyab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// nyon mongs bsam gyis mi khyab dang // 'dar dang 'phar dang drod la sogs// rtags nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha sgom
219b4(rgyud): rlung drang rtsa la sogs// lam nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rang rig nam mkha'i sprin chen ste// pha rol phyin drug la sogs// rgyu nyid bsam mi khyab pa des// rgyu 'bras tha snyad kun dang bral// rtsol ba rdul gyis ma gos pa/ 
219b5(rgyud): sprin med mkha' ltar ma bcos pa'i// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag/ rang gis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// a nI shing dang sprul sogs gyis// bcu gnyis la sogs dbye ba yin// yi ge dbye ba rgyas pa'o// gzugs ni
219b6(rgyud): sdug dang mi sdug sogs// bcu dgu phra rabo rdul gyi mthar// sgro la sogs pa de bzhin te// sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drug ste// re bya bcu gcig nang de bzhin// gang zhig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// theg
219b7(rgyud): pa gsum dang bcwo brgyad dang // ji snyed 'du shes yod kyi bar// lta ba'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i la mo// mthong dang sgom dang mthar phyin lam// lamau gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems rtogs bdud rnams
219b8(rgyud): 'byung ba'i rtags// rtags kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// mu stegs rang rgyal nyan thos nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i bar// spyod pa'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// rtag dang chad dbang bskur ba nas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das mtha' dang / thabs
220a1(rgyud): dang shes rab mtha'i bar// mtha'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// 'dod chags sogs gyur nyi khri dang // gcig stong rtsa ba nye ba dang // zhe sdang la stsogs de bzhin te// nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam
220a2(rgyud): par byang / 'dod chags zhe sdang sbyin la sogs// rgyu'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems dang nam mkha'i ye shes dang // sangs rgyas 'od gsal zung 'jug sogs// rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o// bla rtags mtshan mar snang ba dang // 
220a3(rgyud): sgo 'dogs pa dang skar 'debs dang // rigs man mos pa khyad par 'chol// rdul tshangs khas lan blos 'jog cing // sangs rgyas nyi cu sgrub byed na// gang lngar bcos kyang de mthar ste// ga zhig mthar ldeng lta ba ste// rang rib// 
220a4(rgyud): gzhan rig sems me yin// kun rdzob don dam gnyis med yin// rang 'dod rtog ge skam po dang // mthar lhung dbu mar khas len dang // de ni sems nyid rang rig dang // brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mi mthun
220a5(rgyud): pa'i phyogs yin te// de bral bsdam gyis mi khyab pa'o// rang rig ye shes chen po yin// sbyin rdzogs dkar po'i chos rwa las dang // rang rig spyi'i rnam pa yin// thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba'am// rgyu dang 'bras bu
220a6(rgyud): la sogs pa// rdul tsamra tha snyad yod ma yin// rang 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir// 'dod chags la sogs skyon kyis kyang // de la sgribs pa ma yin te// sprin nyid la ni sprin bzhin no// rang rig gzhan gyi bye brag gis/ 
220a7(rgyud): sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su spang // rang rig sprin med nam mkha' la// rang rig rnam rtog nam mkha' mtshungs// sprin sogs rlung gis gtor byas te// sprin med mkha' 'dra snang ba nyid// gzhan rig rnam rtog bral/ 
220a8(rgyud): bA la/ sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhes bya ste// rang rig kho na tsam du zad// dper na skyes bu nam mkha' lta bu la// sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig las sgribs pa la// nam mkha' de la ma sgribs ji bzhin no// grangs ni dang po gcig
220b1(rgyud): yin te/ \u0f7fgzhan rig rang rig gyur pa las// dag pa gzhan rig rang rig gyur// dag pa gzhan gyi rnam grol min// 'dir ni rang rig gcig kho na// de nyid reg cing nges pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa ni byang // gzung 'dzin thabs
220b2(rgyud): dang shes rab poHbsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o// lus drag sems kyi rang bzhin las// rnam thar stong dang mtshan ma med// smon pa med dang sku gsung thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o// byams dang snying rje dga'
220b3(rgyud): btang snyomasaHsa chu me rlung rang bzhin las// bzhi'i grangs su nges pa ste// dga' ba la sogs nges pa'o// rigs ni lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga// phung po lnga dang chags snang lnga// bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa yin// pha rol phyin drug
220b4(rgyud): rang bzhin las/ yul drug la sogs pa rnams ni// bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid de// brgya la sogs ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig rang rig gzhan rig gnyis// thog ma med nas gnas pa ste// lus dang grib me'i tshul du
220b5(rgyud): gnas te rung rig med pas gzhan rig dag/ so so'i skye bo'i dus na 'dod// 'di yang rmongs byed ma rungs pa// gzhon rig ma spangs rang rig 'dod// 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan 'das// kha cig 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// 
220b6(rgyud): rig pas blang dor gnyis su rtogs// de la sogs pa lnga pa'i gdon// rigs pa 'dzin pa'i brgya can bcu// theg chen mdo sde stong phrag gsum// nyan thos rang rgyal brgya phrag gnyis// khyab 'jug drag po la sogs pa// 
220b7(rgyud): lta ba'i don la bsam mi khyab// rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub// bye ba chen po'i ros gang ba// khams gsum 'khor ba kun shes nas// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba las// 'khor ba
220b8(rgyud): nyid ni mya ngan 'das// lta bo'i gdon dang bral ba ste// rang rig med cing gzhan rig med// don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka spangs// sems med nam mkha'i chos nyid med// 'khrul pa med cing ma 'khrul med// theg pa med cing
221a1(rgyud): / rig pa med// dman dang gya nom gnyis kyang med// ye shes med cing bde ba med// mtha' bral dbu mar yang mi gnas// bsam mi khyab du gnas pa stes jog khong khro chung ba dang // mi 'jigs rtswa
221a2(rgyud): skur mi rtsal ba// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pas byin rlob cing // mkha' 'go kun kis mchod pa'i gnas// rigs 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste// des kyang mnyam gzhag 'bad la bslab// rigs 'dzin
221a3(rgyud): sa la gnas par bya// rigs 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gnas ste// bcwa lnga'i sa'i bdag nyid las// sku gnyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// gzhan gyis las dang smen lam stobs// de'i stob
221a4(rgyud): kyis snang ba lasaHyang dag nyid snang rgya med pa// rim pa rnam gnyis yin te// dang po bla ma'i gdam ngag dang // rigs 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i bar// rang rig spyi bo'i rnam pa ste// chos nyid yul du byas pa'o// rdo rje
221a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i sa dgu ste// rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid ni// yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i// rtog med mkha' lngar snang ba'o// khams gsum gtan dang g.yor btsas pa'i// bdag gi de nyid tshul gyis ni// mnyam
221a6(rgyud): gzhag rjes thob kun spangs te// rgyu ma'i tshul du gar gnas pa// snang ba mthar phyin pa yi tshad// thun dang 'pho ba chu tshod dang // dbyug bu skad cig rim pa la// sems kyi bying rgod la sogs skyon// bral tra dben par gnas
221a7(rgyud): pa ste/ snang med mthor phyin tshud yin te// rang rig spyi'i tshad stan no// snang ba med cing sgra ma med// bya brtsal med cing bgrod pa myed// rang byung ldan gyis grub pa ru// rdag+sa du mi 'gyur gang gnas pa// rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid
221a8(rgyud): la mthar phyin pa'i tshad yin no// 'dod chags ro mos myos pa dang // sems can sdom 'dzin dbang bskur dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i dus// bsam gyis mi khyab rgya'i dus// khyad par can du gsungs pa'o// 
221b1(rgyud): gzhan yang rtog pa'i sems dang yang // rtog med 'dre zhing drang ba'o// gzugs la bstan pa'i mig nyid gyis// rtog pa rgyun chad sems de nyid// sems kyi rgyun bral rgyu de nyid// bsam mi khyab pa'i rgyu yi dus// sgra la sogs pa'i de
221b2(rgyud): bzhin noH'dod chags zhes sbyang gti mug sogs// nyon mongs rjes nas rgyu ba ste// byams dang sbyin stsogs de bzhin no// bzod sogs gtang snyoms de bzhin no// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// bla ma'i zhal las shes par/ 
221b3(rgyud): bya// sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs dang // byams dang snying rje la sogs pa yi// mdor na dkar po'i chos rnams dang // bzo dang rgyu rtsal la sogs dang // skyed rdzogs rim pa'i sbyor ba kun// skye ba gcig gam du mas ni// 
221b4(rgyud): yongs su rtogs par 'gyur ba dang // 'khor ba'i chos la gang skyo ba// bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i dus// bskyed rdzogs la sogs mi gnas shing // rdzogs pa chen po gang 'dod pa// de yang 'jug pa'i dus yin te// bdud
221b5(rgyud): rnams bsam gyis mi khyab par// bar mchod pa 'jug pa'i dus// gzung ba'i thabs ni bcwo brgyad te// mkha' mnyam bzhi bcas bzhi med dang // yul drug dug gsum brten pa dang // lhan cig skyes gnyis sgra la brten
221b6(rgyud): sa chu me rlung sgra rten no// chos rnams gdod nas ma skyes pa'i// rang rig sgom pa mkha' mnyam ste// bla ma sems gzung dang por gnas// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems ni bzod nas ma skyes pa// gzhi
221b7(rgyud): bcas rang rig rnal 'byor ro// sems ni bzod nos ma skyes pa// gzhal med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya chos// des brten sems bzung bla ma las// skyes bu bcad de bla mar bya// de bzhin 'dod
221b8(rgyud): chags zhe sdang dang // gti mug rjes su mkhas pas bzung // lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung bzhi la// brten te skye ba med pas sgom// bye brag sems bzung bsam mi khyab// nyan thos la sogs theg chen lo// man ngag yod pa/ 
222a1(rgyud): ma yin to// lha dang spyod pas sems zung dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu lam dang yang // dus dang longs spyod rnal 'byor dang // bdag don gzhan don dgongs pa dang // ngal dub mtha' spangs tshogs/ 
222a2(rgyud): chung dang nyatshogs bsags pa'i khyad par bya// khyad par rnam pa bcwa lnga yin// rigs 'dzin theg pa khyad par 'phags// kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// rang rig bsam mi khyab pa la/ sbyin dang byams sog/ 
222a3(rgyud): dgos pa ci/ sku gnyis gzhan don gong las 'byung // bsam mi khyab la sems gnas nas// de nyid ci lags phyi ru ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sbyin dang byams pa la sogs pas// gzhan
222a4(rgyud): rig rnam rtog dgag pa dang // sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa'i// sems can las ni sangs rgyas ni// 'byung po'i rkyen du nges pas ni// bsam mi khyab la gnas nas kyang // sbyin srogs 'bad de bslab par
222a5(rgyud): bya/ de las bsam mi khyab pa 'byung // sku gnyis stobs dang mi 'jigs dang // gzungs dang ting 'dzin la sogs sku// sbyin la sogs pa sbyin byas nas// bsam mi khyab las byung bar nges// de nyid rtogs na bsam/ 
222a6(rgyud): mau khyab/ de nyid ma rtogs 'khor ba'i chos// dbul pos nor bu byi dor bzhin// bsam mi khyab la sems gzhag kyang // bskyed rdzogs rim par sems gnas na// de yang sngon byas 'gro can te// sems kyi yig/ 
222a7(rgyud): 'og chod par ces// rang sems las su rung bas ni// de yi rtags ni nang du ste// des na nang rtags phyi ru 'byung // lus la dri med srin bu med// skra dkar gnyer ma la sogs pa// bskyed rdzogs pa yi rtags yin no// 
222a8(rgyud): 'khor ba sgyu mar snang ba dang // spros med nam mkhar ltar snang ba// bsam mi khyab pa'i rtags yin no// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te// de kho na nyid kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rjes
222b1(rgyud): su la rang bar 'gyur ro// dang lnga 'khor ma sdom pa gsang ba bas ma gyis ma khyab pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so// g+hA ya d+hAr dang / shAkya ma shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
222b2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra khA sa ma ya rA dza tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du// dpal nam mkha' mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dbul bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
222b3(rgyud): cig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bA gal snyems par bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag gi nang nas/ mkha' spyod ma dang / sa spyod mi
222b4(rgyud): dang sa 'og gi spyod ma dang gsum/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ gsung ba'i don 'di gsungs pa// dad ldan snying rjer ldan dang rtse gcig sems// lus ngag gus bcos gzhan la phyin sems
222b5(rgyud): ldan 'jig rten brtul zhugs ldan zhing zab mo yi// lo ma la spro bar gyis la legs par nyon// mkha' 'gro khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// nga yis khyed lnga bshad par bya// mkha' spyod snying sgo rlung yin te// sa spyod bar du
222b6(rgyud): thig le'i sgoHsa 'og spyod pa shu kra'i sgo// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dang por mkha' spyod mtshan nyid kyang // rnam pa gsum du shes byas te// bems po rlung dang rnam rtog rlung // kun gyi mtshan nyid ye shes rlung
222b7(rgyud): mdor bskrun rgyas nyid rim pa sod bye// gnyis mod rlung ni mi ning ste// byung 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung // ljang 'jug sku gsung thugs kyi rlung // snying khwa gsang khyi mgrin pa dang // lci ba lus ni khyab pa ru// rigs
222b8(rgyud): lnga'i rlung ni rim par gnas// rgyu ba'i bzhi ni 'byung ba'i rlung // dngas snyigs dbye ba brgyad du 'byung // de nyid rlung gi thun brgyad do// thun re lo ni 'pho ba gnyis// 'pho ba gcig la chu tshong gnyis// chu tshod re la dbyug gu
223a1(rgyud): / gnyis rlung gi dbyug gu drug bcu pa'i// de bzhin chu tshod sum bcu gnyis// nyi khri tshig stong drug brgya stsogs// sems dang sems med 'dre ba'i rlung // rags pa dang ni 'phra ba dang // gsal ba sems rgya/ 
223a2(rgyud): bzhon pa gzugs// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin sems kyi d+ha// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas// 'di nyid rdo rje ye shes rlung // dbye ba thabs dang shes rab gnyis// 'di rnams mkha' 'gro rang bzhin te// de
223a3(rgyud): dag man ngag mkhas pas brtag// yon tan skyon dang rtags rnams kyi// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes par bya// de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // gzhol ma dang ni g.yon pa ma// 'di ni gzhu yi rnam par gnas// bems po'i/ 
223a4(rgyud): rlung ni lam yin te// dbang po'i mngon sum lom yin pas// snang po'i ri rab gling bzhi la// nyi zla byang rgyug lhor rgyug gis// thabs dang shes rab skor sogs la// 'bad pa'i sems ni gzung bar bya// de dag byems
223a5(rgyud): par yang dag gnas// mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis// rin chen sems ni drin can byas// 'di ni nam rtog rlung yin te// de nyid kyi ni lam gyur pa// ro ma dang ni rkyang ma ste// sbrul 'khyil lta bu'i rnam pa s+ho// rnal 'byor gi/ 
223a6(rgyud): ni dmigs pa'i yul// gnas der rnam rtog rlung dag go// rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// 'di nyid ye shes rdo'i rlung // kun 'dar ma'i rtsa la rten// tsan dan gyi ni shing lta bu// rang rig ye shes spyod yul te// gnas
223a7(rgyud): der 'bad de rang rig gzung // mkha' spyod rlung gi ring bzhin phyir// 'di dag rdo rje'i lam yin no// de nas sa sbyor bshad pa ste// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// tsan da li'i bye brag brtag// dang por rang bzhin tsan da
223a8(rgyud): li/ gnyis pa stug po can da li// gsum pa kha sbyar tsan da li// de nyid la yang dbye ba ste// stug po sdug pa shin du sdug/ yang dag stug po gzhan sbyar dang // bye brag kun lo sbyar bar bya// gcer bu shin du gcer/ 
223b1(rgyud): bu dang / shin du gcer bu gcer bu sogs// 'di dag kun la sbyar bar bya// dbye ba rnam pa bcu gnyis te// yan lag bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad// sa spyod rtsa yi rang bzhin te// stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis sogs// 
223b2(rgyud): gzhan skyes kyi ni khro mo tsam// phra ba de las bzlog pa'o// brgya do dang nyi shu skra'i rtse// sum bcu rtsa gnyis skra'i rtse// lnga yi cha ste rtsa yi gsum// gsum 'dus yungs dkar gyi ni tshad// dbus dang g.yas g.yon phra sbom da
223b3(rgyud): nyis 'gyur bye brag shes par bya// drangs ma dang ni snyigs pa'i rtsar// rang bzhin du ni gnas pa la// yi ge lta bu'i rtsa mdud kyang // dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa// sa spyod ma'i rang bzhin no// gnas la sogs pa gzhan nas shes/ 
223b4(rgyud): 'di nyid nor bu rin po che// 'di las rten nas thams cad 'byung // rigs 'chol gnas 'chol de 'chol dang // dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la sogs// 'chol ba las ni dngos grub med// de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni// 
223b5(rgyud): sa spyod ma'i dngos grub ste// thams cad kyi ni rten yin no// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// byang chub sems ni rnam pa gsum// dang po don dam sems yin te// de ni shes brjod yul las 'das// gnyis pa gzhan
223b6(rgyud): rig byang chub sems// dper na rkyen gyis sgo nga bzhin// gsum pa bems po byang chub sems// sih+la dang ni ga pur ste// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su gsung // las kyi rlung dang las kyi mes// g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub
223b7(rgyud): semaso// ye shes rlung dang ye shes mas// g.yo ba don dam sems yin te// dngas snyigs las ni rim pa bzhin// dbyibs dang kha dog las kyis ni// sems kyi khyad par shes par bya// las kyi rlung gis mi goyo zhing
223b8(rgyud): las kyi me yi mi 'jigs par// kha ba lta bu'i mtshan ma la// dmigs pa hUM gi dbyibs 'dra ste// nor bu kun da'i mdog lta bu// dkar la 'tsher dang gzing dang snum// bde ba chen po'i sku 'byung ba// 'di ni don dam byang chub/ 
224a1(rgyud): sems/ dramar la dngas pa'i rang bzhin la// khyang par banan la// khyad par bzhi ni thun mong ste// 'di ni shes rab byang chub sems// de las bzlog pa dman pa gnyis// mgo bor gnas shing brod pa skye/ 
224a2(rgyud): dam pa rkyen gyis g.yo bar byed// de ltar don dam kun rdzob kyi// sems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya// rgyu 'tshol ba la dngos grubo med// rkyen 'chol ba las de bzhin te// bla ma'i zhal las shes bya// don dam sems
224a3(rgyud): kyi spyod yul min// kun rdzob tshor ba bde ba'i yul// sa 'og spyod pa'i rang bzhin de// rdo rje gsum sgro mi phyed pa// 'di nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// yi ge dang ni yan lag dang // bsdus pa'i don dang spyi bo'i don// sbas
224a4(rgyud): po'i don dang mthar thug don// sna tshogs de las 'byung bar 'gyur// nor bu dang ni sil snyan bzhin// rtog med rkyen las sna tshogs 'byung // A li ka li ma ning dang // drug du sbyar ba rtag par bya// sgra yi yi ge bsam
224a5(rgyud): mi khyabaHyan lag rnam pa gsum yin te// rgyu 'bras brda dang brda can dang // brjod bya dang ni rjod byed do// de las zlog pa bsdus par bshad// theg pa gsum dang de las gzhon// thun mong spyi ru nges pa ste// bye
224a6(rgyud): brag rang las shes par bya// sbas pa sngags dang dbang du dbye// sngags dang lnga ste dbang la gnyis// chos ni spyi dang bye brag go// de dag rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang // bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// snod dang snod
224a7(rgyud): min bye brag kyang / bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// bla mas legs par snyan byas nas// de nyid yang dag rtogs 'gyur na// ston pa med cing snyan pa med// bsam gtan la sogs 'jigs po med// sangs
224a8(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ni sna tshogs 'byung // bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs dang // chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs bskor// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te// rnal 'byor nad pa de lhag
224b1(rgyud): lAHphyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud de// shes rab snying por brtser bcas pa// thabs dang shes rab bsrub shing la// gnyis med thugs kyis bsrubs pa las// bdud rtsi'i ro ni nyi shu bzhi// nor bu rin chen rgyud chen
224b2(rgyud): brjod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // ji ltar ngam grog gyo mo las// 'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba min// de bzhin lo grangs mang po lngas// dngos grub myur du 'byung ba
224b3(rgyud): medaHde phyir rin chen nyi shu bzhi// bdud rtsi'i ro 'dra seng ge'i gzugs// gnas ni nyi shu bzhi nyid kyang // sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlabs te// mkha' 'gro nyi shu bzhi la btade// phyag rgya bzhi yi rgyas btab bo// 
224b4(rgyud): dam du smra zhing dam du spel// rgyu las 'das na dam tshig nyams// sngags dang dbyibs dang ches bdag nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de yi ngo bor kun tu brtags// sngags la gnyis te chos la gnyis// dbyig
224b5(rgyud): kyang gnyis su shes par bya// de de'i bye brag dbye ba la// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// phyi nang sras dang mthar thug pa na// rgyud kun phyag rgya bzhi yin pas// de nyid dbye ba mkhas pas rtag/ de nyid rtogs na rgyud dang
224b6(rgyud): ldan tede las bzlog pa 'das pa'o// rang bzhin gyi ni tsan d+ha li// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// rtsa gsum gyis ni byin gyis brlabs// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// rgyud ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtad/

224b8(rgyud): chen phreng / me ru shing grib dam tshig che// ka ru e ra stobs po che// o ru 'jigs byed ye shes gsang // tri ru rlungs shugs ye shes phreng // klo ru chang 'thung ye shes 'bar// ka ru sha ma zla ba'i phreng // la ru bzhin
225a1(rgyud): / bzang rin chen 'bar// kA ru Na na nyi ma'i 'khor// hi ru khA ga ye shes rgyal// pre ru 'khor shugs mkha' 'gro sdom// gri ru khan DA gsang ba'i 'bar// sau ru sho Da rdza gsang bdud rtsi// su ru 'khor mo/

225a3(rgyud): l-i dag ni/ nyi shu bzhini gtad pa ste// dang por gsang ba gnyis pa yang // rang bzhin yin te de nas dang // rkyen ni tha mar gsungs pa ste// mkha' 'gro khyod kyi mtshan nyid ste// de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin//

225a6(rgyud): g+hA ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA wa dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shri ma hA kha sa ma tan tra rA dza~M/ bod skad du/ dpral nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba rmi

225a8(rgyud): dang / mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pa dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum

225b7(rgyud): rten dang brten ni sgyu mar ldan// de nas gsang dbang bdud bzhi yang // phyag mtshan khro tshul gar la sogs// phyi'i du ma phung po'i bdud// rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te// dman pa'i

227b8(rgyud): la/ lha grangs du yod me tog sbyin// kun byed chu yis bsang po dag/ me tog dang bcas rdo rje dang // de'i snying la bzhag pa sgom// slob dpon la ni brnyas byed sogs// ltung ba nyes pa brjod par bya// phyi yi rdo rje 'dzin pa drab ba// sngon
228a1(rgyud): / du sdig pa lan gsum bral// mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang // rna bas sgra dang sA yis dri// lce yis ro dang lus kyis reg// dngos grub 'phrin las so so ru// mkhas pas rka cing shes par bya// 
228a2(rgyud): me tog gtor de lha yang sbyin// 'khor rnams gtso bo yan lag yin// gtso bo'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// ji ltar gso ba'i smin pa yis// dbang po lnga yi gzugs su sbyin// de bzhin sems dpa' chen po yi// mi shes bI
228a3(rgyud): rab rib kun// rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bsal// de la gzugs rnyan dkyil 'khor bstan// dbang gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du// bzhag ste rig pa'i dbang sgyu bskur// chu khaHpa mi bskyod le long gi// rdo rje rigs kyi

228a5(rgyud): las byed// dril bu don yod grub pa ste// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// phrin las sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// rigs las dras nas ming gi dbang // rdo rje dang sbyar rdo rje sems// rnam snang chen po'i ngo bo ste// chos dbyings
228a6(rgyud): ye shes ngo bo las// de bzhin nyid kyi mtshon nyid 'dzin// mi 'jigs seng ga'i khri stengs su// rig byed slob dpon dbang sbyin bya// bdud bzhi 'joms pa rgyal mtshan bzhi// chos rnams mi nub rgyal mtshan gzugs//

228a8(rgyud): rin chen bdun la sogs pa kun// thun mong yin par nga yis gsungs// bum pa'i dbang gis las rnams te// dkyil 'khor du 'jug dang po yin// gnyis pa rig pa'i dbang yin no// bstan par byed pa gsum pa'o// / 
228b1(rgyud): de nas gsang ba bshad par bya// lus ni ri rab lhun po la// byang chub sems kyis gnas btsas nas// bde ba'i stan yang gnas su bstan// gsang ba'i dbang gi brten gyur pa// rig ma dang por btsal bar bya// dang po shes pa
228b2(rgyud): brtag pa dang / bdag dbang yod pa blangs pa dang // nyes pa dag par sbyang ba dang // dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ba dang // bar chod bgegs rnams zhi ba dang // bsrung dang de la tshogs kyis mchod// dri yi thig le du ma bya// g.yon
228b3(rgyud): na gnas pa de nyid la// bsrubs dang sgrub thabs sbyor ba dang // bsrubs las bde ba'i rgyu rgyun gyis// lus kun khyab nas gsang ba ru// dkar ba la dmar blta bur 'dzag// dkyil 'khor du 'jug gong dang 'dra// ro ma'i
228b4(rgyud): 'khor lo mdab bsags la// lce de pad mar byin rlabs la// lce'i rtse mor byA bsams la// saM h+la ga pur 'dres pa yis// bye las bzhag ste de las snyim// sor gnyis longs spyod mnyam sbyar la// dbugs su mi dmigs
228b5(rgyud): bsgom par bya/ gsang ba'i dbang la rnam gsum ste// rdo rje rtse mos sbyin po dang // sbom po khro mos sbyin pa dang // rdo rje dri tshongs sbyin pa'o// shes rab ye shes la yang dbang // dang por shes rab po rtag par bya// lus dang ngag dang
228b6(rgyud): yid dang gsumaHmkhas pas rtag cing shes par bya// de nas khyab par bltas bstan te// rigs dang lang 'tsho longs spyod dang // rgyan dang gzugs kyi khyad par lnga// phyi'i brtag par yin par gsungs// sems brtan
228b7(rgyud): ni rdo rje'i rigs// khyad pa yin par nga yis gsungs// rnam rtog chung ba rdo rje yin// lcang 'tsho'i khyad par yin par gsungs// mi'i rtog pas rgyan shes pa// rdo rje rgyan gyi khyad par yin// de nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur// mi nub
228b8(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje gzugs kyi khyad par yang // chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid// de yi rol longs spyod pa// rdo rje longs spyod khyad par ro// kun 'dar ma ste thugs kyi rigs// rigs kyi khyad par yin pa'o// de nyid / 
229a1(rgyud): @// ltar mkhar ba ni thugs kyi lang 'tsho'i khyad par ro// rtsa de dmar la dngas pa dang // byang chub sems ni dkar la dngas// gnyis su med par gsal ba'i tshul// dper na nor bu ke ke ru// dar la rgyus pa ji bzhin du// 
229a2(rgyud): thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad par ro// la la na dang ra so na// a wa d+hU ti gnyis med la// spyod thugs longs spyod khyad par ro// dang por phyi la gnyis par nang // gsum pa gsang ba'i rtag pa'o// lus brtag pa ni sku yin te/ 
229a3(rgyud): ngag brtag gsung du 'gyur ba'o// yid brtag thugs su shes par bya// rgyu ma tsam du dgongs pa'i don// kun la khyab cing shes par bya// lus kyi drug la ngag gi bdun// sems kyi bdun la sgyu ma'i tshul// dang por mig sgra chur
229a4(rgyud): 'khrul dang / gnyis pa mig sgyu nyid yin te// gsum pa mig sgyu mi snang bzhin// de bzhin zhal nas shes par bya// chu la bdun te mar ni gcig// dri ni bdun te sha la gnyis// sgo nga bzhi ste 'o ma gsum// 'di rnams brtsal ba'i
229a5(rgyud): rten gyur paHlo gsum bzhi pa yin par gsungs// kha ra gnyis te bu ram gcig/ chang ni gnyis te shes par bya// rgyan ni bye phrag sna tshogs so// dgun gyi sha dang ston ka'i sha// zhag gcig nang na bcu dang gcig/ dbyar
229a6(rgyud): dang dpyid kyi sha rnams kyang // drod dang ldan na bcud dang ldan// rang bzhin shi ba'i sha yin te// bdun pa byas na dom tshig nyams// rtse ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// gzhan yang 'bras bu la sogs sman// mar dang bcas
229a7(rgyud): sbyar por byAHsha yis mar gyi de bzhin no// kha rnams kun gyis bcud bskyed de// dang ra ba kun gyi ro rtsi byed// bcud bskyed pa ni gzhon nu ste// ro rtsa lnga ni sha lnga yin// bcud bskyed sha dang mar gnyis kyang // lnga dang lnga yi cha yin
229a8(rgyud): bsre/ cha ni mnyam por gsungs pa'o// ro rtsa ba yi sha la yang // 'o ma sgong cha mnyam par// lnga gsum lnga yis gtso bor bya// la ri chang ma 'o ma 'am// sha dang mnyam por sbyin por bya// 'di ni yan lag spos bcas so// de nas
229b1(rgyud): mtshams bcad bsnyen pa dang // dam tshig sna tshogs bya ba yang // spros pa med pa'i yan lag yin// dbang skur sngon du sgom pa'i don// dbang thob phyi ru nga yis gsungs// rig ma gtad na snga ma bzhin// brda rnams bya zhing 'dod
229b2(rgyud): pa'i rtagasaHbrtag pa shin du spros pa med// phyag dang zhabs la sogs mkhyed// dang po sbyor thabs zhes gsungs so// dbu rgyan mgul rgyan la sogs pa// sbyor thabs chen po zhes pa ste// las gcig pu dang gan rgyal dang // kha/ 
229b3(rgyud): sgrub 'phreng dang lnga yin te// 'di rnams kun gyi dgongs pa zab// dgongs med spyad pa spyod byed pa// 'di ni mnar med bskyed pa'i rgyu// tha mal pa las brgya 'gyur gyis// bum pa'i dbang dang de 'brel lo// bum pa dang ni gsang ba
229b4(rgyud): gsong ba gzhan las 'brel pa ste// de yi rnam smin brjod mi lang // dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim pa ni// bla ma'i zhal laso shes par bya// yan lag bdun sgom sbyor ba dngos// khyad par rnam mas sa ga na khyo #
229b5(rgyud): kyi khA sa sa // bskyed shing tshad dang gnas pa'i tshad// drang ba'i tshad rnams shes par bya// 'byung ba bzhi dang rigs 'thun pa'i// bskyed shing bskyed pa'i tshad dang mnyam// sor gsum sor bzhi dar ram men// gnas
229b6(rgyud): pa'i tshad ni rnam pa drug/ rnam thar gsang ba'i pho brang nas// bskyed mched rim pas gnas pa'o// stong pa rta mgrin 'khor lor gnas// khams la gsang ba'i bde skyong gnas// 'da' khang sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas// yang ba
229b7(rgyud): spong ba'i snying khar gnas// he ru ka ni ma gshegs shing // rdo rje mda' yis ma rgyab pa'o// dra bre'i tshad ni sor bzhi 'byung // dang por khrus byas gnyis pa la// sman dang snum dang dri dang gsum// su ma cha sum gnyis stod slad du// lus
229b8(rgyud): la sku zhing me la bdug/ rtse gsum rtse ni shin du zab// bang su ba dang rtsa ba dang // ram nye ba dang nye shing ba// ro ma shags dang yan lag bcas// rdo la sogs lnga sbyar deng // gzhan yang snum dang snum pa dang // dar la sogs pa'i na/ 
230a1(rgyud): / du blugs sgo gnyis nas ni po ngos bdug/ zab pa'i sngags gang bsgom byas pa// dang po mtshan ma shes par bya// chags pa'i gzugs ldan sna tshogs 'byung // thal ba gsum 'am bdun nas 'byung // dgo// 
230a2(rgyud): pa'i bye brag shes gyur na// sngags dang sman gyi khyad par ro// dgongs pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir// sman la sogs pa btsal mi bya// 'di yi sdig pa bsam mi khyab// gdug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur na// dbus kyi rtsa
230a3(rgyud): / bu'i kho phye nas/ sbyor thabs khyad par yin par gsungs// bde chen go bzlog sbyor ba dang // 'khor lo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // sku'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // ye shes go bzlog sbyor ba dang // 'byung ba go bzlog sbyor ba dang // 
230a4(rgyud): yum gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // thig le'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // bsam gtan go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba dang // stong pa go bzlog sbyor ba dang // dbugs kyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang / rga tsa'i go bzlog sbyor
230a5(rgyud): dang gtum mo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // rtsa'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // byang sems go bzlog sbyor ba dang // g.yas g.yon go bzlog sbyor ba dang // brda'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // rten gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // kun kye
230a6(rgyud): paHsangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum// sras rnams thun mong ma yin bskyed// ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro// 'di yi khyad par ma gtogs par// thob pa'i don 'di yod
230a7(rgyud): ma yin// dbang skur ba yi sngon du yang // gdum dog sbyin par gsungs pa yi// gro ma ngag de yis dbang thob 'gyur// shiso rab ma la brten nas su// bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pas ni// shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs
230a8(rgyud): si blag bur shes rab ste// de yi bde ba ye shes yi ni// si ng+gar shes rab zhes bya ste// ga pur ye shes su ni bshad// rtsa gsum 'dus pa shes rab ste// de yi thig le ye shes yin// la lan ni shes rab ste// ras ni ni yin// 
230b1(rgyud): so/ rdza ni shes rab zhes bya ste// byang chub sems ni ye shes so// mkha' 'gro ma ni shes rab ste// dpa' bo ye shes su ni bshad// dga' ba gsum ni ye shes te// rang bzhin dga' ba shes rab yin// 'og gi shes rab zhes bya
230b2(rgyud): ste skyeng la ye shes su yang bshad// g.yon pa shes rab zhes bya ste// g.yas pa ye shes su yang bshad// chos dbyings shes rab zhes bya ste// ye shes bzhi ni ye shes yin// phyag mtshan ming dang ni yi ge rnams// gan
230b3(rgyud): yang bye brag shes par bya// shes rab ye shes la yang gsungs// tshig bslab pa yang gnang ma yin// gzugs brnyan la ni bshad pa ste// mngon par rtogs pa sgom pa gsungs// e waM ma ya rnam pa yang // e ni sa ste
230b4(rgyud): wa ni tshwa/ ma nI me ste ya ni rlung // e ni snying rje wa ni byams pa// ma ni dga' ba ya ni btang snyoms// e spyan waM ni mA ma kI// ma ni gos dkar ya sgrol ma// a ni sbyin pa waM tshul khrims// ma ni bzod pa ya bsam gtan// 
230b5(rgyud): e ni phyag rgya chen po ste// waM nI dam tshig phyag rgya'o// ma ni chos kyi phyag rgya yin/ ya ni ye shes phyag rgya'o// e ni shar te waM ni lho// ma ni nub ste ya byang phyogs/ e ni sku yi thig le ste/ waM ni gsung la ma ni thugs// ya
230b6(rgyud): ni ye shes thig le'o// a ni sngon po waM ni ljang khu// ma ni dmyar pa yaM ser po// e ni mkha' 'gro waM la ma// ma ni dum skyes ya gzugs can// e ni shes rab mkha' 'gro ste// waM ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro yin// ma ni sha
230b7(rgyud): / za mamakha' 'gro ste// ya ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'o// e ni 'gog la waM ni lam// ma ni sdug bsngal ya kun 'byung // oM ni bde chen waM long spyod// ma ni chos la yang sprul pa// e ni mtshan ma wa~M stong pa// ma ni rnam thar
230b8(rgyud): ya dpe byad// e ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// waM ni rnam par smin pa'o// ma ni rnam par nyed pa ste// ya ni rnam pa'i mtshan nyid bral// e ni chung la waM 'bring po// ma ni lhag ma ya tsher lhag// e ni g.yas me rgyu ba ste// 
231a1(rgyud): wa ni g.yon nas rlung rgyu'o// ma ni 'og nas rgyu bas so// ya ni steng nas rgyu ba'i chu// e ni gnas gtan wa~M phal che// ma ni kun bkur ya thams cad// e ni bsnyen pa waM nye bsnyen// ma ni bsgrub
231a2(rgyud): pa ya bsgrub chen// e ni shar la waM ni nubi// ma ni shwar 'tshams waM nub 'tshams// e ni rgyud la waM ni sngags// ma ni ye shes ya gsang ba// e ni snang ba waM snang mched// ma ni snang thob ya 'od gsal// e ni bdag
231a3(rgyud): gi bzang po yin// waM ni dus kyi bzang po'o// mu ni ye shes bzang por gsungs// ya ni rlung gi bzang po yin// e ni bdag gi gnas yin te// waM ni rnal 'byor gnas su bstan// ma ni gzhan gyi gnas yin te// 5
231a4(rgyud): ni rgyud kyi gnas yin no// e ni dga' ba waM mchog dga'// ma ni lhan cig ya dga' bral// e ni chos sku waM long spyod// ma sbrul sku ya byed chen// e ni me long waM mnyam nyid// ma ni kun rtog ya nan tan// e na zhi
231a5(rgyud): b.liM ni dbang \u0f7fmra ni rgyas pa ya gsod pa// yi ge btu ba'i sngags tshan gsum// oM ni sku'i 'khor lo ste// AHni gsung gi 'khor lo la'o// hUM ni thugs kyi 'khor lo yin/ oM ni rnam snang AHna 'od dpag// hUM nI/ 
231a6(rgyud): mi skyod rang bzhin no// oM ni phyag g.yon hUM ni g.yas// AHni dbus kyi snying kha yin// oM ni g.yon gyi spyan yin te// hUM ni g.yas pa AHdbus ma// oM ni srog la hUM rtsol ba// AHni gnas par shes par bya// i nAM
231a7(rgyud): sku laM hU~M ni thugs// AHnI gsung yin shes par bya// oM ni lus la AHni drag+ma// hUM ni yid du shes par bya// oM ni thabs la hUM shes rab// AHni gnyis su med pa'o// oM ni g.yon gyi la la na// hUM ni g.yas kyi r-i sa na// 
231a8(rgyud): I ni i wi d+hU ti ya ni// oM ni g.yas kyi ras ni// hU~M ni g.yon gyi la la ni// I ni de bzhi ni dbus na gnas// oM ni ga pur hU~M sa~Mh+la// A ni dka ru la rtsa dmar yin// oM ni mchog dga' hUM ni mched dga'/ A ni rang bran+d+ha
231b1(rgyud): dge' ba'i don/ dga' ba lhan cig skyes dga' 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pa dga' bar 'gyur// rgyu la 'bras bu sbyor ba dang // 'bras bu la ni rgyu sbyor ba// rgyu la rgyu'i sbyor ba dang // 'bras bu la yang 'bras bu sbyor// rgyu
231b2(rgyud): 'bras gnyis su med par sbyor// thabs la shes rab sbyor ba dang // shes rab la yang thabs kyis sbyor// thabs la thabs kyis sbyor ba dang // shes rab shes rab sbyar ba dang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
231b3(rgyud): sbyor/ sbyor ba 'di'i dgongs pa yang // kun mkhyen pas kyang rtogs par dka'// AHni rnam snang mi skyod pa// na ro rin chen 'byung ldan te// zla tshes 'od dpag med pa ste// thig le don yod grub pa ste// oM ni bde
231b4(rgyud): gau shegs lnga rang bzhin// zhabs kyu don yod grub pa ste// 'a ni de bzhin 'od dpag med// ha ni rnam par snang mdzad de// zla ches rin 'byung ldan yin// thig le mi'i rang bzhin no// zhabs kyu sgrol ma'i rang
231b5(rgyud): bzhin to/ 'a ni gos dkar ngo bo yin// ha ni rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// zla tshe sa mu ma ki rang bzhin// thig le spyan du shes par bya// 'byung ba lnga dang sku lnga dang // 'khor lo lnga dang dga' ba dang // go rims
231b6(rgyud): bzhin du shes par bya// zhabs kyu bya ba nan tan yin// 'a ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// ha ni chos dbyings ye shes so// zla tshes so sor rtogs pa'o// thig le me long ye shes so// 'di dag kun gyi dgod/ 
231b7(rgyud): pa kun rdzi sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gsang // kun du gsang zhing dpyad par dka'// yi ge tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / 
231b8(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyis mchod nas/ mi snang bar gyur to//  mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sdom pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po/ rdzogs s+ho// // 
232a1(rgyud): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya d+hA ra dang / bod kyi lo tsAN dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 6/ rgya gar spyad du/ rad+ha ma l+ye tAn+d+ha
232a2(rgyud): dza/ bod skad du/ rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po laM phyag 'tshal lo// lde mos gsol ba rdo rje 'dzin// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// rin chen phreng ba'i don ma rtogs// khyod kyis
232a3(rgyud): na bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha mo spyan bzangs kyis ni gzigs// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// ma gsungs khyod la nga yis bshad// de yi phreng bas rnam pa gsum// 
232a4(rgyud): dang po snod kyi rin pa che// gnyis pa bcud kyi rin po che// snod bcud gnyis dang rang bzhin bral// de ni rin chen gsum pa yin// lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum du gsungs pa na// de rnams rin
232a5(rgyud): chen ji ltar lags// de yi phreng ba ji ltar logs// de rnams su yi spyod yul lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po snod kyi rin po che// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya// ka kA ri ni dkar po ste// mi skyod pa
232a6(rgyud): yis byin brlabs te// dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu ste// rab ni ngeng po'i sgo nga'i tshad// ba dkar ra dkar lug dkar mo'i// 'o mas sku zhing spang ba dang // mi skyod pa la mchod par bya// de nas spyi bor gdags pa'o// mchod pa
232a7(rgyud): bye brag kun la bya// shar gyi gdon rnams thub pa dang // gang la yod pa de la skyo ba// 'bring ni gzhan skyes sbom pa tsam// 'di ni rin chen dag pa ste// dngul chu rnam pa gnyis blugs la// rkan gyi rjes rnams tshang ba dang // kha ni nang
232a8(rgyud): du gzhug pa ste// ro ma'i 'khor lo lhos mnan la// de nas dal nas bskyod pa dang // gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse ru// bde ba chen po skyes tsam na// ro ma'i 'khor lo ri dag mnano// dper na sbrul gyis nya zos pa// mgo bo mnan
232b1(rgyud): pas mi rung 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems// sna nas kyang ni gyen la ldog/ til dang til mar bzhin du gnas// khyad par bde ba gyen la skye// bde ba ltar chen rin po che// de yi phreng ba du mar bsha do// 
232b2(rgyud): tha ma skyes pa khra bo tsam// e ran la sogs sman lnga dang // spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdags gyur na// lus kyi gnyer ma zad par byed// de nas yang dag gnyis pa yang // bai dur+ya ni sngon po ste// rin chen 'byung ldan byin brlab
232b3(rgyud): te/ do byibs ni sogs ka lta bu ste// ra ba kyi tshad ni glang po'i mig/ 'di ni ri ni chen myu gu ste// ngang pa'i sgo nga ldong ros dang // spang shing mo dang gsum sbyar nas// de dag rna ba g.yas su gdags// lho yi gdon rnams
232b4(rgyud): thub par gsungs// gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni ngang pa'i sgo nga tsam// 'di ni rin chen a ran dang // ge pur rag ta dngul chu gsum// de yi na blugs lce lkog tu// gyen 'thur gnyis ni snang dang zhugs// de yi byang
232b5(rgyud): chub sems bzung ste// 'gal me 'khor lo bzhin du gnas// byi'u yi sgro nga'i tshad tsam ste// a ru ra dang skyu ru ra// ba ru ra dang ldong res rnams// bris te sbrus te lus la byug/ 'di ni radA kas su re// lus kyi srin po
232b6(rgyud): 'byer bar byed// de nas yang dge gsungs pa yang // pad ma ra ga dmar po ste// 'od dpag med kyis byin brlabs te// rab ni kar sha ba ni ste// gur gum ga bur lnga sbyar la// lte ba'i dbus su gzhag la rtsing // 'di ni
232b7(rgyud): rat+na ka tu ka/ nub kyi gdon rnams thub par gsungs// 'bring ni kar sha pa ni lnga// 'di ni rad ni ka ra ste// mar dang sa le sbrang dang lnga// bzor byas pa'i dngul chu lnga// de yi nang blugs legs par gnas// 'di yis byang chub
232b8(rgyud): sems bzung ste// chu la chu bzhag ji bzhin no// tha mra kar sha pa ni tsam// 'bras bu gsum dang ru rta dang // mar gyi snying po dang sbyar bar bya// 'di ni radwa de bas ste// skra dkar med par byed pa'o// de nas yan lag bzhi pa yad/ 
233a1(rgyud): / de nas mar gad ljang khu ste// dbyibs ni gru bzhi lta bu la// don yod grub pas byin brlabs bya'o// rab ni be con dbyug pa tsam// 'di ni rat+na gang ka ri// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// bskus la rna ba g.yon du gdags/ 
233a2(rgyud): 'dis ni byang gi gdon rnams thub// 'bring ni de mo'i sgo ngo tsam// ma hA de ba u mo de// gnyis kyis ga pur rag ta yis// byugs te lte ba'i nang du gzhug/ ga pur si la gnyis ka zan// tha ma gzhan skyes khro ba tsam// ldeng ros sar
233a3(rgyud): bo gser dang gsum// man cha gcig ni byin nas ni// 'di ni e na ra ste// srid pa mi skye de dang 'dra// 'di ni rat+na sa ran d+ha ha// de nas yan lag lnga pa yang // kha dog dbyibs ni du mar snang // rnam par snang mdzad byin brlabs te// don
233a4(rgyud): rnams so sor du ma byed// lha mos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs so so'i skye bo yis// rin chen gnas rnams gang gnas brtsal// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i rgyas pa'i brtsal// rin chen mi brtsal ji ltar lugs// rin po
233a5(rgyud): che ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgya mtsho chen po'i phyi rol no// rin po che yi gling yod de// de yi gnas nas tsal bar bya// gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni// gser dngul la sogs rto rnams kyi// 
233a6(rgyud): gnas ni kun la yod pa gsum// rin chen shes pa rnam pa lnga// dang por rgyu rnams thams cad la// rmongs pa med par shes par bya// bla ma'i man ngag thob pas shes// gnyis pa rnal 'byor thos pas shes// gsum pa rgyud kyi
233a7(rgyud): man ngag la// zhugs pa'i tshong dpon chen pos shes// bzhi pa yon tan ldan pa yi// rgyal po chen po dos shes so// lnga pa rnal 'byor pa dag drang // rgyal po chen po dang 'brel ba'i// gser mgar mkhas pas rtogs par 'gyur// 
233a8(rgyud): dang po man dag ji ltar lags// gnyis pa rnal 'byor ci lags pa// gsum pa rgyud ni ji ltar lags// bzhi pa yi yon tan ji ltar logs// lnga pa phreng ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang por man
233b1(rgyud): ngag shes pa yang // rin chen ngo bo cig nyid la// yon tan du mar shes pa ste// dper na rdzas kyi ba lam la// chu la mi 'bying 'gro la stsogs// du mar shes pa man ngag yin// rnal 'byor shes pa rtse gcig ste// de yi thams cad shes pa
233b2(rgyud): yin// rgyud kyi don ni shes par yin// tshong dpon de'i shes pa yin// sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa yi// yon tan kun ldan rgyal pos shes// rgyal po'i rnal 'byor dang 'bral ba'o// sa 'og gser gyi gling bas shes// gser mgar de
233b3(rgyud): ye shes pa'o// rtag pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// mngon sum dang ni mtshan ma ste// rdo rje pha lam la sogs dang // e ran da la sogs pa ni// mngon du gtan la phab pa yin// ma hA ni la la sogs pas// gdon rnams thub cing lha rnams skyob// 
233b4(rgyud): dam tshig nyams pa gso ba dang // tshe rnams srid pa la stsogs pa'o// dang por gdon gyi mtshan ma dang // mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// de nas gdon gyi mtshan ma la// de nyid cho ga tshul bzhin byas// de nas chu mig gtsA
233b5(rgyud): ma ru// gtor ma gtang la chu gtsang blang // gser dngul snod du chu blugs la// lha 'am klu 'am gnod sbyin sogs// mtshan ma g.yas kyi maN+Dal la// rnal 'byor pa yis bzhag par bya// gong ma gsum gyi bar chad la// g.yon gyi maN+Dal thog/ 
233b6(rgyud): tu ni/ chu yi nang du me long bzhag/ phyi ru gtor ma cha gcig sbyin// nang du yol ba dkar pos bcad// de ru tshogs dang bkra shis bzhag/ rnal 'byor yan lag bsgrub byas la// lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs pa dang // khro ba drag tu mtshas/ 
233b7(rgyud): bcad pa// sgom pa'i khro mo lta bur sgom// de yis rin chen dang po bzung // de nas sor bzhi 'phyang du gzhug/ thub bam mi thub la sogs pa// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// dbyibs dang kha dog rin po che// yon tan
233b8(rgyud): med pa gang la srid// dper na bu gcig skyes gyur na// phra med pa ni ga la srid// de bas mkhas pas brtag par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gsar dngul la sogs ji ltar legs// bcom ldan 'das
234a1(rgyud): // kyis bka' stsal pa// gser ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// rang bzhin dang ni bzo byas yin// rang bzhin gyis ni 'chi ba sku// bzor byas las ni rnam pa gnyis// gser 'gyur gser gyi brgyan yin to// bad+mar
234a2(rgyud): bI'i gser ni srid la 'gegs// lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// dngul la sogs pa yang de bzhin no// mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas// thams cad rin po che yin te// man ngag tsam byas
234a3(rgyud): shes par 'gyur// de nas bcud kyi rin po che// lus kyi ri rab lhun po la// rin chen gser gyi dbye ba yang // thabs dang shes rab rin po che// shes rab rtsa ba'i rang bzhin te// thabs ni byang chub sems yin no// dmar
234a4(rgyud): dang dang bshes rab ste// dkar zhing gdang ba stabs su gsungs// a ba d+hu ti rin chen las// thig le tum mo phreng ba yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// a ba d+hu ti ji ltar legs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkA
234a5(rgyud): stsal bu// a ba d+hu ti'i rang bzhin las// steng du dgra lnga yang dag gnas// bar dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin te// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rims bzhin dang // yon tan skyon gyi mtshan nyid do// bde chen thig le haM yin te// oM dang hU~M/ 
234a6(rgyud): dang hUM dang bzhi// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ru// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che// 'bar ba bzhin du yang dag bshad// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che// mgrin pa ru ni 'jug pa bzhi// sprul pa ru yang de bzhin te// chos kyi sku ni
234a7(rgyud): / rin chen le// stong pa bcu drug phreng bar bshad// de nas shin du gsang ba'i don// pad ma rdo rje gnyis pa la// a ba d+hU ti rin po che// oM phaT e dang baM dang bzhi// gsang ba'i thog le bzhi ru bshad// a ni me long lta bu ste// phaT ni bya/ 
234a8(rgyud): ba nan tan yin// e ni so sor rtog pa ste// baM ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// rin chen chos dbyings ye shes te// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // mtshan dang de bzhin dpe byad rnams// a yi 'khor lo 'byung ba bzhi// phaT kyi gnas su
234b1(rgyud): ye shes lnga// e ni gnas su snyoms 'jug dgu/ khaM gi gnas su lnga bcu brgyad// de kho na ru ni shes par bya// k+Sha e A ta sa bon bzhi// yon tan skyon gyis mtshan nyid kyis// kun la khyab cing shes par bya// lha mos gsol ba bcom
234b2(rgyud): ldan 'das// 'di yi gdon rnams ji lta bu// byang sems dgag pa ji ltar lugs// sgra dkar gnyer ma ji ltar zhi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam par rtog pa gdon yin te// mtshan dang dpe byad spong ba dang // 
234b3(rgyud): phung po lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga// skye mched de nyid lnga ru 'gyur// khams rnams brtan cing ngo bo che// 'di rnams rtsa ba'i ngo bo ste// rnam rtog spong phyir rin po che// byang sems dgag pa'i rim pa yang // g.yas pa rkyang bzhi thabs yin// 
234b4(rgyud): te/ g.yon gyi shes rab mdud pa dgag/ sa dang nam mkha' dgag par bya// zlom mos gsang ba'i sna rtsar dgag/ la la na dang rA sa dang // a ba d+hU tri'i nang chud pas// de ni nam mkha' zlum po ste// dper na sbrul gyi lce
234b5(rgyud): gnyis dag/ dug dang sman ni yod pa bzhin// gzhan yang 'dug stangs bye brag gis// dgag pa'i bye brag shes par bya// dgag pa'i srog dang brtsol ba ste// de ltar dbus su gnas pa dang // rimA nas rim du gyen du drang / skad
234b6(rgyud): cig gcig nas bzung ba'i bar// skra dkar gnyer ma'i rang bzhin dgog/ gang la brten pa de yi tshe// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// dbus su gnas pa ji ltar lags// rim shes rim du ji ltar drang // bcom
234b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs zhes bya ba rtag pa'i mtha'// shes rab zhes pa chad pa'i mtha'// snyoms par 'jug pa u ma'i don// g.yas kyi srog ni rtag pa'i mtha'// g.yon gyi rtsol ba chad pa'i mthA/ 
234b8(rgyud): ro ma rtag tu byang chub sems// rkyang ma'i khrag ni chad pa'o// kun d+ha ra ma ru gang gnas pa// de ni dbus mar shes par bya// mchog gi dgra brtag pa yi mtha'// bral ba'i dga' ba chad pa'i mtha'// lhan cig skyes dga'/ 
235a1(rgyud): / dbu mar bshad// oM dang hUM ni mtha' gnyis te// a ni rnam par dbu mar gsungs// a li ka li mtha' gnyis te// ma ning yi ge dbu ma yin// skyes pa bud med mtha' gnyis te// ma ning gnyis su
235a2(rgyud): med par gsungs// 'di ni 'gag pa bzung du 'jug/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa ru// 'brel par bzung du 'jug par gsungs// bya ba'i rgyud dang rnal 'byor rgyud// snang ba zung du 'jug par gsungs// dpal kun
235a3(rgyud): gsang ba 'dus pa ru// steng sgo dbugs la zung du 'jug/ shes rab rnal 'byor bla ma ru// swah+la ga pur zung du 'jug/ rim nas rim du drung ba la// gsang ba'i 'khor lo a la ni// bde ba rdzogs pa'i tshang bstan na// pad ma rdo
235a4(rgyud): rje 'gags pa snyam// de nas yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshad// de na gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi// bde chen 'khor lo'i bar du drang // dang po de ltar shes par bya// de ltar sems ni brtan 'gyur na// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo no// gsang ba'i
235a5(rgyud): sna rtse'i bar du drang // lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// bcud kyi rin chen gang na gnas// de yi shes pa su yis shes// de yi brtag pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas// 
235a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i 'khor lo yon chad du// a pa d+hU ti rtsa dag gnas// ro ma rkyang ma sbrul ltar gnas// gzhan rnams pa thag khug par gnas// 'di rnams kun la rang bzhin gnas// rtsa dang 'khor lo 'di rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs
235a7(rgyud): pa'i snying por gsungs// phyi yi rtsa dang nang gi rtsa// gsang ba'i de bzhin mthar thug ni// man ngag yin par shes par gsungs// brtag pa rnam pa gnyis su bstan// dang po lus kyi rtag pa ste// gnyis pa dag tu shes par bya// lus
235a8(rgyud): la spyi dang bye brag gnyis// rgyu ni rlung gi rang bzhin te// yan lag thung na chu'i khams// yan lag bzhi rgyas sa yi khams// smad zheng chen me yi khams// sna tshogs du ma nam mkha'i khams// spyi ru dkar ba chu'i khams// dmar
235b1(rgyud): ba me ru shes par bya// ser ba de bzhin sa yi khams// sngo ba rlung du shes par bya// yang ni rlung gi khams yin te// drod rnams che ba me yi khams// brtan pa sa yi khams su bstan// chu rnams chen chu yi khams// de rnams ldan
235b2(rgyud): kun nam mkha'i khams// 'jug pa'i bde chen sa yin te// ldog pa sprul pa sa ru gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi bye brag gis// sems kyi gnas su shes par bya// shu tA rlung la si ha la ma// sbrul dang chos su kha sbyor
235b3(rgyud): yin// gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya// de nas bye brag gsungs pa ni// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan mar gsungs// kun la khyab par shes par bya// dang po dbyibs kyi brtog pa yang // dpral ba'i dbyibs la rnam pa
235b4(rgyud): bzhi gru bzhi zlum po zla gam dang // zur gsum du yang shes par bya// dkar po la sogs de dang 'dra// rna ba nas bzung rkang pa'i bar// kun la brtag cing shes par bya// skad ni phra zhing sbom pa dang // ring du 'don dang thung ba dang // 
235b5(rgyud): 'drar ba la sogs bye brag rnams// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// rtags des brtags pa'i mtshan ma ni// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// 'dod chags sku la zhe sdang thugs// mun pa gsung du shes par bya// 
235b6(rgyud): dang po 'dod chags dbye ba yang // yar ngo mar ngo 'tshams dang gsum// dbyibs dang kha dog skad gsum la// mkhas pas 'dod pa bskyed la brtag/ nyin par bzhi dang mtshan mo bzhi// de bzhin skad cig thang cig rnams// / 
235b7(rgyud): mkhas bras brtag cing shes par bya// mig 'dzum pa spu ljang la sogs// dbyibs kyi 'dod pa skye ba rtag/ 'dod pa gzi ldan chung zhing dmar// sna sbubs dkar la sogs pa dang // skad 'dar kha ni skams la sogs// 'dod pa skyes
235b8(rgyud): pa'i brtags su bshad// gzhan yang 'dod pa rgyas pa'i rtags// sra phyir 'dod pa'i sa yi rtags// chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// sku gsung thugs su shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags
236a1(rgyud): // zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi chen po ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la sogs ji ltar lags// sku gsung thugs kyi ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste// gang/ 
236a2(rgyud): pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par// sbas pa'i gsang ba la zhen nas// srid pa'i sa bon mi zad par// dper na rgyud kyi mda' bzhin du// 'bras bu mnar med dmyal bar skye// chen po mi rtog rang bzhin de// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes
236a3(rgyud): skyes// 'dod chags zhes pa spang bya ste// de yi chen po gnyen por gsungs// 'dod chags zhes pa me tog ste// de yi chen po dri dang 'dra// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// zhe sdang la sogs gong dang 'dra// thams cad rten
236a4(rgyud): bes sku ru bstan// brjod pa dang bral gsung du bstan// rnam rtog bral bas thugs su shes// rnam rtog chung ba gtong phod che// bla ma la gus snying rje che// gzhan yang bye brag kun shes pa// 'di la bstan gyi kun la gsang // 
236a5(rgyud): bla ma yon tan kun ldan zhing // dbang dang man ngag 'brel shes nas// gsang ba'i don la ma rmongs shing // thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// chos la ser sna med pa dang // gsal la gsong por smra ba dang // rigs bcas kun gyis
236a6(rgyud): bkur ba dang // lus kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba dang // dam tshig dang ldan bla ma la// 'di la bkur gyi thams cad la// bsnyen cing bkur bar bya ba min// de nas rin chen gsum pa ni// gnyis med lhan cig skyes pa ste// rtog bral spros
236a7(rgyud): pa med pa'o// de rtogs rin chen phreng ba'o// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gab pa zhes bya ji ltar lags// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar lags// sbas pa zhes bya ji ltar lags// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar lags// bcom
236a8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gab bzhis pa ye shes te// sum bcu rtsa bdun su gsum thugs// chos dang longs spyod sbrul sku dang // dga' ba bzhi pa mdor bsdus pa// dmigs pa yi brgyan 'di gsang ba'o// 
236b1(rgyud): bdun dang ldan phyir chen pa'o// sum bcu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i// gnyen po'i stobs kyis ma zhugs par// sbas pa pad ma rdo rje gnyis// snyoms par zhugs nas 'dod pa ste// 'di ni kun mong ma rungs pa// dper na ljon shing
236b2(rgyud): rtsa ba las// yul ga me tog thams cad skye// nyon mongs rtsa ba'i 'dod chags las// dug gsum la sogs thams cad skye// sbas pa'i gsang ba 'khor ba ste// gab pa mya ngan 'das par gsungs// 'khor bar mnar med dmyal
236b3(rgyud): ba deng // dur khrod rgyal po dregs pa can// snying rje med par sha khrag za// shing rta'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas// mya ngan 'das pa sku gsum ste// skyob pa mya ngan 'das gyur dang // 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul dang ni// tshogs kyi shugs
236b4(rgyud): mi mthu yis su// sems can don la yang dag 'jug/ chos sku spros bral nam mkha' bzhin// sku gnyis sprin dang char gyi chu// sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa// sems can las dang smon lam stobs// de yi stobs kyi snang ba
236b5(rgyud): las/ yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med// sku gsum de nyid bzhi po'i de ni// dur khrod la sogs brda' ru shes// sum bcu rtsa gnyis chos sku'i brda// brgyad ni gzugs sku gnyis kyi brda// gzhan yang brda yi bye brag ni// sbom mo gsang ba'i
236b6(rgyud): pad ma'i brda// khro mos gsang ba'i pad ma'i brda// rgyu dang drang ba yon tan skyon// 'dzub mo la brten thob pa'i tshul// nga yi gan du tshur shog yin// mthe bo la brten 'dzub mo'i bar// khyod kyi gan du 'ong gis yin// mthe bo 'dzub
236b7(rgyud): gnyis zur gsum ni// bA ga rgyas sam 'dri ba yin// bA gi ma rgyas zlum por ston// bde ba'i gnas su 'du ba yang // srod dang nam gung tho rangs gsum// 'dzub tshogs dang po nas bzung nas// tha ma'i bar du brda yin no// sku gsung
236b8(rgyud): thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis// lan gsum par dunan tan bzung // gzhan yang brda yi bye brag nams// rgyud rnams kun du ma gsungs pa// gnas ni thabs kyi 'dug pa ste// nye gnas shes rab 'dug sar gsungs// zhing ni thabs/ 
237a1(rgyud): kyi 'dug pa ste// nya gnas shes rab 'dug sar gsungs// snying ni thabs kyi bzung ba'i ngogs// de bzhin shes rab nye ba'i zhing // 'du ba thabs kyi ngo bo ste// shes rab 'ong ba nye ba'i 'du ba yin// chan 'od thabs// 
237a2(rgyud): kyi snyan dang brgyan// shes rab de bzhin nyid mtshan to// dur khrod thabs kyi rnam rtog bral// de bzhin shes rlab nye dur khrod// gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams// kha dog de bzhin dbyibs dang yang // yan lag tshul las shes
237a3(rgyud): par bya// de rnams lha mo la sogs pas mchod pa// sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ rang bzhin gsang ba// rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin chen rdo
237a4(rgyud): rje dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // // rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sau mo ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dam tshig chen po'i rgyud zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
237a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i bA ga la snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas byang
237a6(rgyud): / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / rnal 'byor ma grangs med pa'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ dam tshig rim pa bka' stsal pa// dam tshig dang ni
237a7(rgyud): ma ldan na// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu bzhin// tshe yi dus byas dmyal bar 'gro// de phyir dam tshig shin du bsrung // sangs rgyas bla ma las thob phyir// thun mong ma yin bla ma yi// lnga bcu
237a8(rgyud): bdag nyid srung bar bya// thun mang brgyad dang bcu bzhi te// de rnams nyes par shes par bya// de rnams spyi yi dam tshig ste// bye brag dam tshig bsrung ba dang // phung po lnga ni rigs lnga ste// 'thung ba lnga ni yum lnga'o// 
237b1(rgyud): myached sems dpa' sems ma ste// gzugs bung rnam par sbyang mdzad la// brjed dang brnyas pa la sogs spang // de la mchod dang bstod stsogs bya// don dam par yang rang rig ste// tshogs gsags phyir ning yis gsungs// 
237b2(rgyud): tshor ba la sogs de dang 'dra// sa ni sangs rgyas spyan yin te// spyod lam gsum du ma yangs shig/ gong du gsungs pa'i tshul bzhin bsrung // chu la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no// mig la sogs pa de bzhin no// gzugs la sogs pa de
237b3(rgyud): bzhin bsrung // dkyil 'khor du zhugs rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du mchod// brnyas shing gsha ba la sngogs spang // sems can po dang mo kun la// dpa' bo dpa' mo dam tshig bsrung // bza' ba la sogs dus su yang // 
237b4(rgyud): bdud rtsir sbyor bas dam tshig bsrung // sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams la// rang gi spyod dang gzhan spyod la// rjes su yid rang dam tshig yin// mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas// dam tshig bsrung phyir mchod pa'i rdzas// lus kyi nyes pa sngo
237b5(rgyud): sku yin// ngag gi nyes sdom gsung du gsungs// yid kyi nyes sdom thugs su gsungs// oM gyi 'od zer dkar po ya ni// 'dod khams dag par gyur pa yi// sku yi dam tshig bsrung ba'o// de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya// bsdu ba'ang
237b6(rgyud): yi du shes par bya// a yig kha dog dmar po yis// gzugs khams dag pa dam tshig ldan// hUM gi kha dog nag po yis// gzugs med drag pa dam tshig go// oM ni spyi bor yang dag gnas// a ni de bzhin mgrin par gnas
237b7(rgyud): na snying khar sngo dang bsdu// sku yi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// 'dod khams dag pa dam tshig gi/ gsung gi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// gzugs khams dag pa dam tshig yin// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su//
