237b8(rgyud): gzugs med dag pa dam tshig ste// oM dang AHdang hUM nga bsdu/ oM ni rgyu yi sku bcu gnyis// A ni lam gyi sku bcu gnyis// hUM ni 'bras bu'i sku bcu gnyis// bde ba chen po sku gsung thugs// ye shes cig sbyor sdom pa'o// 
238a1(rgyud): // dpal ldan chos kyi sku gsung thugs// ye shes cig sbyor sdom pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa sku gsung thugs// ye shes cig sbyor sdom pa'o// sprul pa yang ni sku gsung thugs// ye shes cig sbyor sdom po/ 
238a2(rgyud): bde chen snying po ho nyid la// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yang // ye shes dang ni rnam pa bzhi// oM dang A dang hUM dang yaM// yang dag bzhi bzhi ru ni gsungs// rgyu dang l-i dang 'bras bu la// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad shes par bya// 
238a3(rgyud): oM dang hUM gnyis rang bzhin gyi// sngags kyi ngo bor shes par bya// sngags kyi grangs ni khri nyis stong // drug brgya bzlas pas shes par bya// la ga bskyod pa rang bzhin gar// rkang pa rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ro// de ltar gnas na
238a4(rgyud): dam tshig go// gzhan yang dam tshig bye brag kyang // 'jig rten tha snyad spang ba'i phyir// mi skyod rnam snang la sogs dang // dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje pad ma dang // ji ltar rol pa'i spyod pa kun// 
238a5(rgyud): tha snyad kyis kyang lam la 'jug/ gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshig la// rdza ba bzhi dang yan lag bcu// theg pa che la smod pa dang // gsang ba'i don la skur 'debs dang // rnal 'byor kun la gnod pa dang // sems can
238a6(rgyud): rnamams la 'tsho byed dang // 'di ni gsang ba'i dam tshig yin// sbas pa gom pa'i rim pa yang // ma byin brlabs pa dam tshig ste// 'dod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i// 'dod chags spyad pa de dang 'dra// rang gi dam tshig/ 
238a7(rgyud): bsrung ba'i phyir// brdzun du smra ba bzhi pa yin// ro tsa sha dang bcud kyi sha/ kha ba'i chang dang dngar ba'i chang // mar la gnyis ta lo ma cig/ gzhan ni gsum ste yan lag bcu// 'di ldan dam tshig yin par gsung/ 
238a8(rgyud): bdud rtsi nyid la dus gsum du// bcom ldan sku gsung thugs kyi ste// dang po yungs dkar tha ma yang // byi la'i kham gyi tshul du bza'// mtshan mo shes rab sku gsung thugs// nyin mo thabs kyi sku gsung thugs// 
238b1(rgyud): nyi ma nub dang nyi ma shar// nyi ma gung gi thabs kyi dus// nam sros nam ni langs pa dang // nam gyi gung na shes rab dus// dus drug mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// dam tshig 'di la ma nyams na// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams
238b2(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma mo rnams// mchod dang bsrung ba la sogs byed// gzhan yang gsang ba'i bye brag la// gsang ba'i sgom pa rnal 'byor pas// lus la me dang khrag mi gdon// srog gam zug tu phyir
238b3(rgyud): ma gtogs// srog chags 'dod pa spyod mthong na// rang gi rnal 'byor shar mi bya// dam tshig bsrung phyir dben par 'dug/ las su rung na g.yeng bar 'khyam// 'di skad ces bya yan lag brgyad// bdag gis bcu ni yin par gsungs// 
238b4(rgyud): thos pa dus cig lnga bcu'i don// bcom ldan 'das ni rtsa ba bzhi// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bcu// sku gsung thugs ni lus ngag yid// rdo rje mi phyed phyir dam tshig/ btsun mo dam tshig gis brgyan mdzes// b+ha gnyams pa
238b5(rgyud): 'joms pa'o// snyoms par dus gsum mi 'gyur ba// bzhugs bya'i ba yi ngo bo la'o// rdo rje snying po la sogs pa// bye brag yin par nga yis gsungs// e ni yan lag brgyad yin no// ba ni bcu pa'i rang bzhin te// ma ni lnga bcu'i
238b6(rgyud): / rang bzhin no// ya ni gzhan rnams yin par gsungs// e ni srog chags gsod pa ste// bau ni ma byin len pa'o// ma ni brdzun du smra ba ste// ya ni 'dod chags spyod pa'o// e ni sku yi dam tshig ste// bau ni gsung gi dam tshig go/ ya
238b7(rgyud): ni thugs kyi dam tshig go// ya ni bza' ba'i dam tshig go// dus gsum dam tshig ma bsrungs na// 'jig rten pa dang 'bum 'gyur ba'i// rnam smin che bar nga yis gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa'i mtshan ma ni// lus kyi nyes pa
238b8(rgyud): sna tshogs 'byung // ngag gi nyes pa sna tshogs sgra// kha dog dbyibs rnams 'gyur ba dang // lag gi rdzas rnams mi mthun cing // 'bras dang shu ba la sogs 'byung // de tshe rnal 'byor nyams pa des// dam tshig nyams pa shin du bsam/ 
239a1(rgyud): bla ma 'am rdo rje spun 'gram du// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul byas la// gser dngul la sogs brgya'am stong // rta dang glang po la sogs dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan brgya 'am stong // mar me
239a2(rgyud): la sogs de bzhin no// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen pos bskor// tshogs gsags pas ni nyams pa ga so// gal te nyams pa ma gsos na// nyams pa de dang rnal 'byor gzhan// gnas cig dang ni chu gcig gam// 
239a3(rgyud): yulal dang lam gyi gnas gcig gam// skad cig tsam yang 'dug mi bya// 'dug na nyes pa bsam mi khyab// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // gtor ma mchod dang bzlas pa dang // ri lu mig sman la sogs
239a4(rgyud): dang / zhi rgyas la sogs las rnams dang // 'jig rten mtshan ma brgyad dag dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i mtshan ma bzhi// sangs rgyas pa yi mtshan ma cig/ gzhan yang dngos grub ma lus pa// dam tshig 'di las 'byung
239a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur// 'bru rnams sna tshogs bskyed 'gyur ba// rin chen sa lus skyes pa yin// dam pa 'bras gsung thugs yin te// de las 'das na tshig par 'gyur// ji ltar bu ni med pa'i khyim// shi ma thag tu stong par/ 
239a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ de bzhin dam tshig 'di med na// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// pi wang gling bu sbyor kun sogs// rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung // de bzhin dam tshig med 'gyur na// sngags bzlas sgom pa la sogs
239a7(rgyud): pa/ 'bras bu med par brlag par 'gyur// nas la nas kyi myug gu skye// dam tshigo las ni rdo rje 'chang // tshe 'dir thob par gsungs pa skye// dus ni gzhan men brtsod ldan du// bstan bya gzhan min nga yis ste// skye ba gzhan
239a8(rgyud): min pa ma dang // bzhi ni yin par gsungs pa'o// de ltar dam tshig dang ldan pa// bud med 'du zhing dga' bar 'gyur// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mar bstan// nor dang bran dang g.yog/ 
239b1(rgyud): 'khor dang // rgyal po yi 'khor lo la sogs 'du// dag ni snyan tsang bde bar 'gyur// srog gcod la sngogs tshig smras kyang // sems can skrag par mi 'gyur ro// lus kyis sems can bsad byas kyang // rnam smin 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// 
239b2(rgyud): sku ni thob par ngas gsungs so// ngag gis phra ma'i tshig smras kyang // nyes par mi 'gyur gsung thob 'gyur// yid kyis mnar sems sems byas kyang // nyes par mi 'gyur thugs thob 'gyur// dam tshig ldan pa'i yon tan no// 
239b3(rgyud): oM ma hA// rgyud ni dam chog chen po'i rgyud// / rdzogs s+ho// g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // 6// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ba la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 
239b4(rgyud): dpal skyabs po che'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dbul sdom pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub sem/ 
239b5(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo'i tshogs dang / la ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / ma 'ongs pa'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/ btsun mo'i bA ga la snyoms par bzhugs so// 'jig rten na ni cher
239b6(rgyud): grags pa// dgra ni chen po drug yin te// ji ltar nyi ma nub pa'i tshe// grong khyer gyi ni mi rnams kyis// rta dang glang po la sogs pa// rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed// thams cad dbul por skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin yul drug
239b7(rgyud): du ni dgras// shes rab nyi ma nub pa'i tshe// ma rig pa'i mun pa la// so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis// ye shes lnga la sogs pa yi// rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed// bde ba chen po'i gnas su skye// dgra de yongasu gzham
239b8(rgyud): ba'i phyir// mchod pa med cing bzlas pa med// gtor ma sbyin bsreg maN+Dal med// klog dang bskor ba bsam gtan med// g.yeng ba'i tshes dang skar ma'i tshogs// thams cad spangs te bde ba yi// stan la bdag nyid leg
240a1(rgyud): @// 'dug ste// shes rab ye shes sgrub par bya// shing rta yi ni 'khor lo ltar// yul la yang dag rgyug pa'i sems// de dag las ni bzlog nas su// las kyi rlung ni chen po g.yos// ye shes me ni chen po 'bar// 
240a2(rgyud): rnam rtog bsregs te bdud rtsi'i ror// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// skye ba med pa'i gnas su gzung // de nas sems ni brtan gyur nas// mtshan mar snang ba 'gag par 'gyur// de nyid las ni bzlog nas ni// rang seMs
240a3(rgyud): stong par bsgom par bya// chos ni bdag med rtogs pa ni// de tshe sems ni rtogs par 'gyur// thams cad stong ros gang ba ste// bde ba chen po'i sku zhes brjod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste// 'di la bsal bya ci yang med// bsnan
240a4(rgyud): par bya ba ci yang med// de nyid mthong bas rnam par grol// rigs gcig dang ni rigs gsum dang // rigs lnga rigs ni brgya la sogs// de nyid 'di las tha dad med// ji ltar glang po rnyed gyur nas// glang po'i rjes ni mi btsal ltar/ 
240a5(rgyud): sems kyi de nyid rnyed 'gyur nas// rnam rtog gang yang mi btsal lo// ji ltar dug ni 'dod pa la// sman nyid dug tu sbyar ba sbyin// sman las dug 'byung sbyor ba yang // sman pa mkhas pas sbyor bar shes// gzhan yang mar dang kha ra
240a6(rgyud): dang / mar gyi snying po la sogs pa// 'thungs te zhu na sman du 'gyur// de bzhin nga yis gsungs pa yang // drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don// sgra ni ji bzhin ji bzhin min// dgongs pa dang ni dgongs pa min// bsregs bcad ba dar
240a7(rgyud): ba'i gser bzhin du// yongs su brtags nas nga yi bka'// blang bar bya yi mos pa 'am// gzhan gyi khams la 'jug mi bya// de ltar skyes bu blun pa ste// dgra ru gyur pa'i skye bo yis// sman yin byas te dug byin na// sman du
240a8(rgyud): dmigs te dug zos pas// zos pa'i rjes la 'chi bar 'gyur// thabs rnams thams cad rgyu ma ste// shes rab brjod du med par gsungs// ji ltar rig pa mkhas pa yis// dug ni dug gis 'byin par byed// ji ltar ma yis
240b1(rgyud): tshig pa la// de bzhin me yis brdung bar bya// ji ltar 'dod chags che be laM// 'dod chags nyid kyis spang bar bya// ji ltar zhe sdang che ba la// naM sdang nyid kyis spang bar bya// de bzhin gti mug che ba la// gti mug nyid kyis spang bar bya// 
240b2(rgyud): dper na rlung ni mar me 'dzag pa'i rgyu// de nyid nags bsregs ma'i grogs su 'gyur// 'dod chags la brten bde ba'i yul// drug gi dgra rnams bcom nas gnyis med thob// ri lu mig sman la sogs 'di las 'byung // ji ltar
240b3(rgyud): pha rol thabs ldan pas// rdzas la brten nas pha rol 'gro// pha rol byin nas dor bar byed// de bzhin rang rig tshol las kyang // bud med sgyu ma la brten te// rang rig ye shes thob par bya// rang rig ye shes thob pa dang // bud med
240b4(rgyud): mngon par bya ba mo dgongs pa ma shes shing // mar mo'i dgongs pa ma rtogs par// zab mo'i spyod pa spyad par byed// sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung // ji ltar r-i yi rtse mo nas// skyes bu 'ga' zhig lhung gyur na// de ni ltung ba chen por 'gyur// gzhan yang
240b5(rgyud): dar gyi srin bu yis// rang la rang gis 'ching bar byed// mtshan mo me yi srin bu yang // rang gis rang ni sreg par byed// sgyu ma tsamo gyi tshul gnas shing // mtha' bzhi las ni rnam par grol// spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi// mtshon bya/ 
240b6(rgyud): mtshon byed ma yin te// lha yi bu yi dbus gnas pa'i// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o// dbul stobs po che'i rgyud las// mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u sde dang po'o// / gang zhig brtag par byed pa yang / 
240b7(rgyud): gnas ni shin du sngags pa ru// khru do pa yi maN+Dal la// dang po ba yi rnam lnga yang // sor gcig tsam du byug par bya// de nas dri chen dri chu yis// byugs te me tog sngon po bgram// brgyan la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan// bum pa lnga
240b8(rgyud): ni phyogs dang dbus// de nas zlas pa khri 'am 'bum// bdud rtsi chu ru byin brlabs te// gang zhig rtag pa'i mi de la// dang por 'tshams bcad khrus byas te// smag bla nag po phyir zlog gon// sgra ni gyen bcings sha chings dang // bar
241a1(rgyud): ga thogs te shar sgo bzhag/ tshal chen me mar shar du bltam// nub tu me long dngul la sogs// dag pa de la sman lnga dang // dri lngas byugs te bkru bar bya// de nas me long nang du yang // gdon gyi mtshan ma brtag
241a2(rgyud): bya ste// gtso bo'i sngags kyis mtha' ru ni// gdon gyi me dang sngags btags nas// lha yi gdon la sogs pa kun// mtshan mar 'byung bar the tsom med// mi de brgyan ni tha dad de// lha la sogs mthong bye brag go// dus ni
241a3(rgyud): / 'byung po'i nyi ma sogs// mtshan ma sna tshogs 'byung po'i tshe// de tshe gdon ni dbang du bsdu// tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod dang // mdza' bshes zug rngu la sogs pa// gdon las byung ba bsal ba'i phyir// dpal ldan mkha
241a4(rgyud): 'gro la sogs pa// brtag pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag kyang // mchod dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo sogs// bskor ba mtshan ma brtag par bya// dbang bskur dus su ye shes kyang // dbab pa de bzhin sdig la sogs// mtshan ma me long dag
241a5(rgyud): la ni/ brtags te gzhan yang ci 'dod pa'i// mtshan ma brtag pa bla ma yi// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// nad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba'i phyir// gso ba'i rig par ma gsungs pa'i// rlung drang bad kon 'khris pa dang // 'dus
241a6(rgyud): pa dang ni yan lag bcas// gnas bzhi'i 'khor ni gnas pa ste// lus kun khrus byas gnas bzhi ru// sngags pas lag pa mnye bya ste// me long dkyil du brtag byas na// rlung la sogs pa nges par shes// de rjes 'khor la
241a7(rgyud): de nyid la// gso ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya// dug ni brtag pa'i rim pa yang // nang grol yan lag thams cad la// gang du dug zhugs mtshan ma brtag/ de nas gso ba'i sbyor ba yang // sman dang sngags dang bcud bcas te// 
241a8(rgyud): mkhas pas brtags nas gso bar bya// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ mtshan ma thams cad brtag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // / gang zhig bsrung ba'i rten de yang // gang dag dang ni ldan pa yis/ 
241b1(rgyud): bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam par bya// gso ba'i bzlas pa khri'am 'bum// bsnyen pa byas te de nas yang // gser ram dngul la bzo byas te// nang du dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa 'am// rdo rdor ba la sogs bya// yungs dkar la sogs 'brul
241b2(rgyud): dang / rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // de nas bzhag rje rab gnas kyang // yongs su rdzogs nas bcing bar bya// gzhan yang gro ga 'am shing shun nam// dur khrod dag gi ro ras la// gsang dang bgegs bskrad tshul bzhin bya// bzlas pa gang
241b3(rgyud): dang 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs gyur ni// sngags kyang yongs su rdzogs pa bri// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis// lus ngag yid la bsrung bar bya// yongs su ma rdzogs zur drug le// dpa' bo drug gi sngags bris la
241b4(rgyud): bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan mar sgrom// rtsibs mtshan drug la g.yung rung gi/ yi ge drug ni bris pa ste// bsrung bya'i yul la mtshan mar sgrom// dbus su yi ge k+Sha bris te// bar chad thams cad bgags par bsam// cho ga yongs su
241b5(rgyud): rdzogs byas te// bzo bya snod ni kha dog bsgyur// legs par sbas te spyi bo 'am// mgrin pa de bzhin dpung pa yi// tshangs pa'i bu gar longs spyod mnyam// ser bzhi drug tu bcing bar bya// gzhan yang nad pa 'am rnal 'byor pa
241b6(rgyud): bdag la bsrung ba dang por yang // gnon gsal ba ste gnas gsum du// thig le gsum byis sngags gsum dgod// gzhan yang gnas ni sum bcu bdun// thig le byas te sngags rnams dgod// de nas go cha mtshon pa yang
241b7(rgyud): / tshul dang 'thun par shes par bya// de nas stan nam mal cha dang // oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT// sgo 'am gzhan la'ang bri bar bya// gzhan yang lag pa g.yas pa yi// 'thil du gur gum dag sbyar te// g.yon gyi sbom po khro mo yis
241b8(rgyud): spyi bor bral ba na ba mig/ sna dang kha dang mgrin pa dang / dpung ba snying kha lte ba dang // 'og gi sgo gnyis yan lag la/ sngags dang bcas na legs par 'tshe// gzhan yang skud po sna lnga la// sngags dang bcas nas bsrung bar btsun
242a1(rgyud): / dpal stobs blo che'i rgyud las// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i'u le'u ste gsum pa'o// / mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// de nyid la ni phyag 'tshal nas// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bsrung ba'i 'kho// 
242a2(rgyud): le do ltar na// ye shes bye brag ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ye shes kyi ni de nyid kyi// brtag pa rab tu bshad par bya// de la ye shes kyi ni gnas// rnam pa lnga ru shes bya ste// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba// 
242a3(rgyud): dang / rab tu gsang ba gsang ba che// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// de phyir phyi'i ye shes ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan dang bral ba// de ltar rtogs pa byi yi ye shes// nang gi phung sogs lta bu rtog/ de nyid dang bral ye shes so// / 
242a4(rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i ye shes ni// rtsa dang rlung dang thig ler rtog/ rtog pa de dang bral ba ni// gsang ba'i ye shes yin par bshad// dga' dang mchog dga' bral ba'i dga'// lhan cig skyes dga' gang yin pa// bde bar rtogs pa
242a5(rgyud): rnam rtog ste// de nyid spong ba'i ye shes so// ye shes ye she chen po ni// dngos po ro mnyam mtha' spangs pa yi// sems kyi de nyid stong pa la// rnam rtog spong ste ji bzhin 'jog// de ni rang rig chen po ste// de nyid ye shes
242a6(rgyud): chen po yi// de ltar shes na rdor 'dzin gyis// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las// ye shes brtag pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas ye shes chen po yi// brtag pa de nyid bshad/ 
242a7(rgyud): par bya// dang po mnyam par gyur pa yi// stong pa nyid kyi ro tshon la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs dang // phung po khams dang skye mched srogs// rtsa dang rlung dang thig lce dang // dga' dang mchog dga' dga' bral dag/ de la sogs
242a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kun// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// de ni gzhan rig zhes bya ste// rang rig sems kyi de nyid la// gnyis su med par sgom pa'o// de nyid ye shes chen po ste// mthar phyin brtag pa rdzogs pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i
242b1(rgyud): rgyud las/ ye shes chen po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje sem ma das la sogs dpa' bo dang // mkha' 'gro dang ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rjes su/ 
242b2(rgyud): yid rang nas/ byi nang gsang ba la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ g.yon phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi snang bar gyur to// dbal stobs po che'i rgyung // rdzogs s+ho
242b3(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan do rang+ga badz+rA dang / bong kyi sngas dge sbyong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur rnying zhus te gtan la phab bya'o// // rgya gar skang du/ shrI badz+reT ki gu d+ya n+te rA ngo/ bod gad / 
242b4(rgyud): dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpral he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mngon rdzogs rgyal po kyo// dbang rnams dam pa yod dam ci// gtso 'khor khyad par med dam ni// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la// 
242b5(rgyud): bye brag tha dad med dam ci// dam tshig che chung med dam ci// de nyams bshags thabs yod dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgug pa dang // rang rig ye shes blugs pa'i phyir// dbang / 
242b6(rgyud): rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bo ru// dbang ni nges pa kho na'o// lus ngag kun las bzang ba dang // de phyir sems kyi dri ma med// 'khru dang 'dor dang sreg pa dang // mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 'byed pas// sa
242b7(rgyud): dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha' lta bur gsungs pa ste// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rims kyis ma bgrod dbang ma thob// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i legs gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la// thabs 'di
242b8(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sgras kyi rim lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// mngon par rtogs pa'i yan lag ste// 'di yis ngan 'gro srid las grol// dbang dang man ngag 'brel bas so// de nas bzhi/ 
243a1(rgyud): / ba zhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med// 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po ste// 'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang // 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu
243a2(rgyud): phyug sogs bya// rdo shing 'dra 'bag le sregs pa'i// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa dang // ras dang mtshon la sogs pa yi// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la// byin brlabs ye shes byas nas ni// 
243a3(rgyud): lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te// bcos ma'i lha tshogs de ltar na// phung sogs ye shes sangs rgyas la// ci'i phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan pa dbye ba dag/ 'khrum pa yi ni 'khrum bzhi dge/ bcos me med
243a4(rgyud): par bcos ma dang // 'dra dang 'dra ba lta bu'o// dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te// log pa'i sred pas sred pas 'ching // 'khrul par 'khor lo 'khor ba bskor// de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // lha yi bu yi
243a5(rgyud): bdud spangs te// bla ma dam pa rtag tu rten// yid ches rigs dang nges pa ste// lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang // 'og ma spong zhing ma thob na// man ngag tshad ma yin par blang // mos pa'i rjes su 'brang byed cing // che ba'i nga
243a6(rgyud): rgyal la gnas shing // 'jig rten lha spyod 'dre ba yi// snod bcud blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas kyi khyad par dbus su ste// brgyan gyi khyad par bral ba ste// rigs kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigs/ 
243a7(rgyud): phyag dang zhal sogs khyad par gyi// gtso 'khor la sogs khyad par 'phags// dper na pha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin med na// pha rol phyin pa'i ming ma thob// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gnas pa// 
243a8(rgyud): de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor te// gang zhig dbus su mi gnas na// 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du mi 'gyur// dper na rgyal po med par grang // grong dang grong khyer ji bzhin no// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang // rtsa ba'i dam/ 
243b1(rgyud): tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sku gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dang ma sbyin len pa dang // 'dod chags dam tshig de
243b2(rgyud): dang 'dra// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i dam tshig de dang 'dra// tshul 'chos mi shes sngo ba tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dper na 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po drang // bral ba'i rin chen sna bdun de dag gi
243b3(rgyud): 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i ming ni mi 'thob bzhin// bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang // rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyi// ring rig gzhan rig rkyen dag kyang // rang sems las su rung ba
243b4(rgyud): / dang // ma rung ba dang las kyi mtha'// log pa dang ni ma log pa// don rnams nus dang mi nus dang // yongs su rdzogs dang ma rdzogs dang // sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su snang // tha dad par ni mi stan te// chu khams gser
243b5(rgyud): dang nam mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang sems rang gis rtogs pa na// sems can gdod nas sangs rgyas so// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// srog gcod la sogs dam tshig lo// dbye ba khyed
243b6(rgyud): kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang gi lus ngag sems g.yos kyang // gsod pa'i 'du shes rab bskyed na// srog gcod nyams pa chung bar nges// gzhan gyis gnod par tshor ba dag
243b7(rgyud): nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// de lus bzlog pa chen por nges// gang zhig ma byin chu blangs kyang // gzhan la nyon mongs cher skyes na// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du nges// cher blangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring // chen po
243b8(rgyud): las ni nyon mongs cher// de ni chen po kho nar ngos// tshul 'chos ltung ba chen po ste// mi shes pa dang bag med dang // brjod pa la sogs 'o bring du gsungs// gzhan du dam tshig nyams pa yi// cha 'bring chung rdul dam tshig dag/ 
244a1(rgyud): rang rapa gzhan dang gnyi ga yi// rgyu rkyen dag la shes pa ste// ltung ba ngo yis zin pa dang // phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs// tshul dang 'thun par bshags pa bya// dam
244a2(rgyud): tshig gong 'og bye brag gis// bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shes par bya// gzhan yang bshags pa'i bye brag las// sbyin sreg gis ni sdig bsreg phyi/ nang gi sbyin bsreg chen po brtsam// zab pa'i me ni rgyan bzhag med// thabs
244a3(rgyud): kyi rgyun bzhag ma yin te// lo bdun dang ni lo gcig dag/ phyi'i rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// zla ba gsum dang bdun dag ni// 'bring du gsung ste zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs// rgyas pa la sogs de
244a4(rgyud): bzhin te/ rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi// gtum mo ye shes me rang bzhin// 'di ni rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// thog ma med pa gnas med phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ye shes mi yi bud shing yin// 
244a5(rgyud): man ngag can gyis bsreg byas na// nyams pa'i nyes sogs 'jigs par nges// dgang gzar la sogs de bzhin to// rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra// rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // thams cad dga' zhing
244a6(rgyud): mgu bar 'gyur// dpal mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// / rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / lots+tsha wa dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
244a7(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na ma le tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// kye lags gsang bdag rdo rje mtshan// gsang ba b+hU
244a8(rgyud): na mod pa yi// lta ba zhes bya gang zhig lags// spyod pa gang dang gang zhig lags// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha ba shes rab pha rol phyin// gdod nas spros// 
244b1(rgyud): bral lhun gyis grub// rang rig ye shes dbyings nas gsal// rang rig mun pas bsgribs pa nadzin shes rab snying po ser byung bas// lnga ba kun gyi yang rtse yin// don ram rang rig ye shes la// blang ba med cing dor ba
244b2(rgyud): med ci dman dang gya nom gnyi ga med// sgom pa po med bsgom bya med// dmigs med gnas su shes rab gnyis// blo dang lhan cig gcig gyur pa// nam mkha' nam mkha' ji bzhin no// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pa/ 
244b3(rgyud): mtshan ma'i rnam rtog sgom pa min// dman pa rnams la skur mi gdab// de nyid la yang sgro mi gdags// dngos po bskal par bsgoms pa bas// rang rig skad cig thos pa gnyis// brgya stong la sogs char mi phod// dpe dang bgrang
244b4(rgyud): bar mi nus te// dpeg mtsho dang glang rjes bzhin// dngos por bsgoms pas bsgoms pa min// dngos med bsgoms pa'ang sgom pa min// dngos med dngos por ro mnyam na// ma bsgoms na yang sgom pa nyid// sgom dang mi sgom gnyi
244b5(rgyud): ga med// 'od gsal de la sems zin na// bzung 'dzin dgra'i dpung rnams 'joms// phyogs bcu'i 'jug rten khamasu bcas pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gros mchod pa'i gnas// rab kyis mnyam gzhag rjes thob spangs/ 
244b6(rgyud): 'bring gis rjes thob stong par lta// tha ma rjes thob sgyu mar lta// seng ge lta bu'i lha spyod ni// bzhi pa yin par nga yis gsungs// de nas spyod pa'i rgyal po bshad// spyod pa rnams ni bzhi yin te// kun du bzang po bu su ku// a wa d+hA ti
244b7(rgyud): gsum yin te// spyod pa'i dus dang gnas dang rdzas// gang zag dang ni dbye ba dang // ngo bo dang ni tshad dang yang // thabs dang dgongs par dgongs pa dag/ mkhas pas kun la sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs dang rdo rje rigs// rin
244b8(rgyud): chen rigs dang pad ma'i rigs// lus kyi rigs kyi spyod pa lnga// kun du bzang po'i spyod pa yin// sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang // dkon mchog gsum la 'dzin pa dog/ sangs rgyas kyi ni mchog gi spyod// rdo rje dril bu'i
245a1(rgyud): // phyag rgya 'dzin// bla ma 'dzin pa'i rdo rje spyod// dam tshig yid 'ong bu bzhin du// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rin chen spyod// theg pa gsum dang dam chos 'dzin// pad ma gar gyi spyong ba yin// dam tshig thams cad ldan pa yin/ 
245a2(rgyud): ma grol la sogs grol la sogs// ta yi rgyal po'i spyod pa yi// za ba nyal ba 'chag pa kun// rnal 'byor chen pos gnas bcas te// g.yeng bas g.yeng ba spangs pa ni// bu su ku yi spyod pa yin// brgyan 'chang ba dang
245a3(rgyud): bdud rtsi myang // phyag rgya bsten dang rnam pa gsum// a wa d+hU ti'i spyod pa ste// rgyan la drug ste phyag rgya lnga// bdud rtsi bcu ste mi gtsang bas// mi gtsang 'khrud pa'i spyod pa'o// gnas ni kha na ma tho med// phyi nang gsang ba'i
245a4(rgyud): gnas yin no// rtog pa 'joms pa'i slob pa'i dus// 'grub nas rdzu 'phrul smon pa'i dus// thabs ni gzhan gyi mthong ba dang // sgo dang skur pa med pa'o// dgongs pa gnyen po'i stobs yin te// rnyed dang bkur bsti graH
245a5(rgyud): pa dang // zug rngu kha zas ma yin te// bla ma'i dus mtha' legs brtson nas// gang zag rnam rtog chung ba yi// las dang po yis bya bar nges// dbye bar gsum dang bye brag ni// gong du gsungs pa kho na'o// ngo bo rtog med sas/ 
245a6(rgyud): de nyid// gtsang sbra 'gags dang sprul pa ston// 'di gnyis grub pa'i tshad chad yin no// dgos pa la yang gnyis yod de// gtsang sbra spangs pa'i dgos pa la// dgos pa dngos la rnam pa bzhi// rang sems brtan g.yo rtag
245a7(rgyud): bA dang // phyag rgya khyad par tshol ba dang // de su gang zag gzhug pa dang // mi mos sgro skur dgag pa'o// gsang sngags rgyal po'i lha spyod kyis// 'khor gyi dpa' bo mkha' 'gro tshogs// dus dang brgyal dang brgyal 'gyur bas// 
245a8(rgyud): dbugs dbyung ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad dran pa slar rnyed nas// thams cad mgrin cig 'di skad gsol// dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa yi// lta ba 'di yang ngo mtshar che// g.yeng bas g.yeng ba spong ba yi// spyod pa
245b1(rgyud): 'di yang ngo mtshar che// chos rnams stong par mnyam pa na// lha dang mi lta ga la yod// gtsang sme bdud rtsir ro gcig na// spyod dang mi spyod ga la yod// dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje 'dzin// mnyam gzhag rjes thob ga la yod/ 
245b2(rgyud): thams cad sems kyi ngo bo la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ga la yod// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrib g.yogs kyis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// 
245b3(rgyud): zla ba'i rab rib sel byed pa// mig gis rang gi rdul mi mthong // sems kyis de nyid mi rtog par// tha dad gzung 'dzin sna tshogs 'dzin// de phyir lta ba'i rgyal po ston// mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis// bdud rtsi der nyid mi
245b4(rgyud): shes te// gtsang dang mi gtsang la sogs sten// de phyir spyod pa'i rgyal po stan// gnas pa'i rgyan dang g.yeng ba'i brgyan// de phyir zung 'jug rgyal po bstan// rkyen dang dbang po rab 'bring gis// mnyam gzhag rjes thob rgyal po
245b5(rgyud): bstan// 'khrus pa gzung 'dzin gnyis su bstan// de phyir sems kyi de nyid bstan// lte spyod 'di la nan tan gyis// de nas thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas/ yid rangs te/ phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar
245b6(rgyud): gyur te/ dpal ye shes phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po lha spyod rmad du byung ba// / rdzogs s+ho// / rnal 'byor ma tsan Da ma le dang // dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
245b7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dza la dz+nyA na tan+t+ra ra dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// ngo mtshar rmad du byung
245b8(rgyud): ba yi// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // ye shes gang lags 'bar ba gang // dpal ni gang lags bdagra la gsungs// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te// gnyis med bde chen
246a1(rgyud): // ro las byung // gzung 'dzin mtha' yas rang rig gi/ sna tshogs bdud pas ye shes dbang // rang byin brlab pa lte bar te// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsang bar ro// smin 'tshams kyi ni mdzod spu ltar// thung tu gnas
246a2(rgyud): shing ring du 'byung // de nyid drang dang kha bye dang // rgyas par bya ba gsum yod do// drang por byang ba'i rnam pa yang // dros pa'i tshad ni gsum yod de// sgo gsum yon tan kun ldan na// sor bzhi phyi ru 'byung bar nges// 'bring
246a3(rgyud): las sor gnyis tha ma yang // sor dang nas kyi tshad kyis 'byung // sbom phra gzhan skyes phra mo tsam// dang po bya gdong nyin na gnas// rnam thar sor gnyis skye mched bzhi// stong pa drug ste khams sor brgyad// nyi shu lte bar nyi shu lnga/ 
246a4(rgyud): snying kha ru ni gnas pa'o// sman la sogs pa kun ldan pas// drang ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// rnam snang sku rigs bcings pa dang // rgyab yol phul nas mchod pa dbul// sman mchod dbul dang me mchod dbul// de nas
246a5(rgyud): reg bya'i mchod pa dbul// kun rdzob me lce'i rtse mo tsam// khro mo'o 'dzub mo'i rtse mo la// bdud rtsi'i ri lu legs byas te// mkhas pas reg bya'i mchod pa dbul// mngon du shes pa gdon mi za// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// 
246a6(rgyud): khams gsum mchod par gdon mi za// dar ma men ni sor bzhi'i tshad// rkyed pa sku rags dbul bar bya// sprul pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su// ras bal la sngogs rgyab yol phul// shing bu'i rigs dang 'thun pa yi// 
246a7(rgyud): sbom phra rigs kyi bdag po tsam// dri med sman dang snum ldan pas// zug rngu skye med mchod rdzas kyis// be ro tsa na'i lam du mchod// dri zhim chu yis khrus byas te// khrus kyi lus la mchod pa dbul// sman dang ba spu bye ma yis// sgo
246a8(rgyud): gnyis dag tu mchod pa dbul// shin du dro ba'i me mdag gis// gtum mo'i me kha me mchod dbul// rked pa'i mtshan mnyam bka' ni ngag/ gdan ni stab pa'i mchod pa dbul// de yi drang ba'i gdon ma za// de nas rgyas par bya ba/ 
246b1(rgyud): yang de gzhan ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// phyi nang mchod pa'i mtshan ma kun// rgyas par byed pa'i las yin te// rgyas par sbyor ba gsum byas nas// dper na me tog pad ma bzhin// de nas dbye ba'i rim pa yang // gong du gsungs
246b2(rgyud): ba'i thun mong ste// dus gsum lce yi rol mos kyang // bskyod nas nges par kha dbye ste// de nyid gsum ni me rang bzhin// me spang ba yi rkyen gyur pa// rlung ni yin par gsungs pa yin// rkyen ni me yi 'bar bar bshad// gzhon
246b3(rgyud): yang rkyen gyi bye brag kyang // srog sogs rlung gi dbu mar dgag/ bum pa gzhal med rlung nas su// sgo dgu phyi ru drag tu 'bud// lus kyi mal dub cha nyams te// sbyor ba rdzogs nas bde ba'i rkyen// bde ba'i las ni rdo rje 'chang // bde ba
246b4(rgyud): yis ni bde ba bsgrubs// rgyu bde ba las 'bras bu bde// rgyu ni nang na 'di mchog las// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog go// de nas bde ba yi rkyen gyur dang // srid pa dgag dang rlung dgag dang // gnas nas gnas su brten bzung
246b5(rgyud): ste/ g.yas rkyang bas ni ro ma dgag/ dpa' bos g.yas nas mkha' 'gro g.yon// g.yon brkyang bas ni rkyang ma ste// sa gas kun 'dar ma ru gzung // de bzhin zlum pos dbu mar gzung // de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang // dpa'
246b6(rgyud): bos g.yas nas gzhan gyis g.yon// de bzhin kun la sbyar bar bya// gzhan yang gzung ba'i bye brag kyang // dril chen bug gu mgu lam gyi// rlung dgu phyi ru bus byas te// rkang lag drag tu bsgrims byas nas// zin par 'di la the
246b7(rgyud): com med// dpa' bos mkha' 'gro ma gnyis kyis// thun mong du ni dbye ba gsungs// be ro tsa na las kyi rlung // gzhan yang lam brgyad rlung rnams dag/ dang po nyid du bsdams byas la// zin par 'di la the tsom med// byed
246b8(rgyud): ba bsdams pa'i man ngag go// byed las spel bar so 'gyur la// 'di zin pa la the tsom med// gnas gsum dag tu k+Sha bsam te// dbugs gsum pa'i yar drangs te// lte ba'i gyen nas drangs kyang zin// 'di ni gang zag mchog
247a1(rgyud): gis yin// mdzes pa'i s+t+rI bo de nyid la// gyen du kan dang 'thur du kas drang por g.yas g.yon bcan thabs la// kang tha'i zer ni can thabs cig/ sbom po khro mos mnan pa ste// bla ma'i zhal nas ma/ 
247a2(rgyud): / blangs na// lus kyi nad bzhi kun nas skyes// chu 'gegs chu so sgreng la sogs// lus smad nad sna nyi shu 'byung // gzhan yang btsan thabs bcu gnyis ni// bla ma'i zhal las shes pa'i phyir// lus srog longs spyod
247a3(rgyud): / thams cad kyis// dus gsum maN+Dal bcas dang mchog/ lus srog rtag pa 'phangs pa bas// man ngag dam pa de phangs pas// de bas btsa' thabs legs par sba// man ngag chu bo'i rgyun 'dra bas// de nyid rgyun du shes par bya// 
247a4(rgyud): zab mo'i don ston rgyal bas gsungs// rdo rje bag mo la sngogs gsungs// gsang ba'i yang gsang rmad byung 'di// khyod la gtad do dam du spos// kun la spel na dam tshig nyams// kye ma rgyud 'di'i don 'di las// phyogs bcu'i
247a5(rgyud): 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'grob tshogs// thams cad ngo mtshar cher skyes te// dga' zhing mgu nas yid rang ngo // dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba las kyang ches
247a6(rgyud): zhes ba rmad du byung ba// rdzogs s+ho// / sing ga gling gi nal 'byor ma can nyam la dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ 
247a7(rgyud): / shA tsikra sa~M b+ha ra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo bsdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
247a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i bA ga la bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang / dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyis/ phyi'i mchod pa dang / nang gi mchod pa dang / gsang ba
247b1(rgyud): de kho na'i mchod pas mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dpal zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// 'khor lo zhes pa gang la bya// sdom pa nyid ni ji ltar lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji lta
247b2(rgyud): yin// de bzhin rgyal po ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te// 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi ru brjod// phyi nang gsang ba'i de nyid do// dang po phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni// sku mdog
247b3(rgyud): phyag mtshan lha yi sku// drug bcu rtsa gnyis rim pa ste// ye shes dam tshig sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor phyogs 'tshams rim pa bzhin// lugs byung lugs las bzlog pa ni// tha mal spyod pas phyi ru bshad// gnyis
247b4(rgyud): ba nang gi dkyil 'khor no// gnas sogs sa bcu'i rim pa rnams// mtho ris sa ste sa 'og dang // tsakra sbre la dgod pa ni// phyi rol spros pa gcod pa yin// gsum pa gsang ba'i tsakra ni// sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang // 
247b5(rgyud): de bzhin bde ba chen po ste// gtsang chen sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// gnas su gyur pas sdug bsngal gcod// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' dang // rnam par dga' ba'i gnyen pa ni// bde ba stong pa mi rtag
247b6(rgyud): gsum// dbyer med rtogs pas lhan skyes la// de kho na yi dkyil 'khor brjod// sdom pa phyi nang gsang ba nyid// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs po// gnyen po
247b7(rgyud): ye shes nang du sdom// bde dang dngos por lta ba dang // tha mal pa'i rnam rtog kyang // dag pa lnga'i 'khor lor sdom// gdod nas lus la grub pa yi/ 3/ rtse dang rlung dang byang sems dang // a
247b8(rgyud): wa d+hU ti'i nang du sdem// bde ba stong pa mi rtog dang // dngos dang dngos med ye shes kyang // / dbyer med gnyug ma'i gnas su sdom// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te// gnas skabs gsum gyi dri ma dang / 
248a1(rgyud): 'jug dang zhugs dang nges pa nyid// rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste// dang po 'khor khro'i ring bzhin la// gnyis pa thun mong mya ngan 'das// rgyal po zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// 'og ma'i yon tan 'dus pa dang // nges pa'i// 
248a2(rgyud): don la dbang byed dang // gnyen po ye shes che ba dang // gzhan la khyab pa'i rgyal po yi ni// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dur khrod rgyan ni ji ltar gnas// de'i dgos pa ji ltar gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// phyi nang
248a3(rgyud): gsang ba de nyid kyis// dur khrod rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur// dang po phyi yi dur khrod ni// rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol lam// yang na phyi rol gra rnams su// lugs byung lugs las bzlog pa ni// gtam khrag dang ni tshang tshang dang // 'bar bas 'khrug
248a4(rgyud): pa'i keng rus dang // 'jigs sde rnams ni shar sogs kyi// phyogs su g.yon nas bskor te gnas// ha ha ri dgod pa dbang ldan te// lus kyi nags tshal byin za'o// 'jigs pa'i mun pa bden bral du// rlung 'tshams ki la
248a5(rgyud): ki lir bgegs// shar du shA ri pi tsa ma// gtum drag dkar po glang po'i gdong // byang du byang chub shing bu la// g+ha ru ser po mi yaM gdong // nub du mya ngan med shing la// 'bar 'khrugs dmar po chu srin gdong // lho ru tsu ta'i shing
248a6(rgyud): bu la// 'jigs snga nag po ma he'i gdong // me ru dkar ba tsa ni ste// dpal gyi nags tshal ra gdong dmar// bden bral a 'dzu'i shing bu la// 'jigs pa'i mun pa ro langs gdong // rlung srid grub pa shing bu liM// ko lir
248a7(rgyud): bsgrogs pa ri dgas gdong // dpal ldan n+ya gro'i shing bu la// ha har bsgrogs pa ba glang gdong // g.yas na gri gug thod pa g.yon// shing lo'i gseb tu stong byung ngo // shar du brgya byin dmar po la// rdo rje sdig 'dzub glang po
248a8(rgyud): bcings// byang du lus ngan ser po la// dbyug pa 'dzin cing gter la gzhon// nub tu chu bdag dmar po ni// chu srin zhon nas zhags pa thogs// lho ru gshin rje nag pa la// me he zhon nas dbyig pa thogs// shar lho me lha dmar se ral
248b1(rgyud): ral zhon nas gling bu 'dzin// lho nub smug nag srin po ni// ral gri thogs nas mI la zhon// byang nub rlung lha mdog dkar po// ri dgas zhon nas gnas su 'phyar// byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni// khyu mchog zhon nas rtse gsum thogs// 
248b2(rgyud): thams cad rang 'dra'i rig mas mkhyud// bsu ta dang 'jog po dang // stobs kyi rgyu dang pad ma dang // shar nas brtsams te g.yon du dgod// pad ma tshe dang mtha' yas dang // rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong bzhi// g.yas kyi phyogs
248b3(rgyud): nas dgod pa'o// sgra bsgrogs pa dang ldog pa dang // mun pa can dang kun du 'khyil// shar nas byang gi phyogs su dgod// mkhris pa gang la 'bab pa dang // drag po'i sprin tshogs 'tshams laM dgod// rdo rje rin chen pod ma
248b4(rgyud): dang // lus dang dam tshig rnal 'byor ma// sna tshogs 'jig rten mkha' 'gro rnams// shin du 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis ni// ro la spyod cing mdangs la rgyu// gzhan yang rnal 'byor mchod rten dang // chu dang me sogs
248b5(rgyud): rim pa ste// gza' dang bar ta grub pa rnams// rol pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// 'byung po'i gdon dang ro langs dang // stag dang khyi da lce spyang dang // khra dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // phyed tshig pa dang rnam par sbyangs// mgo
248b6(rgyud): bo lus dur rkang rnams dang // a li phyed kyi sgra bsgrogs so// de nas nang gi dur khrod ni// lus kyi skra sran spu la sogs// skye zhing 'jig par byed pa na// dur khrod chen po lus la dgod// de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod ni// rtsa chen
248b7(rgyud): sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni// ldang 'jug gnas pa'i rlung rnams ni// dbugs rgyu zhes pa dur khrod do// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dang // dngos po'i rtog pa sna tshogs pa// chos kyi dbyings su dur du 'chi// gsang ba'i
248b8(rgyud): rig pa'i ye shes khrod// de nas dur khrod dgos pa ni// rnam shes dag pas dur khrod la// phyogs skyong mi dge bcu po spong // sangs rgyas brgyad kyi mtshan ma shing // thugs rje'i rtags su sprin brgyad la// zhing skyong
249a1(rgyud): gsang sngags theg pa bsrung // gdug pa 'joms phyir klu rnams dgod// mchod rten rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas// rnal 'byor brtul zhugs spyod pa byed// chu ni brjod bya zab pa la// me sogs rtog pa bral ba la'o// 
249a2(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs ni ji ldir lags// btsun me'i b+ha ga dza lta bu// bzhugs pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan
249a3(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// nyon mongs dang ni 'chi bdag bdud// lha yi bu dang phung po'i bdud// bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom pa la// ldan pa yon tan drug nyid de// dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags
249a4(rgyud): dang skal ba bzang // ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yi// drug po de la ldan zhes gsungs// 'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te// de dang bral phyir 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshes
249a5(rgyud): thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bcas// btsun mo zhes bya chos kyi dbyings// de la yod phyir po ga ste// mi phyed pas nA bzhugs zhes bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dpa' bo zhes ni gang
249a6(rgyud): la bya// de bzhin dpa' mo nyid kyang ci// de yi mchod pa ji ltar logs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa// dpa' bo la yang rnam bzhi ste// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// lha yi rnal 'byor sgom pa yis// tha mal pa yi
249a7(rgyud): rnamo rtog spong // des ni phyi yi dpa' bor bshad// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// rtswa rlung thig le sgom pa yi// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog 'joms pa nIni// nang gi dpa' bor bshad pa yin// gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel
249a8(rgyud): pa yi// dga' ba bzhi po don sgom pas// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'joms// de ni gsang ba'i dpa' bo yin// bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// gnyis su med par ga' sgom pa// tha dad rtog pa 'joms pa'i
249b1(rgyud): phyir/ de kho na yi dpa' bor bshad// dpa' mo la yang rnam pa bzhi// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// gdod nas spos bral lhun grub la// lha la zhen pa spong ba ni// de ni phyi yi ma mor bshad// nang du rtsa dang thig le sogs// rang bzhin
249b2(rgyud): med par byed pas ma// gsang bar dga' ba bzhi rnams la// rang bzhin lhan gcig skyes pas ma// rang rig sems kyi ngo bor na// nam mkha' lta bur gang sgom pa// de kho na yi dpa' mo'o// mchod pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi// phyi nang
249b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i de kho na// dang po phyi yi mchod pa ni// me tog bdug spros mar me dang // dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang // rol mo sgra snyan dbyangs nyid dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// ro dang reg pa 'jam pa dang // 'khor lo rin
249b4(rgyud): chen glang po rta// btsun mo dmag dpon blon po rnams// phyi yi mchod pas thun mong ngo // rang gi lus la byung ba yi// bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba dang // sha lnga lhags pa'i rdzas rnams dang // phung po khams dang skye mched kyis// 'khor lo/ 
249b5(rgyud): rnams la mchod pa nang // de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// rang snang thabs kyi rig ma yig sku gzung bA ga gzung skur btsir// rtsa dang rlung dang thig la sogs// dga' ba mchog dga' dga' bral dang // lhan gcig skyes pas bde bas
249b6(rgyud): mchod// rang rig stong pa rtogs pa yi// 'od gsal de nyid chos kyi sku// zhen pa rnams dang bral ba ni// bla na med pa'i mchod pa'o// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// gtor ma zhes ni gang la bya// 'di ni phan yon ji ltar 'byung // bcom
249b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// gtor mi rnam pa bzhi yin te// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// dang po phyi yi gtor ma ni// thun 'tshams lha yi mdun nyid du// raM las me dang yaMd las rlung // spyod gsum a las du ma gcig pa'i// 
249b8(rgyud): nang du bdud rtsi sha lnga la// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams mnyes par byed pa dang // mkha' 'gro dgas par byed pa'o// gnyis pa nang gi gtor ma ni// phung po khams dang skye mchod rnams// lus ni lha yi 'kho
250a1(rgyud): lo lnga/ rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod// gsum pa gsang ba'i gdor ma ni// 'khor lo bzhi yi ka pA lir// rlung dang thig le'i bdud rtsi la// dga' ba gsum gyis byin brlabs
250a2(rgyud): tete/ lhan gcig skyes pas mchod par bya// de bzhin pa yi gtor ma ni// phyi nang dngos po'i gtor ma kun// chos kyi dbyings kyi pad snod du// don dam sems kyi gsum sngags kyi// bde ba chen po'i lha la mchod// phan yon
250a3(rgyud): dngos grub ster ba dang // phyi nang par chad sel ba dang // zas kyi rtog pa choms pa ni// khams dang skye mched brtan pa dang // rgas sra lus kyi mdangs ldan zhing // skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang // dang saM po rtog las grol ba dang // 
250a4(rgyud): 'khor ba'i pha rol la sogs pa'o// dpa' mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu// de las 'khrul na ji ltar 'khor// ma 'khrul don la ji ltar bzhag/ de las yon tan ji ltar 'byung // bcom ldan
250a5(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// sems las ma rtogs sangs rgyas dang // sems las ma rtogs chos gzhan sa/ sangs rgyas kyis ni ma gzigs zhing // ma gsungs gsung bar mi 'gyur te// des na sangs rgyas thams te/ 
250a6(rgyud): cad kyi// sems kyi gsang 'di gsang ba'i mchog/ khams gsum brtan dang g.yor bcas pa// snang ma myong zhing 'grub pa med// de phyir 'khor ba'i ming yang med// thog mar ma skyes rang bzhin dag/ blo bur sangs rgyas
250a7(rgyud): ming yang med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ma yin// kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang gzhan rig pa 'od gsal sogs// sgrar med brjod du med pa ste// dper na lkugs pas re myong 'dra// ras dang shil 'dra'i rang
250a8(rgyud): rig le// log rtog lha sogs rnam pas 'khrul// khams gsum brtan dang g.yor snang zhing // 'dod pa'i byang chub sna tshogs dang // de dag spyod pa sna tshogs dang // de nyid g.yeng dang rnam rtog ste// rang gis 'khrul nas
250b1(rgyud): rang gis 'ching // rang gis gsod cing rang gis za// rang gis ltung zhing rang sdug bsngal// rang rig ye nas spros bral lo// sgra dang tha snyad 'jug na 'jug/ rang rig rang gis 'od gsal ba// ma rig ldan pas sgrib na 'khrul/ 
250b2(rgyud): dngos po stong par ro mal sa la// blang dang dor ba med na 'khrul// 'dod yon ngang gis 'gag pa la// de dag dka' bas spang na 'khrul// rang rig yo nas stong pa la// 'dod yon lnga la brtan na 'khrul// dman dang gya nim
250b3(rgyud): med pa la// sgo dang skur pa 'den sa na 'khrul// gdod nas spros bral lhun grub la// sbom dang mi sgom byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med la// de dag gnyis su 'dzin na 'khrul// don dam kun rdzob
250b4(rgyud): gnyis med la// bde ni pa gnyis su byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor bar rgal// skye 'gag gang ltar 'dod na 'khrul// stong nyid ro la mi gnas par// dngos po mtshan mar gnas na 'khrul// sems kyi glang chen mi
250b5(rgyud): 'dul bar// g.yeng ba'i sems su 'dul na 'khrul// rnam rtog rlung gis bskyed pa la// rang rig ye shes 'dod na 'khrul// rang sems rang gis ma mthong bar// che ba'i nga rgyal smra na 'khrul// rang rig nyams su ma myong bar// 
250b6(rgyud): dkar po'i chos rnams spong na 'khrul// sangs rgyas ma 'khrul sems can 'khrul// rang rig ma 'khrul gzhan rig 'khrul// sems nyid ma 'khrul bag chags 'khrul// sangs rgyas las 'khrul bag chags te// rang rig ma
250b7(rgyud): las 'khrul gzhan rig snang // sems nyid las 'khrul bag chags 'byung // des na rang sems 'khrul pa dang // don du snang ba rab tu skye// skye ba med bzhin skye ba 'khrul// lcags bsregs sa gzhi rang gi sems/ 
250b8(rgyud): me sogs byed pa gzhan na med// bkres skom sdug bsngal rang gi sems// zas skom bkres pa gzhan na med// brdeg sogs lcags kyu rang gi sems// srog gcod shan pa gzhan na med// 'khor ba rang sems
251a1(rgyud): thams cad kun// rang gi sems su ma shes na// ngo yis sangs rgyas spangs pa yin// bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// theg chen zab mo'i mdo rgyud lta// sgrom du med pa'i don sgoms na// ma bsgoms na
251a2(rgyud): yang sgom pa'i mchog/ de ltar gyur pa'i mkhas pa la// stong par mi 'gyur gang yang med// de las mya ngan 'das pa 'byung // dbang dang stobs la sogs pa kun// nor bu'i tshul du rang bzhin 'byung // de dag sems
251a3(rgyud): kyi phan yon no// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rten gyi gang zag rnam pa dang // rgyud kyi rnam grangs du zhig mchis// gdul bya gang la rgyud rnams bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// sems
251a4(rgyud): can sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas// gdol pa ko lpags mkhan la sogs// gzugs ngan gsod pa don gnyer ba// theg pa 'di la grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par sgom pa dang // gtso bo yab yum sgom pa
251a5(rgyud): dang // dbu ma'i spyan la sems 'dzin pa// bskyed rims srod dang bcas pa'i lam// rig le gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// lha la sogs pa bu mo mtshan ldan la// chags pas chags pa spong ba ni// las kyi phyag rgya chags
251a6(rgyud): pa'i lam// gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa byang sems dman pa'i dbyings// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug yan lag bdun sgom pa// chos kyi phyag rgya grol ba'i lam// rton yod ma yin brten
251a7(rgyud): pa med// dmyigs pa thams cad rnam gsal te// lhan gcig skyes pa'i don sgom pa// phyag rgya chen po rang lhag pa// de rnams gnyis su bsdu ba ste// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// las dang po la ni phyi nang gnyis// mtsha
251a8(rgyud): la yang ni phyi nong gnyis// dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste// 'di yis rgyud rnams 'grub par 'gyur// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa gsum kha shad
251b1(rgyud): bsum bcu rtsa gnyis te// yan lag rgyud ni grangs med 'das// rtsa ba chen po phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar bsdus pa yin// bram ze rje'u rigs rgyal rigs dang // dmangs rigs gdol pa gdul don du// rgyud kyang rnam
251b2(rgyud): bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gnas gang du ni gtso bo sbom// thabs ni rnam pa du zhig mchis// de bzhin thabs las 'byung ba ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
251b3(rgyud): bsrel pa// ri'i ma dur khrod ri stengs su// gcer bu skra bshig lhor lhas te// a li kA lis lus bsrungs la// dpa' bo 'khor lo bsgom par bya// smin par byed pa dbang bzhi la// grol lame bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi lam
251b4(rgyud): lam gnyis la ni brten nas su// sngags pas byang chub bsgrub par bya// bum pas rang gi dri ma bkru// gsum pas sems kyi dri ma ste// de ni kun du brtags pa la// lhan gcig skyes pa'i ma rig pa// bkru ba'i phyir na bzhi pa
251b5(rgyud): bshad// gnas dang ldang ba nyid dag dang // 'jug dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang // byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang // ting 'dzin mchod pa bskyed rims la// nye bar bsdu ba rdzogs rims so// rim gnyis mAnyam
251b6(rgyud): par gnas nas su// rdo rje can gyis chos bshad de// stong pa mngon gyur chos sku la// mtshan dpes bde la ba longs spyod sku// rol pa'i mdzad pa sbrul sku lo// sku gsum dbyer med bde chen no// lha mos gsol pa bcom
251b7(rgyud): ldan 'das// gang gis bsgrubs na grub par 'gyur// gang la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa// 'khor bas skyen sa sdom gsum ldan// thos chen dang ldan mtshan nyid bzang // dben
251b8(rgyud): par dal bris sgra bcad de// chos gos gyon la bdud rtsi sbyar// thun bzhir bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhen pa chen po'i rnal 'byor la// lta ba'i bar chad 'thung bar 'gyur// g.yeng ba ma pa'i rnal 'byor la sbom
252a1(rgyud): pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor la// spyod pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// le lo cha bya'i rnal 'byor la// 'bras bu'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// lha mos gsol pa bcom
252a2(rgyud): ldan 'das// rgyud kyi ngo bo ji lta bu// rtsa ba'i rgyud zhes gang la bya// bshad pa'i rgyud ni gang la bgyi// 'byung ba'i dus ni ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// lhan gcig skyes pa'i ye shes la// rgyud
252a3(rgyud): rnams kun gyi ngo bor 'dus// yod pa rgyu la sgrub pa'i lam// mngon 'gyur 'bras bu'i ngo bo'o// thog mar gsung ba rtsa ba'i rgyud// phyi nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i rgyud// don rnams ston pas rtsa ba la// gsal bar
252a4(rgyud): byed pas bshad pa'i rgyud// bskal pa rdzogs ldan sum gnyis dang // rtsod ldan dus bzhi'i rim pa yis// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan
252a5(rgyud): 'das// zab mo'i rgyud 'di gang la sgra// ji lta bu la sbyin par bya// ster na lung nod ji ltar bya// bka' 'di rgya yis ji ltar gdab// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// snying rje med cing khro la gdug/ khengs shing
252a6(rgyud): chags la tshul khrims med// dad med rigs ngan bla ma skyo// thos chung snying rings rnams la spa/ dpa' zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med// dad ldan rigs ldan gtong phod che// thos mang
252a7(rgyud): dam tshig ldan pa sbyin// dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon du bla ma mnyes par bya// yar ngo mar ngo'i tshes bcu la// dpa' bo rnal 'byor tshogs kyis mchod// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// lha mo rnams
252a8(rgyud): la spyod gtad ltaro// de bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud sde rnams// zung la sgrub po tshe dad kyis// lon gsum brjod la rgyud rnams bya// phyi rabs dus kyi sdigs ma la// chags shing gyong ba'i slob ma ni// gus par mi
252b1(rgyud): zhu g.yo sgyus 'dod// thos nas khungs su ba rang che 'byin// de la bstan na dam tshig nyams// nges par dad nas zhu ba yi// gcig nis gnyis la ma spel na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs rgyud 'chad// bcom ldan
252b2(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang // mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad rgyud kyi don rtogs nas rjes su yi rang ngo // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dur khrod rgyun rmad du byung ba rdzogs so// 
252b3(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang // lo tsA ba shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsaN+Da ma le tan tra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal zla ba phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje
252b4(rgyud): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mgon po rdo rje can// sgron ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// nges pa gang lags tshad gang lags// rang bzhin grub pa ji ltar lags// mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom
252b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rang bzhin grub pa sgrub 'dod pas// bla ma'i bka' drin legs mnos pas// dur khrod la sogs sa phyogs su// bar chad gsum med yon tan ldan// brtags pa las dang po yi
252b6(rgyud): gnas// gang zag mchog la brtag pa med// yon tan ldan pa'i ser 'dug ste// bla mas sems bzung rnal 'byor pas// sgro dal ba yi tshing brtags te// bcing ba gsum ni nges bsgoms na// skye ba gcig gis
252b7(rgyud): 'grub par nges// dbugs bcing kun rdzob sna rtser yid// yid bcing sor bzhi nam mkha' sems// sems bcings rang rig bsam mi khyab// rnargyu rkyen las skye sna tshogs las// sems can mos pa sna tshogs
252b8(rgyud): 'byung // de dag bcings gsum dag pa yis// sems can la las nges bsgrol bar// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// 'du shes gsum gyis chags pas grol// thig le cha gsum phra mo ni// yan lag lnga
253a1(rgyud): @ldan 'byung ba'i rim// sgra dang rang bzhin ro rang snang // stong nyid thabs dang shes rab tshul// sa dang lam sogs rim pa kun// rang bzhin gyis gnas mkhas pas sbyor// de nas sgron ma'i tshad
253a2(rgyud): bstan te// tshad ni spyi dang bye brag ste// brgya phrag gnyis dang bcu gnyis ni// yi ge gsum las nges byung ba// gsang ba gcod pa rgyud kyi tshad// brgya phrag gcig dang sum bcu lnga// yi ge bcu las nges 'byung ba/ 
253a3(rgyud): rin chen phreng ba nges tshad do// brgya phrag gcig dang sum bcu bzhi// mi 'gyur sum bcu las 'byung ba// sku gsung thugs kyi sgron ma'o// brgya bcu rtsa lnga yi ge bzhi// ma tshang ba las gang 'gyur ba// gsa' bsam/ 
253a4(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'o// brgya bcu rtsa gnyis yi ge gcig// rin chen 'bar ba'i lnga tshad do// sum bcu rtsa gnyis yi ga ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis byung ba'i// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i tshad yin no// drug bcu rtsa drug yi ge
253a5(rgyud): drug/ dam tshig chen po rgyud kyi tshad// drug bcu yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig la// gsang ba rdo rje rab tu grags// drug bcu rtsa gnyis mi 'gyur ba// bcu drug stobs po che'i tshad// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig yi ge l-I/ nam
253a6(rgyud): mkha' chen po'i tshid yin no// sum bcu rtsa bzhi yi yi ge drug/ ye shes 'bar ba'i ljang tshad do// sum bcu rtsa drug yi ge dgu// ye shes brang ba'i tshad yin no// sum bcu rtsa bzhi nyi shu bzhi/ mkha' 'gro gas
253a7(rgyud): ba'i tshad yin no// sum bcu rtsa bzhi bzhi bcu dag/ me yi phreng ba'i tshad yin no// nyi shu rtsa bzhis bcwo brgyad dag/ de nas nges par bshad bya ste// gsang ba'i 'khor lo gang bston pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje
253a8(rgyud): / dam tshig dag/ dog pa dam tshig chen por nges// dgra drug ston pa stobs po che// dbang bzhi dgag sgrub gsang ba gcod// rang rig de don bsam mi khyab// yi ge gsum don rin chen 'bar// sgo gsum lam/ 
253b1(rgyud): sngon nam mkha' mnyam// bcom ldan la sogs the tsom med// ston pa nam mkha' chen po ste// dbang bzhi de nyid gang ston pa// ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud du nges// lha spyod rmad du byung bar ston// ston pa ye shes phreng bar
253b2(rgyud): nges// gleng slang rnam pa lnga yi don// ston pa mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud// he ru ka dpal gang ston pa// me yi phreng ba'i rgyud du nges// dbang gsum ngon ni gang ston pa// sku gsung thugs kyi ra la rI// snod bcud rin chen
253b3(rgyud): ston byed pa// rin chen phreng ba'i ra la dir// thams cad kyi don la rjes su yi rang ngo // dpal zla ba'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ shri rad na dz+wa la ta na tra rA dza nA ma/ bod
253b4(rgyud): skad du/ dpal rin po che 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// he ho rdo rje snying po dang // mkha' spyod sa spyod la sogs rnams// sgo gsumi legs par bsdus nas ni// ra yi
253b5(rgyud): chen po dbye ba nyon// ra li las gnyis thabs kyi rgyud// ra lus byung ba shes rab rgyud// li phyis a las gnyis med rgyud// thabs ni sku ste shes rab gsung // gnyis med thugs su shes par bya// sku gsung thugs su rang
253b6(rgyud): bzhin las// nyi shu rtsa bzhir byung ba'o// a la la ho// e ma ho// thabs ni la las ji ltar byung // ra las shes rab ji ltar byung // a las gnyis med ji ltar byung // sku gsung thugs su ji ltar 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa bzhir/ 
253b7(rgyud): ji ltar 'gyur// oM ma ho// mgon pos bshad du gsol// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' bstsal pa// A las a wa d+hU tA ste// 'di nyid las ni gnyis med rgyud// 'byung ba'i gnas dang rgyu ru brtag/ la las
253b8(rgyud): la la na yi rtsa// de las thabs ni rgyud byung ba'i// rgyud dang gnas dang ngo bor brtag/ re las rA sa na yi rtsa// 'di nyid las ni shes rab kyi// ra li byung ba'i rgyud dang gnas// shes rab ye shes bcu drug brda'// la ni
254a1(rgyud): nub kyi thabs yin te/ thabs kyi yi ge bcu bzhi yi brda'// thog mtha' med las ma skyes pa'i// a nI gnyis med rang bzhin te// gnyis med blo yi spyod yul min// blo dang sgra ni kun rdzob phyir
254a2(rgyud): g.yas ni thabs yin la la ni// g.yon pa'i shes rab ra sa na// oM ba d+hU ti gnyis su med// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med kyi// ra li yi ngo bor shes par bya// 'dod chags mun pa lus ni thabs// la la
254a3(rgyud): na ni sku yin te// gti mug mun pa dag dang yang // shes rab ras sa na ni gsung // zhe sdang snying po stobs yin te// sku ste gsum gyis 'gyur ba'o// sku la brgyad de gsung la brgyad // thugs la brgyad de nyi
254a4(rgyud): shu bzhi// ra li nyi shu rtsa bzhir nges// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang // tsan du li dang phyag dag dang // 'khor na 'byung ba nyi shu bzhis// de nyid brda' ru nges pa ste// sku gsung thugs su dbye bas so// gnas dang
254a5(rgyud): mkha' 'gror ldir dbye// sgo gsum du ni de bzhin bsngo// dang po rgyud kyi dbye ba dang // rgyud kyi nges pa gnas pa des// gtod pa nges dang go rims ngas// grangs nges rigi oM bcoM lnga nges/ mdo sde 'dul ba
254a6(rgyud): mngon pa yi// dman pa'i rigs pas dang po gsungs// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// de rjes rnal 'byor nyid yin no// skyes pa gdul phyir rnal 'byor rgyud// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// bud med
254a7(rgyud): yongs su bzung phyir ro// dang po rtsa ba'i rgyud gsungs te// de nas bshad pa'i rgyud yin no// de rjes phyi ma phyi ma ste// rim pa bcu ni bskor ba ste// snod ngan dman pa'i rigs pas so// me tog snying
254a8(rgyud): pos bcud bzhin du// phyi yi phyi nas bdud rtsi'o// ra lI snying po snying po'i rgyud// dang por la la thabs kyi rgyud do// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro mas zhus nas// sku yi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// de rjes
254b1(rgyud): ra li gsung gi rgyud// gsung gi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// phyi nas a las thugs kyi rgyud// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// gnyis med ye shes bdud rtsi'i ro// lus las la gsal la mig gi lus// 
254b2(rgyud): gsal ba'i phyir ni sgron ma ste// seng ge'i gzugs 'dra bdud rtsi'i ro// nyi ma'i 'od 'dra zla ba'i zer// 'brug gi sgra 'dra rgya mtsho'i gting // chu bo'i rgyun 'dra ri rab ldan// u dum 'bar ba zhing gi rdul// 'di la 'dod
254b3(rgyud): 'dod tshol ba dang // rtog ge pa yis spyad du med// gal te rang 'dod spyad gyur no// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro khros 'gyur te// mgo lus tshal pa brgya ru 'gas// de bas rang gi chung ma dang // bu dang yul 'khor lus dag
254b4(rgyud): dag gis// bla ma dam pa mnyes par bya// chu bo'i rgyun 'dra man ngag blang // kye mu mgon po snying rje che// ra li'i dbye ba de ltar na// de yi chen po ji ltar lags// nang du nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// nges par phyi yang bdag la gsungs
254b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang gis bka' bstsal pa// mi spangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// ra li 'di ni chen por 'gyur// re re la yang chen po bdun// gang zhig 'bras bu 'dod pa la// rgyu nyid gtso bor 'gyur ba ste// sa lu la ni myu gu bzhin
254b6(rgyud): de phyir dang po'i rgyu mi spang // lhan gcig skyes gnyis rgyu yin te// rang bzhin lhan gcig skyes pa dang // lhun gcig lhan gcig skyes pa'o// thun mong dang ni thun mong min// bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya'i phyir// dpa'
254b7(rgyud): bo mkha' 'gro'i zhal yin te// de nyid ston pa'i bka' las 'das// de las 'khrul pa snying re rje// phung rdzogs rtsa dang shu kA ni// lhan gcig skyes pa'i rgyu yin te// log rtog 'khrul pa rgyur 'dod dang // ngo bo ma grub
254b8(rgyud): rgyur 'dod dang // kun rdzob byang sems rgyur 'dod dang / 'di ni rmongs pa ma rungs pa// phung po 'byung ba dbang po dang // phyi yi skye mched dman pa'i rgyu// brtag 'gyur 'dod pa snying re rje// nam mkha'i me tog
255a1(rgyud): / dri gang dang / rang bzhin gnas pa'i rtsa rlung sogs// khyad par lam gyi rgyu yin te// rang bzhin gnas pa ma shes par// log par rtog pa snying rje nyams// don dam byang chub sems kyis ni// lhan
255a2(rgyud): gcig skyes pa'i ye shes dgu// bla ma ma brten pa las 'khrul// kun rdzob shu kra rgyur 'dod pa// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'o// rkyen med rgyu yis 'bras mi 'byin// de phyir rkyen ni spang mi bya// ye shes rlung dang ya sh+ya
255a3(rgyud): me/ lhan skyes gnyis ni rkyen yin te// de nyid spang bar mi bya zhing // las kyi rlung dang me nyid spang // gzhan du de bzhin pa sbyar bar bya// srid pa len dang bde ba len// las ma spang zhing dra bya ba yang // ma spang ba ni bzhi pa'o// 
255a4(rgyud): lus dang lus kyi snying po rtse// gnas dang gnas chan mi spang ba// lnga pa drug pa yin par 'dod// de nyid phyi dang nang du shes// phyi ning dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// snang ba dang ni mun pa'i tshe// gang dang gang ni stong pa'i tshe// 'pho ba ma
255a5(rgyud): spangs brgyad pa'o// rgyu'i gnas dang 'bras bu'i gnas// de nyid mi spang shes par bya// rin po che yi pho brang du// rten ni mau spang shu ku bzung // gal te da ru ma yin na// shor ba mi spang ro mar bstim// gnyen po mi spang
255a6(rgyud): gzugs sku gnyis// mi spang ba ni bcu gnyis pa'o// nor bu rten las skyes pa yi// bde ba la brten dbang po yi// sgo yi ngo bo ma spangs pa'o// gong 'og khyad par shes byas nas// sgyu mas gnyen bro ma spangs pa'o// dga'
255a7(rgyud): ba mchog dga' zhes bya ste// sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// 'khor ba lugs las bzlog bya ste// gnas dang gnas su ldog byed pa// gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid rim par 'pho byed par// bla ma'i bla ma las
255a8(rgyud): brgyud shes// 'khor ba 'jug ldog bye brag gis// 'pho ba ma spangs rnam pa gnyis// ye shes ma na cher 'bar byas// phung po 'byung ba dbang po sogs// thams cad bdud rtsir 'gyur ba ni// rkyen gyi khyad par ma spangs
255b1(rgyud): gnyis/ rten gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang // brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun// bde ba'i ngo bor gang gnas pa// ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid sgyu ma rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i
255b2(rgyud): khyad par ma spangs pa'o// mdog mdzes mig yangs phyag rgyad ldan pa mu dra ma spangs pa'o// dom tshig chos kyi phyag rgya ni// de nas ye shes phyag rgya che// phyag rgya'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// chags pa'i phyag rgya las min to// dam
255b3(rgyud): tshig chos ni nga gi ste// mu tA gnyis su shes par bya// ye shes phyag rgya chen po gnyis// grol ba'i mu drA yin par 'dod// phyag rgya'i dbye ba mi spangs pa'o// dang po gsang ba'i 'khor lo ste// phyi nas rang bzhin 'khor lo yin// 
255b4(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang por gsang ba'i gtum mo ste// gnyis par rang bzhin gtum mo ni// gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spongs pa'o// las kyi rlung dang me gnyis ni// kun rdzob 'khor ba'i rkyen yin te// ye shes
255b5(rgyud): rlung dang me gnyis ni// don dam gnyis med rkyen te yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// srid pa'i bskyed gcig 'dzag po ba de// kun rdzob sha tA'i los yin no// srid pa ma yin rang rig bskyed// don dam byang sems
255b6(rgyud): las yin no// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// sbyor thabs rtsi ni rgyas pa dang // kha 'byed pa yi las yin te// sbyor ba thabs bzhi la ma rmongs// 'di nyid ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// spyi 'thun las las grub pa'o// smin drug
255b7(rgyud): la sogs drangs kyis bston// rang rig ye shes las 'dod pa// bla ma'i dus mtha' legs bsten te/ mi spang nges pa'i man ngag blang // 'di ni rdo rje 'chang gi rgyu// de las byung po khyad par 'bras// dang por che ste thig le/ 
255b8(rgyud): dang / tshul dang tshul can mchog gzhan mchog/ 'di nyid de nyid drug yin te// de dag drug gi tsan d+ha li// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// tsan d+ha li ni nyi shu bzhi// ra la nyi shu rtsa bzhir nges// phyi ru gnas ni nyi shu bzhi// spyan
256a1(rgyud): dang phyag rgya nyi shu bzhi// tsan dA li dang ra li yi// phyi dad nang du grangs su nges// te he dpa' bo rdo rje 'chang // ra li 'byung ba'i sgo gang lags// sku dang phyag mtshan rags pa kun// ra li yi ngo bo mnyam pa'i lam// 
256a2(rgyud): mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod// sgo gsum la gnas zab pa yi// ra li ngo bor gsungs pa ya ni// dga' ba bcu drug brten dang bcas// khyad par ra li yi ngo bor bstan// rang rig stong pa'i thabs dang bcas// mthar
256a3(rgyud): thug ra lir shes par bya// oM ni thog mthar ma skyes pa// la ni nub dang skyong bar byed// r-i ni 'dod chags rin po che// ra las 'dod chags khrag yin te// la las zhe sdang khu ba ste// a las gti mug sems zhugs te/ 
256a4(rgyud): sems can ra li'i rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga dang sa bcu sogs// kun ljon pas ni ra lir gnas// sku yi ro lIr spyi bor gnas// gtsug tor dag nas byung bya'o// gsung ni ljags kyi dbang po nas// thugs kyi
256a5(rgyud): rA li thugs kha nas// 'byung ba'i gnas kyi nges pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/  spyan rnams las ni nges par 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi gnas las te// spyi bo la sogs dag nas byung // phyag gi 'thil nas
256a6(rgyud): rim pas 'byung // bla ma'o zhil nas blang bar bya// bye brag 'byung ba'i sgo yin no// he ho sems can sangs rgyas kyi// rang bzhin sa dang ldan pa ste// sa bcu la sogs sa sogs nas// brdzus skyes la sogs ji
256a7(rgyud): lhor legs// 'on te sangs rgyas min nus ci// sems can thams cad bzod ma nus// sangs rgyas yin par gsungs pa ste// rdzus skyes sgong skyes drod gsher sogs// sems kyi gnas bcus so bcu ste// rnam
256a8(rgyud): shes brgyad ni byang chub lnga// mkhan po sems kyi rgyal po ste// rang bzhin drag pa chos gos yin// rang bzhin gnas ga baspu bregaso// a da da ga gnyis sngags kyi don// thams cad sems la gnas pas na/ 
256b1(rgyud): sems med sangs rgyas ma yin te// dam grog la sogs bems po'o// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin ni// rgyu dang 'bras bu tshul dang yang // bag la nyal dang mngon du rgyu// nub pa'i tshul/ 
256b2(rgyud): dang mngon pa'i tshul// gzugs can gzugs med mkhas pas brtag/ sangs rgyas sems can de bzhin no// de ltar sems can sangs rgyas dang // ra li'i sems can rang bzhin phyir// lus la sku yi phyag rgyas btu ba
256b3(rgyud): ngag la gsung gi phyag rgyas bta bA// sems la thugs kyi phyag rgyas btab// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du// dngos por ro mnyam gyur pa lo// sems can sangs rgyas ga la yod// dman dang gya nom ga le yod// 'khor ba yongs/ 
256b4(rgyud): su shes pa la// mya ngan 'das zhes de la brjod// thams cad rdzogs nas rna me rtog spongs// 'di la thams cad ngo mtshur gyis// legs par gtad kyis legs pararo spos// de'i tshe thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur to// mi snang bar gyur to// 
256b5(rgyud): / rin po che'abar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// DA / rnal 'byor ma zla ba'i phreng ba ma dang / bla ma shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cang zhus pa// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA sUr+ya tsakra tA na tra rA dza nA ma// bod
256b6(rgyud): skad du/ dpel nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// dpal bde bo chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho dpa' bo kye/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi// bskyed dang rdzogs pa chen po yi// ma spangs pa dang nges pa dag/ 
256b7(rgyud): mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// dang po ma spangs bshad bya ste// phung po khams dang skye mchod dag/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rgyu ma spangs// phyag mtshan nyi zla yig 'bru dang // bla ma'i man ngage rkyen mo spangs// lus ngag
256b8(rgyud): sgo gsum dam tshig las// sku gnyis 'byung ba'i 'bras ma spangs// zhe sdang ru trar skye ba'i lhaso// zhe sdang rang rig bskyed pa dang // lus kyi dri ma bkru sa'i las// lus kyi dbye bra ma spangs pa// pu li gnyis dang dz+wa lan sogs/ nad
257a1(rgyud): @#// spyi yi spyi gtsug sogs// gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs ga shwar sogs bdud kyi snying kha ru// zhabs gnas gnas chen ma spangs pa// gnas de phyi dang nang du shes// gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// gser 'gyur rtse 'i
257a2(rgyud): rnam pa bzhin// phung sogs lta bur 'pho byed pa// 'di ni 'pho ba ma spangs pa'o// rgyu'i gnas ni snying kha ste// 'bras bu'i gnas ni phung sogs te// ma spangs pa yi gnas su shos// phung sogs sgyu mar shes 'dzin byed// 
257a3(rgyud): / 'di yi rten ni ma spangs pa'o// gal te nang du ma zin na// phyi ru de nyid ngo bor sgom// de nyid shor ba ma spangs pa'o// gnyen po mi spong sgyu mar sgom// pung sogs la brten lha rnams la// spro bsdu ngo bo ma spangs pa'o// tha mal pa dang
257a4(rgyud): bskyed rims gnyis// gong 'og khyad par shes bya ste// sgyu mo gnyen po nang ma spangs// bdun po rnam dag la sogs pa// sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// phung sogs rtog pa las log nas// phra ba'i gnas su gnas byed med/ gan+d+ha
257a5(rgyud): kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// lha yi rnam pa 'jug pa dang // gong du sgyu mar ldog pa gnyis// 'pho ba'i khyad par ma spangs nyid// ye shes me ni cher 'tshar nyid// pung sogs sgyu mar gang 'dzin pa// rten gyi khyad pa ro ma spangs pa'o// 
257a6(rgyud): mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun 'gags te// thams cad rten dang brtan par snang // ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa// de nyid sgyu mar rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa// shes rab pag mo mo spangs pa// phyag rgya
257a7(rgyud): spangs pa ru 'dod/ ma spangs gcig na gzhan dang 'dre// gong ma 'og las khyad par 'di// zhe sdang thugs la 'dod chags sku// gti mug gsung gi rang bzhin te// phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs lo khor
257a8(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dag/ 'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa// dang po sgyu ma'i ye shes me// gnyis pa sgyu ma ltar snang mo// gtum mo'i dbye ba me spangs pa// pud sogs sgyu ma yang dag phrog// kun rdzob rig pa'i rkyen yin te// 
257b1(rgyud): smra ma ltar snang la yo zhing // sgyu ma de nyid ltar bsreg pa// don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa// 'khor ba spel zhing rnam rtog bskyed// kun rdzob 'dun pa sems kyi las// 'khor dang mi 'khor rang / 
257b2(rgyud): rig bskyed// don dam sems kyi las yin te// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa// 'di dag ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa'o// gsang dbang bla ma'i zhal nas shes// shes rab ye shes gzhan du'o/ 
257b3(rgyud): bzhi pa ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// rang rig lhan gcig skyes pa yi// chos nyid ma dag zhi ba'i rgyu// zhal gyi man ngag rkyen ma spangs// 'gro ba'i chos rnams rang rig med// bsreg pa'i las rnams ma spangs yin// gong
257b4(rgyud): 'og rim pas dbe kA maM spangs// e wa d+hu hi 'og min gnas// gnas dang gnas chen ma spangs pa'o// de nyid phyi dang nang du shes// phyi nang dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// stong pa Ta dang ni gzung 'dzin char// 'pho ba ma spangs a
257b5(rgyud): d+ha hA// rten ma spangs te rtog ma spangs// sems dang de nyid rang rig sgom// shor ba ma spangs rang rig la// dbang po'i sgo bsdu ngo ma spangs// rtog bcom gnyen pos ma spangs pa// rang rig spyi la sems pa la// sngon 'gro ma
257b6(rgyud): spangs me spangs brgyad// bla mra'i zhal nas shes par bya// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid la// 'phro ba ma spangs rang rig sgom// phyag rgya ma spangs rang rig las// 'phrin las nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'byung // las ma spangs te gzhan
257b7(rgyud): rnams ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// dad med bla ma la brten te// bla ma dam pa mi rnyed dang // ma spangs ngo bo ma shes par// rang rig 'bras bu gang 'dod pa// de dag mi shes dri mas bsgribs// dper na sbrul gyi'o// 
257b8(rgyud): ma byazhin// de na nges pa bcwo lnga yang // rgyu dang rgyu dang gnas dang sngar// gtod pa'i go rims grangs dang rim// nges pa bdun na gzhan du gsungs// sngags ni spro ba spros pa des// rkyen ni ye shes rlung nges// rgyu 'bras gnas
258a1(rgyud): ni a he nges/ dbang gnyis gong 'og khyad par des// sun 'byin gnyis po nges pa dang // ngo bo ngos dang dbye ba nges// las nges pa dang bcwo lnga ste// de las byung ba'i nges pa dag/ bcu bdun bla ma'i
258a2(rgyud): zhal las shes// ma spangs pa dang nges pa yi// mtshan nyid yongs su shes gyur na// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// thams cad 'di las spangs par byed// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'dres pa yi// dngos grub
258a3(rgyud): thams cad 'di las byung // gong bu chu dang gzugs la gnas// de bzhin gzugs las 'das pa dang // gnas pa rnam pa bzhi ru yang // rgyud ni nges pa kho na'o// rgyud 'di dbang gi ngor por gnas// de phyir dngos grub
258a4(rgyud): 'dod pa yang // 'bad pas bla ma mnyes bya ste// rgyud kyi ngo bo dbang rnams dang // de yi man ngag shes par bya// bla ma mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas na// nyan pa la sogs byed po ni// 'bras bu
258a5(rgyud): med cing brlag par 'gyur// de bas 'bado rtenani tan bya// dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// rgya gor gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang // dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bskor ba'o// 
258a6(rgyud): rgya grar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na rA dza tAn tra rA dza// bod skad du/ dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi pa sangs rgyas// kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs/ gang
258a7(rgyud): phyir sems can thams cad kyi// mya ngan 'das pa tho ba bya'i phyir// dad dang brtson 'grus rdzogs byas te// bla ma'i rjes su 'jug par bya// rang rig gnyis su med pa la// gzhan rig gnyis su 'dzin pa 'khrul// bzod nas
258a8(rgyud): ma skyes ma grub la// skye dang grub par 'dzin par 'khrul// dngos po mnyam gyur pa la// dman dang gya nom 'dzin pas 'khrul// 'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid// mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa la// sangs rgyas sems can
258b1(rgyud): rtog pas 'khrul// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa la// rgyu dang rkyen gyis skyes pas 'khrul// brda dang tha snyad bral ba la// brda yi spyod yul byed pas 'khrul// mtha' bral dbu mar gnas pa la// rtog dang chad par 'dzin pas 'khrul
258b2(rgyud): shes brjod yul las 'odas pa la// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khrul// dngos po mtshan ma la sogs pa yi// rnam rtog kun gyis stong pa la// dngos po rjes su 'dzin pas 'khrul// rang rig gnyis su med pa la/ bdun
258b3(rgyud): pa gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul// gdul bya sna tshogs gdul ba yi// theg pa du ma gong 'og la// sgo dang bskur pa 'debs pas 'khrul// sems can 'khrul pa sna tshogs kyis// las kyi rnam smin sna tshogs la// lta bas skur
258b4(rgyud): pa'ade blo pas 'khrul// rang rig gdod nas 'od gsal ba// bskur dang phyag mtshon la sogs pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dod pas 'khrul// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhir// 'dod chags 'dod chags chen po ste// 'khrul
258b5(rgyud): bzhi 'khrul pa las 'das na// 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang zhe sdang chen po dang // de bzhin zhe sdang bcom ldan 'das// gti mug gti mug chen po ste// de bzhin gti mug bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis dri
258b6(rgyud): par grol 'gyur gyi// 'di springs gzhan gyis grol ba min// bdag po lta pa dang la bla ma spun// bdag po lhan cig rnal 'byor tsam// theg pa spyi smras de las gzhan// skye bo bems po tshad dang brgyad// de dag rang rig thob pa'i
258b7(rgyud): rgyu/ dwe phyir dam tshig gtso bor bsrung // 'bras bu khyad par rang rig 'byung // kya ma mgon po kya sangs rgyas// 'dod chags dbye ba de ltar na// de yi ngo bo ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la sogs da dang 'dra// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// 
258b8(rgyud): sogs por nyon la yid la bung // lus dang lus kyo nam smin gyi// rgyu 'bras mo shes gti mug ste// lus sems kun nas 'a drug pa drug/ zhe sdang yin te sgo gsum gyi// kun nas blangs te nor bu'i mthon// sa bon byung ba 'ad
259a1(rgyud): / chags so// dbang sogs ngo bo gang ma shes// 'dod chags bde ba chen po nges// rangs ngo bo gang la gnas// 'og ma spangs pa'i gnyen po dang // ngo bo sgyu mar gang shes dang // dbang po sgo bsdu thabs yin te// 
259a2(rgyud): gong ma skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i// phyir yang chen por 'gyur ba ste// gzhan gyi don du 'gyur pa dang // de las gzhan dag mos 'gyur dang // mang po ma mos spong ba dang // nyon mongs spyi yis zil phyis gnon// be brag 'dod chags
259a3(rgyud): zhe sdang sogs// zil gyis mi gnon 'og ma yi// rnam rtog gang yang mi skye dang // nyon mongs spyi dang bye brag spong // gnyen po yin par nges pa dang // nyon mongs sku rtse tsam mi skye// gnyis ni gong dang 'dra bo ste// bcu gnyis
259a4(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po dag/ bcom ldan 'das su gsungs pa ste// zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin no// zab pa'i lha spyod ma rtogs pa// sngags brjod bzlas pa la byed po// de dag ngal ba don med yin// de dag bla ma dam pa las// 
259a5(rgyud): man ngag dam pa btsal bya ste// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul gzhi las// sad par byed pa'i cho ga blang // de'i tshe rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / 
259a6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du// shrI Di ki ni sam b+ha ra ta na tra rA dza nA ma// bod skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba chen po ros gang ba// thams cad spong bar gyur
259a7(rgyud): nas kyang // he hi mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// mkha'i 'gro ma ni ji ltar logs// de yi sdom pa ji ltar lags// dam tshig bsrung ba ji ltar lags// phag mo bdag la bshad du gsol// nyon cig rdo rje phag mo nyon// dang po dam tshig
259a8(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyang // rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dag/ kun nas 'khrugs te gzhan gyi yang // sgo gsum kun 'khrugs chen po ste// rang bzhin sgo gsum 'khrugs pa 'bring // nyams pa/ 
259b1(rgyud): 'bring du gsungs pa yin// rang bzhin 'khrugs pa tha ma yin// nyams pa chung ngu yin par 'dod// de la yang ni gsum gsum ste// nyams pa che 'bring dgu ru byed// rang las mnar sems ma skyes kyang // gzhan las mnaras
