259b2(rgyud): skyes pa'o// bdag gi g.yer pas rkyen byas pa de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad// rang la mnar sems cher skyes kyang // gzhan la nyes pa chung ba na// 'di yang nyams pa 'bring du bshad// g.yeng ba'i rkyen gyis gang nyams yang
259b3(rgyud): 'di ni ltung ba yang bar gsungs// rang gi dam tshig bsrung ba ni// lha spyod gang la gzhan ma mos// zab mo'i don la bskur 'debs pa// ltung ba che 'bring yang bar bshad// rang gis ma nyes gzhan cher 'khrugs// 'di ni nyams
259b4(rgyud): pa chung ngur gsungs// de re'i dbye ba gzhan nas shes// de nas snod kyi 'i dam tshig kyang // phyi yis rang gi sgo gsum dag/ 'khrugs pa che chung rim pas dbye// rang sems 'khrugs nas phyi rol la// snyun sogs nyams pa che bar gsun/ 
259b5(rgyud): g.yeng ba nyams pas 'o bring chung ngu// mdor na rang bzhin dam tshig dang // bcas te bye brag dam tshig las// gnyis su med par mkhas pas gsungs// dam tshig la ni rdo rje 'chang // mkha' 'gro rtsa ru gnas pa ste// phag mo yungs
259b6(rgyud): dkar tsam gyi tshad// gzhan ni l-I yi tshad tsam ste// gsal la rang bzhin med pa ste// bka' nas g.yas bskor bka' yi bar// mkha' 'gro drug bcu bzhi ru nges// ka sogs zung rtsa mkha' 'gro ro// phyi nas rtsa re mkha' 'gro mi ma khA
259b7(rgyud): 'gro nas bskor 'tshams kyi brla// sum bcu rtsa bdun mkha' 'gro ma// a sogs brgyad ni mkha' 'gro brgyad// de bzhin zung rtsa mkha' 'gro bzhi// snying kha ru ni yang dag gnas// zung rtsa gsum ni mkha' 'gro re// gzhan rnams
259b8(rgyud): rtsa ra mkha' 'gro ro// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi mgrin pa gnas// rdo rje phrag mo lte ba'i dbus// gzhan ni spyi bror yang dag gnas// de nas sdom pa brgyad bshad de// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// bde ba sdom pa yang dag bshad// 
260a1(rgyud): gang zhig bde ba khyed par can// nges par sgom pa yin par 'dod // rdo rje phag mo mi 'bar bar// sdom pa dam tshig rab tu bshad// mi byed pas ni phyag rgyar gsungs// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig nyams/ 
260a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyu gang lags// rkyen ni gang lags dus gang lags// tshad ni gang lags bsrung dus gang // lus ngag dam tshig ji ltar dbye// dang po nyams pa'i rgyu nyid kyang // mi shes pa dang tha bag med pa// nyon mongs pa dang ma gus
260a3(rgyud): dang // brjed ngas dran pa mi gsal ba// 'di drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu// bla ma ma bsten grogs ngan 'grogs// mdor na sgo gsum g.yeng ba'i yul// de dag nyams pa'i yul du gsungs// gdon gyis bar chad chad gas myos// 
260a4(rgyud): log lta skyes dang khyed grags 'dod// nyon mongs zil non bla mas skyo// 'dod chags chen po skyes pa drag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i dus yin te// spyi ni rtsod ldan dus su gsungs// gdon sogs gzhan gyis byin brlabs tshe// bsrung bI
260a5(rgyud): 'du shes sngon song nas// chen por rdzogs kyang chung ngur gsungs// 'du shes sngon du ma song no// bag med nyams pa so na gnas// gdon sogs rang gis ma mthong na// de bas nyams pa chung ngur gsungs// 'khor ba'i skyon dang
260a6(rgyud): rnam smin dran// bla ma dran dang 'gyod pa skye// bar chod bral ba bshags pa'i dus// sbyor ba dngos gzhi 'jug dang gsum// gang zhig rdzogs tshad mthar phyin te// tshe 'bring bya ba shes par bya// sbyor ba ltung ba chung ngu ste// dngos
260a7(rgyud): gzhi ltung ba 'bring du 'byung // 'jug rdzogs ltung ba chen por nges// rgyan dang phyag rgya phyog mtshan dag/ 'chang dang rten pa'i dam tshig yin// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni// bzo' bar bya ba'i dam tshig yin// sems can dpa' bo/ 
260a8(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dang // longs spyod mnyam par gang byed pa// blta bar byed pa'i dam tshig go// rang gzhan sgyu mar gang shes pa// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig go// sgo gsum skye gsung thugs su gsal// bsrung bar bya ba'i
260b1(rgyud): dam tshig yin nyon mongs dus drug gzung 'dzin kun// rang rig skye ba med par bskal// bskal ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// dam tshig don du dam tshig dag/ dus drug dus gnyis lo yi bar// brtul zhugs can gyi dam tshwa bsrung // dngos grub
260b2(rgyud): don du rtag tu bsrung // skad gcig tsam yang gnang ba med// rang rig lus kyi nyes pa las// gzhan gyi lus kyi nyes pa byung // 'dra ni sku yi nyes par bshad// rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las// gzhon gyi ngag gi nyis byung ba// bdag gi sku ya nyis
260b3(rgyud): pa ste// gzhan yang gsung gi nyams par 'gyur// gzhan la mkhas pas shes par bya// rang la rtsa ba'i nyes pa las// gzhan la yan lag nyes byung dang // legs par las ni nyes 'byung sogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// / 
260b4(rgyud): 'bad de tshig de'i don rnams la// 'khor rnams 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur te// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig de'i don rnams ni// zab cing rgya chen rtogs par dka'// mgon po khyod nyid bzhengs par zhu// bcom ldan
260b5(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// bdud rtsi khar zos slar la dor ba med// ngan skyugs byi dor slar lo zos// rang gi bdud rtsi'i ro tshar na// log rtog 'khrul pa'i rgyu'abras tshol// de bas dam tshig gtso bor gyis// dri'i tshe 'khor
260b6(rgyud): 'dus pa thams cad kyang // rgyud kyi don las rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis
260b7(rgyud): bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+wa la agra ni gu h+ya tan tre rA dza bod skad pa dpal gsang ba'i me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
260b8(rgyud): ne/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs paM thams cad kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs btsun mo'i bA ga la bzhug so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas// rdo rje phag mos gsol pa/ rnalnga 'byor gang lags 'pho ba ga/ 'chi / 
261a1(rgyud): / gang lags shi ba gang // ro ni gang lags ro tshan gang // de bzhin shi ba chen po gang // thal ba gang logs thal chen gang // tsha tsha gang lags tsha tsha yi// chen po gang lags gnas ni gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
261a2(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug phyir// rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dus men lha ni gsod pa ste// dang por 'pho ba'i rtags dang yang // dus tshod nges par shes bya ste// bar chad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis 'khrul 'khor bcas te/ 
261a3(rgyud): khyad par gyis/ 'bras bu 'byung ba 'pho bar nges// khams dang 'byung ba so sor thim// srog dang rtsol ba la thim ste// rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i// skad cig dang por 'chi ba ste// rdo rje can sogs rigs bzhi dang // rnam snang tha dad bral ba yi skad
261a4(rgyud): cig dang po shi ba ste// de nas zhag bdun bar du gzhag/ lus kyi mkha' 'gro mya ngan 'das// de yi shi ba chen por grags// lus ni ta la mgo cad 'dra// de nyid ro zhes gsungs pa ste// ye shes dbab dang ye shre brtag/ mkha' spyod sa spyod
261a5(rgyud): sa 'og spyod// spyi bo snyed kha mgrin pa ruHdri yi thig le gsum byas te// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis rlab// thog mar dri zhim sna tshogs kyis// khrus byas nas ni bcu gnyis su// dri yi thig le bcu gnyis bya// dpa' bo mkha' 'gros byin gyis
261a6(rgyud): brlabagazhan yang rgyan la sogs pa kunaHdngos su gnas nas ra ba tu ngas// ri mo bris pa 'bring yin te// dri yi thig le tha mari ngas// g.yas rkyang la sogs 'dug spangs kyis// he ru kar grags chen por bzhengs// rang gi bdag srog yin pa'i
261a7(rgyud): he ru ka ru ngas pa dang / de la dus drug mchod pas mchod// 'di dag ro na chen po ste// 'chi ba lde ni rnam rtog ste// mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed// rang gi sbyin bsreg thal ba ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten na// chos sku'i gzug
261a8(rgyud): brnyan rim bzhin sog// yang na bum pa lta bu yi// gzhal yas khang pa brtseg par brtsig/ mi 'chi snying po bcu phyed dang / tsan dan gur gum la sog pa'i// dri yis byug cing bsgo ba bya// tsan dan dmar po la sog pa/ dri zhim ldan pa'i shing bu gaM/ 
261b1(rgyud): yang na 'bras bu yod pa yi// bud shing tshad dang ldan pa yi// thab khung chen po rdzogs par bya/ bla ma dam pa mnyes par bya// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// zur bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs bzhir mi 'jigs seng ge bzhin ka ba bzhilnga
261b2(rgyud): gdung bzhi brgyad/ cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa dang // rig pa dkyil 'khor gzhug pa dang // sngar dbang gang thob rdzogs par bskur// de nas rgyun chags me sbar ti/ me ltas la sogs gzhan dong 'dra// de nas rig pa de nyid kyab me yi khang pa mdzes pa ru/ 
261b3(rgyud): rang bzhin spyan drang bzhugs su gsol/ me mchod sdig pa bsregs pa yi// sngags dang rdzas sogs gzhan dang 'dra// me dang du ba rlung sogs kyi// mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag bya ste// bkra shis rtags ni byung na legs// med na sdig pa bsreg pa bya/ 
261b4(rgyud): gdung la sogs pa byung na rab// ma byung na yang cho ga rnams// rdzogs pa las byung rus pa dag// 'di ni thal ba chen po ste// de las gzhan pa thal bar gsungs// de nas rus pa zhag gsum na// gur gum la sogs dris gtong pa// rus pa'i mtshan ma rtag
261b5(rgyud): bya ste/ kha dog dbyibs dang dri ro dang // bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// gdod bsal khrus byas rus pa bdu// ma nyams dum bu gcig pa la// dri sogs la sogs sgo nang du// maN+Dal yongs su rdzogs pa yi// steng du seng ge'i khri ga laHseng ge
261b6(rgyud): rgyal chen 'og gi rgyan// steng nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan de// gnas der rus pa gzhag byas la// me mchod byas nas zhag lnga ru// bsnyen pa byas te drug pa la// gdung bu'i sta gon bdun pa la// tshwatsha rab tu gnas par byaHdang por ro bsregs
261b7(rgyud): dusu yang / shi ba dang po nas bzung ste// zhag lnga ro yi bsnyen pa ste// drug pa ro yi sta gon ste// bdun pa dur khrod rab tu gnas// dang po snang ba gnyis par ro// gsum pa rus pa'i mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das pa rnam po gsum// gzhan la men
261b8(rgyud): cing rang la med// dman pa med cing de rjes med// yongs su ma gsungs shes rab kyi// rtsa rgyud bshad rgyud phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar ma gsungs pa'i// mya dran 'das pa rnam pa gsum// bdud rtsi sgron ma ra li yi// rgyud du nga yis khyed la
262a1(rgyud): / bshad/ de nas tsha tsha'i rim pa yang/ snang ba rgyal po la sogs la// 'thun pa'i rnam gyis sa sogs blang // mi snangs bdag la sogs la// gtor ma byin las sogs bslang // de nas dbang bskur rnam lnga lang/ phan pa rdorje
262a2(rgyud): can dang yang te gzi brjid gar dang rdo rje rgyal// srad bus sa gzung sbyang ba sogs cho ga gzhan dang 'thun par bya/ dur khrod gnas su rtsa ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par bya// lha grangs du yod gtor ma dang/ sbyin bsreg dag
262a3(rgyud): gis zhi byas te/ de nas shes pa dgug pa dang // bgegs spyod sdog pa gzhom la sogs// las kyi rim pa byas nas ni// gcig gam lnga 'am bdun nam ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya rtsa brgyad ci nus par ni gdab par bya/ dus ni mtshan
262a4(rgyud): mo shes rab ste/ dang po la ni dkyil 'khor gyi// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa ste// gsum pa bzhi pa gnyis pa dag/ chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan gdab// bum+ba dbang sa la gdab pa ste// gsang dbang sa dang tshu la gdob// gsum pa
262a5(rgyud): me rlung sA la gang bya// bzhi pa nam mkhar gsungs pa'o// dang por 'pho bas ma ltung zhing // gnyis par ro bsreg ma ltung la// gsum pa tshatsham ltung na// 'chi ba slong ba'i dam pa ste/ srid pa'i 'chi ba las grol lo// 
262a6(rgyud): dman pa'i 'pho ba la sogs pas// ltung zhing 'chi ba kho nar nges// de bas srid las grol 'dod pas// bla ma dam pa mnyes byas te// 'pho ba la sogs gdam ngag blang // rgyud 'di gtad kyi legs par zung // de'i tshe 'jig
262a7(rgyud): rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// mchod pa sna tshogs pa 'chir yang bab po// nam mkha' las kyang sgra chen po yang 'byung ngo // dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang // dur khrod na gnas pa'i ro dang / ro
262a8(rgyud): langs la sogs pa thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpral gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs sos+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / khyod kyi lo tsA pa shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// ma~M g+ha la~M g+ha r+than+tu/ 
263b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra a ra li ma hA tan tA rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje a rA li zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
263b2(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i brag la snyoms par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rang
263b3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsal ba btab par rig cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisamakhyen nas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhengs te/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad
263b4(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// chu yis gdong ni bkrus nas ni// sman ni bza' bar byas nas su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// he ru ka nyid rab bsgrub bya// rang gi snying khar re pha ni// bsreg pa'i bskal pa ltar 'bar sgom
263b5(rgyud): de byung rdo rje nyi ma ni// 'bar ba'i phreng bas yang dag khyab// da yi steng du hUM nyid de// bsgral pa'i me ni lta bu nyid// des ni rdo rje yang bsams nas// rdo rje las byung he ru ka/ bgegs ni chen po mnan nas ni// sku la thal bas byugs
263b6(rgyud): pa dang phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan// 'jigs pa yi ni 'jigs par mdzad// in+d+ra ni la'i 'od lta bu// dbu skra ser po stobs po che// gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa ni// ri rab ri rgyal mthon pon+d+ha sA yi 'og tu yang dag mnan
263b7(rgyud): phyag tu rdo rje rnam bsgoms nas// g.yon pas skyes pa'i thod pa ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// sha lnga yang dag ldan par sgom// kun da dang ni zla ba dang // chu skyes do shal lta bus ni// kha T+wA~M ka yis phrag pa brgyan
263b8(rgyud): a ra li lus lha'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / shes rab kyi
264a1(rgyud): rol du phyin pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje btsun mo thams cad dang / dzam b+ha la la sogs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'byung ngo / dbang po la sogs pa'i rdo rje nam mkha' la
264a2(rgyud): gnas pa thams cad dang / glang po che'i rna ba la sogs pa'i zhing skyong thams cad dang / kun dar la sogs pa'i yi dgas thams cad dang / de dag la sogs pa sems can thams kyi chos mnyan pa'i sbyor ba des/ de bzhin gshegs
264a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje A ra li chen la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gtor ma'i sngags ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bder gshegs kun gyi ston pa yis// gtor ma'i las ni rab tu cha phyag rgya
264a4(rgyud): yang ni khyad par bu 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa po// rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di nyid sngags ni chen po nyid// de bzhin du ni gtor ma'i sngags// las ni thas nad pa yi sngags// yin pa nyid du the tsom med rdo rje
264a5(rgyud): / a ra l-i las gtor ma'i bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 3/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ming yang dag pa re rab tu phye ba/ gdong gi sna ni mthe ba dang // de bzhin dpag bsam shing nyid dang // tshangs par spyod pa nang ba dang // dam tshig
264a6(rgyud): 'dir ni dngos grub sbyin// glang po rta bong glang rnga mo// khyi las byu 'be' me dang // mar me chen po bsregs nas ni// tshangs spyod 'dzin pa mchod par bya// de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis srog chags bsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig
264a7(rgyud): dang smra bar bya/ khyod kyis ma byin par ying long // gzhan gyi bud med bsten par gyis// ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo ni// thams cad shes rab cho ga yis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// de nas dbang bskur
264a8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ phyag rgya ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis// de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya// dbang bskur de yi phyi nas ni// de nyid 'dir ni rab tu dbye// 'di nyid bde ba chen po ste// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// 'di nyid ye shes chen po ste/ 
264b1(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// de nas sbyin bsreg bka' stsal pa// khru gang tsam gyi tshad dang ni/ khru phyed pa la brko bar bya/ rdul tshon dkar po ldan par ni// rnam par mkhas pas thab khung bya/ gsungs pa'i sngags kyis nges par ni// der
264b2(rgyud): ni sha sags sbyin bsreg bya// mi ya lha yi gzugs nyid de// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po// de nas dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan// mkhas
264b3(rgyud): pes dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dur khrod sol ba so phag dang // ldong ros phyi ma nyid dang yang / ljang khu yi ni phye ma nyid/ dkyil 'khor la ni mkhas pas bsngags/ dbus su sum la rdo rje bri/  shar gyi sgo ru mgo chen
264b4(rgyud): / lho ru rdo rje dril bu nyid// de bzhin nub tu dgra sta ste/ byang du gr-i gug dge ba nyid/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor du ni bri/ chos don 'dod dang thar pa la/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni rab tu dgye/ dkyil 'khor bzhengs par byas
264b5(rgyud): nas ni/ der ni slob ma gzhug par bya/ rang gi gdong ni btsongs nas ni/ bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// rdo rje a ra li las las thams cad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// mngon par shes
264b6(rgyud): pa bka' stsal pa// lha yi migo dang rna ba dang / de bzhin gzhan sems shes pa dang // sngon gnas rjes su dran pa dang / de bzhin rdzu 'phrul mngon shes nyid// he ru ka yi ga nas bsgoms na// yo gi
264b7(rgyud): mngon shes lnga ru 'gyur// shin du goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// he ru ka ni rang gis 'gyur// bsam gtan la ni nus skyes nas/ phyis ni spyod pa yang dag brtsam// !yid ni brtan nam g.yo
264b8(rgyud): 'am tsaM/ rang gi sems ni bskul ba'i phyir// glu ni sna tshogs len pa dang // de bzhin gar ni sna tshogs nyid// sna tshogs rim gro byed pa dang // lus la rgyan ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin sna tshogs dga' ba yi/ 
265a1(rgyud): gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang reg bya yang dag brtsam// de nus sangs rgyas bka' stsal pa// re'u mig brgyad bris nas ni// rgyud kyi sngags ni rgyas par bya// las kyi dbye
265a2(rgyud): ba'i rab dbye bas// de bzhin zhi dang rgyas sogs kyis// oM ni dbang ldan la ni mer// de bzhin bden bral nyid du la// rlung gi 'tshams su hUM nyid de// shwar du dz+nyA ni rnam par gnas// lho ru dzA ni rnam par gnas/ 
265a3(rgyud): nub du b+h+yo y+r-i rnam pa ste// byang du phaT kyi rnam pa yin// dbus su swA hA rnam par gnas// ngos gnyis su ni sgrib bya'i ming// rdo rje a re l-i las las kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'khor lo bri ba bka'
265a4(rgyud): stsal po// che ge mo sod cigo/ che ge mo dbang du mdzod cig/ che ge me rings par mdzod cig/ che ge mo rmongs pa ra ma dzid cig/ che ge mo ma lus par gyis shig/ che ge mo lkugs par mdzod cig/ che ge mo khug cig/ 
265a5(rgyud): chetshi ge mo skrod cig/ che gro mo ma las bAr mdzod cig/ che ge mo chings shig/ che ge mo ma ning du mdzod cig/ che ge mo sgur por mdzod cig/ ces sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnams kyis ngos gnyis su bris te/ glo gra'i
265a6(rgyud): mdab mar gur gum gyis bri bar bya zhing 'dir dpung pa'i rtsa bar gdags par bya'o// gzugs ni zla mtshan zags pa'i ras la rgya skyugs kyi khu bas bri bar bya'o// bsad pa la sogs pa'i ras la dud khrod kyi sol ba
265a7(rgyud): dang rtsi kra'i khu ba dang / yungs mar dung / dug dang skye tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / ka na ka'i khu ba dang / rus pa'i stu gu so// dgugs pa la ni ku ra'i tsher mas so// rmongs pa la ni d+ha tu ra'i shing gis so// rings pa la ni
265a8(rgyud): baba'i sbu gus so// ma lus pa ni b+he ste tse'i shing gi spyi gus bri'o// de nas rdo rje mchod pa bka' stsal pa// bas mtha' dang ni dben pa dang // bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang // lo ni bcu gnyis de bzhin du// lo ni bcu drug bu mo dang // 
265b1(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa lnga phan chod pa// ba dang de bzhin ma he dang // spre'u mo dang ni de bzhin khyi mo dang // bong mo de bzhin rnga mo dang // shi ba dang ni ra ma nyid// phag dang ba med las byung ba// gzhan yang he ru kas mchod na// grub pa nyid du the tsom med// nya dang
265b2(rgyud): zla ba'i 'pho ba'i tshe// chos ni mu stegs can gyis brtags// dri ma bzhig par bya ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni myang bar bya// srog chags rnams ni bsod mi bya// rdzun gyi tshig ni smra mi bya/ ma byin par ni blang mi bya// nyin par nyal shing mtshan
265b3(rgyud): mo la/ shin du mnyam par gzhag pas 'dug/ sha chan mi yi rus pa dang // khrag ni chen po btung ba dang // khu tshon yang dag bza' ba dang // de bzhin rnam snang chen po nyid// bram ze mo dang g.yung mo nyid// gar mo de bzhin btso blag ma// thod pa
265b4(rgyud): can dang ko lpags mkhan// rdol pa de bzhin phyag dar ma// rtswa 'tshong ma dang shan pa nyid// de bzhin kla klo la sogs dang / sgyu mkhan dang ni cha tshong ma// gzhan yang zla mtshan 'dzag pa nyid// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // sring mo las byung bu mo nyid/ 
265b5(rgyud): gzhan gyi bu mo sgra mi bya// rje'u rigs mngon dga' mi bya ste// bgrod bya'i bu mo rtag spangs nas// bgrod min mkhas pas bstan par bya// rdo rje a ra li las le'u lnga pa'o// de nas dam tshig mchog gi bag dbab pa bka' stsal pa// nyan thos skel ba ngan pa la
265b6(rgyud): bag ni dbabra par mi bya zhing // de bzhin gcer bu thod du ma dpa // ral pa can ni thams cad la// dam tshig bag ni dbab mi bya// snying rje yi ni bdag nyid can// gal te yin na bza' bar bya// grub kyang lta ba dmin pa ni// sems can gnod byed skyes pa nyid// skal ba dan
265b7(rgyud): pra zhes byar brjod// bram ze dam tshig rnam par ldang // de nas slob ma'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa// dul byed blo dang ldan pa dang // bzod ldan dal ba mi slu ba// bla mar gus shing snying rjer ldan// rgyud ni 'dir ni rab tu bsngags// de nas slob dpon gyi
265b8(rgyud): mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// snying rje ldan shing bstan chos mkhas// de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas// de nas thun tshod bzhi byin gyis brlab pa bka' stsal pa// ji ltar sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ 
266a1(rgyud): dang por thun tshod byin gyis brlab// des ni ji srid nyi phyed na// nyi ma phyed na rdzun gsum pa/ dus dang bral nas nam phyed na// thun tshong byin brlabs rab tu grags// thun tshod byin brlabs rnal 'a
266a2(rgyud): gyis bdag gi rnal 'byor ldan mas grub// de nas bdag nyid kyis dkyil 'khar bka'o stsol po// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // phrag dig dang ni ser sna nyid// bcom ldan pa ru ka la med// yod na rnam par/ 
266a3(rgyud): dga' ba nyid/ de nas dom tshig sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ 'gegs dang btsubs pa'i shing la 'am/ ldan shing btags shing 'phyang ba 'am// g.yul du mtshon gyis bsnun pa nying // bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pas sgrub/ 
266a4(rgyud): de nas nang du mdzad pa bka' stsal pa// btung ba rin po che'i chu// gang zhig bza' 'dod don yod nyid// khrus nyid dpag med rdo rje yis// dri med rim pa snang bar mdzad// dam tshig chos kyi de bzhin spyad// btsong ni gang za/ 
266a5(rgyud): mnyam pas ni dam tshig ro ni 'di yis ni/ gang zhig glu yi rang bzhin nyid// mkha' 'gro thams cad btsun mo ste// bu ni 'jam dpal la sogs pa/ khro bo'i gzugs ni bsnyen bkur ba// bdag nyid he ru ka ru 'gyur brjod
266a6(rgyud): pa bzlas pa yang dag bshad// yan lag nyid sogs phyag rgya ste// lha yi rnal 'byor dmigs nas ni// gang zhig thams cad du ni gnas// mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya// gang zhig 'jig rten bya gnas pa// rdo rje sems
266a7(rgyud): dpa'i gnas thob phyir/ rnam par bzlog pas bya ba nyid// ri dgas shar sogs bya ba ni// 'jig rten du ni ma shes pa// mchog tu rab tu bsngags 'gyur// rnam dag pad ma dam pa ni// de nyid thob pas rab tu spyod de nas
266a8(rgyud): sdom pa bka' stsal pa// rdo rje dril bu bzung bya zhing // bdud rtsi mkhas pas bza' bor bya// rang gi phyag rgya rtag bsten cing // spyad pa 'da' ba nyid mi bya/ de nas lha mchod bka' stsal pa/ chu klung tshul gyi gnas su ni bdag
266b1(rgyud): nyid lha ni mchod par gyi/ bdag gi sngags ni brjod par bya// me tog laM sogs byin gyis brlab// rdo rje a ra li las le'u drug pa'o// / de nas bsod snyoms kyi lhung bzed bka' stsal pa// mkhas pas phru ba chag par ni
266b2(rgyud): rigs bani du ni dgongs me rgyu chu ba'i 'dram du bza' bya zhing // gtsang sbra nyid ni bdud pa byed// bI la'i rkang pa tsam gyis mi kho ni blo dang ldan pas blang / phye btab bza' bar mo bya zhing / mi ster ba ni rtag tu spang // g.yas su rab mos
266b3(rgyud): skye ba ni/ g.yon nas bskor ba ru ni gya/ nges pa med par khyim du gnas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// rdo rje shing gis dngos byas dang // de bzhin dril bu shing gi bdag he ru ka ni rab sgrub phyir/ bzung nas rtag tu rgyu bar
266b4(rgyud): dedonas rdo rje gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ ser skya'i khrum blangs nas ni// sngags ni 'di yis bzla bar bya// bsrung bar bya zhing bskam byas nas// de la gu gul bsre bar bya// mkhas pas gnod sbyin mo sngon// 
266b5(rgyud): du des ni gdug pa sbyin par bya/ shin du mdzes shing gos mdzes pa// dri skur gnas pa legs 'grub phyir// 'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// gnod sbyin mo ni dgug par bya// bris sku nyid ni gnod sbyin mo// snga bar/ 
266b6(rgyud): byin nas 'gro bar 'gyur// de yi phyi rnams thams cad ni// gang zhog cung zad rgyan rnams kun// sde ba ru ni blangs par bya// gal te 'dod na mtshan mo la// me tog gis ni mchod par bya// de nas rdo rje ro langs kyi
266b7(rgyud): sbrus bka' stsal pa ma chad rma med gang bI ni// 'gegs pa brtul zhugs can gyis bkru// mar khu chen pos blag par bya/ bdug po chen pos bdug par bya/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su// mar khu chen po'im
266b8(rgyud): mi dbul nga yis khyod la ci gsungs pa'i// de la dkyil 'khor ba zhengs par bya// yungs dkar rol rten bya zhing / sgrani ring por yang dag brjod de la mkhos po 'jigs mi bya// oM dzo la dza li b+h+yo hU~M brjod par bya/ 
267a1(rgyud): / des ni mi nig sbyin zhes pa// sgrub pos de la gsang bar bya// rlung byug dang ni mig sman nyid// ral gri dang ni rkang sog dang // raM lum pa la spyod pa nyid// thams cad sbyin par the tsom med// 
267a2(rgyud): de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo bka' stsal pa// gong gi bsam gtan byas nas ni// de la sngags ni zla bar bya// rang gi he ru ka yi ni// rnal 'byor gyi ni bdag nyid do// tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'grub par 'gyur// gtsang
267a3(rgyud): zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs dang // zhi zhing dge ba'i gnas su ni// rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di nyid du// dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni/ oM ra li zhes bya ba'i mtshon// za ba na ni gtam smra
267a4(rgyud): g+ha ri ya rgyal blo mgor gnas pa/ tshogs kyis dag pa'i sems kyis bskor// de yang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ro// 'grub 'gyur gang phyir 'di nyid du// mchod pas grub par shes ma 'gyur// de yI btsun
267a5(rgyud): mi bsrung ba no// gshin rje mthar byed du ni 'gyur// shes rab mthar byed dpung gi mgon// pad ma mthar byed sku bsrung ba dag/ de yi bgegs ni mthar byed ni// dmag dpon du ni brjod pa yin// 'dod pa'i rgyal po
267a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba/ de yi gshed ma'i bdag po nyid// dpal ldan dbyug pa sngon po ni// sgo bsrung ba yi bdag po nyid// thams cad la ni dbang byed pa// zhar ba mi g.yo mgon nyid yin// yi ge pa yi bdag po ni// de bzhin du ni
267a7(rgyud): stobaso po che// rdo rje a ra li las le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pas gtam 'di dag thos nas// srid pa'i kun du sbyor ba bcad cing rnam par dag par gyur
267a8(rgyud): pa dang / sdig pa zad cing nyon mongs bsreg par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshig 'di dag gsol to// rdo rje a ra lo ni brtson 'grus che// sna tshogs e ma rmad byung bas// gang zhig bdag
267b1(rgyud): cag nyon mongs khebs// gang zhig bdag cag grub 'gyur ba// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis rkang gnyis kyi mchog dam pa thob nas// sangs rgyas kyi rol pa ston par byed do// la lar rdzogs pa'i
267b2(rgyud): byang chub mdzad/ kha cig tu ni dka' thub spyod// lce las brabs pa'i sbrul po dang // de bzhin khab nas 'byung ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / kha cig tu ni rab tu byung // 'dul ba ston par byed pa dang / 
267b3(rgyud): mngon pa'i chos ni lhag po'i sems// lo lar sngags kyi bdag nyid 'chang // kha cig pha rol phyin pa'i tshul khwa cig bye brag smra ba'i lam kha cig tu na mdo sde pa/ kha cig tu ni rnam shes nyid/ kha cig tu ni dbu ma
267b4(rgyud): nyid/ la lar dmyal ba chen por 'gro/ la lar sems can rje su bskyod// sems can 'dul ba la ltos nas// snying rje'i byasam pas rol par bya// rdo rje a ra li las le'u brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
267b5(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / gang yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi las rnam par dbye ba bstan par bya'o// gang zhig rgyun gang du dam tshig byed pa de ni 'jig rten gsum po kun gyis bstod par
267b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gang zhig rgyud de yis gang gi tshe byed pa de ni srid par gzugs mdzes par 'gyur ro// gang zhig glu yis mchod byed na// de ni rtag tu smra snyan 'gyur// gang phyir gang zhig mar me 'bu la// 'di ni mig
267b7(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur// gang zhig gar gyi mchod byed pa// de ni rigs 'dzin chen por 'gyur// gang zhig phyag rgya byed pa ni// de la skye bo phyag 'tshal 'gyur// gang zhig dri zhim 'bul ba ni// lus ni dri zhim ldan par 'gyur// 
267b8(rgyud): gang zhig phreng ba bza' 'bul ba// de ni gser gyi phreng ldan 'gyur// gang zhig gos ni 'bul ba ni// des ni lho yi gros rnyed 'gyur// gang zhig mtshan tsam 'don pa dang // dad pa tsam yang rab byed pa// lhag par
268a1(rgyud): mos par rab tu byed/ gang zhig skye bo mchod byed ga/ de rnams thams cad rnam dag pa'i// sbrid par longs spyod rab tu / rdo rje a ra la las/ yon tan rjes bsngags pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// 
268a2(rgyud): de nas yang gang zhig de ltar rnam par dag pa'i sbyin pa byon pas// de rkang gnyis kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' bas the tsom skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la la ni gsuM bskor/ 
268a3(rgyud): / ba byas nas nye bar 'dug ste zhus pa// ji lta bu yi rnal 'byor babyaM// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sbyin pa mtha' gsum yongs dag pa/ he ru kA ni bsgom par bya// sbyin pa yAd naM he ru kas// gang la sbyin pa de
268a4(rgyud): lta bus/ sbyin pa 'di ni rab tu bsngags// sbyin po 'di ni dpe tsam+ba ste// tshul khrims la sogs 'di ltar spyad// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje a ra l-i las de skad gsung so// rdo rje a ra li las rnal 'byor ma'i gong nas
268a5(rgyud): med pa'o zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po g.ya swa ba ga ya d+ha ra li zhal mnga' dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha wa dge slong shakya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
268a6(rgyud): @// rgya gar skad du/ ri gau a ra li tan tra rA dza na ma/ bod skad du/ ri ga a ra laM rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis this pa dus gcig ma/ bcom ldan 'das ri gi e waM gi
268a7(rgyud): rnam pa'i sdom pa la bzhug so// gnyis med gnyis kyi rnal 'byor gyis// a ra li dang rig rtags// ra gi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso// de la a ra lis zhus pa// gnas kyi rnam pa du ru gsungs// nye gnas rnam pa du zhig lags// 
268a8(rgyud): del zhing gi rnam pa du/ nye zhing rnam pa du ru gsungs// tshan do rnam pa du ru brjod// nye ba'i rnam pa tshan do ru// de la 'du ba gang zhag lags// de bzhin nye bo'i 'du ba nyid// de la dur khrod rnam pa du// nye ba'i dur khrod ji ltar lags// 
268b1(rgyud): des su ma chog // lha mo rnal 'byor chen gnas pas// a ra li ni bder go bar/ sa bcu rnams ni rab tu phye/ gnas ni shar gyi lus 'phags po/ de bzhin du ni baglang spyod// gnas ni byang gi sgra mi snyan// gnas ni de bzhin 'dzu bu gling
268b2(rgyud): gling bzhir lha mo bzhi dang ni/ r-i rab spyi bor rigri bzhugs// a ra li dang mnyam sbyor bas// gnyis kyi rnal 'byor gnyis med las// sa~M si'i 'dod pa lcug ma dang / bde chen de bzhin rdo rje ma// ljang khu ser mo btsod mdog dang / 
268b3(rgyud): dmar mo ru ni yongasu grags// zhal gcig ma ni phyag gnyis ma// g.yas na chu gri 'dzin ma ste// g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung zed nyid// gcer bu mgo skyes grol ba mo// a ra l-I ni sku mdog gnag/ spyan gsum phyag drug A ra li/ 
268b4(rgyud): ri gi sngon mo spyan gsum ma/ phyag gnyis zhags pa lcags kyu 'phyar// rdo rje rol gri phyag gnyis kyis/ ri gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhyud// g.yas kyi phyag gnyis dag tu ni// rdo rje dang ni cang te'u brtag/ gzhon dag tu ni dgra/ 
268b5(rgyud): sna dang thod pa mgo bI 'dzin pa gnyis// gnas ni sems dang nye ba'i sems// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'dir yang lha mo rnam pa bzhi kha dog dbye bas gang mo bzhin// mi zad rnon po sgyu ma tshe// mthon po gsung gi 'khor lo
268b6(rgyud): la'o// shar sgo de bzhin du ni zhing // nye ba'i zhing ni lho ru 'gyur// tshan do hA ni nub kyi sgor// nye ba ya ni tshan de byang // we dang dang ma he nyid dang ni// rta mgrin glang po rgyal mtshan nyid// 'di rnams sgo dang sgo khyud yin// kha dog dbye
268b7(rgyud): bgong ma bzhin/ gsung go 'khor lo'i 'tshams su ni// 'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba nyid// sku yi 'khor lo 'tshams su ni// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid// sku gsung 'khor lo'i 'tsham su ni// dmyal ba brgya de ni rtag tu bri// sgo
268b8(rgyud): la drang po'i dngos po bzhi// de bzhin gsung la tsha ba bzhi// zhigi a ri li las sa la'i le'u ste// dang po'o// / lha mo ro g+hi snying rje che//  ra li ni nyid kyis zhus
269a1(rgyud): / ji ltar 'khor lo'i 'tshams brgyad du// dmyal brgyad ni ji ltar sgom// rlig gis bka' stsal ba// ji snyed sems can gyi bsdubs bsdus pa// sgong las skyes pa dang // mngal nas skyes
269a2(rgyud): pa dang drod gshar las skyes pa dang // rdzas te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs mad pa can nam// 'du shas can nama?// 'du shes med pa can de thams cad a rA l-i las dmyal par 'tshod
269a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de rnams gadron pa'i blos// a thA gi rnam par bzhug sA pAr bya'o// stong pa nyid na bsgoms nas ni// hUM ni snying khaR+Ya baM sgomAM par bya// hUM las sna tshogs rigs bdag y+r-ini// rdo rje
269a4(rgyud): las ni a rA lI// 'byung ba nyid du gyur pa yin// mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya// e rdo rnam pa chas gsal bar// sangs rgyas rin chen gab rtser ni// rdzogasde ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'gyur// / oM
269a5(rgyud): a ra li rig gi pheM pha phreM b+h+yo swA hA// che re dbab pa'i las bshad par bya ste// sa ni nog po blangs na sra ni// nor rgyas bu ni mkhas pas bya// thod pa sbyor mar bzhag nas ni// ba yi 'o mas bgang bar bya// de yi sbyor
269a6(rgyud): byas bkang nas ni// nges par srad bu nag pos bkris// chu yi 'gra mau du rang song ste// ri gi a ra lar sbyor bas// sngags pas sngag swo ni khri bzlas nas// klu ni 'khrugs pas tshar pa 'bebs// rmi limA gyi
269a7(rgyud): lus bshad par bya ste// yo gis bdag gamal 'og tu// d+he d+hA ra yi mdabe lu dang // dud khrod sol bar bsres pa dang // 'ug pa'i sgrol sna gu yis// ro dkris dam pa'i ro la ni// bsgrub bya'i mang na rang gis bri
269a8(rgyud): de la rnal 'byor pas 'dug nas// a ra lI ni khri ru bzlas// oM a rA li ri gi pheM a mu kaM ke ma ma si taM sa taM daR+sha ya b+h+ya swA hA// khrag dgug pa bshad par bya ste// sgo thal brtags par byas nas ni/ 
269b1(rgyud): gong bu bdun du dgod par bya// rI gi a ri lIr sbyor bas// dbus kyi gong bu dgug par bya// khab kyi phyag rgya mchu byas nas// dang por lce'i byed pa pos// ji ltar tsha ba'i gong bu bzhin// shes rab can gyis sbyang
269b2(rgyud): chun dgug/ khyab kyi phyag rgya gnyis pa 'di// mgrin dgras dal gyis yongs su gzir// 'jug pa'i las yang dag par bshad par byas te// ji ltar spyod pa'i gzugs bltas nas// bdag gi rI
269b3(rgyud): gi gzugs su ni// r-i gi a ra li sbyor bsa?// mgo ni 'og tu rnam par bsgom// oM badz+ra a ra laM phaT ya to ta yA pheM pha swA hA// r-i li par byed pA ba shadra pa ra bya saM ta// dgra bo nyid kyi l+yA la ni// 
269b4(rgyud): gu rang gong gu bsgom par bya// oM ri gi gu d+ha gu d+ha sha tAM swA hA/ 'khru ba rab tu bshad par bya ste// dgra bo'i dri mas gzugs brnyan bya// de yAs skra yis brakr-i ba rA b+ha// chu bi gsum gyis kha
269b5(rgyud): bekang nas// / gzugs bAr-In kha ru gzhug par bye// i ai raM li rig gi ma ma da a u mu ka kr-I sa rA ya phaT phaT phaT swAhA// dbang du bya ba lo bdag gi g.yon pa'i mig du ni// AHrnam par bsgom
269b6(rgyud): par bya// da yA g.yas pa'i mig tu ni// rdo rje 'phro bo rnam par bsgom// de dag 'dus pa'i sgom pa ni// rig gi a ra khir sbyor bas// mdzes ma dbang du byed par 'gyur// bdag nyid srung bar bya ba dang / 
269b7(rgyud): gnas ni bya ba nyid dang yang // ye shes 'khor lo gzhug pa dang // thugs sogs byin gyi brlab pa dang // yan lag dgod par bya ba dang // de bzhin lha ni dbang skur dang // lce mo rnams kyi sngags rdo byung ba/ 
269b8(rgyud): A ri lis ni rtag tu bya// oM dang a hUM gis byin gyis brlab// de nyid gnyis ni rigs gsum byung // byin brlabs pas na grub par 'gyur// las rnams thams cad rab sbyin dag/ snying dbus rung gi sa
270a1(rgyud): dge lcags kyus a ra li phyung nas// ye shes 'kho sngo dgug par bya// bkrug nas dram por bcing bar bya// d+hin+ya me b+hU tA su to shro mA d+hA k+Sha// su bo sh+yA ma b+haH// a nu rAka tro ma b+hAH// sar+b+ba sada? nI m+b+ha b+hU
270a2(rgyud): ya tsA yA e h+ye hi b+he ga \u0f85 ti rig gi swA hA// spyi bo snying dang de bzhin 'grin// lte ba gsang ba'i gan su ni// zhugs pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// dam po la sngags bcing bar bya// ha ho hi hi de bzhin du// hu hu ho hi de bzhin te/ 
270a3(rgyud): lus kyi gnas ni brgyad rnams// yan lag dgod par bya ba nyid// spyi bo mchan khung lte ba dang // khwa dang de bzhin migo nyid dang // rkang 'thil gsang ba nyid du ni// yan lag dgod par rab tu grags// yan lag pa spun
270a4(rgyud): khung bu nas// rig gi 'od zer spro bar bya// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// yang na phyi sa bsdu bar bya// gri hAM saM kaM maM saM nyid thug kyi 'khor lo rab tu grags// g+ha taM maM aM zhes bya ba// gsung gi 'khor lor rab tu
270a5(rgyud): grags// dzaM maM haM gaM yaM nyid ni// sku yi 'khor lor rab tu grags// rig gi sngags kyi gdon po ni/  rim pa yis ni gdon par bya// rang gi snying las 'od zer phyung // lcags kyu'i phyag rgya rab sbyor bas// phyogs bcur
270a6(rgyud): / rna par bzhugs pa yi// rdzogasde pa'i sangs rgyas des bkug nas// cho ga 'dod pa'i mchod nas ni// dbang ni blo dag ldan pas blangs// uM saR+Wa ta thA ga ta d+ha gi n+ya nu ga ta ma h+ya me g+hi ShaM ka m+bu zhes// bdud rtsi lngas gang bri pra
270a7(rgyud): nAd+hi sengs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// des ni lha rnams dbang bskur ba// lha yi dbang la badra ba nyid// oM saR+Wa ta thA ga te d+ha ki n+ya ha b+hi She ka badz+ra swa b+haM pra h+ma et+ma ma ko hau// gru gsum mi yi sa bon gyi// snang byed rnam
270a8(rgyud): par bsgom par bya// nyi mar hUM las rig bdag nyid// de nyid kyis ni de ru 'gyur// de nas rdo rje las byung kun// rdo rje gur dang ra ba nyid// ri gi a ra laM gnas su// bdag nyid rtag tu bsrung bar bya// dmyal na
270b1(rgyud): brgyad ni tha~Md gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor 'phar ma gsuM pa yin// mkha'i 'gro ma'i dri ba'i sdom// 'khor lo ga yas bri ba yin// zhabs g.yon rkyang ba'i a ra li// sems kyis 'dzugs byed mnan nas ni// rig gi shil ma
270b2(rgyud): zhon nas// zhabs la zhabs kyis bskor bar bya// rnal 'byor mA kun thod par gnas// gar gyi rkang pas phyog kun gnas// grang dang tsha bA rab dbye bas// 'tsham su thod pa brgyad po yin// las thams cad rab tu rgyas pa
270b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// rig gi oM ra li zhus pa/ brda yi rnam pa du zhig lalugs// dI l+ya lha mo raM gri chos// brda ni yang drag rab tu phye// brda na chen po'i ts+tsha ma bcu// bdag nyid mngon du byed pa nyid
270b4(rgyud): gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// gnas ni gnas pa'i rgyab du 'dod// ngos ni nye ba'i gnas nyid de// snying ni zhing du yang dag 'gyur// lte ba nye ba'o zhing nyid de// pus mo
270b5(rgyud): tshan dor grol bar 'gyur// dpral ba nye ba'i tshan de nyid// lag pa g.yas pas 'du ba nyid// rna ba g.yas par dur khyod gnas// g.yon par nye ba'i dur khrod nyid// tshong rdal nyams dga' tsheng dus dang / 
270b6(rgyud): ma mo'i khyim du rtag tu brtag/ brda yis rnam par shes par bya// rang gi mtshan ma rang gi ston// ra lu mig sman la sog pa/ mchog gis rab tu sbyin par 'gyur/ ai ra lI'i lha mos zhus// yu shas dam pa ji ltar
270b7(rgyud): lags// gang gos rnam par shes tsam gyi// sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ro// 'bras sbyin byang chub thob 'gyur ba/ ye shes dam pa ji ltar logs// ti 'dzin lha mo rA ki ste// mchog tu badre ba chen po nyid// sgrub
270b8(rgyud): dang sgrub byed las byung ba// kun mkhyen ye shes yang dag byung // sems dpa' thams cad yongs spangs nas// dbang po thams cad bzlog par bya// dgon pa dben pa'i gnasu ni/ gnyis gnyis thams cad rnam par
271a1(rgyud): // / spangs/ dmig dang sred du bzlog nas ni// smin ma'i dbus su sems byas nas// mi zad man pa'i gnas su ni// sbom pos drang por mthong bar 'gyur// byas ni rna bga'o// 
271a2(rgyud): pA'i sngags 'dul gyis dal gyis 'gul bar 'gyur// yan lag can gyis bde ba gang // de bzhin phyag rgya chen po bde// li yi phyag rgya ngang gis 'jig/ de yi ye shes kyang ni 'jig/ bde ba chen po rtogs pa'i
271a3(rgyud): phyir// de yi ye shes phyag rgyas gad baM// 'di nyid ye shes chen po nyid// rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin can// gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta ba// gzhan du brjod par mi nus so// lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyor ba 'dis/ 
271a4(rgyud): sems can gsol 'debs sems kyis ni// sems can kun la snying rje yis// 'di ni rnal 'byor gtso bo nyid// 'di la goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni// snying
271a5(rgyud): rje mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// dang po mun par mthong bar 'gyur// gnyis pa dkar deng du ba mtshungs// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa ste// gzhi pa yang ni me tog
271a6(rgyud): bzhin lnga pa sprin med ye shes ni// rang gzhan yang dag rig par spangs// sprin med nam mkha' lta bu ni// de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu// rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// brtse gcig sems kyis ri
271a7(rgyud): gas 'gyur// ye shes bdud rtsi rtag 'thungs pas// bkres pas zil gyis mi non cing // skom pa yis kyang zil mi non// dga' dang na bas zil mI non// 'di yi thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// rlig gis thams cad
271a8(rgyud): rig par 'gyur/ des ni rnal 'byor pa chen po// a ra li na nyid kyis ni// dam du mkhyud pa mdzad 'o pas// rig la ni gus par zhus// e waM ma ya tsi zhes bshad// e yi rnam pas ru bshad// thi ga rnam pa de bzhin
271b1(rgyud): / chu me ni me zhes bya bar brjod// ya yi rnam pa rlung du bshad// rig sdom ci zhes bshad// ri gas bka' stsal pa// rig mkha' 'gro ma ru gsungs// sdom pa 'dra bar 'gyur ba nyid// rig e wa sdom pa ni// e wa rnam par rnam pa/ 
271b2(rgyud): gnas/ rig gi sna yi rtse mo ni// rtag tu rigi bzhugs pa yi// ye shes dam pa 'di nyid ni// kun mkhyen ye shes de yi bdag/ 'byung ba chen po brtan la dbab pa dang / rnga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor pa chen po// a
271b3(rgyud): ra laM ni nyid kyis ni// rang bzhin mdzes pa nyid la zhus// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i// khrag ni ji ltar dgug par bgyi// rigs bka' stsal pa// nas la goms pas dgug tu ni// a ba'i me tog gzhan nas ni/ 
271b4(rgyud): rang gi khrag ni bkug nas ni// ri ga nyin gcig goms pa yis// nas ni nyi shu kha na byung // phyi nas khrag na dgug par bya// lha ni bral ba bshad par bya// spyi bor 'bar ba bsam par bya// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab nas ni// der ni
271b5(rgyud): sngags ni bzla bar bya// oM he ru ka pa ta ya sAhA// ri gi a ra la sbyor bas// lha la phyag byasad 'gas 'gyur// e li kr-i ni yan lag mnyam// 'di dag gnyis dbus rangs byon// rang gis bon nyid kyis ni// rang gi phyag rgya rnams yin
271b6(rgyud): te/ phyag rgya las ni lnga rnams 'byung // oM shun+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ko \u0f85// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya gnyis kyis ni// mthe chung phan tshun lcags kyu'i gzugs// dbu ma yin ser mo gnyis// mthe bong rgan pos gzir bar
271b7(rgyud): bya/ sdig 'dzub nyid kyis nags pa nyid// rdo rje ra li grags pa nyid// chos kyi ye shes gang zhig gzhan// ri ga nyid du rab tu grags/ 'phags pa'i bden bzhi'i tshul gyis ni/ 
271b8(rgyud): pr-i mi la sogs rab tu grags/ mi 'jigs rnam pa bzhi pon// mi zad la sogs rab tu grags// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni/ wa la sogs pa rab tu grags
272a1(rgyud): phyag drug 'gro ba drug du gsungs// spyan gsum srid pa gsum du brjod// 'jigs byed bdag gi sems nyid de// zhabs kyi rtsa bas bsgyel ba nyid// dga' ba la sogs sa
272a2(rgyud): bcu ni/ gnas sogs yang dag rab tu grags// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya drug/ thod pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyid// e waM ma ya'i dbus gnas par// bdag nyid rnam par bsam par bya// 
272a3(rgyud): 'chol pa kun gyi mtshan nyid kyis// thams cad rgyud du yang dag gnas// gr-i gug ma rig gcod pa nyid// thod pa nyid ni snying rje ste// ri gi a ra li sI sgras// cang te'u hUM he'i sngags bzlas pas/ 
272a4(rgyud): dgra sta chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod// rdo rje stong nyid rab tu grags// mgo bo nyon mongs pa'i bdud// thod pa nam mkhas dag pa nyid// lcags kyu ri gi ze 'bru ste// de bzhin zhugs pa yang dag nyid// 
272a5(rgyud): nang gi dag pa sdus nas ni// lus kyi mchod rten rnam dag pa// dkyil dkrung gdan du shes par bya// 'dzam bu gling gi snying por gsungs// gnyer ma sum ltag lte ba nyid// lte ba yang ni gzugs su
272a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ mgrin pa yang ni mgrin par dgod// ji ltar na ni de ltar 'gyur// khwa khyer mgo bo shes par bya// spyi bo gdugs kyi phreng bar brjod// mig gnyis zla ba nyi ma nyid// 'phan ni mgo bo las skyes nyid
272a7(rgyud): rus pa bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung // de phyir rang byin brlab par 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lus// rnal 'byor pa ni rtag tu mchod// rang gi ngo bo sangs rgyas su bstan pa'i le'u ste
272a8(rgyud): bzhi pa'o// / rgyal po chen po zas gtsang 'di// a ra lis ni rab tu phye// de la ri gi sgyu ma che// 'gro ba thabs dang shes rab bdag/ don grub rdo rje sems dpa' ste// mchog tu dga' ba
272b1(rgyud): bde chen po/ lha mo sa mtsho phyag rgya che// sgra gcan bzang po bde ba che// sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi spros pa las// sgyu ma'i mtshan mos mtsho nyid// rdo rje sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul pas// don grub lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// 
272b2(rgyud): sras ni bcom ldan rdo rje nyid// yab ni rdo rje 'chang bar grags// yum ni sgyu ma chen po yin// de nyid phyag rgyar rab tu grags// mthe bo rgan po rdo rje yin// lte ba chos kyi 'byung gnas gsungs// sgyu ma
272b3(rgyud): chen po'i rnam 'phrul ba// don grub nyid ni gzi brjid can// ngo bo 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid// oM ra la ni nga tshig nyon// las la spyod par rab brtags pas// lus can rnams ni rtag tu btung // dga' ba yang ni shi
272b4(rgyud): shir gsungs/ mchog tu dga' ba 'dod pa ma// dga' bral dga' ba bde chen po// lhan cig skyes dga' sdom pa ma// mi bzang mo ni 'o ru gsungs// rnon mo yang ni mkhyud pa nyid// nu ma nyed pa sgyu mche// mthon ma
272b5(rgyud): mchu ni 'jib pa nyid// dga' ba'i sod pas wa nyid de// sbrang rtsi btung bas ma he nyid// brdeg po yis ni rta mgrin ste// go byed glang po'i mtshan can no// rdo rje ra li 'dod chags chen po ma// 'dod pa mi ni rig gis
272b6(rgyud): brjod/ thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par khyab// sa yi rnam par dmyal ba bzhi// de bzhin ha yi rnam pa bzhi// 'khor bar ji ltar spyod pa ni// mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gal lo// 
272b7(rgyud): rdo rje e ra li nyid ni// khu bar yang ni gyur pa nyid// rig gi bde ba chen por gsungs// ri gi a ra lir sbyor ba// rdo rje sgyu ma zhes byar brjod// bud med sgyu me'i spros pa yis// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par
272b8(rgyud): rmongs/ bud med sbru ma sangs rgyas nyid// sgyu ma thams cad sel bar byed// snying po'i sngags ni a ra li/ b+he b+ho b+h+yo ha ha ha ha si si so so// mi gsal bar bzlas so// gnyis kyis nye ba'i snying po
273a1(rgyud): / ni// hu ha hA/ las rgya ba la sngags gang ni// de yi sngags su rab tu grags// snying po yi ni sngags yin no// nye snying sngags kyis skul ba yin// sgom pa bde chen myang ba ste// de bzhin dam tshig mchod pa
273a2(rgyud): nyid thams cad kyis ni dam tshig la// mi las skyes pa rab tu sngags// klu gzir gnyis mthung dam tshig ste// rmi lam rta ni rab tu grags// bsad la nye ba'i dam tshig go// dbang la khyi ni rab tu grags// khrag la
273a3(rgyud): dgug pa dam tshig ste// 'jug la de bzhin rnga mo nyid// rengs pa la ni ne'u sha/ kha na ma tho med rnyed pa// gal te bsad par bya na ni// de tshe rnal 'byor pas mi 'grub// sems can skyab sems rnal 'byor pa// 'grub 'gyur 'di
273a4(rgyud): la the tsom med// dkyil 'khor khru ni bzhi par bya// sgo la yang ni sor bzhi pa// sgo khyud sor ni gnyis su gsungs// logs la yang ni sor gnyis dang // sgo khyud kyi ni kha khyer la// sor ni bcu gsum dag tu/ 
273a5(rgyud): gsungs// lha yi snam bu sor gnyis te// rta babs sor ni bcu drug yin// sgo las sor mo gnyis kyis ni// rdo rje phreng ba de bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor snying po zlum po dang // phyogs gcig kha dog bzhi dang ni// kha dog
273a6(rgyud): lnga yi rdul chen nyid// srad bu lnga zhes bya bar brjod// gser dang yang na dngul nyid dang // mu tig dang ni byi ru dang // mu men yang dag sres nas ni// rin chen lnga ni shin du gzhug/ lha yi grungs kyi bum pa nyid// rnam
273a7(rgyud): rgyal bum pa ches che ba// bum pa bkri bo nyid du ni// sgrub pa po na dam pas bya// dang por sa ni yongs dag bya// gnyis par thig sogs gdab pa dang // lnga par dkyil 'khor bri ba dang // de bzhin drug par sbyin bsreg
273a8(rgyud): nyida'ajig rten skyong ba dbang po dang // lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bzhengs par bgyi// 'od srung ma yis bgogs byed mdzod// ji ltar bdag nyid bus de bzhin// rtag pa nyid du gtor
273b1(rgyud): ma sbyin// mtshan mo thun gcig gnas 'aM// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya// gtor ma'i sngags ni// o Sha rka ti ka sa ha na ma kra u ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+harmA NA~M a d+ya nu tAnAn tata// sa ni yongs su bzung dus su// 
273b2(rgyud): gas du byeng ba grags/ sos sa ga klu sa hrIdaga'i
273b3(rgyud): kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya~M sta~M pa g+ha sA d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge sbyong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa'o// 
273b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ a nI ba la tan tra nga nam/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba/ rdo rje ma pa' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pa// rnyog med
273b5(rgyud): rab tu bshad par bya// snang ba med cing dpe med pa// tshig med yul las shin du 'das// zhi zhing bdag med dag pa nyid// mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs// rang gis sangs rgyas de yi tshul// mtshan nyid gzhi
273b6(rgyud): yi rnam par spangs// khyad par du mdor bsdus pas// bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa yin// rmongs pa rnams la phan 'dod pas// snying rjes 'di ni bstan pa yin// kha cig bstod pa 'dod bya
273b7(rgyud): dang / rna kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang // kha cig khyab byed tshul gyis ni// blo dman dag ni 'jog par byed// de nyid nges par yang dag pa// rgyu yi gnas kyi spyod yul nyid// rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub na// sgom
273b8(rgyud): brtsed cing byang chub med// hU~M la yid ches spangs pa 'di// thog mi bla na med pa'i bdag gasgyu ma'i ye sheso lus byeng gi/ rnanas pa sna chags ston byeng gau// khacig drag po'i rang bzhon du// btsog/ 
274a1(rgyud): #/ zhi ba chen po che kha cig phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs// kha cig 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang // glu gar de bzhin sil snyen dang // lha yi sngags ni brjod pa nyid// kha cig sngags ni yang dag dgod// kha cig dkyil/ 
274a2(rgyud): 'khor 'dri ba dang // dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang // 'byung dang 'byung bas gyur pa nyid// de ltar la sogs mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje la sogs brtag/ gang che sems ni legs gnas pa// de bzhin nyid kyi
274a3(rgyud): spyod yul nyid// dkyil 'khor de bzhin gyur pa ni// phan 'dod de bzhin shes par bya// phung po khams sogs tshegs rnams kyis// gang zhig khyad par gyis bces pa// lus ngag yid gsum bcos pa'i phyir// rdul tshon
274a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zhes byas gsungs// phung po gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya gsungs// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa dang // rab bzhin med par bsgom par bya// me long lta bu lu gcig yin te/ 
274a5(rgyud): dang po'i gru ni rtogs par byed// so sor rtog pa zhes gsungs pas// shar gyi gru ni rnam par brgyan// bya ba nan tan khyad 'phags pa// byang gi glu ni rnam par spras// mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ni// bag chags rjes grub rjes thogs
274a6(rgyud): mid / gzhan du yang ni gru bzhi pa// grwa bzhi'i dbus ni thams cad du// de nyid 'di nyid rab 'jug pas// ye shes spyod yul du ni brtag/ sgo bzhi yang dag brjod pa ni// de bzhin dran pa bzhi 'byung ba/ de bzhin grwa bzhir gsungs pa ni// sbyin pa
274a7(rgyud): bzhi ni rnam dag pa// dbus su dkyil 'khor gzugs su ni// mi bskyod pa mi rnam pas brgyan// ni dang chos ston brgyan pa lags// de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor grub// dra ba dra phyed zla ba sogs// dkyil 'khor du ni bro ba dang / 
274a8(rgyud): rkababs las gus thams cad ni// ting 'dzin man lagarte babs nyid// sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste// de nyid rang bzhin las kyis gsungs// gang zhig sems kyi rab 'phel bar// tid 'dzin yan lag na ma
274b1(rgyud): phyir gnas/ de nyid dra ba zhes byar gsungs// dra ba phyed pa phyed du so// dril bu do shal btags pa ste// rang gi btsun ma rtags par byed// smra sman rnam pa la bur ni// chos rnams thams cadas sar rtogs// 
274b2(rgyud): chos rnams ma skyes mthong ba'i phyir// de nyid rgyal mo chen phreng por gsungs// bla re las gas gang bris pa// dngos tham sogs dang po sol// sems ni bla ri zhes byar bshad// dem pa'i don
274b3(rgyud): las gsungs po'o// gos phreng de dag thams cad ni// rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid// gang zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems// dga' ba'i ye shes kyis ni mtshan// de yi don du rtag tu
274b4(rgyud): gsungs// grwayi 'tshams ni thams cad du/ rdo rje rin chen rtogs bya'i phyir// rdo rje rin po che yis spras// zla ba nyi ma gang gsungs pa// thabs dang shes rab don mthong phyir// thabs
274b5(rgyud): dang shes rab bdag nyid sems// ye shes 'dis ni rnam par brgya no// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// de ltar dkyil 'khor du ni gsungs// sku gsung thugs ni nye ba'i phyir// rnams
274b6(rgyud): pa gcig pu mtshan nyid med// bla ma slob ma rnams bsal bar// rab tu 'jug pa de nyid gsungs// sbyin bsreg yang ni bshad pa dang // lha rnams tshim pa nga yis brjod// rnam rtog med pa'i
274b7(rgyud): sems gang ni// thab khung sgra yis mtshan pa nyid// bye brag phyed pas mi nang du// gzugs kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams// sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid// thams cad kyis ni bsregs blags
274b8(rgyud): / bya/ gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba// yum shing zhes ni rab tu grags// de ltar sbyin po sreg bsngags nas ni// rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya// sku gsung thugs las rtag tu ni/ gang zhig sems ni brtan
275a1(rgyud): gyur pa de nyid rab tu gnas par brjod// phung po rnams kyi dngos po gcig/ gang zhig sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// da ni gsal bar brjod par bya// yid nas/ 
275a2(rgyud): kyi ni skad du yang // gang zhig gasnga ba bdag gis brjod// skye ba med cing snang med pa// mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// gsang ba'i don ni rtogs pa'i phyir// 'di ni ngo/ 
275a3(rgyud): yis sngags su gsungs// sngags ni gsal bar bshad nas ni// lha rnams yang ni brjod par bya// phung po khams dang skye mched kyis// rang bzhin gyis ni legs gang yin// yang
275a4(rgyud): dag byang chub mthong ba nyid// de kun yang dag rab brtags shing // gal te sems kyis nyer brtags gang // lha zhes bya bar yang dge bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya lus// de
275a5(rgyud): nyid phyag rgya nyid du gsungs// lha la gsol gdab rnal 'byor ni// gsang bar nga yis brjod par bya// de nas dkyil dkrung bcas nas ni// sna yi rtse mor bltas nas kyang // rang gi rang bzhin rnam
275a6(rgyud): 'byor gyis// de nyid mthong bas bzhag par bya// snying kha'i gnas su lag po gnyis// 'bad pas mnyam par sbyar byas nas// mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin du// gang che sems ni rab rgyu ba/ 
275a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ de tshe de la skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ myor ba byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag
275a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa'i bdag/ thugs kyi rdo rje gsungs pa bzhin// yoM gi sangs rgyas thams cad 'gyur// nga yis gsal bar brjod pa nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub sbyin pa// sangs
275b1(rgyud): rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i don// thabs dang shes rab spyod yul don// sems can don du snying rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// sna rtse dkyil dkrung nga yis gsungs// de dag thams
275b2(rgyud): cad dbyibs tsam du// mdor bsdus thams cad ma byas so// res 'ga' dam tshig don du yang // de nyid zhes bya mi btung ngo // rtogs pa cung zad tsam gyis ni// gang 'gyur des ni res 'gras
275b3(rgyud): yang / gsung gi 'khor los gsungs pa bzhin// 'khor lo'i rgyu ru gsungs pa yin// rnam rtog med par lhag mos pas// sgrub po dam pas bsgrub par bya// khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha// gci
275b4(rgyud): ba dang ni gshong ba nyid// dam tshig zhes byar rab 'bad pas// gang zhig bdag gis tshigs gsungs pa// de rnams kun la de bzhin gshegs// de rnams tha snyad kyis ni gnas// gang tshe dam
275b5(rgyud): tshig 'dod chags sems// des na de nyid rab tu spyod// gang tshe sems can yod pa yin// de ltar kun du rtog pa yis// khrag ni za bar 'gyur ba'o// khrag ni chen po zos nas ni// 'od dpags
275b6(rgyud): med pa'ang bza' bar bya// gang zhig chos rnams mo skyes pa// khu ba'i sgra ni bsgrags par bya// de tshe ma skyes rtogs pa'i phyir// bza' ba yang dag gsungs pa nyid// dngos po kun gyi mnyam pa
275b7(rgyud): pa nyid// sher chen du ni rab tu dbye// mi dmigs po yi rnal 'byor pas// bza' ba zhes byar mngon par brjod// gang zhig rtag tu 'dzag pa'i sems// nus pa'i rjes su sbyor ba las// phyag
275b8(rgyud): rgya las su sbyor ba yis// de yang zhi kha'i sgra yis brjod// chos dang chos mni nges pa'i sems// dgu yi char ni gan ba nyid// chos rnams thams cad rab rtog pas// bshad par za bar yang dag brjod
276a1(rgyud): dam tshig nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'gyur// dpal bde bar rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma dri ba'i sdom pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med
276a2(rgyud): pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ya swA pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ya ten tra na ma/ bod skad du
276a3(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud zhes bya ba/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// mkhar 'gro ma yi 'khor lo bsgyur// ye shes dang ni sku gsung nyid// 'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed
276a4(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// kun du rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing // 'jig rten bya bar rab tu 'jug/ de snyed rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal// de nas de la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi// mchog tu gsad/ 
276a5(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud bshad par bya ste// gang zhig gis ni kun khyab la// rgyu dang mi rgyu ched sgong dang // lha mo thams cad bskyed byed cing // tshangs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid che// de rnams kyi ni gsang chen 'di// sgyu 'phrul chen
276a6(rgyud): mo dbang phyug che// sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo// 'byung ba yang dag skud mdzad ma// gang gis 'di kun la khyab pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum// des ni de nas 'dir bsdus nas// 'jig rten gsum po ying sde'o// 
276a7(rgyud): gsung ba pa rnams la 'di ni// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid zhes rnams grags// 'jig rten gsum sgrub rig ma ste// 'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba// gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub pa'i dbang phyug rig ma nyid// 
276a8(rgyud): lha dang nor bdag dri za dang // gnid sbyin lha min mi dang bcas// rig ma 'dzin dang gang yang rung // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// srin po dang ni sha za rnams// sgrub pa po rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dbang du 'du 'gyur
276b1(rgyud): 'byung po rnams// chu lus skyes dang thang las skyes// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// thabs brjod pa yi de las ni// rang 'byung ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams sbyor
276b2(rgyud): ba'i ma// / khams gsum po ni mi lus kun// ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing // sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'o// sangs rgyas kun la phrogs nas su// lha mchog las skyes bu mo spyod// rnal 'byor dab
276b3(rgyud): phyug byed rig pa// de bzhin du ni mig 'phrul byed// rmongs pa dang ni rengs pa dang // gsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang // nam mkhar 'gro ba nyid kyang ngo // gzhan
276b4(rgyud): gyi gro gsogs bya ba dang // mi snang ba dang gang yang rung // zhe 'dras pa dang rmugs pa nyid// de bzhin sa 'og 'gro ba 'ong // rigs 'dzin 'khor lo bsgyur nyid 'gyur// 'chi ba med cing rgas pa med// 
276b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i rig pa 'dzin// 'di yis na ba med nyid 'gyur// sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs su 'gyur// rnal 'byor pas ni rnam par byed// klags pa dang ni bsam pa dang // sgom pa dang ni
276b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin rnams// klags pas byed pa'i rig pa ste// rig pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur// brtul shugs ma ni dka' thub med// dka' skud bsnyud pa sdom med pa// dga' dang bde ba 'grub
276b7(rgyud): 'gyur te// rtag tu shes rab thabs sogs kyis// lte ba'i dbus na dpe'i' thub ste// ge bsar gisang ba'i spyod yul las// sems dang sems med bsem pa'i gzugs/ ye shes shes
276b8(rgyud): bya'i bdag nyid dga'// de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste// za mo rgyas pa bstan pa'o// a li ki li mnyam bya ste// ri me de la sbyar bar bya// ri mo'i steng du 'bar ba ni// 'og tu 'bar bar byed pa'o// 
277a1(rgyud): / khu ba'i tshul gyis 'bab pa ni// bdud rtsi thigs pa'i zla ba sogs// gang yang dbang po'i lam nas ni// de de'i rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur// mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs
277a2(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'bab// dam tshig chen po dngos grub dang // ri lu chen po sgrub pa yang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo rab sbyor dang // sdom pa'i sbyor bas byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ 'dod pa'i yon ta/ 
277a3(rgyud): lnga dang bcas/ sgrub pa'i dbang pos shes par bya// dngos grub shin du brtag pa'o// gang zhig shes pa'i dngos grub gyis// lha yi gnas su myur bar 'gyur// de ni bdag gi bshad bya ste// lha mo bden par nga sgra'o// sgyu
277a4(rgyud): 'phrul chen mo khyed la ngas// 'jig rten gsum 'grub de bshad bya// rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyi ni// bzang po'i yi ge'i phreng ba rnams// gang zhig bsam pa tsam gyis ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'grub 'gyur ba'o// 'dod
277a5(rgyud): pa kun la long spyod pa// ji ltar 'dod bzhin bstan byas nas// rnal 'byor chen po rtag rol te// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su ni// rnal 'byor bdag nyid ston par byed/ de
277a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ dngos grub chen po ster bar 'gyur// bcud len rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sa// rtag tu sems can don byed pa'o// khu ba dgug dang chang dang ni// gong bu chen po dgug pa nyid// 
277a7(rgyud): / shra chen po ni bkug nas kyang // rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig rol// tshe ring brtson 'grus chen po dang // gzi brjid tsha zhing stobs cher 'gyuraro// lha yi mug dang rdzu 'phrul ldan// nyin re zla ba 'thung ba'o// de yi tshe ni
277a8(rgyud): 'phel 'gyur te/ bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas// lta bas mi ngoms lus dang ni// cho 'phrul dag ni ston par byed// yid la bsams ma thag tu ni// rang gi gzugs ni yongs rje nyid// klags pas 'gyu
277b1(rgyud): pabadon yod pa/ rig ma'i dbang phyug sgyu 'phrul che/ 'jig rten gsum po ma lus na// nga yi rig dang mnyam pa mod// rgyud rnams kun gyi lung 'di ni// mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug
277b2(rgyud): ma'i rig ma chen mo las dngos grub kun gyi mtshan ma bstan pa ste dang po'o// // de nas rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma chen mo rnams sbyor ba'i dngos grub rab tu ster ba'i gsang ba'i yi ge bzang po bshad par/ 
277b3(rgyud): bya ste/ gang zhig bsam pa tsam gyis ni// rnal 'byor ma mchog ster 'gyur ba// dang po'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis// rtag tu dbugs ni gtong bar byed// brgyad pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ u dang thig ler bcas pa yis
277b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yis dbugs rngub byed// dngos dang dngos med rnams spangs pa'o// de la brtul zhugs ma bshad de// sngags dang phreng ba bzung ba dang / sbyin bsreg gi ni lam rnams dang // gcig nas gcig/ 
277b5(rgyud): tu ldog par 'gyur// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyid dang // sbyor ba rnam gsum shes bya ste// ye shes rnam pa gsum gyis nI/ sbrid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// de ltar rgyun du rnal 'byor pas// rtag tu goms
277b6(rgyud): pa nyid kyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa// zla ba drug gis de 'grub 'gyur// dbang po'i mdog dang yang dag ldan// dang po'i yi ge sgrom bya ste// gang gi rig pa la sbyar na/ de yi mod la myur du 'gugs// yi ge gnyi
277b7(rgyud): pab dang ldan par/ bsam zhing rnam par sgom byas nas// sa gsum po ni ma lus par// de yis thams cad dbang du 'gyur// tshangs pa dang ni khyab 'jug dang // de bzhin dbang po 'dod dbang phyug/ ye shes yi ges bskul byas
277b8(rgyud): na de dag chung mar bcas te 'gugs// yi ge los byung cha byad ni// sku gsung thugs la legs gnas par// sbyor ba rnam gsum sgom byas na// gong du 'gugs pa'i dam pa yin// yi ge kha dang yang dang ldan// sku mdog dkar po zha
278a1(rgyud): bzhig lag na thod pa chags pa'i bdag/ khub mgug pa'i mchog yin// yig gcig dang ldan pa ni// kha dog ser po kun du 'od // d+ha yi zhal gyi tshul byas na/ chang 'gugs pa'i dam pa yin// yi ge ra dang
278a2(rgyud): yang dag ldan/ kha dog dmar po 'od chen po// phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa// lce sbyang tshul du legs par gnas// kho bo'i sems kyis sgom byas na// khrag 'gugs pa'i dam pa lags// gnas drug tu ni nges sbyar bya/ rnam
278a3(rgyud): 'byor mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub// mig gnyis dang ni rna ba dang // de bzhin sna dang yid gnyis dag/ seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis bcing bar bya// srog dang rtsol ba bsnams nasu
278a4(rgyud): bsgos na skad cig de la 'bar// 'og min srid pa'i mthar thug pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten bdun// thams cad du ni de bsgoms kyang / de ni rtogs pa ma yin// gal te thams cad rab rtogs na// 'gro ba'i rol pa rnam par 'jig/ de
278a5(rgyud): phyir ye shes 'di gsang zhing // mi gsal yige med pa'o// gang phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen// rnal 'byor nyid dang yang dag ldan// gong bur song ba'i yid de yis// gzugs cig tu ni sgom par byed// g+ho ku las ni gang byung ba'i
278a6(rgyud): rdzas kyi bdag nyid rnams bsgoms la// rang bzhin med pa'i blo ldan pa'i// rnam par mi rtog pa yis bza'// 'the bo dang ni bskyod byed kyis// kha ru yid bzhin nor legs gnas// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin las byung ba// rtag pa'i dngos
278a7(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig ma chen po las sbyor brtan la dbab pa bstan pa ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad par bya// dam tshig sgrub pa'i dam pa ste// rdzas gzhan tshogs rnams
278a8(rgyud): bza' bar bya/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras ster ba'o// gang zhig zos po tsam gyis ni/ 'byung po ma lus 'grub 'gyur ba/ brtan pa dang myar 'gro ba nyid/ de bzhin du ni ba lang khyi/ chen po yang dag ldan pa ni/ de bzhin/ 
278b1(rgyud): ye shes bdud rtsi lnga/ bcu bzhi dang ni tshes brgyad la// lhan cig bsgos te sbyar byas nas// nyi ma bdun du lce sbyang gi/ dbus su bzhag la de nas gdon// lnga po dag las yungs dkar gyi// 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyi ri lu// rgyud
278b2(rgyud): 'dir gsungs kyis 'bras chen por// gzigs nas thams cad rgyud du smras pa'o// de nas 'dir sgrub thabs thams cad 'byung ba ni// yid kyi pad ma bsam byas pa// kha dog dmar po kun 'ad la// lha mo bzhi dang yang dag
278b3(rgyud): ldan/ sangs rgyas gzugs kyis gter brgyan pa'o// shAr du ud pal sngon po'i mdog/ lho ru ser po lta bu'o// nub tu dkar shing dmar ba'i 'od// byang du mar rgad 'od yin no// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od
278b4(rgyud): zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum mdzes// shar gyi lha mo ni spyan gsum pa phyag na rdo rje dang // kha T+wAM ka dang dril bu dang / thod pa bsnams par bsam mo// lho phyogs kyi lha me'i phyag na mdung rtse gsum pa dang rin po che dang ba
278b5(rgyud): dan dang / lce spyang bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na gzhu dang mda' dang / sna tshogs pad ma dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na ral gri dang zhags pa dang / rnge'u chung dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// 
278b6(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// de yi dbus su bsam par bya/ thod pa dang ni kha DA ka/ de bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid// dang po'i sngags dang yang dag ldan// bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar// de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs/ 
278b7(rgyud): nas/ rdzas kyi dngos grub 'bras rab ster// rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pas// 'phral du yang dag yid ches 'jug/ thams cad kyis ni mi mthong zhing // stong phrag gcig tu gnang bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun la phrogs pa dang / lha'i bu mo
278b8(rgyud): tshogs la spyod/ gang ga'i ji snyed sangs rgyas rnams// nyid kyi rdo rje'i gnas bzhugs pa/ lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// gang ga'i ji snyed zhing dag dang / sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid dang // 
279a1(rgyud): dngos po kun gyi mtshan nyid rnams// sems kyi rol mo las byung mkhyen// yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba yis// sngags ni de ru bsgom par bya// rdo rje mchu dang yang dag ldan// rI lu re re bzla bar bya// yi ge
279a2(rgyud): brgyad kyi mthar ldan pa// u dang thig ler bcas pa ni// mtha' ru yang dag sbyar byas la// sngags ni kun du brjod bya ste// b+hu h+ye bak+Sha e pa khye haM hUM hUM zhes bya bas so// rnal 'byor ma kun sbyor ba yis// dang po'i sngags
279a3(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan// gal te rdo rje can kun gyis// sgrub 'dod par ni gyur pa ni// lan bduni mngon bsngags rnal 'byor pas// rtog pa ru ni bza'o bar bya// yi ge gsum mtha' zhes bya ste// brgyad kyi mtha' mar
279a4(rgyud): legs gnas pa// u dang thig ler yang dag ldan// yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas// yi ge dang po'i sbyor ba yis// hri zhes bya bar yang dag ldan// yi ge rnams kyi mthar sbyar ba// sa bon lngas ni yang dag bya// yi ge yis ni
279a5(rgyud): rab bsgom te// pad ma rab tu rgyas par bya// ci ste rdo rje can grub 'dod// de lta'i sbyor ba kun shes bya// de nas 'dir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dgongs pa// dpal rdo rje'i glus srid pa shin du sgrub pa blangs la/ kye grogs po / 
279a6(rgyud): pad+ma ma kha 'byed par mdzad pa/ a la la la la ho// bde ba chen po'i gar gyis dgyes par mdzod cig/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis pad mo'i kha ni rab 'byed pa// bde ba chen po'i gar gyis rab tu dgyes par mdzad// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po
279a7(rgyud): la// de nas 'dir ni glu tsam gyis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams ga ra// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskul// de ltar rtag tu gus ldan pas// sbyor ba'i dngos grub gyur pa nyid// bud med rab tu sbyor ba yis// 'grub par 'gyur
279a8(rgyud): bsgom pa'i mchog/ rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // spos dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// de ltar sku gsum mchog ster ba'o// dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyen tsam du/ 'dzin
279b1(rgyud): / rab tu snang bar byed// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// g+ho ku la ni 'byung ba'i rdzas// sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba// de nyid bla na med pa thob// 'dir tshigs bcad du gyur pa ni// gzugs rnams dang ni de bzhin phyag rgya'i mtshan
279b2(rgyud): ma rnams// bsam gtan rnams dang sgom pa yi// cho ga'i thabs ni rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa ni// lha mo yid 'dod sna tshogs rnams ni bshad pa'o// gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di gnas pa dang // rgyun du 'chang ba dang ni klog pa dang // 
279b3(rgyud): snyam pa de la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rgas pa dang bgegs mi 'bying la 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ rgyun du dus thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug mo rnams kyis bgegs bsrung bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje rna
279b4(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams kyi dgongs pa mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i nye ba'i spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs// sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ba'i gzhi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho/ 5rgya gar gyi mkhan po a rgyu la nga sa badz+ra dang / 
279b5(rgyud): bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po glos lhas btsas gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gton la phab pa// slad nas paN+Di ti chen po zhi ba bzang po dang / klog skye shes rab brtsegs kyis gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ ya tha
279b6(rgyud): lab haM la sa maM ta na tra na ma/ bod skad du/ ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can// sa gsum gyi ni
279b7(rgyud): snying po dang ldan pa// dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas ngo bo mdzad// de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam par spyod pa'o// gal te de 'dra'i bor sems dag pa// byis pa 'di ni don dam sgom pa yi ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang bzhin mthong min
279b8(rgyud): te/ sangs rgyas dang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // rin chen rtog dang pad ldan 'jug pa ste// lha de rnams kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin// dang po'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// dang po'i chos las de rnams 'byung ba ste// mkha' dang lhan
280a1(rgyud): cig sems can rnams kyang ni// gzhug rnams su ni stan ces tshad mar byas// gdod nas dag pa'i go 'phang mkha'i mnyam mtshungs// sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang ldan yang // gang zhig chos nyid kyi ni rang bzhin
280a2(rgyud): can/ sa gsum po yi chos ni 'byung 'gyur ba// rdo rje sems dpa'adi la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sems dpa' la ni phyag 'tshal ba'i// bso rnams kyang ni mtha' yas 'byung 'gyur zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal bas/ 
280a3(rgyud): chos kyi bdag nyid chen pos thob par 'gyur// sems can thams cad yongs su bsgom par yang // bya ba 'di ni thar pa'i rang bzhin no// dngos kun rdo rje sems dpar dag byas pa'i// thar pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin bya ba ste// chos
280a4(rgyud): 'di 'jig pa med pa'i rang bzhin can// 'jig rten pas ni rang bzhin gzhan du byas// 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dag ni// chos 'di yis ni dang por 'byung ba ste// rnal 'byor gnas ni lha mo skul byed ma// der ni dang por chos/ 
280a5(rgyud): rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// der ni sngags rnams rdo rje cig sngos sgom// chos kyi rang bzhi ni rdo rje dngos dmigs bsam// ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis kyang bar brgyan naso// sku mdog kyang ni sngon po'i rang bzhin can// rdo rje
280a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dge ba ste// gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni bsgom par bya// nyi ma dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus gnas par// yi ge bskyed pa nyid du bsam par bya// yi ge'i gzugs ni yongs su gyur pa las// rdo rje rang bzhi// 
280a7(rgyud): nyid du bsam par bya// mchu' mtha' ni sngags pas bsgom bya ba// rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin te// gnyis su med pa'i sku yi rang bzhin can// rdo rje sems dpa' dmigs par bya'o// 'di ni sems nyid yongasu grub pa ste// 
280a8(rgyud): / rdo rje 'dzin pa yis ni gsungs pa yin// gang zhig sgom pa 'di yis bsgom byed pa// sems kyi rang bzhin nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni lha mo bzhi rnams ro gcig pa'o// ngo bo glus ni mkha' dang mnyam las sgom// de
280b1(rgyud): lha'i chos byas sems kyi rang bzhin ste// lha mo thar pa'i rang bzhin nyid du sgom// rdo rje sems dpa' des mthong ba// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor gnas dang rol pa ste// thams cad mnyam pa'i btsun mor/ 
280b2(rgyud): bcas/ bkod pa dag dang ldan par gnas// mkha' bcas dngos las bya de la// rdo rje sems dpa' gang mthong bar// gzung ba sangs rgyas spro bsdu'o// bi na yi bo lha mo bzhi// dbus su nges par gnas pa ste/ 
280b3(rgyud): sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis// sa gsum la ni khyab pa'o// lha yi der ni kha bzhi pa'i// lha tshogs rdo rje nyid yin no// de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// rnams 'phrul thams cad 'di yi'o// ji lta ji ltar
280b4(rgyud): sems can rnams// skye bar 'gyur ba la nyid de// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul ni// sna tshogs rdo rje yin par 'gyur// de las gang byung lta kun kyang // rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul yin// sems
280b5(rgyud): can rnams ni chos kyi ngobyor lta// sa gsum thams cad gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid// ral pa mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyis gzigs shing // de yis rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma kun mthong // lha'i dam
280b6(rgyud): tshig gi le'u ste dang po'o// / rtag tu mchog ldan khyod kyi ni// dam tshig lha mo thams cad kyi// mchog tu gyur pa'i lha mo ni/ du mchis bdag cag zhu bar 'tshal// de la
280b7(rgyud): glu bzhi gsungs pa ste// steng dang dbyer med byas pa'i chos mnyam rang snang ma// zhi la thar pa ma dang mchog mnyam mnyam byed ma// gang phyir sgyu ma 'dzag pas sangs rgyas rnams dang mnya mo// mkha' mnyam
280b8(rgyud): thams cad rol pa zhi ba med pa'o// ru lu ru lu b+h+yo ru d+ha/ mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun tu rol pa ste// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang ni sgra bstan chos mnyam snang / lhan cig gnas min cha ste rang nyid pi wang mtshungs// 
281a1(rgyud): byas pa'i snang bu dang ni mnyam par gyur pa'o// gang zhig chos rnams sdong pa nam mkha' du rdzun me // de ni ni mad pagazugs can ste/  rje'i ga pa der ni ga zug cogs 'dzu
281a2(rgyud): son gyis/ bde bo mI bzang chu sogs zla dang mnyam sgrol mdzad pa'o// nal 'byor gnas ni dri ma 'dzi rje'i tshul 'di ni// du ma'i gzugs 'dzin de ni rdo rje dang mnyam ning // nying dang 'dra ba'i sems do 'arnas ni sgro
281a3(rgyud): mdzad pa'i/ rdo rje dbyings dang lhan gcig mchog stsol mdzad// rang bdag mkha'o mnyam bzhugs la bskul ba ni// gang zhig rtse gcig sems kyis 'di nyan cing // brjod bcas sems kyis glu 'di 'dzin pa'o// glu 'di/ 
281a4(rgyud): namamakha' dang ni mnyam pa ste// der ni gzugs bcas rdo rje len pa'i phyir// rdo rje'i bdag nyid thugs ni sad byed cing // rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir na rgyud kyang len par 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig ste rdo rje gzhan
281a5(rgyud): rang bzhin/ sngags pas thags chud dkyil 'khor kun bsgoms shing // chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus nas pad mchog de ru bsgom pa// dkyil 'khor dbus gnas chos ni hUM gi dbye ba can// gzugs
281a6(rgyud): rnams thams cad sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par brtag/ thugs kyi ngo bor gcig bsam rdo rje theg pa'o// sems ni mkha' mnyam sems kyi theg pa'ang rang bzhin med// gnyis ga'i rang bzhin yang ni lus can ma
281a7(rgyud): min te/ der ni rdorje lani med pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa' khyed ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin ste// 'jig rten pa la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du mdzad// sems can 'dul ba'i rang bzhin du ni sad mdzad pa// kye lugs
281a8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni gcig pa'i dngos// snyamo pa nis smras rdo rje kun du spangs pa ste/ nang du gnas pa'i de rje'i rol par ldan pa dang / thugs kyi ngo bor nyid kyis der ni rab tu gnas/ thug kyis gsangang gi
281b1(rgyud): chos ri rnam par byung ba'o// rnam pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo sbyor zhing // spros pa'i rdo rje slar yang bsgrubs te// sems kyi rang bzhin du ni gcig phyir// sems ni 'gog par gyur pa na// kun kyang mnyam ning mtshungs par
281b2(rgyud): mthong / yang dang yid du sngags bsdus pas// cig pa'i rnam para~M bya ba'o// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// bram ze dang ni gdol pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin du// chos rnas kun gyi rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyis
281b3(rgyud): gsungs pa'o// gcig gi rang bzhin la gnas dam pa'i dngos po ste// de la rdo rje can gyis mnyam pa'i ngo bor gsungs// bram ze dang ni khyi dang gcig pa'i dngos yin zhing // rus pa'i rgyan rnams kyang ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje
281b4(rgyud): go 'phang de la bden pa'i rang bzhin no// rnal 'byor de la mnyam pa'i ngo bor nges mthong ste// de dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin sim can rnams la sbas// de yi rnal 'byor rang bzhin lha mos gsungs pa ni// lha mo thams cad de
281b5(rgyud): ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te// gtso bo dang bcos mdzes pa gcig pu 'byud 'gyur khyod// mnyam pa rang bzhin de ni sngags pa gcig pu ste// rdo rje rnam por sad par byed pa gcig pu nyid// der ni zhe sdang rang bzhin
281b6(rgyud): dag ni zhig pa ste// yan lag phyed pa'i chos ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba srin// der ni rdo rje'i btsun mo gcig rang bzhin// gang tshe rdo rje la ni dbyangs kyis stong pa'i tshe// lha yi gau yon gyi phyed dang gcig tu gyur par lha// lung / 
281b7(rgyud): nyid tshang mar byas nas rdo rje sems phyag byas te sgom// gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u sna gsum pa'o// / glang po dang ni rta dang mI dang khyi dang ni// ba lang sha ste thams cad ma lus gyur pa rnams// 
281b8(rgyud): dam tshig do nyid gcig pa'i rang banan nyid yin te// mkhri' mnyam rung bzhin can gyis rnal 'byor pas bza' ba'i// dam tshig 'di ni snya ma bani pos gsungs pa'o// rnal 'byor pa ma/ 
282a1(rgyud): / la sgom pa'i sems dang ldan gyur cing // sems gcig pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid 'grub 'gyur te// dngos po nyid dang bcas pa'i thugs ni skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dngos mdzad zhi ba ma gsungs snying
282a2(rgyud): po ste/ 'di ltar chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs bya zhing // de ltar mkha' dang mnyam par rnam par spyad par bya// lho 'di rnam snang lha mo lha rnams de'i bdag nyid// rdo rje theg pa la ni mnyam pa'i rang bzhin
282a3(rgyud): ste/ skul byed mos ni srid pa'i rang bzhin yin phyir ro// gcig pa'i dang po rdo rje sems te skur mthong ba// rdo rje'i theg par 'dod rnams lha mos 'di skad gsungs// bden pa skyed pa 'di ni rnam snang lha mos
282a4(rgyud): gsungs 'di ni zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgoms pa rdo rje'i gsang sngags te// de ni sems gcig pa yis rdo rje rnam bsgoms pa// rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa nyid do// rnal 'byor gnas kyi dbus gnas rdo
282a5(rgyud): rje'i rang bzhin bsgoms// sa ni rdo rje'i theg par 'di skad du/ chos rnams gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan/ sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // dngos med mi rtag pa las dngos bcas lus sgom
282a6(rgyud): min/ lha mos bskul bar byed pa'i dngos po ste// de ltar chos las nges par brtag bya ba// sems ni nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang // dngos po theg pa med pa'i dngos por bya// dngos po'i rang bzhin la ni theg pa
282a7(rgyud): med pa ste// sems ni nam mkha' nyid dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang // snga ma ji bzhin sems ni rnam par sbyar bar bya// ji ltar de ni dngos por bya ba ste// dngos po 'di ni theg par mi 'gyur te// sems can nas/ 
282a8(rgyud): mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang // dbus su tshig ni chos la nges rtog par// sems las dngos po nyid du bya ba ste// rnam pa du ma'i tshul gyis rang bzhin gyi// rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed par bya'o// ji ltar dngas zhing
