282b1(rgyud): rnyog pa med pa'i chu// 'di 'dra'i sems ni myur ba'i ngo bor sgrub// de ltar bstan du med pa 'di ni nga yis bstan// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyis// bzhi pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor bya ba ste// de la rdo rje'i chu ni yid dam lha'i rang
282b2(rgyud): bzhin can// thugs kyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor pas bza' bya// chos dang dge 'dun dang rdo rje'i ste// de rnams mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te// zhag dang khrag sogs mchog tu mdzes par rab bzhugs dngos po'i lus ni bsgyur
282b3(rgyud): bar bya/ bza' ba dang bcas mel stan la sogs de rnams thams cad 'di'i rang bzhin gang zhig ting nge 'dzin du nges par bstan pa'ang de dang cig pa'i rang bzhin no// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsum cher rdo rje ngo bo mdzad// 
282b4(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje can gyis bsgyur ba'i rang bzhin nyid du gsungs// de'i rang bzhin mkha' mnyam so sor snang bar 'gyur// sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par bstan pa yis// rdo rje
282b5(rgyud): yi ni nges par 'jug par bya ba ste// sems can rang bzhin la ni theg pa med// sems ni de la gnas pa'i snying bri'o// de lha'i ngo bos thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi// sngags pa khyod ni 'grub par 'gyur ba ste// thugs dang
282b6(rgyud): spro dang slar yang bsdus bya bo// gsum cir yang ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin no// sems ni ri rib hUM dang mnyam bya ste// dag pa'i sangs rgyas su ni sems slar bskyed// sems dub gyur nas slar yang bsdu ba dag/ der ni
282b7(rgyud): sngags pas des brtag bsgom par bya// bsdus pa'i ngo bos slar yang sbyar bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa' der ni sku g.yos mdzad// slar yang nam mkha'i ngo bos khro bas te// de ltar spros dang bsdus pa'i rang bzhin
282b8(rgyud): no// de la rdo rje sems dpa' gcig dngos grub pa'i phyir// de'i phyir spre bas rdo rje 'chang du rigs// sngags pas bsnyen par gyur na spro// bstan par ma gyur 'dir smos pa// lus nyon mongs kyi 'bras mi 'byin// nges
283a1(rgyud): par 'grub 'gyur theg pa'i dngos// thams can bden pa 'di rnams bstan// de lta'i chos ni bsgom byed pa'i// dngos po rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems ni smad mi bya// gang yang
283a2(rgyud): / drim cis kyang gos pa min/ kye rnal 'byor pa/ bcom ldan 'das yum skul byed ma ni dang po'i rang bzhin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byor pa bskyed mdzad pa'o// rjes su 'dzin pas bsgoms
283a3(rgyud): pa'i sems dang ni// yi ge hU~M gis kyang ni 'grub 'gyur ba// brla dang rkang pa dag tu rnam rtog pa'i// rmongs pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin no// 'jig rten ga sum gyi 'khor lo 'di nyid ni// rdo rje 'od zer gyis
283a4(rgyud): ni yang dag bcings// sngags pas nam mkha' khams su khro bo'i lha// bye ba stong phrag dag ni spro bya ste// cig pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i rdo rjer ni// slar yang nges par bsdu bar bya ba yan// byang chub theg pa
283a5(rgyud): sems kyi rang bzhin te// byang chub kyang ni sems kyi rang bzhin no// gnyi ga rang bzhin sems kyi theg pa ste// sems kyang mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no// rgyud gzhan dang thun mong gi le'u
283a6(rgyud): ste lnga pa'o// / ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po k+ka ka ga na dang / lo tsA ba mang po dge slong
283a7(rgyud): byang chub shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI b+ha gA wan e ka dza Ta ma hA ka la pa tan tra rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan
283a8(rgyud): 'das ral pa gcig pa'i brtag pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyage 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can bya
283b1(rgyud): gnas rdo rje ri bo'i them na bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jigs byed rgyal po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdong can dang / ye shes bkod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
283b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po gsang ba'i de kho na shin du sbas pa'i mdzod la mnga' brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par nges pa/ rigs dang tshogs dang dam tshig dang brtul zhugs chen po phyag rgya rgya
283b3(rgyud): mtsho lta bu'i ngang tshul la gnas pa/ gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba'i bde ba chen po la rnam par rol pa/ thabs dang shes rab bla na med pa'i kha sbyor las nges par 'byung ba'i ye shes can/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi kun
283b4(rgyud): nas ldang ba dang bag la nyal 'joms pa la mkhas pa dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje ston las langs te pus mo g.yas lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo
283b5(rgyud): sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje che// rdo rje rgyal po kun bdag po// sangs rgyas thams cad skyed mdzad yab// bde rkyen rgyal po bdag la gsungs// srid gsum
283b6(rgyud): thibs po sel mdzad cing // mya ngan 'das la mi gnas pa// lus can kun skyob brtse chen po// 'dren pa khyod lam bstan du gsol// blo gros snying rje brtan ldan pas// thabs ni gang zhig mngon bsgoms
283b7(rgyud): nas/ sku lnga phyag rgya 'grub 'gyur ba// gtso bo de ni 'dir bshad gsol// rdo rje dkyil 'khor cher 'byung ba// 'bum phrag rgyud chen las gsungs pa// ral pa gcig 'phyang dkyil 'khor gratse// sbas
283b8(rgyud): ba gang lags brtse bas gsungs// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i bdag po rab tu dgos pas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog lnga pa phyung ste/ 
284a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te slar 'dus pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yongs sbyangs te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la skor ba lan gsum byas nas spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur
284a2(rgyud): to/ de nas yang dbu'i gtsug tor gyi nor bu las zla ba dang kun d+ha lta bu'i 'od zer dkar po byung ste/ dbu'i steng du dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par 'byung ba'i rnam par bkod pa mngon som du gsal bar mdzad/ 
284a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snying rje chen po khyod sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
284a4(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'byung ba'i mdzod/ rdo rje sgeg pa chen po ral pa gcig pa'i gsang mchog zhus pa legaso legs so// rdo rje 'chang 'di ni khyod kyi dus yin cing / 'di ni khyod kyi/ 
284a5(rgyud): snang bar byed pa yin no// nga yang sngon rdo rje ri bo'i zom 'di nyid du byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ye shes ral pa gcig pa'i gsang
284a6(rgyud): ba lcen cig tu rnam par rol pas sems can dpag tu med pa smin par byas pa rjes su dran no// de bas na khyod kyis snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pas gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi nges par 'byung
284a7(rgyud): ba'i rtog pa 'di legs par nyon la yid la zung shig/ ngas khyed la bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// / 
284a8(rgyud): oM AHhUM/ oM hr-i traM hUM/ oM A saR+Wa ta thA ga to gan+d+he badz+ra tat+t+wa dzA na dza la hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A sar+b+ba ta thA ga to ma tri badz+ra tat+ta pa ya badz+ra s+pha ra Na be hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A badz+ra dz+nyA na hU~M phaT/ oM A badz+re pA ya hUM phaT/ 
284b1(rgyud): AM badz+ra tsakra A hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A badz+ra rad na i hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra pad ma u hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra bi sha e hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra mo hA A hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM AHbadz+ra wa ra Na i hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra/ 
284b2(rgyud): rA gA A hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A~MHbadz+ra dwe Sha e hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra s+pho ra oM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra yo ga oM hU~M phaT swA hA oM AHbadz+ra dz+wa la A hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra ba la a hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra ru
284b3(rgyud): pa ni kra hUM pheT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra shap+ta tsa hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra g+hen d+ha Ta hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHra se te hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra yar ShA pa hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra d+harme ra ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AH
284b4(rgyud): badz+ra kA tra sha hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra A lo kri k+Sha hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra a~M gu sha ro hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra pa sha rA hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra ban d+ha li hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra g+ha Da Ta li hUM phaT
284b5(rgyud): swA hA/ oM swa b+hA be shud d+ha sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma swa b+hA ba shud dz+ha ni/ oM badz+ra shud d+ha sar+ye d+har+m+ma badz+ra shud d+ha rge/ oM yoM ga shud d+ha sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma yo ga shud d+d+ho ha~M/ rdo rje mi bskyod bla ral pa gcig/ mi bskyod mu ni byang sems bcas// 
284b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / pad ma sna tshogs rnam par bsgom// gti mug bag chag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor lor bcas// ri rob nyi zla ba ngan las// 'byung bzhi'i rdo rje de bzhin no// khyams
284b7(rgyud): bzhir me long pa wang dang // dri mchog zhal zas las byung ba// gzugs sgra dra ro rdo rdo rje ma/ mkhas pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ phyogs bral na bza' chos 'byung dang // maN+Dal mar me las skyes pa/ 
284b8(rgyud): muM zhes shAs gi rdo // sgo bzhir lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu yongs gyur pas// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs sgom// rang mtshan ka pa las rab mdzes// gtum drag tshang tshing dkrigs pa
285a1(rgyud): / dang / 'ur 'ur 'bar bas khyab pa dang // keng rus 'jigs rung shar sogs kyi// phyogs su g.yon bskor gyis legs gnas// ha ha rgod pa dbang ldan du// byin zar dpal gyi nags tshal
285a2(rgyud): lo/ mun pa ma zad bden bral du// rlung du ka la ki lar sgrogs// ma mnyam med pra zur bzhi yin// dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste// bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs bzhi// rnam thar brgyad ni ka ba brgyad// byang chub
285a3(rgyud): yan lag bdun dag phyir// dra ba dang ni dra ba byed// phyogs bzhi tshad med bzhi yin te// pad ma 'khor lo shes rab thabs// rnam par shes brgyad yongs dgra pa// de ni dur khrod chen po brgyad// zla bo me long
285a4(rgyud): nyi mnyam nyid// sa bon mtshan ma kun du rtog/ yongs gyur bya ba grub pa ste// nyer rdzogs chos dbyangs ye shes yan// lnga pad dang na dri ma bzhi// chen po bzhi dang spyod yul brgyad// rnam bzhi tshor ba rnam
285a5(rgyud): dag lte/ ye shes bdag nyid 'khor lo'o// pU dza o a go ra daM ma ka o tra ko ka la ka hi pre gr-i so su na sa me ka/ ha hi hu hai ho hAM/ a a u e o aM/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin// rnam par 'joms
285a6(rgyud): dang rnam mtshan bral// dga' dang mchog dga' dga' bral dang // lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid do// dgod dang phrad ma khyud 'khrig pa dag/ bde chen dag phyir bum pa dang // gsang ba shes rab bde ba che// 
285a7(rgyud): dbang bzhi rgyal po thob par 'gyur// dza hUM baM ho// dmigs pas dub drang gzhan goms 'dod// rnam par ma rtog de nyid bsgom// rmi lam nam mkha'i sbyor ba ni// nyin mtshan rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ 
285a8(rgyud): spyi bo snying kha lte bar ni/ zla ba pad me nyi steng de/ ha dang hUM dang A zhes pa/ yi ge bde gsal mi rtog rgyu// snying po 'pho dang thi ma dang gnas// 'gyur dang 'gul dang 'phar ba dang // mda' bsnun bsdu dang 'gro 'ong spyod/ 
285b1(rgyud): shIr+m+ma sa ni nI bder 'gro// beskaMm nas 'phro zhing 'brer b.ru bye // rI bang du byed dA khA b+h+yo d+h+r-i sgroma?// 'dun a sgrub dang s+yA d+hin bsgyur// 'apr-in dun bAR+Sho den tron+ya sgrub 'gyur// tshe 'dri'i myan d+ha bzhin du// nyid
285b2(rgyud): skyes sbyor drang srad 'tshams yod// rnal 'byor rgyalnga po thabs ldan pa ste// bad chen s+ye gusum ba blag 'gro// sIng wI dgre da d+his pa dang / rten 'brel 'byung dang bzlog dang bsad / zhi rgyas dban dang
285b3(rgyud): br-i sr-ig+ha sa'ad+hi la bA rlom mi bya'o// gnyis sbyor ts+tshar+ya mri 'chang bde dang // kun nas khyod gsal lhan cig skyes// bung bus me tog rdzawAR+Sha ni// rnam pa kun pa don sgrub pa'o// or+tha/ shru D+he mU dz+dza t+su d+ha
285b4(rgyud): Na ma nut+sa ta swa b+ha ba nuHswi pra ba hAM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad tsesta bAMka?'i stsal ba dang / byang chub sem+b+has dpyanya chen po phyag na rdo rje la sngogs pa 'khor de dge thams cang rab tu sid rang ste/ tshigs
285b5(rgyud): b+h+yab+h+ya/  swA badz+ra pa 'di dag gis man sbyin pa sto / seMn+t+r-i 'i sa mu gyis mi khyod pa thams cad kyi sa mdzod byu ga bu seMn bur g+hur tISh+Tha 'jig rten dgon bcom ldan lce ga pa gro ba nyon mongs
285b6(rgyud): skyo slad du// stong pa'i dang dzin spangs nas na// khyod kyis byams N+Din+ya skr-i bA sman mdzad// thugs rje rkyen po bcom ldan logs// // sem saM D+yan sdug bsngal bsgra lci skrod du// zh-i ba mthaSh+Ti lA n+ti
285b7(rgyud): nIs bang/ bde tshun+da rnA mya bor 'phrul par mdzad/ b+hi chen rgyal ma btso'i sprin legs// lus can byed don sgrib slad du// zag med dbyings thugs ma gzhol bar// dge skye rmA ni s+ya du sna
285b8(rgyud): sa// go tsi bau rdo NAM n+ya kr-i mr-i legs/ skye bo dab pa d+ha laM sau phyir/ mtha' ky-i rig rgyan chad mi bzhi gas pa ro/ l+ya lusa? 'tshe l+ya ba sgrub pA R+sha dau// de n+tasa? 'khor gyi tshogs phal mo tshe de dag
